host_about:
Premier Kauai Vacation Rentals is owned by Cindy Plemer. Cindy is Hawaii-born and raised, waking up every day to the privilege of calling one of the most beautiful places in the world home: the Garden Isle of Kauai.

My passion has been connecting the land I love to guests, owners, sellers, renters and visitors throughout the world, turning dreams of Kauai into an attainable, magical reality.

By living the spirit of aloha, creating moments of a lifetime on Kauai for those around me, deep knowledge of the Kauai market, and real estate sales expertise, I have been successful in many areas of real estate. Beginning as a Resort General Manager for some of the world's largest hoteliers to property management experience and real estate sales, I've been entrusted to care for assets exceeding well over $50,000,000.

Whatever the occasion, if we may be of assistance, we are happy to be of service to you here on Kauai.

description:
Retreat to Hale 'Io (named after the Hawaiian hawk residing near by), a studio apartment tucked away on a vibrant and lush coffee farm in Captain Cook! You've a private bath and kitchenette, queen size bed. Fruits, vegetables, coffee, and herbs galore. A wonderful sweetheart escape for the adventurous, set just 2 miles from Kealakekua Bay a marine preserve with spectacular snorkeling and hiking. And 2.5 miles from the City of refuge. The perfect headquarters for your Big Island explorations.

The space
Our small coffee farm is verdant and alive with the sounds of birds through the day, and coqui frogs at night. During the week there might be farm noises, as we work cultivating our coffee. Your space is located on the front of the house, directly under our living room. you might hear us sometimes, but we are in bed by 9pm.
You will have well equipped kitchenette, fridge, slow cooker, nutribullet blender, pots and pans and double hot plate- all you’ll need
neighborhood_overview:
Our farm sits on a west slope Mauna Loa volcano, it's nestled between many others coffee farms. Thanks to larger properties, there is a sense of tranquility and peace. Cooler temperatures in the 1800 feet elevation allow for good sleep under the blanket. The days are warm and comfortable.
It’s ok to walk around the farm, there are fruits and herbs to try.
host_about:
My husband is a retired school teacher (middle school shop and ceramics) and I used to work as a class support and therapy provider with autistic children of a young age for 13 years. 
     We now have a seven year old boy,  and a coffee farm- both of which we are trying to nurture, while hoping to find time for our own passion ART. We are about to set up our own ceramics studio…..yay!
     We all love good food and traveling, opening an Airbnb was a logical step, because we do love to meet people from different parts of the world and learn about their homes and experiences.

description:
Welcome to Hokulani 414, you're home away from home at the Honua Kai Resort! This 1 bedroom/1 bathroom condo is bright and airy, with partial ocean views. You are only a short stroll away from some of Maui's most beautiful beaches, swimming pools, Duke's, and 24-hour gym. A dream Maui vacation; 7 pools, a waterslide, hot tubs, barbecues, and more, you have everything you need to relax and unwind in style. Live the good life on your next vacation- by booking with Maui Westside today!

The space
As you settle in to Hokulani 414 take a moment to enjoy the beautiful southern exposure and partial ocean views from the lanai, picture yourself sipping coffee as the sun rises over the mountains and trees before meeting the ocean.

Inside, you'll discover everything you need to make your stay comfortable and convenient. Sink into the plush king-size bed in the bedroom, or stretch out on the cozy queen-size sofa bed in the living room. With smart TVs in both rooms
neighborhood_overview: The Honua Kai resort is located on the magnificent North Kaanapali Beach on the west side of Maui near Lahaina town. This resort has seven pools & numerous hot tubs you can enjoy during your stay, including a water slide! In each tower lobby there is a shop you can get snacks, drinks, amenities & more from. There is valet parking & bellhops  to assist you as well as self parking available. Duke’s restaurant is onsite & offers  breakfast, lunch and dinner along with pool service at the 3 main pools. There are BBQs throughout the resort for your use & easy access to the beach. The A'ina gourmet market in the Hokulani lobby & the Whalers General store in the Konea lobby provide everything from a bottle of milk to a bottle of fine wine. Take a stroll down the beach path & enjoy snorkeling at airport beach or soak in a sunset over the water.
host_about: Live 'The Good Life' on Maui with Maui Westside! Our family-owned business is dedicated to making your island getaway unforgettable. With local expertise, friendly staff, & free concierge services, we're here to ensure you have a great stay. We are a fully licensed & legal property management & real estate brokerage firm - license #RB-21121. Please feel free to contact us via email, text, or call during your stay.

neighborhood_overview: Maui’s unique and varied terrain offers a multitude of activities. From relaxing on some of the world’s most beautiful white sand beaches to the more adventurous undertakings of zip-lining and paragliding. Kihei Bay Vista's location is such that there are many activities and attractions right at your finger tips. Some of Maui’s top attractions are: Maalaea Harbor; many boats leave from Maalaea on snorkeling trips, deep sea fishing, scuba diving, whale watching (in season), sunset cruises, and more. It is much faster to leave from Maalaea Harbor than Lahaina Harbor when taking trips to Molokini Crater and Turtle Town. Other attractions include Maui Ocean Center, Haleakala Volcano, Shops at Wailea, Iao Valley, Wailea Golf Club, King Kamehameha Golf Club, Maui Tropical Plantation, and the Whale Sanctuary. The town of Kihei is a quant, laid-back beach town boasting some of Maui’s most pristine stretches of white sand and turquoise waters. South Maui is fun for couples and families alike. Y

neighborhood_overview: Poʻipū Beach Park is located in the community of Poʻipū on the southern coast of Kauaʻi island in Hawaii. The beach is a park has lifeguards provided by the county of Kauaʻi.
host_about:
Suite Paradise – The gateway to island living.

Suite Paradise in sunny Poipu Beach on Kauai is home to hundreds of vacation rental properties, amenable to any sized group and any specifications you could think of. With the highest level of service and a wide range of vacation rental options, Suite Paradise can ensure that your stay is as seamless as Kauai’s lifestyle.

Choose from luxurious beach resorts, each with multiple pools and spas within walking distance and top-of-the-line amenities, including, but not limited to, full membership to Poipu Beach Athletic Club for the duration of your stay. Poipu Kai consists of 70 acres of lush tropical foliage and some of Kauai’s most sought-after vacation rentals. One complex is literally located nestled in a verdant and extinct volcano crater – you can’t get more immersed in the island lifestyle than that! From mauka (mountain) to makai (sea), Suite Paradise has something for you!

Kahala – A popular complex that is home to mostly one- and two-bedroom units. Kahala is only a short walk from the beach, and closest to Poipu Kai’s tennis courts and Kalapaki Joe’s sports bar. With the option of both mountain and ocean views available dependent on the unit, Kahala’s location is perfectly situated with proximity to Poipu Road as well as the Poipu Kai greenbelt.

Makanui – Two- and three-bedroom units perched across from Poipu Crater, with stunning mountain views, distant ocean views, and a short walk to the greenbelt path.

Manualoha –Less than a mile from the beach, although the complex pool is practically attached to the Pacific Ocean! With units sleeping four to six, easy access to the greenbelt pathway, and hues of purple bougainvillea draped throughout the complex.

Poipu Sands – One- and two-bedroom units with incredible ocean views, spacious lanais, and a short walk to Shipwreck’s Beach.

Regency – Larger units, spacious enough to accommodate up to 10 guests. Many of these units are newly remodeled and offer AC. Regency and Kahala sit right next to each other.

Regency Villas – Luxury units with central AC. Regency Villas often feature a loft and sleep up to five guests. Situated near the greenbelt for easy access to many resort amenities, and centrally located for a short walk to Brennecke's Beach, or access to the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort.

Nihi Kai Villas - A comfortable and quiet beach resort with 70 condos to choose from. Located right across from the ocean.

Poipu Crater – Just as the name says, Poipu Crater is nestled in a verdant an extinct volcano crater, which makes the foliage truly breathtaking. With 30 condos to choose from, sleeping four to six guests, the choice is yours! Enjoy the tropical gardens and central location to all that Poipu has to offer.

Lawai Beach Resort - Luxurious oceanfront condos located directly across from arguably the best snorkeling spot on the island. Enjoy a short stroll to five-star dining at The Beach House or enjoy the view from Lawai Beach, as the surfers paddle out for a sunset session. With room to sleep up to six, Lawai Beach Resort has it all!

Poipu Kapili - A beautiful and peaceful resort located on five acres of meticulously landscaped oceanfront property.

Pili Mai - This is Kauai’s newest resort development of luxury condominiums, nestled among a championship golf course.

Wake up to the smell of fresh local coffee brewing as you catch up on local news in the living room with two sofas and two plush chairs. The modern wooden indoor living space has seating for six.

The sleek kitchen will inspire your chef to prepare local finds from the Farmer's Market for everyone to enjoy. The kitchen features modern amenities including a full-sized fridge, stove/oven, mi
host_about:
Kaha Lani Resort vacation rentals in Lihue are one of Kauai’s best-kept secrets!

Our condominiums bring you prime views of Kauai’s oceanfront. Think swaying palm trees, fine white sand, and dreamy ocean blues. Spend your days sun-kissed at our heated swimming pool and sundeck or snorkel at Lydgate Beach Park. At Kaha Lani Resort you can sunbathe at the sandy beach, challenge a friend to a tennis match, and then summon your family for a barbeque as the sun goes down.

With these Lihue condo rentals, you get all the benefits of resort-style Kauai accommodations in a place as comfortable as home. We have laundry facilities, DVD rentals in the lobby, and free parking, making it easy to come and go as you please for as long as you like.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

Spend quiet mornings at a countertop bar with coffee & river views & whip up breakfast in a kitchenette with a fridge and induction cooktop. Even a suite of small appliances is at the ready, including a blender, coffeemaker, toaster & microwave.

We currently manage over 300 properties in South Maui, which is also where our office is located, making it convenient should guests need assistance day or night.

description:
Beautiful 1 Bedroom 1 Bath eco-friendly off-grid home built on an old lava flow out of 3~ 40’ cargo containers. But once you step in this home you will have no idea you were inside former containers. It was built with quality and function in mind. There are 3 large sliding glass doors with views of the ocean & old lava landscape. We have large windows to view the Kīlauea Volcano.
The whole building is 2 homes. The other is a 3 Bedroom 1 Bath also available for rent. Around 12 adult guests total

The space
This beautiful shipping container Home was built on an old lava flow. It’s has clear ocean views, an expansive view of Kīlauea volcano out the back, it’s eco-friendly in so many ways, off-grid utilities (solar power and UV filtered water catchment), surrounded by amazing lava landscape, awe inspiring night sky filled with more stars than you have ever seen before. You will also enjoy the incredible ocean breeze that refreshes and cools you day & night.
neighborhood_overview: Guests can enjoy the peace and quite of God’s creation here in this place. You can also visit many of the major “tourist” sites within an hour of this home. Whether you want to see waterfalls, hike on old lava flow, visit a black sand beach or just have an amazing Wednesday night out at Uncle Robert’s this location is like no other.
host_about:
They say, “when you do what you love, you never work a day in your life.” Managing property and traveling through America’s coastal region has armed me with the experience necessary to provide you with a quality place to stay in some of the country’s most stunning locations. 

I have been a property manager and owner for 19 years. 30 years ago, I made Lantana my home, and I am proud to say it is still the great coastal town that I grew up loving. Whether you enjoy going to the beach, boating, shopping, or sampling the local fare, Lantana is the place to go - and stay a little while. 

I have also spent a lot of time on the Big Island of Hawaii, and like most, remain fascinated by all that it has to offer.  This was why I took on the adventure of converting shipping containers into off-grid vacation bungalows on the lava fields of Kalapana. It was an adventure I will never forget. These lush interiors are situated directly on the lava field and under a night sky lit by thousands of twinkling stars.  With the ocean as your view and Kilauea volcano in your backyard, it is truly a once in a lifetime experience you won’t soon forget. 

A hui hou,
Ron
Living a Joyful & Blessed Life

neighborhood_overview: Our dwelling is historical. It was built in 1944 by Greenwell Ranch to house their Paniolo (cowboy) workers.  The site is approx. 20,000 sf and very fertile with much rich soil (not so common in Kona).  Many guests refer to the yard as a botanical garden with many varieties of orchids and colorful vines and plants. The guest house is completely detached and a good 100 feet away.   There are privacy barriers between guest house and main house and a completely private entrance.  It is well lit with motion sensor floodlights at night.  There is also a gravel driveway through our yard right up to the  guest house if guest party is packing heavy suitcases.  The neighborhood is fairly standard Hawaii style residential houses mostly inhabited by long term residents. There are no barking dogs. One can park up by the guest house if one wishes, but navigation is a little tricky. Otherwise, a space in the detached garage is for the guest.
host_about: More than 45 year resident of Hawaii. I appraise properties, golf and generally enjoy the laid back casual ambiance of Hawaii.  My wife loves gardening and landscaping. Come join us "e komo mai" - you are welcome here.

The Apartment is on Paoakalani Avenue, home to the famous Tiki's Grill & Bar just off Waikīkī's main thoroughfare, Kalākaua Avenue. It's a 2-minute walk to Kūhiō Beach Park, a section of Waikīkī Beach home to the Kapahulu Groin (Waikīkī's iconic pier), rock seawalls and ocean pools.

Local attractions are Kapiʻolani Park (Honolulu's Central Park), Honolulu Zoo and Waikīkī Aquarium. It's a 7-minute stroll to the Duke Kahanamoku Statue in the heart of Waikīkī and a 10-minute walk to the International Market Place (a shopping, dining and entertainment complex).

Popular restaurants nearby include d.k. Steak House, Sansei Seafood Restaurant & Sushi Bar, Momosan and Yoshitsune (Japanese), Arancino Di Mare (Italian), Cheeseburger in Paradise and Denny's Diner (American), Queensbreak (locally inspired), Tucker & Bevvy (grab-and-go) and Barefoot Beach Cafe (oceanfront food outlet). There's also a row of Food Trucks beside the building and a late-night Domino's Pizza in th

host_about:
Kaha Lani Resort vacation rentals in Lihue are one of Kauai’s best-kept secrets!

Our condominiums bring you prime views of Kauai’s oceanfront. Think swaying palm trees, fine white sand, and dreamy ocean blues. Spend your days sun-kissed at our heated swimming pool and sundeck or snorkel at Lydgate Beach Park. At Kaha Lani Resort you can sunbathe at the sandy beach, challenge a friend to a tennis match, and then summon your family for a barbeque as the sun goes down.

With these Lihue condo rentals, you get all the benefits of resort-style Kauai accommodations in a place as comfortable as home. We have laundry facilities, DVD rentals in the lobby, and free parking, making it easy to come and go as you please for as long as you like.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

Great place to stay if you enjoy walking - walk everywhere! Quiet mornings with turtles and the beach all to yourself and the birds- a walkers paradise!

description:
WELCOME TO HANA, MAUI ~ THE LAST HAWAIIAN PLACE

HANA KAI MAUI welcomes you to our beautiful oceanfront vacation rentals on Hana Bay at Waikaloa Beach.

The space
Premium Oceanview Studio Unit #202 - Alau is an upper floor lofted Oceanview studio located in the Mauka Building. There is a queen bed on the main floor and a loft with a 2nd queen bed. Expanded sliding glass doors open onto a spacious covered lanai with teak furnishings and a breathtaking view of the pacific ocean. Porcelain tile floors and countertops, tub / shower combiniation with custom tile details and bamboo accents throughout.

Our oceanfront property feature​s​ exquisite grounds, beachside barbeque, fully equipped kitchens, private lanais, and free wireless internet service. Many of our Hana condos have panoramic oceanfront views where you can experience incredible sunrises and moonlit nights while turtles and ​​dolphins swim nearby in the surf.

As you travel the
neighborhood_overview: Hana is known as the last Hawaiian place. Our community is still predominantly Hawaiian. Hana has a rich history and the Hawaiian population in this area once numbered in the hundreds of thousands. Today Hana's population is under 2000, from Keanae to Kaupo, a 40 mile coastal radius. Hana Kai is centrally located and easily accessible. The property is nestled along the North side of Hana Bay at the entrance to Waikoloa Beach. Although we do not recommend swimming (except on very calm days), Waikoloa Beach is wonderful to explore and you can actually walk for several miles on the coastal trail to Waianapanapa State park. Hana Bay is a precious resource to the community and you may see fisherman netting Akule, keiki swimming in the gentle shore break at Hana Bay, dolphins and sometimes whales, turtles along the rocks or canoe paddlers practicing for an upcoming regatta.
host_about: I am the General Manager for Hana Kai. I originally came to Hana in 1978 and have made Hana and Hawaii my home ever since. We have a 16 member staff including front desk, housekeeping, grounds and maintenance personnel. We are all Hana residents and the majority of our staff is of Hawaiian ancestry. Our staff is very friendly and always willing to assist our guests as needed with services and information about the Hana area.

host_about: With Park City Rental Properties, expect the very best. We are devoted to providing the highest level of customer service and lodging opportunities. We offer a wide range of accommodations — from cozy condos and spacious townhomes to luxurious mansions — we have something for every taste and budget. You can find ski-in, ski-out lodging, letting you experience our world acclaimed ski resorts in style. Enjoy spectacular mountain biking or golf within just minutes from our accommodations. You can enjoy a remarkable day of exciting activities, and then settle back and enjoy a delicious meal at one of the many excellent dining spots. Or you can head back to your rental, and fix that family favorite in a perfectly appointed full kitchen found in many of our properties. At Park City Rental Properties, we also offer premier catering services, as well as the services of a private chef all within the comforts of your vacation rental. At Park City Rental Properties, we offer many package deals that will let you enjoy all that this area offers. Many of our ski vacation packages offer airport transportation that features an array of amenities including WiFi access, Direct TV, bar and other luxuries to make your ride exceptional. We have access to discounted lift tickets so you can enjoy your ski days without breaking the budget. Ask about our promotional rates for snowmobile adventures. During the summer, we offer specials on horseback riding and other adventures to let you explore our beautiful area during the warm summer months. With our unsurpassed service, well-appointed accommodations, and quality assurance, your Park City vacation is sure to be an experience of a lifetime. Our highly trained staff with decades of property management experience have been tasked with providing our guests with the very best experience possible. We also specialize in group lodgings to make your family reunion, wedding, or special event memorable. Call us today to find the best vacation lodging for your upcoming trip to Park City!

neighborhood_overview:
The condo is located in the heart of Kaanapali beach resort area framed by Kaanapali Golf Course, flowering plumeria trees and palm trees. Next door starts the ocean boardwalk – enjoy sunset walks or morning strolls along the boardwalk. Enjoy a short walk (12 mins) to Whaler’s Village shops, restaurants and major hotels from the Hyatt to Sheraton. The Kaanapali Trolley stops by our hotel and services the major hotels in the Kaanapali Beach Resort area.
Walk to Kaanapali Beach or our exclusive beachfront clubhouse with full kitchen, 2 outdoor showers, beach towels, chairs, recliners and ice machine. Or if you don’t want to walk to Kaanapali beach, enjoy a courtesy golf cart ride to from Front Desk to beachfront clubhouse, getting to beach never got easier or quicker – how easy is that!
Grocery store is a few miles either direction from the resort. Downtown Lahaina is a 5 minute drive heading east and Kapalua is 10 minute drive heading west.
host_about:
Raising the Standards at the Maui Eldorado for Over 20 Years

We're world travelers who first visited Maui over 20 years ago and have been in love with this special island ever since. As hospitality specialists, we have international experience at top hotels and restaurants in Asia. Beginning as condo owners at the Maui Eldorado, we were the first company to raise the standards, invest in quality, and begin upgrading condos. Since then, we’ve grown naturally to suit the needs of our owners and our guests. 

Pride in Everything We Do

From our background in food services, where we’ve won numerous awards, we know how to take care of our guests. We take pride in everything we do. Kaanapali Beach, and the west side of Maui, holds a special place in our hearts and we look forward to sharing our passion with you. 

Personal Guest Service - From Beginning to End
Based on-island, right in West Maui, we offer complete customer service throughout your Hawaiian vacation. From the moment you begin planning your trip to the time you leave, we’re here to help. We’ll be sure you find the perfect condo for your group and connect you with Maui’s top activities and attractions. 

Offering  privately-owned studios,  1 and 2 bedrooms at the Maui Eldorado Resort located on Kaanapali beach surrounded by Kaanapali golf course. Exclusive beachfront clubhouse with full kitchen on the beach!

As a host, customer satisfaction is our #1 priority, as we know you have choices. Let us help make MAUI memories last!!

neighborhood_overview:
The Apartment is on Tusitala Street, nestled in Waikīkī’s residential neighborhood. It's a 5-minute walk to Waikīkī Beach, straight down Lili‘uokalani Avenue. The area enjoys less traffic and noise compared to other buildings due to its positioning from major roads.

Nearby local attractions include International Market Place (shopping, dining and entertainment complex) and Kapi’olani Park. It's also a short stroll to Thomas Jefferson Elementary School, home to Waikīkī Farmers Market every Saturday from 8am-2pm.

Popular restaurants nearby include Hy’s Steak House, Blue Ocean Seafood & Steak (food truck), Appetito Craft Pizza & Wine Bar (Italian), Tanaka of Tokyo East (Japanese teppanyaki), M.A.C. 24/7 Restaurant and Bar (American), Maguro Spot (Hawaiian poke), Me Bar-B-Que (Korean) and Musubi Cafe IYASUME. There's also a group of Food Trucks on the corner of Kūhiō Avenue and Kapuni Street, including Five Star Poke and Hula Dog Kūhiō.

There are two parks, and a performing arts center for education in the neighborhood.

host_about: I have been living in Oahu for 16 years, and myself and my family have being having good time and enjoying Marriott's Ko Olina Beach Club ever since it was built ( we became an owner before the construction was done ). The property can accommodate all age groups, for example, I have two young children and love the sandy pool which is small kids friendly shallow pool and my older one loves the water slide pool. Adults can enjoy the quiet pool which only allow 18 years old and up and adult only hot tub. There are so many activities on the island but even the in-house activities can keep you busy on right on the property with such as bingo games, hula lessons, hula hoop contests, yoga, aqua work out, etc.  Even it is a rainy season in Hawaii in Winter, but Ko Olina is in the most dry side of the island so you still can enjoy the sun and ocean. Feel free to ask me questions and hope you will make a decision to have a wonderful and memorable vacation with great deal!  Aloha!

description:

Situated in one of Hawaii's most beautiful locations and a few miles from the Polynesian Cultural Center, Kualoa Ranch, and famous Kahuku shrimp and food trucks.

The space
Please message me with any pricing/availability questions!

Newly remodeled, the space has an updated living room, kitchen, two private bedrooms, and 1.5 bathrooms. Brand new appliances, flooring, furniture and more.

Quite rare for a beach home, this bungalow is equipped with *air conditioning*.

neighborhood_overview:
Ocean Front Right on the Beach! The Beach is protected by a reef a ways out so it's perfect for snorkeling without the bigger waves. Beaches with big waves are nearby! Shrimp Truck, Thai Food Truck, Burger Food Truck, Vietnamese Pho Food Truck, Hawaiian Ice stand and convenience store with local food counter are nearby!

Near the Polynesian Cultural Center, Hawaii’s #1 paid attraction, draws millions of visitors annually with their world-class entertainment, learning, shows, and luaus. There is a Longs drugstore and two grocery stores in the area. Five minutes away, Laie Beach Park has great year round larger waves for body surfing. Turtle Bay Resort Golf Courses/Restaurants and World Famous North Shore Surfing Beaches a short drive away.

If it's winter, along the North Shore you'll be treated to 30 to 40-foot tall waves and some of the world's best surfers. You'll also find Waimea Bay and the beautiful Waimea Falls Park with its sacred sites, waterfall and wond
host_about: Aloha, I'm Chandler! I am a licensed real estate agent here in Hawai'i, RS-84482. Aloha!

The Garden Suite at Onomea is a private cottage with views of flowering royal Poinciana trees, mango, lychee, mountain apple trees, monkeypod trees, and coconut palms. It's very private and during your stay you will rarely encounter my wife and I unless you reach out by text or phone.

Kitchen counter top serves as dining table as well with cafe chairs making the living room area much larger. Both Bathrooms have new cabinets, tub and shower enclosures. host_about:
The complex is located directly across from Kamaole III State Beach Park, which is known as one of the most beautiful and safest beaches in the Islands.  It is perfect for swimming, snorkeling, sunning, jogging, picnicking, kite flying, and especially enjoying amazing sunsets and whale watching.

Each unit has a private lanai that faces the interior of the complex, offering views of the expansive lawns, pools, and lush tropical landscape of palm trees, hibiscus, birds of paradise and plumeria trees.  Most lanais also offer views of the beautiful Pacific Ocean and spectacular sunsets.  

There are two pools, a covered pavilion, and a full size tennis court on the property.  Every evening the outdoor barbecue area is a popular spot to socialize while grilling the perfect dinner and watching as the Hale Kamaole conch shell band performs their nightly sunset ritual.

You will find world class golf courses, fantastic snorkeling and diving, many Maui activities, abundant shopping and delicious fine and family dining all within minutes of Hale Kamaole.

We provide all of the items you need such as shampoo/conditioner, detergent, spices, etc. Located in the Colony Villas in building #10 which is close to the main pool.

High ceilings and island design provide spacious tropical comfort. Great as a home base for seeing and exploring the island and/or for relaxing island time. neighborhood_overview:
Ideally located on the Kohala Coast, our townhome is surrounded by 22 acres of tropical landscaping, palms trees and two golf courses. Waikoloa Beach Golf Course is in front of the unit and lends fantastic mountain views. Waikoloa Colony Villas is approximately 18 miles north from the Kona International Airport, within Waikoloa Beach Resort. Staying in Waikoloa Colony Villas gives you great access to some of the World’s Most Amazing Beaches. Hapuna Beach is only a five minute drive from our door. It is a long white sand beach with turquoise water. Ideal for relaxing by the ocean, snorkeling, body surfing and wildlife viewing. Our unit is situated within walking distance of the beautiful Anaeho'omalu Bay (“A” Bay). The crescent coastline of 'A' Bay offers a pristine sandy beach with many sports activities and rentals. Additionally, there are shoreline paths, a turtle refuge and ancient royal fishponds, all within a ten minute walk.
At Waikoloa Colony Villas we are surrounded by
host_about: We live in Oregon and own a vacation home on the Big Island. We adore the island and frequently go there to visit. We have two young kids and love traveling with them to special places. Our favorite things to do in Hawaii are hiking, snorkling, visiting coffee plantations and going to farmer's market. We hope you will come and stay with us and have a wonderful time! Mahalo & Aloha.

The location of this rental is so convenient yet feels tucked away. It's at the end of a quiet street, just 5-10 minutes to the mall, downtown, the zoo and the ocean. You will love the sound of the Kanelehua rain as it pours down on the tin roof. It will soon pass and the sun will shine on the beauty of Hilo. Enjoy the verdant town, the farmer's markets, the nearby waterfalls and adventures that awa

Please be mindful that our street is not a thoroughfare.  We are in a quiet neighborhood with children often playing on the street.  We welcome folks who drive slowly and respect our neighbors.
host_about: Aloha~ I am a Real Estate Broker, born and raised on Hawaii Island.  I grew up in Puako and Waimea, working in the Real Estate/Vacation Rental business with my mother from an early age.   I have 20 years of experience in property management and have been actively licensed in Hawaii for 14 years.  After managing 30+ homes for many years, I decided to downsize and specialize in just a few boutique properties. I take pride in caring for these unique properties and enjoy welcoming our guests to this beautiful piece of paradise.  I am available 24/7 for any questions or guests needs.   I would be happy to assist you with your dream vacation to Hawaii Island!

You will be close enough to town, but far enough away for some peace and quiet in nature. A scenic 25 minute drive to Kona town, many restaurants, shopping, as well as the most popular beaches and snorkeling! 15 minutes down to Kealakekua Bay and Captain Cook monument, enjoy the authentic South Kona!

The space
Your unit is situated on a two acre property, it is a downstairs unit. We live upstairs and there is a vacation rental adjacent to your rental. You have your own private bathroom and shower. It’s separated nicely and you have a private entrance with plenty of space to park in your designated space. It’s very peaceful and quiet on this property, with ocean views around the property, amazing sunsets and cooler temperatures. No need for AC here!

*Note, the p
neighborhood_overview: We are positioned right above Kealakekua Bay and Captain cook monument. We are elevated at 2200 ft above sea level, so the temperatures are very comfortable! Please drive slow and very cautiously, it is a very family oriented neighborhood with kids and dogs around. Also please be aware that the road is narrow and is single lane. Share the road with locals, There are many pull outs, and the rule of thumb is to always yield to uphill traffic. Drive carefully and avoid potholes.

description: Once you arrive at Club Wyndham Royal Sea Cliff on the Big Island, you'll be whisked away to a land where stress and worry are foreign concepts. What's more, you'll have more time to play as a wealth of cultural destinations and recreational activities, such as snorkeling, mountain biking, horseback riding, golfing, and hiking are within easy reach.

description:
This stylish place to stay is perfect for a relax trip. A cozy one bedroom with one bathroom and kitchen located near everything you need. In the bedroom with one queen bed and living room with one queen bed which is comfortable for group of 4.

You have a full kitchen with everything you need plus a washer and dryer inside the unit.

I am open for different booking options. Please feel free to contact me.

Other things to note
Tax information:

Regardless if you rent your property short term or long term, we need to talk about tax obligations that come along with collecting rental income in Hawaii.

1.) On all gross rents received you have to pay 4.5% General Excise Tax (GET).

2.) If you rent 180 days or less per tenant, then you’re obligated to pay an additional 10.25% Transient Accommodation Tax (TAT)

3) UPDATE effective 12.14.2021: OTAT – Oahu Transient Accommodation Tax (Oahu). All rental revenue

– Start-Up Supplies: coffee filters, laundry detergent, dish soap, dishwasher soap, bar soap, paper towels, toilet paper, tissue, basic cleaning supplies, and travel size (2 oz.) shampoo, conditioner, body wash, body lotion
– NOT PROVIDED: beach umbrellas, beach toys, aluminum foil, Ziploc bags, coffee, condiments/seasonings, cooking oil, fabric softener, or bleach. This private vacation rental does NOT include resort services such as daily housekeeping, replenishment of towels or toiletry supplies, or hotel front desk services.

Please let us know if you have any questions!

Mahalo!

description:
Beautifully Upgraded Vacation Rental 2 Bedroom Partial Oceanview next to sheltered Beach full of Turtles.


The space
This well maintained 2-bedroom 2 bath Air Conditioned Menehune Shores resort condominium has everything you need to relax in Maui. The granite and stainless-steel kitchen is perfect for dining in. The ground floor location allows easy access to the beach. The master bedroom has a view out onto the ocean you can enjoy right out of the California King-sized bed. The second bedroom has two twin beds to relax in after a fun day on the beach or hiking in the nearby mountains. Incredible sunsets, fantastic sheltered beach, and a roof top deck for whale watching across the whole bay with picnic tables and barbecues! Menehune Shores is a unique Kihei gem sitting right on the ocean at Kalepolepo Beach overlooking a rebuilt Hawaiian fishpond and sheltered beach. The Hawaiian Islands Humpback Whale Sanctuary is also next to the resort. It is the perfe
neighborhood_overview: North Kihei
host_about: A licensed professional real estate manager.

description:
Formally https://abnb.me/enCT4tEmfob Our family welcomes vacationing guests to our home away from home. Ground level unit steps from the beach.

Experience mesmerizing sunrises, moon rises & swaying palms.

Explore stretches of white sand with Life-Guarded beaches nearby, but please do not enter the ocean to swim from our beach property. Enjoy using the 4.5 mi Kaua'i Coastal Path next to our parking lot.

The space
Awaken to birds beautifully singing. Enjoy whale watching from November through March. We keep binoculars at the condo for touring, and for humpback whale and ocean viewing. Read and feel the gentle trade wind breezes while relaxing on the lush green grounds.

Walk to fun shops and food stores, bike, beach activity, and kayak shops, local gym, and enjoy excellent fine and casual dining at nearby restaurants.

Stroll First Saturday Art Walk Kapaa. Hike the Sleeping Giant trails nearby. Our location is equidi
neighborhood_overview:
Great location with grocery stores and restaurants within walking distance. Jump on the Kaua'i Coastal Path for biking & walking just in front our condo entrance. You will truly enjoy the convenience of it all.

This is a no pressure place. You can check out shuffle-board equipment at the front desk.  The front desk and maintenance staff are all very friendly.  If you need to ask any questions about anything, they are very approachable.

Hawaii is a special paradise.  We want to share (Website hidden by Airbnb) with you.

description:
Aloha, This is the One!! A beautifully renovated top floor 2 bed 2 bath unit with vaulted ceilings and fantastic amenities. This unit faces Maalaea Bay and the West Maui Mountain. Elevator access to the unit makes is very convenient for all ages, and parking is free.

Desirable building 3 is away from the bustle of South Kihei Road, and you are in walking distance of some of Kihei’s best beaches, restaurants, shopping, and food trucks! Including our favorite ‘Kihei Caffe’ for breakfast.

The space
The large open plan kitchen features side by side refrigerator/freezer, large sink with disposal, granite countertops, dishwasher, and an Island with seating. You will appreciate the walk-around kitchen island where many units have a smaller galley kitchen.

The kitchen, which features stainless steel appliances and granite countertops, is fully equipped for cooking any meals, and several grocery stores are nearby.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview:
Free unassigned parking at each building. Please just register with the Office, or with security after hours. Phone number for security posted at the elevators.

Each of the three buildings at Maui Vista offers two tennis courts (with pickle ball lines), a pool, and barbecue areas. Check in at the office for Tennis court reservations, codes, and equipment. Pool Key is in the unit, hanging in the kitchen.
host_about: Active. Gym, Dancing, Food, Travel.

description:
This nicely remodeled 3rd-floor condo offers breathtaking views of Maalaea Bay, the grand volcano Haleakala, and the sparkling Kihei lights at night from the private lanai! The primary suite features a comfy king bed and ensuite bathroom with a walk-in shower and a guest room with 2 twin beds and a tub/shower. Enjoy the tasteful décor, a fully equipped and upgraded kitchen with everything needed for a delightful meal, and relax in the roomy interior with wall A/C in the living room for comfort!

The space
*Remodeled unit and furnishings
*Wall A/C, living room
*Ceiling fans throughout
*[K] bed primary bedroom, [T] beds (2), guest bedroom (can be changed to [K] upon request)
*Primary suite with ensuite bathroom and walk-in shower
*Washer/Dryer, in unit
*Fully equipped kitchen and separate dining area
*Private living room
*Flat-screen TV with cable, living room
*DVD/CD/Stereo
*Wi-Fi up to 200 Mbps
*Free parking
neighborhood_overview: Located in the most central location on Maui to all points of interest. 15 min from the airport (OGG) and Kihei. 20-25 minutes to Lahaina. With in walking distance to the longest sugary beach on Maui, dining, general store for lite shopping, deli and espresso. Tourist shopping, ice-cream, dive and snorkel gear rental, the harbor and the Maui Aquarium.
host_about: I Go Maui Vacation Rentals offers you the “The Best Of The Best”  in affordable first class, ocean front and beach front luxury and deluxe accommodations along with hospitality service that over flows with the spirit of Aloha! A unique vacation rental specialist emphasizing hands-on, detailed, and attentive customer service and condo care.

description:
Beautiful west side country home in Makaha Valley. 10min walking distance to the nearest beach with views of the spectacular mountain ranges from your bedroom & front deck. Ideal for surfers and people who want to explore a little bit of untouched, local oahu & have the pleasure of less crowded beaches as well as world class surf.

Other things to note
Unfortunately we can not accommodate any pets as well as “service animals” including dogs or horses due to allergies. Our sincere apologies.
host_about: Couple from Hawaii always looking for adventure, good surf & a lot of fun!

Hello, I am Evan! 
Growing up I always went to amazing timeshare resorts that always made it feel like home. Vacationing has always been apart of who I am and I’d love to send you on your next vacation to somewhere special! During my studies, I decided to make an account, so I could help send you on a memorable getaway. Please let me know how I can make your vacation grand!

description:
Island Colony in Waikiki is one of the popular vacation accommodations on Oahu!

Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

445 Seaside Ave is in the "Heart of Waikiki"!

A block away from famous International Market place restaurants and mall!

Just a 10-15 minute stroll is famous Waikiki Beach!

Enjoy the large salt water pool, Hot Tub, Sauna, BBQ, picnic tables and Fitness room.

Parking is available in adjacent parking garage for $40/day (rates are subject to change).

The space
***********
Aloha,
Please be advised there will be Spall/Concrete repairs on the exterior of the building/lanais starting January 3rd, 2023 until November 2023 (Work hours: Monday - Friday, 8 am-4 pm). The balcony/Lanai for this unit will be inaccessible to guests from September 18 - October 13. For the renovation period, the balcony/lanai doors must be locked during the work due to safety policies
neighborhood_overview: Located in the heart of the city, Island Colony offers easy access to all of Waikiki’s must-see locations. Just one block away from International Marketplace, Duke's Marketplace, and various famous boutiques, surf shops, restaurants and shopping centers. Take a short walk further and you’re at soft-sanded Waikiki Beach and Kalakaua Avenue. It’s also nearby Ala Moana Beach Park, Ala Moana Center, Honolulu Zoo and more.
host_about:
Aloha! 

A warm welcome to Hawaii! We look forward to being your host in the land of rainbows. Let's treat you to an unforgettable Airbnb experience as you enjoy Waikiki, which is really a place like heaven on earth.

My name is Jason and I host different units on Airbnb. Each unit has a different theme to showcase different stories, memories, and adventures. All our units are newly renovated and designed to appeal to our guests' liking.

As a Super Host, I believe that trust is a strong foundation in building relationships with guests like you. Our goal is to make your stay here in Hawaii feel like paradise. Allow us to treat you to something you truly deserve: an unforgettable Airbnb experience that best fits royalty. One that will make you want to come back—or even make you wish you’d never leave! 

See you soon! Mahalo nui loa!

description:
Spacious ocean-view Maui Kamaole just-remodeled, air-cond. 1244 sq.ft. condo right across from Kamaole III Beach, 2 blocks from Wailea. Quiet 2 bath, tiled lanai, private sun porch, full kitchen, washer/dryer, free WiFi, 2 pools, tennis cts, grills.

The space
Aloha!!
Kindly consider our beautiful, spacious ocean-view Maui Kamaole condo, located on the sunny side of the island. We fell in love with Maui the first time we visited and we have been going back often ever since.

This gorgeous, newly-remodeled, air-conditioned condo is one of only six 1244 square-foot condos at Maui Kamaole! All other ground-floor condos are 850 to 1061 square feet. You can really tell the difference in the living room, which nearly twice as big as other 1-bedroom condos. The condo has two bath rooms, a tiled private lanai with ocean-view & a private sunning porch off the bedroom. There is a comfortable, king sized bed with new mattress in the bedroom & a queen sized s
neighborhood_overview: The best part of our condo is the view, the spaciousness, the privacy and the location. We love waking up to a beautiful ocean view and taking walks along the beaches. We often see whales right from shore in the winter and early spring. While we're drinking coffee and eating papayas on the newly-tiled lanai, the birds come begging for bread crumbs. Mornings are great for beaching it so we spend many hours snorkeling, boogie boarding, whale watching, body surfing, surfing and diving right in front of Maui Kamaole and all along the coast. Afternoons are for adventures--hiking to waterfalls, exploring the Haleakala crater, sea kayaking, tennis or golf. Shopping at the island-style boutiques and open markets is fun, too! Then it's happy hour on the lanai and barbecuing at the pool, bidding farewell to the sun with a blow of the conch shell as it sinks into the ocean (watch for the green flash), enjoying delicious island food in the condo and settling in for an early slumber so we can do it
host_about: I was born in Fairbanks, Alaska, grew up in Green Bay, Wisconsin, went to Arizona State University for gymnastics and coached at Boise State University for 20 years. I am married to a wonderful man & have 3 grown sons. I own our ocean-view Maui condo with my 4 siblings and our McCall, Idaho cabin on Payette Lake with my husband & his 3 siblings. We rent both out when our family is not using them. We love sharing our favorite places with others. My favorite travel destinations are Maui & McCall.  We enjoy skiing, hiking and camping. The country I most want to visit is New Zealand. Five things I can't live without are my family, skiing, coffee, Thai food and the outdoors.

description:
Asako's House is located on popular Ali'i Drive just south of Magic's Beach. This spacious 4 bedroom, 2.5 bath home is ready to help you experience the best Kona has to offer. With a large kitchen, a Japanese soaking tub, a pool, a sauna, and grill to cook your favorite dinners, this space can't be beat.
With an ocean view and located blocks from beach access, this property is great for a family trip, yoga retreat. or just a friendly trip of a lifetime to Hawaii.

The space
Asako's House is a spacious house in a popular area of Kona. Just minutes from Magic Sands Beach and Keauhou, this location is perfect for riding the waves and taking a manta ray excursion.
With 4 bedrooms and a Murphy bed in the annex there is room for everyone.
The pool, sauna, and Japanese soaking tub help you relax after a long hike to Green Sand Beach or to snorkel Captain Cook monument.
Four couches and two dining room tables invites conversation after a fun day. The
neighborhood_overview: There is a vibrant mood in the neighborhood as this is a mostly tourist area. There are often pedestrians, bicyclist, and joggers passing in front of the house. There is a surf school near, a place to shore dive, as well as a beach for body boarding.
host_about: Aloha! I am Kris and I love to travel. My family recently spent a year traveling while staying in Airbnbs. It was an incredible learning experience for our entire family, but especially my daughters. Now that we have settled into Hawaiian life we want to share our home and our love of Hawaii.

description:
9th Floor Oceanview Condo, Interior Courtyard, 2 Bedrooms + Convertible bed, 2 Baths, (Sleeps 4-6). Nightly rate includes Hawaii state taxes (13.42%) as well as parking.

The space
Welcome home to Konea 919!

Konea 919 is one of only (4) 2 bedrooms at Honua Kai with this highly sought after floor plan. Exclusive to the 9th floor of Honua Kai, this suite offers the highest and most direct ocean view vantage point of any two bedrooms at Honua Kai.

Sweeping ocean view vistas infuse the interior and the location is further accentuated by the solitude of its rarified 9th floor location and shelter from Maui's prevailing tradewinds.

The suite can accommodate up to six guests in two king-sized beds and one queen-sized convertible sofa sleeper. The lanai (balcony) comfortably seats four persons to enjoy the stunning view. At this suite, opulence and comfort are the constant. gracefully interwoven for your happiness and relaxation.
neighborhood_overview: With a prime beachfront location on West Maui's Ka'anapali North Beach, The Honua Kai Resort and Spa was recently recognized as one of the top resorts in Hawaii by Conde Nast Traveler for 2016. Should you wish to explore the area, several prominent shopping and dining destinations are within a short drive–including the world-famous Front Street in Lahaina and the upscale beachside mall at Whaler's Village.

As an added benefit, our exclusive Maui Resort Rentals courtesy shuttle offers free guest transportation between our West Maui resorts a number of West Maui locations - including Lahaina, Kapalua, and Whaler's Village.

description:
This spacious, wonderfully designed two-bedroom two-bathroom suite is perfect for your family vacation! Enjoy all the amenities of home, plus an oceanfront view! You’ll have a full-size kitchen, stainless steel appliances, washer/dryer, and furnished lanai.

***Air conditioning is available upon request for an extra fee.***

The space
Experience pure bliss in this two-bedroom two-bathroom suite with a loft and oceanfront view. It doesn’t get any better than waking up to the sound of the waves crashing against Big Island’s infamous lava rock shoreline. This suite offers a large furnished lanai with a wet bar, where you can read a book, relax with an evening glass of wine, or share a meal with friends and family. Inside, you’ll find a roomy living area with island-style wicker furnishings, a flat screen television, and large windows. The suite’s full size kitchen has wood cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, a breakfast bar, and dini
host_about:
Kanaloa at Kona by Castle welcomes the hopeless romantics, the thrill-seekers, and those who just want to have fun. Our resort feels secluded, but is close to charming shops, restaurants, and sits upon the dramatic lava rock coast. You’ll enjoy year-round sailing, snorkeling, and fishing, dine among spectacular Kona sunsets, and fall asleep to the sound of crashing waves.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

description:
A perfect 2 in 1 experience like no other to explore the island! Enjoy the sounds of nature when you stay in this unique place. Super rare find! Enjoy Kauai’s most authentic way to visit the island with the only lifted all grey 4WD FJ Cruiser on island! You’ll be riding and camping in style with the rhino lining matte grey finish, 33inch wheels, and a brand new hard shell tent on top with 5 inch memory foam to sleep on!

The space
This will be hands down the easiest and most convenient way to see everything you'd like to see no matter how much time you have here on Kauai. Instead of driving hours back to your hotel/resort or normal airbnb, you can popup the tent at the nearest campsite or spot I have on the guide. Sure some people would rather stay at a resort I get it, but this is for those who love spending time outdoors, watching the stars every night and waking up on the beach or in the mountains. With the 4WD capibilities this vehicle will take you where you
host_about: After exploring Kauai and the Big Island via Overlanding, I had to offer other likeminded individuals a chance to see it the way I did. Which is why I am renting out my own setups I’ve build myself! Enjoy a guide with tips and spots to camp around Kauai or the Big Island depending on which cars you rent from me!

description:
This “Better-Than-Gold” remodeled, two bedroom, three bathroom town house, is the perfect place to call home while visiting Maui. From the moment you enter the villa, you will be stunned by the design, the ambience, and the vistas.

*The Kapalua Resort and this property were not affected by the Lahaina fires, nor were our surrounding areas or Napili, Kahana and Kaanapali.

The space
*The Kapalua Resort and this property were not affected by the Lahaina fires, nor were our surrounding areas or Napili, Kahana and Kaanapali.

Property Highlights:
• Five minute walk to three world-class beaches, including Kapalua® Bay, rated the "Best Beach in the World" by Dr. Beach, and “Best Beach in the US,” by Conde Nast
• High-end remodeled townhouse with unrivaled ocean, island AND coastal views
• Ultimate luxury interiors and custom designs
• Large wrap around lanai, ideal for outdoor living at its very best
• Upgraded bathrooms riv
neighborhood_overview:
Resort Highlights
• The Kapalua® Resort is the only low-density resort on Maui
• Ideal destination to escape the crowds and long lines
• Access to a complimentary door-to-door Kapalua® Resort Shuttle
• The resort is home to four award-winning beaches/bays: Kapalua Bay, Oneloa Bay, D.T. Flemings Beach and Honolua Bay
• Two championship golf courses – the PGA’s Plantation Course and The Bay Course
• Eight tennis courts and ten pickleball courts at the Kapalua Tennis Garden
• Numerous award winning restaurants, from casual to high-end
• Two world-class spas – Spa Montage and The Ritz Spa
• Kapalua® Coastal Trail and other hiking trails

Description:
The Ridge features two beautiful, heated swimming pools. Both pool areas feature gas grills, lounge chairs, a location for eating, with tables and chairs, a shower, a soda machine and restrooms. Pool “One” has an additional full kitchen and large covered gathering area, making this a
host_about:
Ridge Realty/Rentals LLC is the oldest, family owned real estate brokerage which specializes in properties at The Kapalua® Resort. For over thirty years we have maintained a solid track record, generating a customer loyalty that is second to none.  

When planning your next Maui dream vacation, do not make the mistake of staying in a hotel, most of which are small, overcrowded and overpriced. Start your vacation off right, and book your stay in one of our affordable spacious properties. All our properties come fully furnished and offer free high speed wireless internet, fully stocked kitchens, a starter supply of towels, soap/shampoo and laundry detergent, plus linens and all the other comforts of home.

Our clientele enjoy personal, around-the-clock service; staff are on-site, 24 hours a day.  Clients deserve the best and we deliver.  Allow our team to enhance your vacation with special touches; we will stock your pantry, arrange a limo service from the airport, or even create that perfect romantic atmosphere, just for your arrival – no matter the request, it is our pleasure the be there for you. We go the extra mile to ensure that your stay with Ridge Realty/Rentals is nothing short of extraordinary. Our number one priority is to accommodate you in creating a personalized, dream vacation that is as much stress free as it is memorable.

Kapalua® is fortunate to be able to claim three, world-class beaches. Kapalua Bay (rated the “number one beach in the world," by Conde Nast), Oneloa Bay and D.T. Fleming Beach are just a quick walk from all of our properties. Do not worry about parking or long drives; the best beaches in the world are just out your door!
All Kapalua® Resort activities and amenities are conveniently located within walking distance from all of our properties.  You do not feel like walking? No problem! The resort's complimentary shuttle will pick you up at your door, and then transport you to anywhere on the resort grounds.

At Ridge Realty/Rentals we feel fortunate to call Maui our home, and want nothing more than to share this beautiful paradise with you. With the warm sand between your toes, the sun upon your face and the soft trade winds at your back, you will discover an island way of living, offering the peaceful simplicity you have been searching for. We take pride in serving each and every one of our clients with the warmth of the Aloha Spirit.
 
Mahalo for your interest and we look forward to seeing you soon!

description:
Maui is OPEN for tourists, after the devastating wildfires! Your condo is far away from Lahaina, and the people of Maui need you to visit their Island, to assist them recover financially from the fires!

Enjoy the spectacular, treetop, panoramic, view of Maalaea Bay and Haleakala, from your private lanai. Watch turtles feeding along the shoreline and in the winter see humpback whales jumping in the Bay. Your condo is far away from Lahaina, yet close to everything fun to do in Eastern Maui!

The space
PLEASE NOTE: For your protection, convenience and safety, your condo is professionally cleaned AND sanitized after each guest check-out. We provide hand soap in each bathroom and by the kitchen sink, with extra cleaning emphasis applied to high touch surfaces like A/C thermostats, remote controls, telephones and appliance/door handles!

Your oceanfront condo is located at the Ma'alaea Banyans condo. It is on the top floor of a 4 story build
neighborhood_overview: Your top floor, ocean front condo has a treetop, panoramic 'million dollar' view of Maalaea Bay and the 10,043' Haleakala dormant volcano.  Listen to the surf lap at the shore a few feet below your private lanai.  Watch whales play in season out in the bay. Your condo is far away from the Lahaina fires, on the other side of the mountain.  Eastern Maui has hundreds of things to see and do, without bothering the recovery efforts in Lahaina.
host_about: I asked Karen to marry me when we were on the summit of Haleakala (10,043'), which can be seen from our 4th floor, treetop lanai. We were married by a remote waterfall on Maui a year later. Maui is very special to us!  Ma'alaea (Mah-ah-lie-yah) is a secluded, little village off the beaten path to Lahaina. Not many people know the town even exists and that is why we like it. It is centrally located to just about everything fun to do on Maui, but when you return back to your "Little grass shack", you seem to be miles away from everything and can relax and take time to smell the plumerias!!!  Aloha, Joe & Karen

description:
Retreat to your oasis in this 1-Bedroom Garden View Paradise space located on 35 acres of landscaped lawns within walking distance of a stunning swimming beach. Enjoy waking up in your king bed and begin the day on your private lanai with a fresh cup of coffee. This 880-square-foot condo comes with a full-kitchen , a washer/dryer, flat-screen cable TV, WiFi, and fans.

The space
Vibrant tropical blues greet guests upon entry to this condo. These blue hues, are incorporated throughout the space, from the living room to the detailed tile-work in the bathroom. Guests can begin the day with coffee discussing breakfast plans on the two bar stools overlooking the full-kitchen. The kitchen has the amenities to satisfy everyone, including a refrigerator, stovetop, oven, microwave, and dishwasher. After breakfast, guests can map out the day as they enjoy a cool breeze on the lanai. This highly desirable corner unit with a ground floor lanai has seating for four and a loung
host_about:
Kauai’s Plantation-style Resort on Famous Poipu Beach

Get ready to be charmed by the feel of old Hawaii at Kiahuna Plantation & The Beach Bungalows, a Poipu resort set upon 35 gorgeous acres of landscaped lawns, gardens, and one of the best beaches on an island famous for its beaches. Our condo resort has all the amenities you’re looking for in a home away from home on Kauai’s sunny south side.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combine value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

description:
Sophisticated & luxurious meets rugged farm & charm!

Retreat off the beaten path & step into a fairytale to experience the tranquil solace & sustainable lifestyle of this elegant off-grid 2 bedroom, 1 bath cabin- featuring a spiral staircase, marble kitchen countertops, excellent WiFi, repurposed plantation windows, a cozy enchanting atmosphere, a stunning rainfall shower, and clawfoot bathtub.

Gaze upon the magically lush native Ohia Forest and fall asleep to the chorus of coqui tree frogs!

The space
Shortly before arrival, you get to adventure through the forest for a mile-long off-road drive into the eclectic subdivision of Hawaiian Acres. Get a feel of being a true local in the country, while being conveniently located 15 minutes from eccentric Pahoa Town, 35 minutes away from historic Hilo Town, and 40 minutes from Volcano where Pele makes her Lava-luscious appearance.

**(SUV or Truck highly recommended, for 3 blocks/1 mil
neighborhood_overview:
Hawaiian Acres! In the Ohia Rainforest! We have a diverse community of all income brackets, so please be mindful and respectful of my eclectic neighborhood.

Each neighbor has all 3 acre parcels, so there's lots of privacy and space!

*****If being secluded in the Hawaiian country is not for you, then please consider booking another place.*****

If you love the solitude of unique nature and lots of privacy, then this is the perfect spot for you!

The culture is very friendly and you will often see neighbors waving at you and using the *shaka* sign, which is the "hang loose" sign of friendliness!! Feel free to wave or shaka back!! :)

Thank you for visiting the real Hawaii and authentic cultural experience!
host_about: Aloha & E Komo Mai! One of the greatest joys of my life is when I get the opportunity to serve humanity and create a space that makes you happy, comforted, and relaxed. I love my home immensely and have put a lot of heart into it, and I have decided to share the peace and comfort of my home with others when I am not there. As a licensed therapist, and musician, you will see pieces of my life reflected in my home--my love of plants, nature, gardens, music, peace, artistry, fairy tales, and solitude. There's an ukulele hanging on the wall, so if you want to try it, go on ahead! Any youtube video can help you get at least one chord going! I hope that your stay is magnificent! Mahalo nui loa!

description:
This expansive 3br penthouse residence boasts gorgeous ocean views stretching from the iconic Kaanapali Black Rock to Maui's neighbor island of Lanai and beyond. Indulge in the 1950 luxurious square feet, with 3 separate bedrooms/bathrooms, large living room, modern chef's kitchen, and spacious balcony.

The space
This stunning 3BR ocean view "penthouse" residence offers gorgeous views of the Pacific Ocean from an exceptional 7th floor vantage point, well above the tropical foliage of the Konea Tower interior courtyard. Located only one column back from oceanfront, your group will be treated to views of the Kaanapali North Beach shoreline that stretch all the way to the iconic Black Rock and beyond!

The prime location is coupled with an an expansive 1950 sq ft interior, making suite 749 one of the finest three-bedroom ocean view residences on offer at Honua Kai. Get swept away into the lovely Maui sky after folding away the glass doors and allowing the
neighborhood_overview: With a prime beachfront location on West Maui's Ka'anapali North Beach, The Honua Kai Resort and Spa was recently recognized as one of the top resorts in Hawaii by Conde Nast Traveler for 2016. Should you wish to explore the area, several prominent shopping and dining destinations are within a short drive–including the world-famous Front Street in Lahaina and the upscale beachside mall at Whaler's Village.
host_about:
The Ohana (Family) at Maui Resort Rentals has been helping vacationers "Make Maui Reality" for over 50 cumulative years on the shores of West Maui.  Inspired by the Maui lifestyle, we aim to provide incredible vacation experiences at a curated collection of premier resort residences.

For your convenience, our warehouse and offices are located in Kaanapali North Beach, just minutes from all of the West Maui resorts.

Our Ritz-Carlton and Marriott trained staff are here to serve. Your guest experience is our highest priority. The privilege to host your precious Maui vacation is ours. 

As an added benefit, our exclusive Maui Resort Rentals courtesy shuttle offers free guest transportation between our West Maui resorts a number of West Maui locations - including Lahaina, Kapalua, and Whaler's Village.

www.airbnb.com/p/mauiresortrentals

description:
Located in the Kuau Plaza, on Maui's North Shore. A stone's throw from Ho'okipa Beach Park, Tavares Bay, Nori’s and several other fun surf breaks, The Green Guava is a cute, comfortable place to chill-out after a your day at the beach! Walking distance to Mama's Fish House, Kuau Store and near public beach access points, you won't need to go far to find beaches, surf, windsurfing, and a nice spot to relax!
Transient Accommodation (TA) Registration Number: TA-155-824-1280-01
TMK:260120500004

The space
The Green Guava is located in Kuau Plaza, a small, 30 unit condominium complex on Maui’s North Shore. The space itself is fun, breezy, casual, and relaxing. There are two Hawaiian daybeds (twin size) in the living room (new mattresses purchased Feb 2023), situated for sitting, lounging, sleeping or napping! A spacious eastern king size bed (Tuff & Needle foam mattress) is situated in the bedroom. A pub-style table that seats 4. There is also a small outsid
neighborhood_overview: The Green Guava (in Kuau Plaza) is located walking distance to Mamas Fish House and the beach fronting the restaurant. It is located within the small, beachside neighborhood of Ku’au, within a mix of residential and vacation homes which was historically a Hawaiian fishing village turned sugar plantation village.
host_about:
...a busy mother/step-mother of four! 

I enjoy a simple life, spending time with my family and friends.

I am an independent and low-maintenance traveler. As a host, I am available to guests as necessary, but generally leave them alone to enjoy their vacation.

description:
If you are looking for a completely remodeled condo at Papakea Resort with gorgeous ocean views you have found the perfect property! This one bedroom property is located in building C and offers views of the ocean with the islands of Molokai and Lanai in the background. Sit back, relax and watch stunning Maui sunsets from the comfort of your lanai.

The space
Additional Description:

Effective May 17, 2024, through June 2, 2026, Papakea Resort will undertake an extensive plumbing project. Standard work hours for this project will be from 8:00 AM to 5:30 PM, Monday through Friday, unless authorized for weekend work. Contractors may be present on the property to commence preparatory tasks as early as 7:00 AM. Non-working holidays are already included in the schedule. To minimize disruption, any excessively loud work will not commence before 10:00 AM. Dates are subject to change. Not all units will be affected at the same time.

My Perfect Stays is here to make your Maui vacation unforgettable! We are committed to delivering our valued guests the very best in quality and service. description:
Spacious 1 Bedroom 1 bathroom of about 800 square feet of living space of full ocean & mountain views that is only 500 feet to the ocean. The warm tropical breeze and the sound of the ocean in an oasis setting on over an acre of land with 28 plumeria trees and just steps away to the World famous Poipu Beach!

This sublime, 2nd story condo is freshly accentuated with furnishings in a serene approach to fine living. Listing to the serenity of blue pacific ocean while drifting off to sleep.

The space
The lanai directly overlooks the ocean and the mountains, providing an unparalleled vista. Enjoy daily sunsets, and annual whale migrations from your very own private lani! With a convenient location and stately resort feel, this is a unique opportunity to experience a truly breath taking view.




- Convenient location and stately resort feel, this is a unique opportunity to experience comfortably priced opulence!

-
neighborhood_overview: The surrounding neighborhood is comprised of custom ocean front homes in 2 M plus range.  The ocean is only 500 feet away from the property.  World famous Poipu Beach is about 1000 feet away. The walkway to the Grand Hyatt is a lovely walk to the hotel and Shipwreck Beach is a short distant walk.
host_about: Our hotel is Family owned and operated, we arrived on Kauai in 1907 (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) from Spain.    Come and experience Kauai like no other place in the world!

description:
Incredible Ocean View with Year Round Sunset Views, Beautiful Private Home is set within 1 ¼ acre Secluded Hawaiian Tropical Landscape, featuring a custom Lava Rock Pool (solar heated) & Lava Rock Hot Tub. Property is very private in a quiet neighborhood. Located near Keauhou Shopping Center which has many top amenities, KTA Grocery (local chain), CVS Drugs, Kenichi’s (top Sushi and Japanese Rest.), Regal Movies, Habanero’s (auth. mexican food), Royal Thai Rest. Urgent Care, Specialty Shops!

The space

The entire Guest Ohana is situated on the first floor with a private entry, and direct access to the Koi Pond and Swimming Pool water features. Please note that the maximum allowed occupancy is 6 persons. The additional sleeping space is a full size futon located in the main living area. It is best suited for use by smaller children or a sin
neighborhood_overview: Very quiet and tranquil neighborhood.  Walua Road is also a popular walking trail with dedicated areas closed to vehicle traffic.  Close to fine shops and restaurants, as well as a Regal 7 Cinema.
host_about:
Aloha 
I call home Kailua Kona on the Big Island of Hawaii for 23 years!  I own and operate a Landscape Contracting Firm that caters to the High End Residential market.  This path has given many years of enjoyment and insight to create beautiful Tropical Landscapes.  The Ultimate Oasis for my Clients.  I love the outdoors and the super diversified activities available on the Big Island, including; hiking, surfing, 4 wheeling and riding my Harley Davidson.

description:
Exactly 70 steps from having your feet in the water, Puamana 62-4 is a 3 bedroom, 2 bath island home that comfortably sleeps 6. This ocean view, pool side home has an open floor plan with open beam ceilings and is setup with separation of space in mind.

The space
Just 70 steps from having your feet in the warm tropical waters of Maui, Puamana 62-4 is a beautiful 3 bedroom, 2 bath tropical Island home that comfortably sleeps 6. Our poolside home features an open concept floorplan with views to the ocean and a great lanai for outdoor living.

The downstairs ensuite master bedroom and bath have been remodeled and enjoy tropical landscapes with pool views.

The small upstairs deck is the perfect place to relax or step out to enjoy the ocean views with your sunset cocktail or morning coffee. The upstairs loft area was thoughtfully designed with separation of space in mind and easy access to the ocean views from the deck. There are two separate sl
host_about:
Proudly providing the best service and expertise to help you enjoy the West Maui vacation of a lifetime. We manage individually owned homes and condos in West Maui, ranging from single family detached homes to studio condos. Whether you're looking for a romantic getaway for two or a place to stay with the whole family, we are sure to have the perfect fit for your Hawaiian vacation.  We look forward to being of service.

www.airbnb.com/p/vacation-maui

description:
This garden level pool villa, F102 "Bali Hai", is a true gem! It boasts a beautiful garden view, 3 bedrooms (King in ocean master, King in 2nd master with a Queen Sofa Bed, 2 Queens in third bedroom), 3.5 bathrooms and more than 3,500 square feet of indoor and outdoor living space.

The F building is conveniently located in the center of the resort. It is close to the family pool, the lobby, the Shops At Wailea, and yet it is also close to the beach and the heated adult swimming pool and ...

The space
...spa. After you park and exit your vehicle, you walk down the gently sloping paved pathway that is lined with potted plants - directly into your vacation home. F102 is ideal for visitors who don`t care for elevators, and for those who want a bona-fide residential living experience.

The property owners have spared no expense in working with our team of professionals to create a uniquely elegant, comfortable and intimate vacation home. Inside F1
host_about:
We've been exceeding our guests' expectations since 1995 with our premium beachfront estates, award-winning resort villas, romantic hideaways and secluded retreats on Maui. Our luxury homes and villas are “Your Own Private Paradise” for your visit to Hawaii. 

Our highly attentive staff includes a personal on-island concierge, property manager and greeter who are at your service, free of charge, from initial planning stages through completion of your stay.

Over the past decade, Conde Nast Traveler and Travel+Leisure magazines have recognized our owner, Irene Ann Aroner, as a premier Hawaii villa rental specialist and our company, Private Paradise Villas (formerly Tropical Villa Vacations), as a premier Hawaii villa rental agency.

description:
Cloaked in natural beauty, The Point at Poipu is a dream vacation destination on the southernmost tip of Kauai. The resort overlooks polished sands of Shipwreck Beach and is secluded among lush landscape.

Covid-19 Enhanced cleaning protocols in place.

• Guest checking in must be 21+ with valid ID
• Guest must have debit/credit card to put $100 refundable security deposit on hold at resort check-in

The space
After a day of exploring, return to the resort to relax with the comforts of home in the spacious two-bedroom accommodations featuring fully-equipped kitchens. Visit the on-site fitness center, explore the traditional gardens or relax poolside and soak in the warmth of the Hawaiian sun.

description:
