The space
Experience breathtaking views of the Pacific Ocean and the neighboring islands of Kahoolawe and Lanai from your own private balcony! Kihei Akahi D402 is the perfect home away from home for your Maui adventures!

Condo Highlights:
-2 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom, Sleeps 6 guests
-Split zone AC throughout
-Private lanai with partial ocean views
-Queen bed in Master Suite
-2 Twin beds in Guest Suite
-Sofa-sleeper in living room
-Fully remodeled kitchen equipped with new, stainless-steel appliances including a dishwasher and stove
-Smart TV in living and both bedrooms
-Dining areas for 4 inside and outside
-In-unit washer/dryer

The well maintained Kihei Akahi complex has two swimming pools, BBQs, and a tennis court surrounded in a tropical landscaped setting. This complex is directly across the street from popular Kamaole Beach P
host_about:
Vacation Rental Management, Property Management, Asset Management, Real Estate Sales and Financial Analysis on  real estate.

We give our pledge to you to make your vacation on Maui as easy and pleasurable as possible. We understand that vacationing with your family and friends is a time for memories, rest, and vital rejuvenation.

We provide the support and peace of mind for your ultimate vacationing experience on Maui.
Link to all our listings:  https://airbnb.com/users/15820446/listings 

We are especially empathetic for our Vacationers.  We are not perfect but we do try hard.  We are all local to Maui and try to represent the Aloha Spirit.

We have discovered for ourselves the pleasure of vacationing in this paradise called: Maui.  All of us came here many years ago, drawn to the mystique and spectacular beauty of the Island. Our satisfaction grows each time we are able to provide that special place our vacationers have worked for and dreamed of for so long. This is truly a marvelous business, and we give thanks each day for this wonderful opportunity.

description: On the Big Island’s west coast, you’ll find this delightful retreat built to capture the natural wonder of Kailua-Kona. Beautifully designed to capture the charm of the 1930s, you’ll want for no modern amenity. Outdoor pools and the nearby beach are just the beginning of what’s within reach.
host_about: Hi, I'm Joy! I'm excited for you to check out my listings and discover all the places you can go! I would love to be a part of your travel journey, as its one of my favorite things in life! My parents had us on adventures starting at a very young age and I thankfully got to see and experience so many wonderful and breathtaking places! I love taking my family on those same adventures now and would be so excited to help you plan out some of yours! Please feel free to reach out with any questions you might have, I am representing owners of the underutilized timeshares that might be just perfect for your next journey! If there is anything you're looking for and don't see in the listings please let me know and a lot of times I can help track down exactly what you are looking for! Can't wait to start planning your next adventure with you! Happy Travels!

description:
WB Deluxe Ocean View Waikiki Condo - , Free parking & Wifi

Aloha and Welcome to Koko Resorts at the Waikiki Banyan! We are so glad you have chosen to stay with us for your Hawaiian Vacation!

This 22nd floor condo has amazing views of Waikiki and the Pacific Ocean! This condo comes with a fully equipped kitchen including a refrigerator, stove-range, dishwasher, microwave, coffee maker, and all the kitchen supplies you will need to have an at home cooking experience while you are on vacation.

The space
This kitchen comes with a large marble island complete with 4 stools for your dining pleasure. Take advantage of relaxing in this condo's spacious living area that includes a large tv and great pull-out sofa. The lanai includes a table and chairs so that you can enjoy a warm cup of coffee and watch the surfers' cruise the waves!

This unit has a great bedroom with 2 Queen Sized Beds and an amazing view of the ocean and Waikiki right t
host_about:
Hosted by RedAwning Vacation Rentals

Welcome to RedAwning, a whole new way to travel. We make staying in a unique home or apartment easier than staying at a hotel. By partnering with local homeowners throughout North America, we provide you with the largest collection of vacation homes in the most destinations. Every stay includes our experienced 24/7 customer assistance by text, chat, email and phone, and access to all your travel details via our free mobile app. We offer consistent terms and flexible cancellation policies, and we include accidental damage protection for every stay with no security deposits and a best rate guarantee. Wherever you want to go, RedAwning is here to make your journey easier!

description:
Unit 7-304 is a 1 Bd 2 Bath unit with a great location in the complex. The unit has a full kitchen, AC in the living room as well as the bedroom, washer/dryer, cable/DVD and complimentary Wi-Fi. Sleeps 4.

The space
Kamaole Sands #7-304 is a 1 Bd 2 Bath unit with a great location in the complex. It has a tropical garden view with a "peek-a-boo" ocean view. The unit has a full kitchen, a/c in the living room and bedroom, a washer/dryer, Cable T.V./DVD player and complimentary Wi-Fi service. There is a king bed in the bedroom and sofa bed in the living room. Kamaole Sands #7-304 sleeps up to 4.
Same day bookings and those arriving within 48 hours of making the reservation requires a phone call to Rentals Maui for confirmation.
Longer stays require additional terms and conditions. Please contact Rentals Maui for inquiries longer than 60 nights.
Kamaole Sands is the premiere property in South Kihei. Located across the street from Kamaole Beach III.
host_about:
Rentals Maui Inc. is a locally owned & managed Vacation Rental management company located in Kihei, Maui. We've been doing business on Maui for the past 20 years and we are fully licensed by the State of Hawaii, insured, and bonded.

We currently manage over 300 properties in South Maui, which is also where our office is located, making it convenient should guests need assistance day or night.

All linens are being dried at the highest heat settings to ensure viruses are destroyed. The condo is stocked with enough toilet paper and soaps for guests' entire stay. neighborhood_overview: Lots of shops for renting sports equipment, bikes or to buy Hawaiian souveniers.  Coffee shops, grocery stores (including West Maui's only health food store) restaurants etc. are within walking distance.
host_about: I enjoy traveling, I've been a vegan for 18 years, I like to believe I'm eco-minded.  I run the Great News (Website hidden by Airbnb) and build and develop other web-based websites.

Enjoy expansive ocean views in this beautiful one-bedroom one-bath with large wraparound lanai on Kuhio Ave. Located in the luxurious Pacific Monarch building, this gorgeous home includes both indoor and outdoor dining areas, full kitchen, full bath and private bedroom with plentiful views and natural lighting. The Pacific Monarch features a breathtaking rooftop pool, spa and sundeck and a prime location steps away from Waikiki Beach, shopping, restaurants and more.

This home is a remodeled 1bd/1ba with a full kitchen, full bath, private bedroom and private lanai in the Pacific Monarch building. This unit is located on the 10th floor. Elevators are available.

host_about: Aloha! We are a local family hosting legally-zoned vacation rentals in Waikiki. We love hosting, meeting new people, and offering a great experience on this beautiful island we call home!

Love, Live Aloha!

description:
Give yourself a peaceful non-hotel experience and still get the luxury of pools, tennis courts, workout gym, surf breaks and beaches right out front of this safe gated 30 acres community surrounded by tropical beauty. Come enjoy a great place to call home during your vacation that offers comfort, reliable Wifi, parking, surfboards, beach chairs & accessories, smart TV's with cable (and more). Close enough to town to have a city escape by foot feeling or stay back and refuel by the ocean.

The space
Our home offers:
- Low rise corner cottage in a duplex building with only 1 attached neighbor.
- 966 sq. ft of indoor living: 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms. The Master bedroom has a King bed and the loft has a king bed and two single beds (blackout blinds and curtains/blinds in all bedrooms if you want to sleep in from a long day at the beach). Note: we prefer a maximum of 5 people in the unit.
- 224 sq. ft of outdoor living with night-time lighting ambian
neighborhood_overview:
Puamana Oceanfront property is the perfect place located in the heart of Lahaina. Come have a relaxing visit with the birds chirping, palm trees swaying, and being surrounded by 30 beautiful tropical acres of manicured green space with spread out low-rise units that are mixed with local residents and vacationers.

PUAMANA OCEAN FRONT COMPLEX: Well known and revered for it’s Old Hawaiian Charm, low-rise island designed structures, and great amenities:

Perfect for a couple or two or a family with 2 adults and 2-3 kids. All around, the perfect unit - does not get better! Please note additional fee applies for 5th person.
Located in the heart of Kaanapali - great for shopping, dining, and fun ocean activities. Take a stroll on the Kaanapali Beach oceanfront boardwalk and you will be met by luxury shopping, mouthwatering restaurants,
neighborhood_overview:
The condo is located in the heart of Kaanapali beach resort area framed by Kaanapali Golf Course, flowering plumeria trees and palm trees. Next door starts the ocean boardwalk – enjoy sunset walks or morning strolls along the boardwalk. Enjoy a short walk (12 mins) to Whaler’s Village shops, restaurants and major hotels from the Hyatt to Sheraton. The Kaanapali Trolley stops by our hotel and services the major hotels in the Kaanapali Beach Resort area.
Walk to Kaanapali Beach or our exclusive beachfront clubhouse with full kitchen, 2 outdoor showers, beach towels, chairs, recliners and ice machine. Or if you don’t want to walk to Kaanapali beach, enjoy a courtesy golf cart ride to from Front Desk to beachfront clubhouse, getting to beach never got easier or quicker – how easy is that!
Grocery store is a few miles either direction from the resort. Downtown Lahaina is a 5 minute drive heading east and Kapalua is 10 minute drive heading west.
host_about:
Raising the Standards at the Maui Eldorado for Over 20 Years

We're world travelers who first visited Maui over 20 years ago and have been in love with this special island ever since. As hospitality specialists, we have international experience at top hotels and restaurants in Asia. Beginning as condo owners at the Maui Eldorado, we were the first company to raise the standards, invest in quality, and begin upgrading condos. Since then, we’ve grown naturally to suit the needs of our owners and our guests. 

Pride in Everything We Do

From our background in food services, where we’ve won numerous awards, we know how to take care of our guests. We take pride in everything we do. Kaanapali Beach, and the west side of Maui, holds a special place in our hearts and we look forward to sharing our passion with you. 

Personal Guest Service - From Beginning to End
Based on-island, right in West Maui, we offer complete customer service throughout your Hawaiian vacation. From the moment you begin planning your trip to the time you leave, we’re here to help. We’ll be sure you find the perfect condo for your group and connect you with Maui’s top activities and attractions. 

Offering  privately-owned studios,  1 and 2 bedrooms at the Maui Eldorado Resort located on Kaanapali beach surrounded by Kaanapali golf course. Exclusive beachfront clubhouse with full kitchen on the beach!

As a host, customer satisfaction is our #1 priority, as we know you have choices. Let us help make MAUI memories last!!

Our Maui home rentals are beachfront style, offering activities like snorkeling, surfing, whale watching, hiking, and relaxing by the beach or pool. Not far from many of our Maui home rentals is Haleakalā National Park, an amazing destination for beautiful views, complete with a visitor center for educational information. Also near all of our Maui home rentals are a number of great shops and delicious restaurants for refueling after a long day at the beach. All of our Maui home rentals offer you all the comforts of home with the addition of luxurious amenities. Book one of iTrip Vacations' many beautiful Maui home rentals today for the trip of a lifetime!

description:
The Waipiʻo Lodge Mac Nut tent is "glamping" at its finest! Nestled among Macadamia Nut trees, feel the tradewind breeze that brings some of the freshest air on the planet. Less than a mile from the Waipiʻo Valley Lookout, youʻve found the right place.

The space
With a comfortable queen size bed, ceiling fan and mini fridge, youʻll have everything you need. The platform tent is completely modern, with good wifi and plenty of plugs to charge your electronics.

Guest access
This is part of the Waipiʻo Lodge, which has three other bedrooms and shared spaces among other travelers. Youʻll have access to an outdoor bathroom and showers shared with other lodge guests. Youʻre also welcome to use a community kitchen with all the supplies youʻll need. To stay here, you should be happy to interact with other guests.

Other things to note
This tent doesnʻt have a spectacular ocean view, like our other tent, but it is a bit mo
neighborhood_overview: The Waipi'o Lodge is located in the quaint village of Kukuihaele, less than a mile from majestic Waipiʻo Valley. In a place where horses and wild turkeys often wander by, this is the old Hawaiʻi. A place where neighbors are welcoming and life is sweet as the smell of sugar cane grass. You'll enjoy the wonderful ocean view and many fruit and macadamia nut trees on the property. We enjoy the best weather on the island- not hot like Kona, not rainy like Hilo, not cold like Waimea… just perfect!! It’s also a central location for exploring the Hilo and Kona sides of the island. Just 10 minutes away is the lovely town of Honokaʻa, with farmers markets, antique shops, restaurants, and the coolest old movie theater in the world.
host_about:
Aloha,
I'm the Executive Director of Hawaii Outdoors Institute.  I also run the Waipi'o Lodge in Hawaii and Magnolia House in Florida.  As a longtime Superhost, I love meeting interesting travelers from all over the world.  I travel often for work, and sometimes need to stay in your AirBnB!  I look forward to meeting you.

description:
Welcome to historic old Hawaii. Charming old refurbished COTTAGE with 3 bedrooms -delightful walled garden compound. This vacation cottage is set in a garden with 3 other cottages. It is set directly behind a renovated 1940s building with street frontage. Early bird discounts and longer stay discounts available.

PLEASE NOTE :
17.96% tax on the reservation is payable directly to hosts. These are not included in the reservation fee.

The space
TAX OF 17.96% IS APPLIED on arrival. TAX IS NOT INCLUDED and is payable directly to host. It will be requested of guest at time of check in.
Hilo Farmer's Market and stores very close. Vehicle isn't necessary if you stay here (but most prefer to have one to see sights). Reliable internet for those who need to work remotely. The decor features bright colors. Features 3 Bedrooms on upper level with toilet, kitchen & living room plus front lanai. Outlooks to the garden from bedrooms and lanai. 'Bali
neighborhood_overview:
Hilo has a 'retro vibe' that is charming to many who come here. Hilo has a more than average number of artists & creatives.There is a fusion of cultures and cuisines which make for some interesting small restaurants around town and there are several places to eat and listen to live music.
Browsers might enjoy the thrift stores or vintage stores. The 'famous' Hilo Farmers Market is one block from this property.

Hilo is a great place for guests to enjoy slowing down & it is a great base for those with a long 'bucket list' of sights on the East side of the island:
lava viewing, stargazing, botanical garden, waterfalls, Waipio valley and more. Hilo is central to all of these sights.
host_about:
Aloha I'm Megan. Meet Jasper also. We've been working to create a colorful atmosphere for visitors that reflects the beauty of the tropics. Both of us enjoy helping guests feel comfortable so that they can relax and enjoy all the magic of this wet and wild side of the island. 

Hilo could become known as 'the town that time forgot' because it has the flavor of an older, slower Hawaii. In that way we are pretty easy going and relaxed ourselves. We have two guest cottages and a romantic 1 bedroom apartment here at The Lotus Garden. This is a property that features two garden courtyards, stone Buddha statues, a fish pond and an abundance of tropical plants and trees. . The Lotus Garden is reminiscent of the former 'sugar cane plantation days' when houses were clustered together so that there was a sense of community in the way people lived. Here Travelers meet other travelers in passing. Another wonderful feature of The Lotus Garden is that we are right in the center of town. Guests enjoy being a block away from the Farmer's Market and within walking distance of our cafes, restaurants, galleries and even Hilo's own Kava Bar. 

Just ask us. .. we know some great little beach parks close by and some special things to do around Hilo..  

... Our latest creed to live by? "Now is a really good time!" And so it is..

This one bedroom, one bathroom condo was completely renovated in 2020 and has everything you need to relax and enjoy your time on the island. It is the perfect space for solo travel, couples or escaping with your best friend. All of the furnishings are brand new and were selected to create a sense of calm and happiness for your stay.

The living room features a Pottery Barn queen sleeper sofa, a Smart TV with cable and an Apple TV and a countertop height dining table with chairs. The room extends into an enclosed lanai which overlooks the golf course; a perfect setting for your morning coffee or relaxing after a day of exploring the island.

host_about:
We are from the San Francisco Bay Area in California, USA.
We enjoy adventure, travel, & food. Our love for the ocean and tropics brought us to owning vacation property on the island of Maui in Hawaii. We want to share our piece of paradise with other fellow travelers. Enjoy Maui. Maui No Ka Oi !!  (Maui is the best!!) 
When you rent our condo, we give you an information packet to help plan your trip to Maui with a map, suggestions for activities, sights, eating places, shopping, etc.so you may have a stress free vacation. If you would like something special, we can also assist in arranging anything for you (just ask us).
We are always reachable by cellphone and the resort has a front desk staff who are there to help. We hope to have you as our guests.

neighborhood_overview: You are about to visit one of the most unique and beautiful places on earth. The many islands of Hawaii offer something special for everyone. When you stay with us you will have quality accommodations that are located just foot steps away from one of the worlds most famous beaches. From our Lanai you can stare endlessly at the 4000 ft Ko'olau Mountain Range or perhaps catch a rainbow perching itself over the rain forested Manoa Valley. Within a short walk you will have access to many attractions such as the Honolulu Zoo, Aquarium, Kapiolani Park as well as endless opportunities to shop or dine.
host_about:
We are excited to have you as guests in our home!   We are self proclaimed "Hawaiiphiles", as we just can't get enough of the place!  Having been traveling to the islands for close to 20 years now, we agreed it was finally time to take the plunge and get our own place in paradise!  After several months of searching we believe that we finally discovered the perfect place for us.    The Waikiki Banyan has a great location to the beach, shops, restaurants, zoo, aquarium and we are even fortunate enough to have ocean and mountain views too!  We recently put all our effort into a full renovation, which we hope you will enjoy as much as we do.  Never having done construction work we didn't know where to begin on our renovation of our condo, but we knew we were ready for the challenge.  After a lot of long nights and even more YouTube videos we finally completed our months long  project in Sept 2015.  We have a feeling that our neighbors below us are just as happy as we are now that were finished.  We love our home and hope you enjoy it and treat it the way you would enjoy and treat your own home. Mahalo

description:
When you think of Maui, what comes to mind? Is it the sandy beaches? Or maybe the perfect climate? What about that amazing blue ocean? At Noelani 108 you’ll experience it all! With its endless pacific views and the islands of Lanai and Molokai off in the distance, you’ll be in paradise and not want to go home! This stunning, oceanfront, newly remodeled unit offers panoramic ocean views, cool blue tropical interiors and access to fantastic amenities.

The space
Additional Description:

Endless ocean views from the ground floor private lanai will give new meaning to your Maui experience. Sandwiched between a private estate and the finest sandy beach (known as "S" turns) Noelani can be described as a charming, low-key, hidden-treasure, Boutique Resort. Enjoy snorkeling and swimming with turtles just steps from this premium condo. During the winter months, this condo offers front row seating for whale watching and turtle spotting!

description:
Stay here for beautiful views of Hilo Bay, the sunrise over the ocean, and the peacefulness of nature. This 3 Bedroom home has a large kitchen/dining room/living room space with fantastic landscape/ocean view.
There are 2 other studios and 1 small ohana cottage on site, all with privacy. *Please review pictures: Only 10 mins to Hilo, 45' to Volcano National Park! The property here has plenty of beautiful plants and trees. There is no risk here from any of the active south island volcanoes.

The space
Enjoy this 3 bedroom home! Includes spacious and open kitchen with sweeping views of Hilo Bay. Huge living room and 3 bedrooms with 2 private bathrooms and 3 showers. The two ocean-view bedrooms with king beds, access the living room through either another bedroom or by the outside covered deck.

*Our Sunrise Studio Airbnb is next door and the laundry area is shared for all residents and guests staying here.

*Please note the house i
neighborhood_overview:
This unique house has a huge kitchen and dining room, private lanai, plenty of yard space. This home has high ceilings and big windows with gorgeous views of the ocean and Hilo Bay. Located on the Hamakua Coast known for the refreshing breeze. We are located mauka (up mountain) from highway 19, and about a mile north of the developed Papaikou community.
The immediate neighborhood is a beautiful, quiet, and rural place with horses, cows, and active agriculture operations. You can experience lush green mountainside, views of the ocean and sunrise, Mauna Kea, and stargazing at night.

*10 Minutes to Hilo
host_about:
Sharon and I built this beautiful, spacious home on 7 acres in 2003 to fulfill a dream of living in Hawaii. Our home takes advantage of an incredible view 5 miles north of Hilo on the Hamakua coast, up slope from the scenic drive and Hawaii Tropical Botanical Garden.  (vacation rentals currently on hold though due to Covid restrictions)..
Come share our neighborhood with the farms, local horses, space and quiet while you appreciate what we feel is the best of Hawaii.  You are close to many of Hilo’s local activities, and within easy traveling distance to the Volcano sights, waterfalls and lush vegetation and attractions of our coast.
We offer an extremely spacious main living house area that mirrors the space of our outside view, and an ohana next door for a smaller living option.  We love the sunrises over the water, the constantly changing weather, and the sunsets over the mountain.  We hope you enjoy this place as much as we do.
Mark

description:

The condo has a unique floor plan with open kitchen and living room with window air conditioner, flat screen smart TV and dining table. The kitchen is newly renovated with all new kitchen cabinetry, countertops and appliances and bathroom. 

The condo has a small lanai with sitting area at the front entrance that is nice for having your morning coffee before setting out to explore the North Shore. 

There is a washer/dryer in each condo with a small su

Just a short distance, about ¼ mile from the condo complex you will find the beautiful Fazio Golf Course at Turtle Bay Resort and all the fantastic restaurants they have to offer. You can book surf lessons, horseback riding or helicopter tours all at Turtle Bay Resort.

10-minute drive to Sunset Beach, Pipeline, Waimea Bay and Valley and Shark’s Cove.

20-minute drive to the town of Hale’iwa where you can find great restaurants, shopping and adventure tours like Shark Tours, jet-ski rentals, and scuba diving.

10-minute drive to Brigham Young University and Polynesian Cultural Center.

Please check out website Turtle Bay Condos for more information regarding all that the North Shore has to offer.

No smoking/no pets allowed.

description:
Hana Camp Gear has just what you need for overnight camping at Wai'anapanapa State Park in Hana! The Family Tent - 4 Person Package includes: Family Tent, 4 sleeping bags, 4 pillows, and LED lantern with batteries. The $79 rate excludes Hawaii taxes. We provide only the camping gear.

YOU MUST OBTAIN YOUR CAMPING PERMIT ONLINE FOR WAI'ANAPANAPA STATE PARK BEFORE RESERVING OUR CAMPING GEAR!

The space
Hana Camp Gear provides only the tent packages. To camp at Wai'anapanapa you must secure a camping permit online from the State of Hawaii. Search for Waianapanapa State Park Camping. When you open the site, click "Browse for Availability". At the bottom of the list you will see "Undesignated Campground". Search for the date on which you wish to camp and it will show the number of campsites available on that date. If you wish to secure a permit, click the "Reservation" tab and follow the procedures.

After you have downloaded the permit, we can a
host_about: Our family has lived on Maui for many years. We love living in Hana and enjoying the food from our gardens, fruit from our abundant banana, papaya, mango, lime, lemon, and avocado trees, and eggs from our hens. We look forward to your stay with us!

neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is a perfect family beach haven! White Sands Magic Beach is just across the street, complete with attentive lifeguards ensuring safety every day. description:
Royal Kahana is a premier beachfront resort on the West side of Maui between the Famous Ka’anapali and Kapalua areas. This resort has some of the best ocean views as it sits on Kahana Bay! Enjoy beautiful sunsets as well as beautiful whale watching during winter months. Royal Kahana is centrally located to many restaurants and shops. Just a short walk away, you are able to enjoy a variety of restaurant choices from Maui Brewing Company to take out Sushi at Miso Phat.

The space
Additional Description:

Take a short drive to Lahaina town, dining and entertainment at Whaler’s Village in Ka’anapali, and championship golf courses in Kapalua. You are also welcome to all the amenities that Royal Kahana provides such as table tennis, shuffleboard, fitness center, heated pool and gas grills on site.

Royal Kahana 216 is a cozy, second floor studio with spectacular views! This unit sleeps 3 guests with a King size bed and a Twin size pull out bed.

description:
The Blue Door on Church Street. This portion of the Blue Door was built in 1929 and has been meticulously renovated to create a beautiful space for you and your guests. Its old charm, which dates back to the sugar cane heyday of Maui, has of course been preserved.

The space
The Blue Door on Church Street (@bluedoormaui) is the perfect home for your Maui adventures. Get out of the hectic hotel zones and experience Hawaii in relaxed, luxurious accommodations. We are nestled below beautiful I'ao Valley in historic Wailuku Town. Walk to shops, restaurants, coffee, yoga, theatre, food trucks, and more. A short drive from I'ao Valley, Whole Foods, beaches, the MACC, and 15 min from the airport. Take a soak in the tub before sleeping deeply on a King size Nectar mattress.

The Blue Door on Church Street is the perfect home for your Maui adventures. Get out of the hectic hotel zones and experience Hawaii in relaxed, luxurious accommodations. We are nestled be
neighborhood_overview: Historic Wailuku is convenient and a lot of fun. Walk to Wailuku Coffee Company to grab your morning coffee before heading out for your adventures. Hike the Waihe'e Ridge, explore I'ao Valley, or check out the historic Ka'ahumanu Church, built in 1876! See what's playing at the historic (and haunted) 1920's I'ao Theatre, and head to dinner at 808 on Main or the HI Thai Food truck, all within a short walk. Grab a high-end tropical drink at the Esters Fair Prospect, hear live music at the Way Bar, and have an unforgettable meal at the Mill House at the Maui Tropical Plantation. Drive to Hana for the day, check out the shops and beaches of Paia, head up to Haleakala for the sunrise, or zip out to old Lahaina town... the central location makes it all possible.
host_about:
Avid surfer, student of life, meditation enthusiast, traveler. East coast born and raised, fell in love with Maui in 2005. 

The Blue Door on Church Street is my passion project and I am excited to finally share it with you. My team and I want to make your stay on Maui exceptional in every way.

This great condo is just the place you’ve been looking for to kick off your next tropical vacation. The apt on the 34th floor comes with mountain and city views from your living room, bedroom, and balcony...and have we already mentioned it's within walking distance to the beach?

For your convenience and comfort, this air-conditioned unit has an open floor plan and a fully-equipped kitchen, along with a counter with four barstools. The bedroom has one queen-size bed and one full-size bed, while
neighborhood_overview: The Waikiki Banyan is located in world famous Waikiki, walking distance to the beach, restaurants, and shopping centers.
host_about:
Aloha from Midway Vacations! We are a licensed, full-service vacation rental management company specializing in high-quality destination vacation rentals in Waikiki and South Maui.

 We love to help our guests create amazing vacations where you and your Ohana (family in Hawaiian) will make lasting memories!

Relax and rejuvenate in our stunning homes with confidence, knowing that the units are expertly maintained, thoroughly cleaned, and well stocked.

No surprises! We provide plenty of photos of each unit on our website, so you accurately know what to expect before you arrive.

All units are fully furnished and stocked with dishware, cookware, bed linens, towels, and initial start-up supplies (toiletries). Enjoy the comforts of home in paradise!

Enjoy the privacy of your vacation rental unit with the peace of mind that our dedicated team is always available to assist you if any problems or concerns arise during your stay.

We take great pride in maintaining our high standards of care and attention to details so you can enjoy superior rental properties.

description:
Thank you for considering our location for your vacation. With the current challenges on the islands, we're especially grateful for your business, which keeps our family fed. We mourn with our brothers & sisters on Maui whose livelihoods cannot continue on as usual in the way that we can. We thank you for helping by stimulating our local economy, & we pledge to help our fellow Hawaiians by donating a portion of all earnings to local charities aiding in relief efforts until Maui is whole again.

The space
We believe that vacation is your chance to take a break from your responsibilities, and with that in mind, we will not ask you to do any cleaning as some other rentals do. All we ask is that you treat this place as you would your own!

With 1 queen and 2 full-size beds (with the best mattresses money can buy), this tiny house is large enough to sleep a family of 6, but also cozy and beautiful for any romantic couple wanting a getaway. We provide your p
neighborhood_overview:
The Tiny House is situated on a quiet street with little traffic. People here are extremely friendly and try to represent the Aloha spirit. Because of the jungle, you will rarely hear others and the property is very private. Volcano is a small town with some services listed in our manual. Even though it is small, over a million people visit the park located only a few miles away every year. This is one of the only places on Earth to see and observe an active volcano.

Weather:
The house is located in the town of Volcano, which is close to 3,000 feet in elevation, so it does get a bit colder up in this area (temperatures sometimes dropping to the low 50's (Faranheit) at night). The southeast part of the Big Island does tend to get a decent amount of rainfall, so it is normal that you encounter some showers at some point throughout the day.

Local Attractions:
See our "getting around" section next for more detail, but Volcano villiage is a few minutes away
host_about:
We are so excited to have you stay with us in beautiful Volcano, Hawaii. We want this to be your home base as you go out to explore all the amazing features of this area. Here you can enjoy making meals in our fully equipped kitchen, or just enjoy a cup of coffee or hot chocolate out on the lanai. Both our homes have been  labors of love for us, as we have personally repainted, refinished, replaced, and reinvented our homes to make it what it is. As we went along we came to love this area and the people here. Which is why we live locating and onsite. We want to share that with you. We hope you enjoy your stay here and would love to make it the best possible, so let us know if there is anything you need.
Mahalo!
Tia

description: 2BR 2BA Deluxe at Royal Sea Cliff, Nearby Pu‘uhonua o Hōnaunau, an ancient sanctuary whose name means "the place of refuge," could easily describe this resort. Oceanfront, modern, and conveniently tucked outside Kailua-Kona, tranquility reigns. It’s the ideal home-base for all of your island adventures.* Island tax paid directly to resort
host_about: Hi, I'm Joy! I'm excited for you to check out my listings and discover all the places you can go! I would love to be a part of your travel journey, as its one of my favorite things in life! My parents had us on adventures starting at a very young age and I thankfully got to see and experience so many wonderful and breathtaking places! I love taking my family on those same adventures now and would be so excited to help you plan out some of yours! Please feel free to reach out with any questions you might have, I am representing owners of the underutilized timeshares that might be just perfect for your next journey! If there is anything you're looking for and don't see in the listings please let me know and a lot of times I can help track down exactly what you are looking for! Can't wait to start planning your next adventure with you! Happy Travels!

Aqua Aloha Surf Waikiki is located just a block from the International Marketplace and two blocks to the beachfront of Waikiki. Short driving distance will take you to Downtown Honolulu, the University of Hawaii, and historic experiences like Pearl Harbor and Iolani Palace.

An adventurer’s paradise-Tra
neighborhood_overview:
The Aqua Aloha Surf Waikiki is located just a block from the International Marketplace and two blocks to the beachfront of Waikiki. Short driving distance will take you to Downtown Honolulu, the University of Hawaii, and historic experiences like Pearl Harbor and Iolani Palace.

Enjoy world-class shopping, dining, and nightlife at the International Marketplace, stroll the beachfront of Waikiki for surf lessons and sunset watching, or take in a hike at the nearby Diamond Head for an overview of Honolulu’s magnificent coastline. Whatever adventure abound, the location and the value at Aqua Aloha Surf Waikiki are unmatched.

Points of Interest:
• Waikiki Beach – 2 blocks
• Royal Hawaiian Center – 3 blocks
• International Marketplace – 0.3 mile
• Honolulu Zoo & Kapiolani Park – 6 blocks
• Hawaii Convention Center – 1 mile
• Ala Moana Center – 1.5 miles

READ BEFORE BOOKING:

The State of Hawaii requires us to collect taxes on the rent from every reservation. This feature is not currently supported on Airbnb. Upon booking you will be sent a request via the Airbnb resolution center for General Excise Tax (GET) and Transient Accommodation Tax (TAT)

The tax percentages associated with your stay will be:
(GET) 4.7120 % and
(TAT) 13.25 %

Please note, check-in details will not be sent until the mandatory taxes are fully paid.

description:
Enjoy the calm winds, beautiful sunset overlooking the golf course

The space
Kona Coast Resort's spacious, fully furnished villas are tastefully decorated with soothing Hawaiian accents, and include a full kitchen and all of the comforts of home. As you step out onto your private lanai, feel the tropical breezes and take in the wonder of it all. Amidst the panoramic backdrop of Hawaii's Kona Coast, the Kona Coast Resort has an inviting ocean view. From endless recreation to fascinating sights and spectacular natural beauty, the best of the “Big Island” is at your door.

An oceanfront playground is just the beginning of all there is to do at the Kona Coast Resort. Hike in a tropical rainforest. Explore lava tubes formed thousands of years ago and witness the spectacular sight of fresh, fiery lava spilling into the ocean today. Hang with the “big fish” – Kona is one of the world’s best sport fishing centers. You don’t have to train for Kona’s Ironman Tria
host_about: I am a retired general dentist  in Las Vegas after practicing in San Jose, CA and Las Vegas. When my family was young, we came to the Kona Coast Resort II each year and enjoyed the many amenities the resort has including the lush greenery, the golf course view, and the beautiful sunsets.

neighborhood_overview: Poʻipū Beach Park is located in the community of Poʻipū on the southern coast of Kauaʻi island in Hawaii. The beach is a park has lifeguards provided by the county of Kauaʻi.
host_about:
Suite Paradise – The gateway to island living.

Suite Paradise in sunny Poipu Beach on Kauai is home to hundreds of vacation rental properties, amenable to any sized group and any specifications you could think of. With the highest level of service and a wide range of vacation rental options, Suite Paradise can ensure that your stay is as seamless as Kauai’s lifestyle.

Choose from luxurious beach resorts, each with multiple pools and spas within walking distance and top-of-the-line amenities, including, but not limited to, full membership to Poipu Beach Athletic Club for the duration of your stay. Poipu Kai consists of 70 acres of lush tropical foliage and some of Kauai’s most sought-after vacation rentals. One complex is literally located nestled in a verdant and extinct volcano crater – you can’t get more immersed in the island lifestyle than that! From mauka (mountain) to makai (sea), Suite Paradise has something for you!

Kahala – A popular complex that is home to mostly one- and two-bedroom units. Kahala is only a short walk from the beach, and closest to Poipu Kai’s tennis courts and Kalapaki Joe’s sports bar. With the option of both mountain and ocean views available dependent on the unit, Kahala’s location is perfectly situated with proximity to Poipu Road as well as the Poipu Kai greenbelt.

Makanui – Two- and three-bedroom units perched across from Poipu Crater, with stunning mountain views, distant ocean views, and a short walk to the greenbelt path.

Manualoha –Less than a mile from the beach, although the complex pool is practically attached to the Pacific Ocean! With units sleeping four to six, easy access to the greenbelt pathway, and hues of purple bougainvillea draped throughout the complex.

Poipu Sands – One- and two-bedroom units with incredible ocean views, spacious lanais, and a short walk to Shipwreck’s Beach.

Regency – Larger units, spacious enough to accommodate up to 10 guests. Many of these units are newly remodeled and offer AC. Regency and Kahala sit right next to each other.

Regency Villas – Luxury units with central AC. Regency Villas often feature a loft and sleep up to five guests. Situated near the greenbelt for easy access to many resort amenities, and centrally located for a short walk to Brennecke's Beach, or access to the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort.

Nihi Kai Villas - A comfortable and quiet beach resort with 70 condos to choose from. Located right across from the ocean.

Poipu Crater – Just as the name says, Poipu Crater is nestled in a verdant an extinct volcano crater, which makes the foliage truly breathtaking. With 30 condos to choose from, sleeping four to six guests, the choice is yours! Enjoy the tropical gardens and central location to all that Poipu has to offer.

Lawai Beach Resort - Luxurious oceanfront condos located directly across from arguably the best snorkeling spot on the island. Enjoy a short stroll to five-star dining at The Beach House or enjoy the view from Lawai Beach, as the surfers paddle out for a sunset session. With room to sleep up to six, Lawai Beach Resort has it all!

Poipu Kapili - A beautiful and peaceful resort located on five acres of meticulously landscaped oceanfront property.

Pili Mai - This is Kauai’s newest resort development of luxury condominiums, nestled among a championship golf course.

host_about:
Hosted by RedAwning Vacation Rentals

Welcome to RedAwning, a whole new way to travel. We make staying in a unique home or apartment easier than staying at a hotel. By partnering with local homeowners throughout North America, we provide you with the largest collection of vacation homes in the most destinations. Every stay includes our experienced 24/7 customer assistance by text, chat, email and phone, and access to all your travel details via our free mobile app. We offer consistent terms and flexible cancellation policies, and we include accidental damage protection for every stay with no security deposits and a best rate guarantee. Wherever you want to go, RedAwning is here to make your journey easier!

Located oceanfront on Maui’s Kaanapali Beach, Aston Kaanapali Shores rests on 10 acres of tropical gardens and merges the comfort of spacious suites with hotel-caliber services.

The Magic of West Maui Known for dramatic landscapes of deep valleys and native forests, West Maui’s natural beauty is a dream destination for nature lovers and adventure seekers. Aston Kaanapali Shores is just a short drive from the charming town of Lahaina where you can find art galleries, local shops, and popular restaurants. The resort is also conveniently located across from the Honokowai Marketplace that offers a supermarket, shops, and dining.

All suites include a fully equipped kitchen, a private balcony, and Wi-Fi internet access to stay connected. Rooms feature an in-room washer and dryer. Ohana House has an interesting history—it was built in 1942 using lumber from dismantled supply ships during the second world war. Since then, this vacation home has been fully renovated, but still retains its original materials.

The space

Airbnb.com/p/ferngrottoinn

There’s a reason we call this vacation rental a house and not a cottage. With three bedrooms and three full bathrooms, it’s our best option for families or couples who want the added luxury of a full-size home.

I've always had a love for travel and exploring different cultures, which is why I find hosting guests in my home so fulfilling. I truly believe that hosting guests is not just about providing a place to stay, but about creating a meaningful and memorable experience that they will cherish for a lifetime.

description:

This unit features AC in all rooms, fast wifi, comfortable bedding, 90 inch entertainment tv, hot outdoor shower, a 8 person traditional sauna, gym, & 180 degree ocean views from top level & off street parking. Neighborhood is very peaceful and safe, relaxed area in the center of the North Shore.

Guest access
You’ll have to entire
neighborhood_overview:
Beautiful trail access to beach and cliff side directly in front of the property.


*Regarding beach access, We sit next to Waimea Bay. There is a neat trail that goes out from our cul-de-sac and has the option to go up to a fabulous lookout over the bay where you can see turtles, dolphins, occasional whales and wonderful sunsets. It also has an option to go down towards the beach and if the there are no waves and the water is flat (mostly in the summer) then you can jump in the water from the rocks and swim a short distance to the beach, otherwise there is a local trail/pathway behind the house that the locals use to access the beach, we have timed this walk and it takes about 8 minutes.
If you have never been to the North Shore one of the cool features is that there are so many beaches to visit so we encourage you to drive around and visit many of the nearby beaches that are literally minutes away, Sunset Beach, Banzai Pipeline, Turtle beach and Ali'i beach in ne

description:
Our country farmhouse has a very unique feel with detailed craftsmanship (built by the owner). It’s a 2/1, 1000sqft open concept with a 500 sq. ft. covered deck off the living room and views of the ocean & mountains. We have goats, chickens (eggs) and plenty of trees . We are 6mi to Hoʻokipa Beach Park, 10 min from Twin Falls, 6mi to Makawao & 9mi to Pāʻia. Quiet neighborhood and private. Come relax!
TA-122-773-8112-01. GE-122-773-8112-01

The space
The property is very peaceful. The deck is set in the front of the house for great views of the West Maui mountains and the ocean. The two bedrooms are located in the back of the house. Both have views of the garden. The master bedroom has a small ocean view as well. Ceilings are vaulted and rooms are both comfortable and very quiet. We have a fully equipped kitchen with new, full-size appliances including a dishwasher, microwave, and gas range stove. The kitchen also has a coffee maker, toaster, and a blend
neighborhood_overview: We are in a very quiet neighborhood at the end of a cul-de sac. There are cows, goats, horses, and other farm animals around the neighborhood. The neighborhood has great views and easy access to the Hana Highway for adventures!
host_about: Aloha, I’m Cary and have been on Maui for over 20yrs working on boats and in the tourist industry. My wife is an elementary teacher here in the public school system and loves the kids. My family and I have lived and loved this place for 12yrs and I built this house for family and friends and rent it out when it’s not being used. I traveled for years and enjoy meeting new people and this has been a great way to spread the aloha, educate people about the island and let people step away from the resort experience and enjoy the quiet of the island and meet local people in the neighborhood.

description:
Leave your worries behind and say aloha to paradise when you stay at this 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom vacation rental condo in Kapolei. Boasting 900 square feet, this corner unit comfortably sleeps up to 6 guests and is situated at the end of the resort for peace and quiet during your stay. Spend your days lounging by the community pool, or venture down to the Ko Olina lagoons for a relaxing time on the beach. Make the most of your Hawaiian getaway with numerous activities within a mile of the condo!

The space
Master Bedroom: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed | Living Room: Futon

Take advantage of the wonderful community amenities during your stay including a pool and hot tub. You'll love being close to the Ko Olina lagoons, shops, and restaurants. Set up a tee time for an unforgettable round of golf at the Ko Olina Golf Club. When the day is done, head back to the quiet corner unit for some rest.

Sunlight floods the open living space through the
neighborhood_overview:
Grab the provided beach toys and boogie boards and make your way to the Ko Olina lagoons for sun-filled days on the sand. Snorkel in the crystal clear water, build a sandcastle or work on your vacation tan.

All the fun you could ask for can be found at the Ko Olina Marina located a mile away from the property. Go for a dolphin snorkel tour, helicopter island tour, or charter a boat for world-class sport fishing.

It wouldn't be a Hawaiian vacation without dinner and a show. Take a short stroll to Paradise Cove Luau for a breathtaking display of hula and fire dancers!

Plan a day trip to Waikiki Beach for non-stop fun! Shop until you drop along Kalakaua Avenue, dine on fresh seafood at local restaurants, or splash around at the famous beach. While you're in the area, you can visit the Honolulu Zoo, Diamond Head, or take a leisurely stroll along the Ala Wai Promenade.
host_about:
Hi! We’re Evolve, the hospitality team that helps you rest easy when you rent a private, professionally cleaned home from us.

We promise your rental will be clean, safe, and true to what you saw on Airbnb or we'll make it right. Check-ins are always smooth, and we're here 24/7 to answer any questions or help you find the perfect property.

description:

It includes a tranquil indoor-outdoor space with a beautiful garden, lawns and a lanai lounge area. It is on the white sand beach so you will be steps from the water and sand at every moment. We are not kidding about the view! Jaw dropping.. A peaceful place to relax, and the perfect place to unwind.

The entire connected house is private a care taker may stay on the property in a

description:
On the Big Island’s well loved west coast, you’ll find this delightful retreat built to capture the natural wonder of Kailua-Kona. Beautifully designed to capture the charm of the 1930s, you’ll want for no modern amenity. Outdoor pools and the nearby beach are just the beginning of what’s within reach.

The space
These spacious two-bedroom resort suites comfortably sleep up to six guests. Suites feature one king bed in the master, one king bed in the guest room and a queen sleeper sofa in the living area. You will appreciate the privacy of separate bedrooms, the economy of a fully equipped private kitchen and the convenience of a washer/dryer in each suite. Plus, a whirlpool tub, full dining area and TVs throughout are many comforts you just won't find in an average hotel room. Enjoy the sights off of your private balcony as you relax in this tropical home away from home.


Suites may have different variations of themes, furnishings, layouts and vie

This newly renovated condominium offers a full kitchen equipped with common cooking essentials/appliances, two private rooms and a spacious open living and dining room. Relax on the private lanai that overlooks the Ala Wai canal or let the calming Waikiki waters greet you upon entering the unit. We can't wait for your stay!

neighborhood_overview: A short 5–10-minute walk will take you to the heart of Waikiki with the world-renowned Waikiki Beach and Kapiolani Park. Take surf lessons, explore marine wildlife at the Waikiki Aquarium, or catch a local artist performing local jams at a restaurant. You will have no problem finding something to do during your stay!
host_about:
My many travels around the world has taught me what to expect in quality service. Travel and hospitality have become my passion and I want my guests to experience nothing less. 



I was born and raised in Vietnam and moved to Texas where I immersed myself in the hospitality industry, learning all that I could. Traveling throughout Asia and Europe has given me insight into the meticulous care and detail that is given to its visitors. 



I moved to the states and am now happy to call Hawaii my home. It's not often that you can say that you own a piece of paradise. I am beyond grateful to be surrounded by the crystal clear waters, breathtaking sunsets, and majestic mountains. It brings me great joy to be able to share my piece of paradise with you. Aloha!

description:
Kiahuna Plantation Resort is the only beachfront condominium resort in Poipu. The plantation style architecture is surrounded by over thirty acres of lagoons, lily and koi ponds, swaying palms, tropical flowers, fruit trees, orchids, and plumeria trees accented by meticulously maintained lawns. The white sands of Kiahuna Beach are perfect for a day at the beach and the blue crystal waters are ideal for swimming, surfing, snorkeling, and more.

The space
The Parrish Collection is a locally owned and based real estate management company that specializes in vacation rentals on Kauai and Maui. Our collections of rentals are professionally managed by in-house staff with a commitment to personalized service, fine attention to detail and a true sense of Aloha. Our team looks forward to hosting you soon.

RESORT FEATURES

• Beachfront resort
• Complimentary self parking
• On-site activity hut

host_about:
Jonathan Parrish, or "JP" as he is referred to by friends, family, and colleagues, is actively involved with the day to day activities of The Parrish Collection Kauai.  

My personal goal is to ensure that we are exceeding the expectations of all our guests! 

Explore our unique collections of extraordinary Kauai vacation rentals, then match your style with the largest variety of properties available including the Kauai’s most popular resorts and widest selection of oceanfront homes in Poipu Beach.

description:
Escape from the lights and traffic of downtown Kona in this ocean side retreat. Experience breath-taking ocean views and sunsets while in the comfort of this 2 bedroom, 2 bath home. Enjoy quiet and comfort while you experience the real bounty of Hawaii’s natural beauty.

The space
Off the beaten path with stunning views of historic Captain Cook, this 2 bedroom 2 bath home is the essence of real island living. Raised to contend with the sloping mountain it’s built on, take in enormous views of the ocean and surrounding Hawaiian canopy. A prime location for several iconic Big Island beaches, including Pebble Beach located directly at the bottom of the hill.

The primary bedroom has a queen-sized bed (mattress replaced August 2021) and an attached bathroom. The guest bedroom has two twin beds (mattresses replaced September 2021) and an attached bathroom. The house is located at a cool altitude and each bedroom is equipped with ceiling fan to keep the air mo
neighborhood_overview: Kona Paradise is a quiet and secluded development in South Kona. Built on the slopes of Mauna Loa, the steep incline creates an auditorium of breath-taking views. This home is no exception. Sprawling ocean views from the rear of the home. At the bottom of the hill lies Pebbles Beach, a lava rock beach favored by sea turtles. The lava rocks have been worn mostly smooth which gives it the pebble feel.
host_about: First Island Realty is a full service real estate and property management company serving the Big Island of Hawaii since 2005. We specialize in paradise and have a diverse portfolio ranging from multi-million dollar luxury homes to all sizes of vacation and long term rentals. We have an outstanding team ready to make your visit memorable! With a warm “Aloha,” we at First Island Realty look forward to welcoming you to your new home away from home.

description:
Located on the fifth floor of an amenity-rich, tropical island hotel awaits this cozy home away from home with all the modern conveniences to maximize your Hawaiian getaway. This climate-controlled, 1 bedroom unit is designed with an open concept floorplan & classic tropical island décor throughout. Enjoy a full kitchen with oven, stovetop, microwave & refrigerator for all your cooking needs. Sleeps up to 4 in one Queen Bed & two futon-couch sleepers. Additional perks include free Wi-Fi & AC!

The space
Large sliding glass doors allow an abundance of natural sunlight and lead to a private lanai where you can take in city views while enjoying morning coffee or an evening beverage.

The living area is furnished with two large couched that folds out into a sofa bed and a flat screen TV for all your entertainment needs. Cook from home in the kitchen equipped with an oven, stovetop, microwave, and coffee maker.

The private bedroom separates from
host_about:
Bamboo Waikiki Hotel features a selection of moderately priced guest rooms, studios, and suites in a “tropical-urban Zen” atmosphere that makes you feel relaxed and refreshed. All accommodations offer a private lanai, WiFi access, air conditioning, flat screen LCD TV, iDock, laptop-compatible safe. While all rooms include at least a microwave, coffee maker, and mini-refrigerator, select rooms include a kitchenette or full kitchen.

You’ll love Bamboo Waikiki Hotel’s easy access to the golden sands of Waikiki Beach and the International Market Place. Embrace the action that makes Waikiki the world’s most famous urban resort. Then retreat to your tranquil oasis away to unplug and revive.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

description:
Tropical vegetation surrounds this unique freshly updated stand alone two unit bungalow creating a cool retreat from the hot Hawaiian sun. It is located in the Kona Shores condo complex. This is a great location on Ali’i Dr, close to restaraunt’s and shopping as well as some beaches. Convenient dedicated parking spot nearby makes access to the condo very easy.

The space
When updating this condo, we tried to create a relaxing space that also has some fun details. The kitchen, although small, still has all the conveniences you could want, including cooktop, countertop oven/air fryer, countertop dishwasher and an electric kettle. Even an ice machine in the freezer drawer!
The bathroom has a large shower and fun shower bar and a heated towel rack! The bedroom is large and has its own television. The “nightstands” are tables that can be rolled over the bed. Great for some computer work if you need. The lights have an outlet and usb/usb-c ports for easy charging o
neighborhood_overview: This condo is on Ali’i dr. One of the main streets to get around on. You will find various condo complexes, Green Flash Coffee is right next door and there are several beach options as you head south.
host_about:
Larry and I and our 2 Schnauzers moved from Oregon to Kona 8 years ago. One of us LOVES to fish and enjoys the calm blue waters of Hawaii (and one of us doesn't). 
Our neighborhood has kept it's Hawaiian feel and is a nice mix of cultures. Just 3 blocks from Da Poke Shack and Turtle and Banyan Beaches, which are on Ali'i drive (part of the Ironman marathon). We are also jogging distance to White Sands Beach, a favorite for boogie boarding.

The pristine condition reflects this private home's ambiance of luxury. Sweeping ocean and coastline views from the living-dining area, master bedroom suite and lanai. Cruise the tropical grounds in the included golf cart and enjoy the world class Four Seasons Resort amenities.

The space
Residential vacation rental guests are offered access to amenities at Four Seasons Resort Hualalai. For a detailed description of resort amenities access and associated policies and fees, please read the entire property description.
Sunset views year round while you grill on the Wolf BBQ .

The living room features ample plush seating and a gigantic flat-screen TV with all the premium channels.

The modern kitchen sparkles with beautiful gr
neighborhood_overview:
Residential vacation guests have the opportunity to enjoy world class hotel services and amenities at Four Seasons Resort Hualalai. Payment of daily resort fees, not included in the rental rate, is required to gain access to these amenities, but is not mandatory to book this residential vacation rental. Hotel services and amenities include:

- Hualalai Sports Club & Spa - Resort-wide Charge Card and Account - Club Concierge Services, dedicated to creating special experiences for all registered guests

host_about:
Aloha Kai Properties is a family business. Deborah D. Sharp, “AlohaDebbie” started her family on the Big Island over 40 years ago. We are a happy, loving family (Ohana) of five children in Love (aloha) with the Ocean (kai). Leilani was born in Kealakekua and her younger brother, Joseph Talman, who goes by “Tally” was born in Hilo. Both have a passion for the water. Leilani is an avid paddler and Tally loves to surf. Mom, “AlohaDebbie” still loves to swim, snorkel and paddle her ocean kayak. Debbie acquired her real estate brokers license in 1985 and found a niche in vacation rental management 10 years later. Taking care of vacation homes and world travelers has been Debbie’s life and love for the past 30 years. Tally and Leilani grew up in the business, always helping with guest requests, whether that was delivering a kayak or a coffee pot.

Together, Leilani and Debbie have managed vacation rentals since 1995.  Tally joined in 2017. Leilani Properties & Aloha Kai Properties have a handful of high quality vacation homes, or as we say in Hawaiian “Na Hale Pono” – just the best! Our goal has always been to carry the spirit of aloha into our beautiful vacation homes and to the people who visit them. Our properties are well maintained and full of charm, beauty and comfort.

We hope you will come back again and again and make us your home away from home.

Please join us for your dream vacation!

A Deeper Meaning of Aloha Kai….

Aloha Kai is abbreviated for “ke aloha ka i ʻoi aʻe” -love is the greatest of all and it comes from a song called ʻEkolu Mea Nuii

ʻO manaʻoʻiʻo, ka manaʻolana
A me ke aloha ke aloha ka i ʻoi aʻe
Pōmaikaʻi nā mea a pau
Pōmaikaʻi nā mea a pau

Faith, hope and love,
love is the best
And everything is blessed
And everything is blessed

As a top floor residence, indulge in the quietude and privacy afforded from being perched above the fray. This elevated offering offers convenient stair access to both the main front entrance as well as the rear lanai (balcony).

The Ohana (Family) at Maui Resort Rentals has been helping vacationers "Make Maui Reality" for over 50 cumulative years on the shores of West Maui.  Inspired by the Maui lifestyle, we aim to provide incredible vacation experiences at a curated collection of premier resort residences.

For your convenience, our warehouse and offices are located in Kaanapali North Beach, just minutes from all of the West Maui resorts.

Our Ritz-Carlton and Marriott trained staff are here to serve. Your guest experience is our highest priority. The privilege to host your precious Maui vacation is ours. 

As an added benefit, our exclusive Maui Resort Rentals courtesy shuttle offers free guest transportation between our West Maui resorts a number of West Maui locations - including Lahaina, Kapalua, and Whaler's Village.

The Honolulu Zoo and Waikiki Aquarium are right down the street. You get the best of both worlds - a great condo right in the heart of Waikiki.  Major shopping destinations are just few blocks away.  Have brunch at Dukes or a sunset cocktail.  Whether you just want to relax at the beach or enjoy the nightlife - it’s all at your doorstep!
host_about:
ALOHA! E komo mai and mahalo for choosing to stay with Captain Cook Resorts!

Captain Cook Resorts proudly manages over 170 privately-owned vacation rentals in Waikiki (a district of Honolulu on the island of Oahu). Everyone on the fun and energetic CCR team works hard to offer great accommodations, great service, and has a passion for sharing all that Oahu has to offer our guests!

We appreciate that you're on vacation, and we ask that you let us know if there's anything we can do to make this visit stand out as one of your best!

ALL CAPTAIN COOK RESORTS RENTALS INCLUDE:
– Bath towels, Beach towels, Bed linens
– Dishes, Silverware, Cookware (including tea kettle & rice cooker)
– Beach chairs, Hair dryer, Iron/Ironing board
– Start-Up Supplies: coffee filters, laundry detergent, dish soap, dishwasher soap, bar soap, paper towels, toilet paper, tissue, basic cleaning supplies, and travel size (2 oz.) shampoo, conditioner, body wash, body lotion
– NOT PROVIDED: beach umbrellas, beach toys, aluminum foil, Ziploc bags, coffee, condiments/seasonings, cooking oil, fabric softener, or bleach. This private vacation rental does NOT include resort services such as daily housekeeping, replenishment of towels or toiletry supplies, or hotel front desk services.

Please let us know if you have any questions!

Mahalo!

description:
A true “aloha” welcome as you visit the Big Island. Experience Hawaii in a different way than most luxury Hawaiian properties.

After a 2-year Covid-break from listing properties on AirBnb, Kona Coast Vacations is once again offering professionally managed Vacation Rentals to travelers. KCV is a professional management company established since 2006.

The space
A true “aloha” welcome as you visit the Big Island. Experience Hawaii in a different way than most luxury Hawaiian properties. From the moment you walk in to our home, you will feel the “aloha” of Hawaii with a sense of walking on the beach and enjoying the waves presented throughout. You will experience the essence of Hawaiian wildlife with the display of the turtles and the geckos that hang around our home as well. We also have unique and hand-crafted Hawaiian art for your enjoyment. Natural woods, unique art and other Hawaiian décor will aid in setting the stage for your paradise vacation.
neighborhood_overview: Waikoloa Beach Resort
host_about:
Kona Coast Vacations hosts over 5,400 reservations a year with the help of knowledgeable management, proficient team members and trusted home owners. Open 7 days a week, we strive to help with each visitors’ every need. Sharing Aloha from the first contact whether it is phone or email, we are here to assist by making the booking process as seamless as can be. We pride ourselves on providing hands on assistance whenever it is needed, whether it is reservation details, maintenance issues, or even booking activities! 

Kona Coast Vacations is fortunate to team up with great property owners which is instrumental in providing exceptional homes for our new and returning guests. With over 240 vacation rentals from oceanfront homes, ocean view condos and private estates, we are here for your every need, open seven days a week to take care of our guests and owners. With two locations in Kailua Kona and Mauna Lani we have dedicated specialists in guest services managing reservations, maintenance, and property checks alongside our accounting, support and marketing specialists. We are proud to be Airbnb members since 2001 and now are Superhosts with over 1070 reviews.
We hope to host you Hawaii and help create a memory to last you a lifetime. We are your “’Ohana” (family) on the Big Island of Hawaii, please do not hesitate to utilize our listed resources and book activities thru Kona Concierge.

neighborhood_overview:
The Aqua Aloha Surf Waikiki is located just a block from the International Marketplace and two blocks to the beachfront of Waikiki. Short driving distance will take you to Downtown Honolulu, the University of Hawaii, and historic experiences like Pearl Harbor and Iolani Palace.

Enjoy world-class shopping, dining, and nightlife at the International Marketplace, stroll the beachfront of Waikiki for surf lessons and sunset watching, or take in a hike at the nearby Diamond Head for an overview of Honolulu’s magnificent coastline. Whatever adventure abound, the location and the value at Aqua Aloha Surf Waikiki are unmatched.

description:
The space
Unit is located within an attractive condominium complex on the island’s northwest shore called Paniolo Hale, which translates “Cowboy House” in Hawaiian. The units all have wrap-around, screened-in porches or lanais. When the French doors on the living room are open, the living space expands to include this semi-enclosed area effectively blurring the boundaries between interior and exterior space. It’s a great place to eat meals, read, overlook the ocean, or even sleep as a cool breeze blows and waves break gently in the distance.

Unit is a 5-minute walk to Kepuhi Beach (which it overlooks) and a 10-minute walk to Makehorse Beach.

Although the condominium complex dates back to 1980, the bathroom and kitchen have recently been renovated. Unit amenities include:

Washer & dryer,

Stainless steel electric stove with range,

Stainless steel refrigerator with filtered water and icemaker,

Microw

While the rest of the West End of Molokai is relatively dry in comparison, our condo complex has a lush Monkey Pod tree canopy shading the entire complex.  Its very beautiful.

description:
Our place is a cute, rustic cottage in the countryside, surrounded by 850 acres only 3 miles from Hawi Town. Since we live by pastures we sometimes have geckos (our local lizard). They are our friends, because they eat the bugs, which we sometimes have. Awesome ocean & sunset views. During "Whale Season" you can sometimes hear the whales sing and flapping their tails. Walking distance to ocean and historical trails to Kamehameha's birth site & Mo'okini Heiu.

The space
We call it a Hawaiian Experience.... it's a Special Place..

Other things to note
We have WIFI, internet and a landline available to call anywhere in the world for free. Some cell phones do not work so well here. We are located out in the rural countryside so we sometime have geckos, they are our friends because they eat the bugs. We have 2 friendly Golden Retrievers, "Shady Lady & Jazzy"
and 2 Golden Doodles "Goldie & Coconut"

host_about:
The complex is located directly across from Kamaole III State Beach Park, which is known as one of the most beautiful and safest beaches in the Islands.  It is perfect for swimming, snorkeling, sunning, jogging, picnicking, kite flying, and especially enjoying amazing sunsets and whale watching.

Each unit has a private lanai that faces the interior of the complex, offering views of the expansive lawns, pools, and lush tropical landscape of palm trees, hibiscus, birds of paradise and plumeria trees.  Most lanais also offer views of the beautiful Pacific Ocean and spectacular sunsets.  

There are two pools, a covered pavilion, and a full size tennis court on the property.  Every evening the outdoor barbecue area is a popular spot to socialize while grilling the perfect dinner and watching as the Hale Kamaole conch shell band performs their nightly sunset ritual.

You will find world class golf courses, fantastic snorkeling and diving, many Maui activities, abundant shopping and delicious fine and family dining all within minutes of Hale Kamaole.

neighborhood_overview:
The home is located off Ali'i Drive on La'Aloa Avenue in a peaceful residential neighborhood known as White Sands Estates. It is a wonderful resting spot for those looking for a quiet retreat after a fun day of play. This is a wonderful location on the Big Island - warm, dry and nearly always sunny! It is conveniently located near four popular beaches:

- White Sands / Magic Sands Beach
- 4 mile
- Lyman's Bay to the North
- Kahalu'u beach to the South

Magic Sands Beach features beautiful white sand in the summer, crystalline turquoise water and super fun boogie boarding. 4 Mile is a well-known snorkel and scuba diving spot. World class surfing is 1 mile away at Lyman's Bay to the North and Kahalu'u beach to the South. Kahalu'u also offers easy access to honu (green sea turtles), spectacular snorkeling and beginning surf lessons. Nearby Keauhou shopping center (2 miles away), has dining, shops, a grocery store, movie theater, live entertainment a
host_about:
I came to Kona for a vacation in 2012 to fulfill the dream of swimming with wild dolphins. The experience was literally life-changing! Within 4 months I let go of my predictable midwestern lifestyle to embrace the adventure of living in Paradise. It was one of the best decisions I've ever made. It feels as if I live in heaven on earth!

Looking forward to sharing the Magic of the Big Island with you!

Aloha and A Hui Hou,

Paul

King Kamehameha the Great loved to visit Kailua-Kona on the Big Island of Hawaii. You will, too. Start your day sipping locally grown Kona coffee. Then set out on Alii Drive, where you can shop boutiques, dine or simply look out over the bay. Or, get an early start and take the two-and-a-half-hour drive to Hawaiian Volcanoes National Park and the most active volcano in the world.

It is at the beaches, however, where you’ll find the most fun. Hit the surf on boat or board, or dip under the clear water for a world-class scuba adventure. But don’t forget to come up for an intoxicating sunset ! Popular Attractions

Aston Kaanapali Shores is just a short drive from the charming town of Lahaina where you can find art galleries, local shops, and popular restaurants. The resort is also conveniently located across from the Honokowai Marketplace that offers a supermarket, shops, and dining.

All suites include a fully equipped kitchen, a private balcony, and Wi-Fi internet access to stay connected. Rooms feature an in-room washer and dryer. neighborhood_overview: Maui Banyan is located just steps from one of Maui's best beaches, Kamaole II. It is also within walking distance of restaurants, shopping, health food stores, snorkel rentals and a surf school! Maui’s unique and varied terrain offers a multitude of activities. From relaxing on some of the world’s most beautiful white sand beaches to the more adventurous undertakings of zip-lining and paragliding. Maui Banyan's location is such that there are many activities and attractions right at your finger tips. Some of Maui’s top attractions are: Maalaea Harbor; many boats leave from Maalaea on snorkeling trips, deep sea fishing, scuba diving, whale watching (in season), sunset cruises, and more. It is much faster to leave from Maalaea Harbor than Lahaina Harbor when taking trips to Molokini Crater and Turtle Town. Try a new Hawaiian recipe in the fully equipped kitchen or step onto the private patio lanai to enjoy a cold Mai tai. After a day of adventuring, let the large walk-in shower wash all your cares away before drifting into a peaceful slumber in your own comfortable king-sized bed. This condo exudes the utmost in luxury and convenience and is sure to be the perfect home away from home for you and your ohana during your unforgettable island vacation!

Enjoy access to the many on-site amenities throughout y
neighborhood_overview: Poʻipū Beach Park is located in the community of Poʻipū on the southern coast of Kauaʻi island in Hawaii. The beach is a park has lifeguards provided by the county of Kauaʻi.
host_about:
Suite Paradise – The gateway to island living.

Suite Paradise in sunny Poipu Beach on Kauai is home to hundreds of vacation rental properties, amenable to any sized group and any specifications you could think of. With the highest level of service and a wide range of vacation rental options, Suite Paradise can ensure that your stay is as seamless as Kauai’s lifestyle.

Choose from luxurious beach resorts, each with multiple pools and spas within walking distance and top-of-the-line amenities, including, but not limited to, full membership to Poipu Beach Athletic Club for the duration of your stay. Poipu Kai consists of 70 acres of lush tropical foliage and some of Kauai’s most sought-after vacation rentals. One complex is literally located nestled in a verdant and extinct volcano crater – you can’t get more immersed in the island lifestyle than that! From mauka (mountain) to makai (sea), Suite Paradise has something for you!

Kahala – A popular complex that is home to mostly one- and two-bedroom units. Kahala is only a short walk from the beach, and closest to Poipu Kai’s tennis courts and Kalapaki Joe’s sports bar. With the option of both mountain and ocean views available dependent on the unit, Kahala’s location is perfectly situated with proximity to Poipu Road as well as the Poipu Kai greenbelt.

Makanui – Two- and three-bedroom units perched across from Poipu Crater, with stunning mountain views, distant ocean views, and a short walk to the greenbelt path.

Manualoha –Less than a mile from the beach, although the complex pool is practically attached to the Pacific Ocean! With units sleeping four to six, easy access to the greenbelt pathway, and hues of purple bougainvillea draped throughout the complex.

Poipu Sands – One- and two-bedroom units with incredible ocean views, spacious lanais, and a short walk to Shipwreck’s Beach.

Regency – Larger units, spacious enough to accommodate up to 10 guests. Many of these units are newly remodeled and offer AC. Regency and Kahala sit right next to each other.

Regency Villas – Luxury units with central AC. Regency Villas often feature a loft and sleep up to five guests. Situated near the greenbelt for easy access to many resort amenities, and centrally located for a short walk to Brennecke's Beach, or access to the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort.

Nihi Kai Villas - A comfortable and quiet beach resort with 70 condos to choose from. Located right across from the ocean.

Poipu Crater – Just as the name says, Poipu Crater is nestled in a verdant an extinct volcano crater, which makes the foliage truly breathtaking. With 30 condos to choose from, sleeping four to six guests, the choice is yours! Enjoy the tropical gardens and central location to all that Poipu has to offer.

Lawai Beach Resort - Luxurious oceanfront condos located directly across from arguably the best snorkeling spot on the island. Enjoy a short stroll to five-star dining at The Beach House or enjoy the view from Lawai Beach, as the surfers paddle out for a sunset session. With room to sleep up to six, Lawai Beach Resort has it all!

Poipu Kapili - A beautiful and peaceful resort located on five acres of meticulously landscaped oceanfront property.

Pili Mai - This is Kauai’s newest resort development of luxury condominiums, nestled among a championship golf course.
