neighborhood_overview: We love the openness and privacy of our neighborhood. We also enjoy the fact that when we look out our windows we see green trees and nature. A 6 ft rock wall surrounds our property which offers complete privacy and protection from the road or passersby. We never feel exposed. A short walk around our neighborhood you will see horses, cows and goats on the properties around us. A rural setting but conveniently located to so many hikes and waterfalls. Twin falls a very popular swimming pond is 15 minutes away. Some of our favorite restaurants in the area are Colleens and Nuka. We also have several food trucks down the street about 5-7 min in the Haiku cannery mall – 5 Minutes to Makawao Town for Italian, Mexican and Bistro restaurants as well at great retail shops.
host_about:
We are Gary & Marianne Callari - 
We offer for rent private rooms in Our 1929 Farm house on Maui, Hawaii and (2) Casita Studios in the Red Rocks of Sedona, Arizona. We love nature, home and family. Our fun and together past time is making great dinners at home. We grow our own food and eat and live a very healthy plant based diet. We go to bed fairly early and we get up early. We have healthy habits and healthy relationships with everyone we come in contact with. An open mind and a positive attitude we believe have been our tools in getting the home and lifestyle we create. We try not to have to many rules and flow with what life presents us. Sometimes we are really good at it! We believe energy follows thought, so if you think you can you can! We love to travel and enjoy meeting people from all over the world. Our travels have brought us to Spain, Italy, Mexico, Thailand and the Caribbean. We use travel guides about food to experience the flavors of live! We have two grown adults that we are very proud of, we honor who they are and the choices they have made and look forward to many more exciting adventures with them. 5 things we can't live without: Great weather, great food a higher consciousness, good organic chocolate and of course an active healthy body! We subscribe to the 4 agreements: Be Impeccable with your word. Don't take anything personally. Don't make assumptions. Always do your best. We wish you Happy Travels and Aloha! Gary and Marianne

host_about: Aloha!  We are Hart and Marlene Phillips.  One of our favorite things, other than traveling ourselves, is to make other people enjoy their traveling.  We retired to the Big Island, after having long term teaching and management jobs, as well as being cattle ranchers, in California.   We became Kona coffee growers for awhile and then settled into oceanfront Hilo-side.  We now have a fantastic vacation home.  Emerald Rainforest Retreat is a unique, magical, two bedroom, two bath home secluded in the rainforest near Volcanoes National Park.   Hiking, bird-watching, golfing, and relaxing are it's specialties. It is a perfect location for exploring the rest of the Big Island!  Mahalo for your consideration!

Ka’anapali Shores has a 24-hour front desk and the Maui Condo and Home team will make sure you are pre-registered for a seamless check-in process

• Note: Resort collects $25/per day + tax amenity fee upon check-in
• Parking is $9.95/per day + tax

A valid credit card is required to check-in ($300 security deposit)

neighborhood_overview:
Located oceanfront on Maui’s Kaanapali Beach, Aston Kaanapali Shores rests on 10 acres of tropical gardens and merges the comfort of spacious suites with hotel-caliber services.

The Magic of West Maui Known for dramatic landscapes of deep valleys and native forests, West Maui’s natural beauty is a dream destination for nature lovers and adventure seekers. Aston Kaanapali Shores is just a short drive from the charming town of Lahaina where you can find art galleries, local shops, and popular restaurants. The resort is also conveniently located across from the Honokowai Marketplace that offers a supermarket, shops, and dining.

All suites include a fully equipped kitchen, a private balcony, and Wi-Fi internet access to stay connected. Rooms feature an in-room washer and dryer. Guests enjoy convenient on-site resort amenities including an activities desk, oceanfront restaurant and bar, fitness center and spa, two pools and jet spas, free introductory SCUBA lessons, a

Though our business has changed through expansion and growth to include properties beyond Maui -- on the islands of Oahu, Hawaii and Kauai --  our values and sense of Aloha remain. We have implemented new business strategies and have remained at the top of the Property Management industry on Maui. We are excited to continue to serve our current owners and return guests, as well as welcome new owners and guests to Maui Condo and Home.

description:

Perfect for a family vacation, this spacious condo offers free WiFi, a private washer/dryer, a well-equipped and upgraded kitchen, and a private balcony with incredible ocean views. Relax in the shared, heated pool and then take an evening walk among the palm trees and hibiscus on the beautifully landscaped grounds. There is even a shared grill near the pool area where you can gracefully show off your grilling skills and surprise everyone with a tasty meal! Plan your next trip to paradise and reserve this oceanfront condo today!

host_about:
Vacasa
Vacation Home Management

Vacasa unlocks the possibilities of how we enjoy vacation homes. We take care of managing our homeowners’ vacation houses so they can have peace of mind (and their home when they want to). And our guests book vacations confidently knowing they’re going to find exactly what they’re looking for without any surprises.

Each vacation home is always cared for by our professional local teams who implement our high cleanliness and maintenance values, while the hands-off tasks of vacation rental management--marketing, filing taxes, and maintaining a website--are handled by a specialized central support team. Our passion and focus remain true: to empower our homeowners, guests, and employees to invest in vacation.

description:

With views of the neighboring islands Moloka’i and Lana’i, this vacation unit offers the perfect Hawaiian getaway. Historic Lahaina Town, restaurants and shopping are minutes away.

description:
The space
Monsarrat Apt D - 30-Night Minimum

This house is located at the far end of Waikiki near Diamond Head. The kitchen is the perfect size for cooking and the kids can gather around the dining table and watch a little streaming TV or use the WiFi to play MineCraft. With a separate upstairs sleeping area, A/C in the bedroom, and a fantastic location, this cottage is a great spot for your Diamond Head vacations.

What's Nearby:
Less than a mile away down Monsarrat you'll find the Waikiki Shell which hosts various concerts and performances, the Honolulu Zoo, and the beauty of Kapiolani Park. You'll also find Kalakaua Avenue just a little further down which has a huge array of shops and restaurants. Just across the street from there, you can watch the surfers hang ten on Kuhio Beach or hang your own ten toes in the sand and just enjoy the trade winds.

Things to Know:
Free WiFi
A/C unit in the downstairs bedroom

description:
This apartment is like a home away from home. You will enjoy the lovely view of the ocean from the living room, and the little porch on the west.
The location is close to town, yet also close to nature with an abundance of trees, fruits, flowers and birds throughout the year. The climate is perfect most of the time.

The space
Furnished apartment surrounded by lush tropical vegetation. Turn-key, with Wi fi, TV, ocean view from lanai. Fully-equipped kitchen. Bathroom with tub-shower combo. Shared laundry facilities. Located at 1300 feet, overlooking Kaloko Pond. Airport, beach, golf & Kailua village within 15 minutes by car. $90 per night, discounts for stays of a week or more. Prices based on double occupancy. Add $10 per night for 3rd person. International visitors welcome. On parle français. Мы говорим по-русски.

neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is semi-rural, with many large old trees. At the bottom of our property is a one-lane country road, Kohanaiki Homestead Rd. It is nice for walking, relatively flat. You can gather some fruits and flowers and see/hear lots of birds: saffron finches, cardinals, mynah birds, kolea, kalij, wild parrots and turkeys.
host_about: I am a retired teacher. For nearly 30 years, I taught foreign languages to middle school students. My husband Rob is a retired gardener. We have two grown daughters and three grandchildren. Unfortunately they live on the mainland. I enjoy traveling, especially to places where I can practice my French or Russian. Rob and I both enjoy plants, animals and books.

description:
"Tide Pools,” is a resort style home in the best Princeville neighborhood located on Kauai's beautiful north shore. This lovely mountain, waterfall view home backs up to a lush, tropical foliage valley. Enjoy your own private pool and spa with waterfalls and a cave. Spacious living area with a ping pong/pool table. The home is situated just right to get amazing trade wind breezes throughout, year round. Visit us on insta @staytidepoolskauai

The space
This lovely 3 bedroom, 3 bath, plus bonus room home located on a quiet cult-a-sac. You’ll immediately relax as you walk through your court yard gate and hear your own personal waterfall after a long day of adventure on beautiful Kauai. Come home to "Tide Pools,” jump in your own private pool, BBQ and relax in the hot tub waterfall. Enjoy the mountains, and after a rain, catch a glimpse of the waterfalls. The rainbows, sunset and slight ocean views from the 2 lanais, off the upstairs bedrooms is a sure way to st

GOLF - Walking distance to 18 holes at Princeville Makai Golf Club 0.5mi.
PRINCEVILLE RANCH - Horseback riding, zipline, and off road tours 2.7mi
HANALEI BAY - A crescent bay with white sand, warm water and stunning mountain and waterfall views that form a perfect backdrop for the town of Hanalei. 4.5mi
OTHER - There are too many to count, beautiful beaches and hikes within a short drive to both the east and west, from the lighthouse in Kilauea to the majestic cliffs of the Na Pali coast.

The property is situated within a short walking distance to 1 Hotel Hanalei Bay, Puu Poa Beach, Hideaways Beach, Queen’s Bath summer-time attraction, and the Makai Golf, Tennis, Swim & Fitness Club. Use the beautiful bike and walking path to Princeville Park and Center, where you will find everything from farmer'
host_about: I am a nurse here on Kauai. We've raised our family here on the north shore.  We are very active and enjoy surfing, diving, travel, hiking, horseback riding and camping.  We believe Kauai is a very, very special place and welcome you to enjoy our home and all Kauai has to offer.

description:
Clean and comfortable, Keauhou Poolside is the perfect choice for your Big Island getaway. Located at Keauhou Resort #137, this immaculate one-bedroom condo is an ideal home base to return to after a long day of tropical adventures! Walk to the nearby harbor for an ocean dip, or jump in the pool just moments away from your front door! The Keauhou Shopping Center, also within walking distance, is the perfect place to stock up on groceries for a home-cooked meal on your lanai!

The space
Keauhou Poolside is a 750 square foot one bedroom condominium featuring a full kitchen, bathroom/shower, living area, and outdoor lanai. It is half of a single story duplex, sharing one wall with the adjacent unit. It has one designated parking space located directly outside the front door.

Guest access

This unit does NOT have A/C.

neighborhood_overview:
Keauhou Harbor - Quick 5 minute walk away. Great place to catch a snorkel cruise, spot the dolphins, or rent a kayak!
Keauhou Shopping Center-5-10 minute walk away. KTA Grocery Store, Long's Drug Store, Peaberry and Galette Coffee Shop, Keauhou Movie Theaters, Kanichi Pacific Sushi, Habaneros Mexican Food, L&L Drive In, Urgent Care, book store.
Sam Choy's Restaurant- Great poke and unsurpassed sunset views.
Farmer's Market- Fresh local produce on Saturday's at the Keauhou Shopping Center, and Wednesday's at the nearby Sheraton Hotel.
host_about: Aloha!  I’m Francesca, a small business owner of a skin care brand called Passion Moon Potions and a lover of Big Island life!

description:
We have an amazing Hale for your tropical paradise getaway. This clean, quaint, tropical getaway is in the perfect location to explore the East side of Hawaii. Whether you enjoy Hiking, Volcano exploring, Water Falls, Snorkeling, or Kayaking, this Hale is the perfect place to come home to relax, BBQ, and unwind from a day of exploring everything the Big Island has to offer. The property sits on almost a 1/4 acre of tropical plants, palms, & avocados, in the beautiful area of Hawaiian Beaches.

The space
Nice open 900 sq. ft. of living space. Open beam ceilings in the living room and kitchen. Carpeted living room and bedrooms. Full bathroom with tub/shower combo in the house and 1/2 bath in the laundry room in the carport area. We also have added an outdoor shower for your enjoyment. Covered carport. There is a Blue Jeep Wrangler that lives in the carport full time for our personal use when we are enjoying our home. But there is space enough for a second car.
neighborhood_overview: Our area is very Scenic, Tropical, Old Traditional Hawaii. Do not expect Waikiki or even Kailua-Kona. There are beautiful drives to Black Sands beaches, Clothing optional Kehena Beach and on to the newly formed by the lava eruption, Black Sand beach at Pohoiki Beach Park. Don't miss Uncle Roberts on Wednesday nights for live music, food and crafts. Lots of farmers markets and local crafts, gifts and stores in the area.
host_about: I own a limousine company in Santa Rosa, California. I bought my little home away from home because I absolutely love Hawaii and especially The Big Island. I hope to one day retire there. I love the ocean and outdoors. Scuba diving and snorkeling are my favorite activities while there. But the Big Island has so much more to offer for those that love exploring, hiking, fishing, volcanoes or just relaxing on the beach.

Whether you're hoping to hike, swim, or learn to hula dance, you won't have to travel far to enjoy your favorite activities! The property is centrally located 12 miles from Honolulu, with so much to discover nearby. Ideal for families or friends, this home has something for everyone!

description:
Beautifully adorned with the most exquisite and tasteful furnishings, artwork and pieces, this humble home exemplifies true elegance.

The space
The mixture of varying shades of browns, greens, blues and yellow exuberates the aesthetics in each room. As you sweep through the front door and dally through this spacious two bedroom, two bathroom home, you will come to appreciate the artful delicacy and careful selection of each piece. The living room offers large, comfortable seating that extends out to the living room lanai. Settle in with a good book, favorite movie or enjoy the natural beauty just beyond your lanai. Palms and fragrant florals floating on the trades heighten your senses as the sparkling blue ocean lifts all your cares away. Enjoy restful slumber in charming and cozy bedroom settings. The master suite sits alone on the third floor of this townhouse with a large California king bed, its' own sitting area, master bathroom and lanai. Each area of
neighborhood_overview: Poʻipū Beach Park is located in the community of Poʻipū on the southern coast of Kauaʻi island in Hawaii. The beach is a park has lifeguards provided by the county of Kauaʻi.
host_about:
Suite Paradise – The gateway to island living.

Suite Paradise in sunny Poipu Beach on Kauai is home to hundreds of vacation rental properties, amenable to any sized group and any specifications you could think of. With the highest level of service and a wide range of vacation rental options, Suite Paradise can ensure that your stay is as seamless as Kauai’s lifestyle.

Choose from luxurious beach resorts, each with multiple pools and spas within walking distance and top-of-the-line amenities, including, but not limited to, full membership to Poipu Beach Athletic Club for the duration of your stay. Poipu Kai consists of 70 acres of lush tropical foliage and some of Kauai’s most sought-after vacation rentals. One complex is literally located nestled in a verdant and extinct volcano crater – you can’t get more immersed in the island lifestyle than that! From mauka (mountain) to makai (sea), Suite Paradise has something for you!

Kahala – A popular complex that is home to mostly one- and two-bedroom units. Kahala is only a short walk from the beach, and closest to Poipu Kai’s tennis courts and Kalapaki Joe’s sports bar. With the option of both mountain and ocean views available dependent on the unit, Kahala’s location is perfectly situated with proximity to Poipu Road as well as the Poipu Kai greenbelt.

Makanui – Two- and three-bedroom units perched across from Poipu Crater, with stunning mountain views, distant ocean views, and a short walk to the greenbelt path.

Manualoha –Less than a mile from the beach, although the complex pool is practically attached to the Pacific Ocean! With units sleeping four to six, easy access to the greenbelt pathway, and hues of purple bougainvillea draped throughout the complex.

Poipu Sands – One- and two-bedroom units with incredible ocean views, spacious lanais, and a short walk to Shipwreck’s Beach.

Regency – Larger units, spacious enough to accommodate up to 10 guests. Many of these units are newly remodeled and offer AC. Regency and Kahala sit right next to each other.

Regency Villas – Luxury units with central AC. Regency Villas often feature a loft and sleep up to five guests. Situated near the greenbelt for easy access to many resort amenities, and centrally located for a short walk to Brennecke's Beach, or access to the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort.

Nihi Kai Villas - A comfortable and quiet beach resort with 70 condos to choose from. Located right across from the ocean.

Poipu Crater – Just as the name says, Poipu Crater is nestled in a verdant an extinct volcano crater, which makes the foliage truly breathtaking. With 30 condos to choose from, sleeping four to six guests, the choice is yours! Enjoy the tropical gardens and central location to all that Poipu has to offer.

Lawai Beach Resort - Luxurious oceanfront condos located directly across from arguably the best snorkeling spot on the island. Enjoy a short stroll to five-star dining at The Beach House or enjoy the view from Lawai Beach, as the surfers paddle out for a sunset session. With room to sleep up to six, Lawai Beach Resort has it all!

Poipu Kapili - A beautiful and peaceful resort located on five acres of meticulously landscaped oceanfront property.

Pili Mai - This is Kauai’s newest resort development of luxury condominiums, nestled among a championship golf course.

description:
This old style Hawaiian home will take you back in time as soon as you enter. It is located in a small residential neighborhood at the edge of downtown Hilo where you can walk to the daily farmers market, many restaurants, cafes, yoga centers, shops, and the waterfront. A convenient location to stay while enjoying the east side of the Big Island of Hawaii.

Washer and dryer available for stays of a week or longer. This property is smoke-free, including all outside spaces.

The space
The home has two good sized bedrooms, one bathroom with shower, and large living space and kitchen and dining. There are lots of windows for light and air flow. There are ceiling fans in every room. The bathroom was remodeled in 2016 with new shower, vanity, and flooring. The home is clean and freshly painted. Beds, furniture, and kitchen supplies were replaced in 2015. The kitchen has everything you need for daily cooking. You will have the entire property to yourselves.
neighborhood_overview: Small residential neighborhood where the neighbors are friendly and most own the homes that they live in.
host_about: My name is Michael and I love exploring the outdoors whether it be mountains, rain forest, or beaches. I believe in a well balanced and healthy lifestyle full of good people, good food, mountain biking, skiing, and lots of traveling to see the amazing world in which we live. Santa Cruz and Morro Bay, California and Hilo, Hawaii are places I like to spend time.

With space to stretch, relax and rejuvenate, this exclusive resort provides privacy, play and close proximity to Poipu Beach and town.

With now over 100 properties & a dedicated full time team to Airbnb.  We strive to host our Kauai Exclusive guests with professionalism and aloha. We are always available at 877GOKAUAI and happy to help in any way we can. We look forward to hosting you!

description:
You can park right up to gate of this slightly hidden cute 2 bedroom cottage in the heart of Hilo and walking distance to everything, yet with a quiet neighborhood feel. The front porch is delightfully inviting with nice sitting area with beach stuff available. Feels safe and secure. Inside you are greeted with modern simple clean style that is elegant in Blue & Green motif. Bathroom and Kitchen well equipped and grocery & McDonald’s only 1/2 block away! About 20 places to eat within 1 kilometer

The space
Location, location, location! Is the sounding call in real estate and this is a great one. 3.5 miles to airport means less than 10 minutes ride. All the things in Hilo town are walking distance. A half block to McDonald’s and Grocery store with Poke’ and fried chicken & anything you need to cook your customized meals. Little further gets you to Ocean Sushi, Mexican, Thai, Pineapples. From the kitchen window you can see the Famous Hilo Farmers Market, with all th
neighborhood_overview: Hilo is often described as a sleepy little town and the cottage is close to the heart of it, which is why it is very convenient to many restaurants, businesses, and iconic landmarks of serene Hilo. The cottage is just on the outskirt of town where residences begin to appear and things get a bit quieter as move away from the action and busyness of active commerce. Being close to a major grocery store there is some traffic passing by particularly during daylight business hours, and with a McDonalds across from there, it is a busy hub for downtown. That area naturally attracts some homeless people, which is starting to be a major problem for many big cities across USA including Honolulu, but I would say our county has done an outstanding job of preventing any tent cities from developing and problems that can come with that. It is still a very safe and comfortable town to explore and visit even with kids, especially daytime, as many of the businesses down and around the bayfront are old an
host_about:
Resident of Hilo over 25 years and raising a family of four great girls in a healthy active lifestyle. We love the outdoors on the beautiful big island and exploring its many special places. Psychotherapist and life coach, and teach Aikido as a hobby. Travel helps to expand one's perspective and life, and I believe that helping others have meaningful experiences is what it's all about. Congratulations if you are able to manage a trip to Hawai’i! We recognize that accomplishment deserves a reward you will be pleased with. Champagne taste on a beer budget? Finding that kind of value helps keep the success going right! What we enjoy is what we offer to you because you clearly are a WINNER, and deserve that if drawn to us. 

Living on the dynamic Big Island for a while I am well aware of the potential natural hazards of the Volcano, earthquakes, Tsunamis and Storms, at any moment, and have chosen my properties to avoid those risks and exist with a peace of mind in knowing that. Ocean view place in Wainaku is the closest can be to the ocean and not be in the Tsunami evacuation zone, so no need worry about where to go if and when those sirens go off in the middle of the night because of some big quake in Chile, Alaska, Japan, or local. With the realities of Climate change more people are recognizing that being too close to level water, no matter where in the world, is becoming more risky. The place in Fern Acres, Mountain View, is well secluded from hazards and when Kilauea was erupting from May - September 2018, it had minimal effects as Volcano area shook constantly and Lower Puna inundated by lava. Although the Volcano has settled and quieted for now, living on the Big Island teaches that people, places, and things are all very transient so never take things for granted, appreciate what you have and are blessed with now, for life is precious and can change in an instant.

This beautiful 3rd floor (top floor - Please note, this complex does not

host_about:
Kona Coast Vacations hosts over 5,400 reservations a year with the help of knowledgeable management, proficient team members and trusted home owners. Open 7 days a week, we strive to help with each visitors’ every need. Sharing Aloha from the first contact whether it is phone or email, we are here to assist by making the booking process as seamless as can be. We pride ourselves on providing hands on assistance whenever it is needed, whether it is reservation details, maintenance issues, or even booking activities! 

Kona Coast Vacations is fortunate to team up with great property owners which is instrumental in providing exceptional homes for our new and returning guests. With over 240 vacation rentals from oceanfront homes, ocean view condos and private estates, we are here for your every need, open seven days a week to take care of our guests and owners. With two locations in Kailua Kona and Mauna Lani we have dedicated specialists in guest services managing reservations, maintenance, and property checks alongside our accounting, support and marketing specialists. We are proud to be Airbnb members since 2001 and now are Superhosts with over 1070 reviews.
We hope to host you Hawaii and help create a memory to last you a lifetime. We are your “’Ohana” (family) on the Big Island of Hawaii, please do not hesitate to utilize our listed resources and book activities thru Kona Concierge.

description:
Modern room with balcony and breathtaking ocean views. Queen size bed with twin sleeper sofa comfortably for 3 people. Enjoy all amenities the hotel has to offer: Starbucks, bar, Cafe, Salon, restaurant, pool, gym and more. Adjacent to Ala Moana Shopping Center where you will find the best shopping, restaurants and bars. Take a quick stroll to ala Moana Beach Park or Waikiki lagoon beach, and park. Great spot for surfing and watching the fireworks on Friday nights!

neighborhood_overview:
Ala Moana neighborhood is centrally located in the heart of Honolulu and boasts amazing shopping, dining, retail, parks, and entertainment options. Ala Moana is located right in between the Kakaako and Waikiki neighborhoods and features the best of both neighborhoods.

Beginning at the human-made, half-crescent beach known to locals as “Magic Island,” the sprawling Ala Moana Beach is a favorite Honolulu locale for afternoon picnics, sunset barbecues and celebrating special occasions with family and friends.

Amenities like public picnic sites, bathroom facilities, Hawaiian barbecue stands and shady monkeypod trees help make the beach an ideal place to gather for celebrations and weekend relaxation.

Drawing constant crowds of onlookers to the shoreline, the far end of Ala Moana Beach Park includes some of the most famous breaks on Oahu’s South Shore, namely Ala Moana Bowls and “Kewalos” (i.e., Kewalo Basin), which are coveted by locals and seasoned surfer

Send us a message or any inquires for additional information, we would love to welcome you to be our guest, stay with us here at Punahoa oceanfront vacation rentals, in Kihei Maui Hawaii!  Aloha nui loa!

The tax percentages associated with your stay will be:
(GET) 4.7120 % and
(TAT) 13.25 %

neighborhood_overview: Laie is a small town with beautiful beaches and full of the aloha spirit. It is home to the Polynesian Cultural Center, Byu-Hawaii, LDS Temple and close to the North Shore. Outdoor adventures including water sports, hiking, horseback riding, ziplining, helicopter rides and more are all within 15 minutes.
host_about: We have lived in Laie for 26 years.  We have 4 children and we love living in a culturally diverse place close to some of the most beautiful beaches, hikes, and best surf in the world. We love the people, the culture and the aloha spirit here.

description:
Kona Coast is a 4 star resort property , oceanfront, only 1/2 mile away to local plaza with grocery, restaurants & shops. These is our timeshare weeks and we have access to 1 or 2 bedroom condos. Also right on the 6 mile Historical trail of Alii drive , explore beaches, snorkeling,surfing, world class dining, golf & shopping & incredible sunsets ! The resort amenities are rich, including 2 pools, 2 jacuzzis , volleyball and more.Very spacious interiors ( this price is for the ONE bedroom )

The space
The ONE bedroom condo easily sleeps 4 adults and teh 2 bedroom , 2bath ( if you request that ) has 3 beds total ! Our lovely condo is very , very spacious - 1,200/1,600 square feet ! You truly feel like you live in Hawaii and we have TWO bathrooms ........all very tastefully furnished & every amenity you would need.

Guest access
You have the entire one/two bedroom condo to yourselves!

Other things to note
This is
neighborhood_overview: This is the Keahou area of Kailua Kona, so quieter, more upscale & yet close to all the actionon Alii Drive & the center of town, 4 miles away.
host_about:
We love sharing the ALOHA spirit with guests !  We offer great service and quality condos on : big island , Kauai , Maui and Sedona ! Most people that get to visit any more f these , know immediately what a very special place each of these locations are .We are grateful everyday we get to spend here.  Our condos are  in the BEST location  and we truly enjoy sharing ideas to make this vacation your best ever !. We are sharing our timeshare weeks with guests. The great aspect of that is we can sometimes upgrade you to different neighborhood & the condos are in a professional , high quality resort that at a fraction of the price  ...........we love sharing the Aloha spirit & being of service to you with ideas & suggestions to enhance your experience here in paradise. Our motto for hosting & the rest of life is   " Life is easy " . Our style of traveling see to see many different places within a certain area & experience it as locals. 
Thank you , for the opportunity to host, we are honored & feel confident you will be truly glad you chose our listing !

host_about: Jeff & Suzanne have been hosting guests in their luxury vacation rentals on the Big Island of Hawaii for the past several years.   Their company Paradise in Hawaii Luxury Homes consists of a large team of passionate, dedicated individuals focused on helping guests have amazing holidays.    From the initial three homes to now over forty (40) homes all equipped to the same high standards they have never lost their attention to detail.     While they have added team members they remain directly involved with each and every guest.    They treat every guest like their trip to Hawaii is their life long dream fulfilled.   They love being part of helping families create amazing memories.  Come try the Paradise in Hawaii experience!

description:
Begin the day on your private lanai where you will have a view from the heated freshwater pool to where the Pacific blues meet the horizon! Find peace in this two-bedroom two-bath condo, that offers guests all the amenities guests will need including a full-kitchen, dining space, living room, washer/dryer, air-conditioning, WiFi, flat-screen cable TV, and free parking on-site.

The space
Cherish every moment in this two-bedroom, two-bathroom, oceanfront condo with breathtaking views of the Pacific. As guests take their first step inside the unit, they will notice the bright and minimalistic Hawaiian-themed open concept that flows from the front door to the private lanai. Guests will enjoy the cool ocean breeze throughout the space when they open the sliding lanai doors and chalices. While this condo does not have air conditioning, the location enables guests to enjoy the trade winds, has three fans and tile flooring.

Kick back and unwind in the cozy liv
host_about:
Fall in love with the Garden Isle’s unspoiled coastline, radiant sunsets, and magical valleys during your stay at Kauai’s Poipu Shores. Our oceanfront vacation condos are the epitome of individuality, style, and comfort. 

Poipu Shores condos have a prime oceanfront location near Poipu Beach, which "Travel Channel" once named America's Best Beach. Our hotel is also within walking distance to striking Keoniloa Bay, Shipwreck, and Brennecke beaches, and a short drive to historic Koloa Town.

Our condos offer laid-back island living with stunning Pacific Ocean views, upgraded room features, and resort amenities. Our beachfront resort has two barbeque areas and a heated freshwater swimming pool that’s home to "The Hut" - an open-air lounge area where you can unwind in the year-round Poipu sun. We also provide Free Parking for guests so you explore Kauai and return with ease.

Whether you’re into relaxing beachside or venturing through Kauai’s rainforests, there’s something for everyone at Poipu Shores.

- Stay fit at nearby Poipu Athletic Club
- Tee off at at Poipu's championship golf courses
- Horseback ride along a secret beach
- Take a mountain bike excursion
- Shop Poipu’s fantastic art galleries
- Dine on fresh caught seafood
- All the Comforts of Home

Poipu Shores not only has great resort features, but each condo also comes with amenities that will make your stay feel just like home. Cook your own meals in your full-size kitchen and dine on your large private lanai/balcony while the sun sets into the deep blue Pacific. And don’t worry—every room is oceanfront! We also have Free WiFi, an in-room washer/dryer, and cable TV.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

description:
Pack your sunscreen and prepare for a tropical escape when you make this cozy 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom vacation rental your Hawaiian retreat! Spend a morning watching the sunrise over the ocean from your balcony, then head into town just a quick drive to the King & Queens Marketplace in Abay to find the perfect souvenir. Go swimming with dolphins at Dolphin Quest Hawaii or hike at Kalahuipua'a Historic Park. Whatever the day brings, you won’t want to leave this slice of paradise by the end of it!

The space
Permit # STVR-19-365579 | Unbeatable Ocean View | Resort Perks | Free WiFi

This condo is perfect for couples or solo travelers looking for a stress-free place to unwind after exploring The Big Island’s nearby beaches and golfing.

Bedroom: California King Bed | Living Room: Futon

COMMUNITY AMENITIES: Lap pool, kiddie pool, tennis court, picnic area, bookmobile, golf course (discounted w/ provided guest asses), park

description:
This apartment is located in Downtown Hilo. It's just steps from the Hilo Farmers Market and many shops and restaurants. The apartment has 3 bdrms. The building has a few full time tenants, as well as other short term rental units. The property is gated and we ask that everyone keeps gates closed and locked. The apartment is downtown, so there is downtown noise and downtown activity. It's one flight of stairs to the front door.

The space
There are 3 bedrooms each with a queen bed and a ceiling fan, a full kitchen, and one bathroom. The living room is large with a dining table as well as bar seating over the kitchen. There is a smart TV with Spectrum service. The internet is fast, also through Spectrum.
Again we are downtown, with downtown noise and downtown life.

Guest access
Parking is street parking only.
This apartment is in Downtown Hilo, with downtown life.
We are at one end of the town, the town is about a mile lo
neighborhood_overview:
Historic Downtown Hilo is just about a mile long with 2 main streets this unit is at one end of the town. The farmers market is right behind the building, lots of shops, restaurants, galleries, and cafe's (no need for a car)...but if you plan to see the island and all of its magical beauty, you will need a car.
Just a few things that I want to share before I accept your booking….
We only have street parking, which usually is no problem.
The laundry is the laundromat across the street. Note: best laundromat ever, lol.
This apartment is in downtown Hilo, with some downtown life.
The property is gated with a coded entry gate. There are 4 more units on the property and censored security lights around the whole building, and a property manager who lives on site.
We are in tropical Hawaii, it is not uncommon everywhere in Hawaii to find insects, here at 98 Ponahawai St. we take precautions to keep that from happening, although sometimes they just show up....
host_about:
Hi, I'm Marlene. 
The big island has so much to offer, and I am happy to be able to provide you a place to stay while you experience Hawaii.
Thank you for choosing our place.

description:
Remodeled 1 Bedroom Oceanfront - Kahana Reef 301

The space
Ocean views don't get much better than this! Remodeled oceanfront condo including, new cabinets, tile flooring, new window treatments, paint, lighting, real wood Minka Aire ceiling fans, updated kitchen, appliances, bathroom/stall shower (no tub), and floor-to-ceiling windows. This is a 3rd floor-direct oceanfront corner unit that allows for plenty of sunshine and views of the neighboring islands. Relax to the sound of crashing waves as you stand mere feet away from the ocean; sea turtles, dolphins, and even whales are a common sight. The unit has extra side windows for great light and increased airflow. You will love the privacy of this corner unit.

Sleeps up to 4 people comfortably in a junior private bedroom with a queen bed. The entertainment system includes 40" Samsung LED TV, HD Cable with on-demand TV, and DVD player. Free Hi-Speed Wi-Fi, landline phone with free calls to the U.S. and Ca

You’ll enjoy watching Hawaiian sea turtles feeding on the reef in front of you.  China Boat restaurant is across the street.  Maui Brewing Co, Village Coffee, Dollies, Smiles Nail Salon, etc., are a short walk away.
host_about:

CNR is committed to providing the finest product and unsurpassed personalized service in the industry. Chase ‘N Rainbows is a proud member of the Hawaii Visitors & Convention Bureau (HVCB), The American Society of Travel Agents (ASTA), Maui Visitors Bureau (MVB), Hawaii Association of Realtors, Maui Chamber of Commerce, and Vacation Rental Managers Association (VRMA).

description:
Located on the magnificent, 22,000-acre Kapalua Resort, these upscale accommodations are some of Maui’s best vacation condos. The units feature spacious, one- to three-bedroom with full kitchens, washers/dryers, A/C, and stunning views. Relax at one of the 3 beautiful white sand beaches, just steps away from many shops and restaurants, Enjoy a game of golf at Kapalua's Bay course. Plan an adventure to our near by hiking/biking trails.You'll have a great time at this comfortable place to stay.

The space
• 2nd floor, 2 story villa with 8 stairs from parking
• Tile floors throughout
• Updated open kitchen with granite counters and high end appliances includes – fridge with ice maker, stove/oven, microwave, dishwasher, cookware, tableware and unique chef’s table counter
• Large ocean view deck with dining table and 4 chairs accessible from living and dining room
• 2nd floor master bedroom with queen bed, lanai and 2 lounge chairs, bathroom with gr
neighborhood_overview: Located on the northwestern tip of Maui, the Kapalua Resort boasts three beautiful beaches and 36 holes of championship golf. Kapalua Bay Villas are closest to Oneloa and Kapalua Beaches, with one- and two-bedroom ocean view and ocean front villas available. The Ridge at Kapalua is perched high above the ocean with many one- and two-bedroom villas having magnificent ocean and Molokai views. Kapalua Golf Villas one- and two-bedroom condos are situated along Kapalua’s Bay Course fairway, where guests may watch golfers and may enjoy distant views of the ocean.
host_about:
The Outrigger Way

Developed in 1993 with Hawaiian scholar and historian Dr. George Kanahele, the Ke 'Ano Wa'a process was designed to advance the company's corporate culture and fundamental business strategies. The values-based process intricately connected three core elements of the hospitality industry:

HOST + GUEST + PLACE

It also deepened Outrigger's understanding and appreciation of the local host culture, a distinct hospitality style that is recognized across the globe.

host_about:
ALOHA! E komo mai and mahalo for choosing to stay with Captain Cook Resorts!

Captain Cook Resorts proudly manages over 170 privately-owned vacation rentals in Waikiki (a district of Honolulu on the island of Oahu). Everyone on the fun and energetic CCR team works hard to offer great accommodations, great service, and has a passion for sharing all that Oahu has to offer our guests!

We appreciate that you're on vacation, and we ask that you let us know if there's anything we can do to make this visit stand out as one of your best!

ALL CAPTAIN COOK RESORTS RENTALS INCLUDE:
– Bath towels, Beach towels, Bed linens
– Dishes, Silverware, Cookware (including tea kettle & rice cooker)
– Beach chairs, Hair dryer, Iron/Ironing board
– Start-Up Supplies: coffee filters, laundry detergent, dish soap, dishwasher soap, bar soap, paper towels, toilet paper, tissue, basic cleaning supplies, and travel size (2 oz.) shampoo, conditioner, body wash, body lotion
– NOT PROVIDED: beach umbrellas, beach toys, aluminum foil, Ziploc bags, coffee, condiments/seasonings, cooking oil, fabric softener, or bleach. This private vacation rental does NOT include resort services such as daily housekeeping, replenishment of towels or toiletry supplies, or hotel front desk services.

Please let us know if you have any questions!

Mahalo!

host_about:
Hawaii-based and locally operated out of Kapalua Resort, The Parrish Collection Maui is a full-service vacation rental management company proudly overseeing 50 privately owned homes in the Bay Villas, Golf Villas and The Ridge Villas.  

Originally formed in 2007, Aloha Vacation Villas is now part of The Parrish Collection group of companies.  Based on Kauai, The Parrish Collection LLC manages over 350 properties on both Maui and Kauai.

JP Parrish is the Owner and Principal Broker of The Parrish Collection LLC, originally formed in 1984 that is now the largest independently owned vacation rental company on Kauai.  

Headquartered at Poipu Beach, Kauai and operating owner and guest services’ desks at three major Kauai resorts, The Parrish Collection LLC offers easy access to owners and guests. 

Its dedicated team has worked together for many years and offers an unequaled commitment to personal and professional service, attention to detail, and the highest quality standards all balanced with a true sense of Aloha.

description:
Clean quiet property, walking distance to Magics and Kahaluu. We are located close to the hustle and bustle of the oceanfront Kona town and yet far enough to get away from it when you are ready to relax.

The space
Palm Hale Suite is on the bottom floor of the home. It has it's own private entry with a Queen bed, additional twin bed available to accommodate a 3rd guest, Cable TV,WIFI, Full bathroom, closet and a separate dining room, Full size refrig., bar sink. There is coin operated washer & dryer in a common room. Outside has a table, chairs and a bbq for those who like to grill. There is plenty of off street parking behind the home. The home is situated so that you get the ocean breezes and can hear the waves crashing on the shoreline when the surf is up. We are between Magic Sands Beach and Snorkel Beach (Kahalu'u beach) and both are within walking distance if you just want to hang out at local Beaches. We are also only one mile from Keauhou Center which has
neighborhood_overview: We are located with in walking distance of the 2 most popular beaches. We have Keauhou shopping center 1 mile south of us if you want to pick up groceries, see a movie, mail off a letter or get something to eat with out going to the bustle of town. We also have a local farmers market on Wednesday and Saturday near by.
host_about:
Aloha!
   I recently moved to Kona after going to school here when I was 17 (a few years back now haha) and fell in love with the island. I was born in San Clemente CA and spent the last 20 years in Santa Barbara California. The weather and water here are second to none, weirdly comforting having the west facing beaches and sunsets. My uncle/second cousin David moved over here 2012 ish and has been helping me get started with the vacation renting family business :) Looking forward to hosting people from all of the world so they can see this beautiful Island I fell in love with. I'm sure you will fall in love too.

description: Kona Hawaiian Resort bungalows are located near the action. Just a short walk to restaurants, shopping, and the beach. Come relax by the pool or watch the waves crash on the black shores of Kona. These spacious 2 bedroom bungalows are nestled among the trees and give you the privacy you want. Enjoy breakfast on your balcony and listen to the birds chirp.
host_about: Hi, my name is Aly. My husband and I love to travel. We have 3 kids and we take them everywhere. So we know what it's like to need the comforts of home when you are away. I am so excited to help you navigate the slopes of the Rocky Mountains or the turquoise waters of the Caribbean!

description:
Great location only steps to the beach, shopping, bus lines, and restaurants. Guests return year after year to the Waikiki Banyan that they have grown to love.

The space
Aloha and welcome to your beautiful new home-away-from-home with enchanting views of the Koolau mountains and Ala Wai golf course.

This 35th floor unit of the Waikiki Banyan is fully furnished with two twin size beds, two sofa beds in the living room, dining table with chairs, and two chairs with table on the lanai/balcony.

The full size kitchen has everything you’ll need to feel right at home: plates, glasses, silverware, full size oven/stove, full size refrigerator, microwave, rice cooker, pots and pans, etc.

Free parking pass and free private wifi are both included for your entire stay!!! Additional parking is available for $30day* (*rates subject to change).

The Waikiki Banyan features a recreation deck with a large pool, 2 spa/hot tubs, saunas,
host_about: We are a full service boutique Real Estate firm, specializing in Vacation Rentals and Property Management.

description:
Relax on the blush corner couch under a surf-inspired gallery wall at a boutique retreat complete with ukulele's, a vinyl record player, yoga mats and all the Hawaiian coffee you can enjoy. The loft is located just a 1-minute walk from the quite beach in Kihei which is perfect for young kids to wade in the ocean. Wake up in the mornings and take a dip in the pool or hot tub and listen to the chirping of the tropical birds or the swaying of the palm trees in the breeze. Enjoy your warm evenings on the cozy lanai, drink in hand swinging in the egg-shaped chair while basking in the beauty of Maui

Our loft is bright and airy and carefully curated with decor, furniture and accessories found on the island. Some of the features we love about our second home is the blush pink sofa, patio swinging chair with string marquee lights, the super comfortable beds, our nostalgic record player with a collection of Hawaiian vinyl and the two ukuleles we supply in the loft for the guests enjoy
neighborhood_overview:
Kihei Garden Estates is a block away from a fantastic swimming beach with smooth, soft sand. Reach the island's best coffee shop called Akamai in 2 minutes, along with restaurants, gym, bike, scooter and car rentals, shave ice stall, post office, performance theatre, a dessert stop called Maui Pies, a grocery store that is open until 1am and quaint shops.

Our neighbourhood is quiet and is full of more locals than tourists. We love our community.
host_about:
I live between the Okanagan in Western Canada and the beaches of Kihei on Maui, HI.  

In Canada I own and operate an event decorating company and I am a decorator in the film industry. 

My first trip to Maui was 4 years ago when I fell in love with the island instantly (yes.. I was there during the false missile alert). Through that crazy experience i started to reevaluate my priorities and I decided that life was too short not to prioritize more time for down time and relaxation. I have curated a home that i love (complete with a swinging porch chair, two ukuleles, a shower with tiles that  spell out aloha & a vinyl record player). I designed PRAY for SURF loft with great detail so that my guests would feel right at home. Due to my beloved dogs being unable to fly and my business in Canada i  can only spend a couple months in Maui so i share ‘PRAY for SURF loft’ with my Airbnb guests the other 9 months of the year. 

I hope that everyone gets to experience the vast beauty and versatile outdoor activities that Maui has to offer. There’s so much warm hospitality exuding from this special island. 

Thanks for enjoying @prayforsurfloft.

Mahalo!

host_about:
Aloha，welcome to Hawaii! 
I’m Tim, traveled around the world now I’m back to Hawaii. You should never miss the most amazing place in this world. I am here for you to provide the best stay and nice experience.

description: Make some memories at this unique and family-friendly place. Our home is located at a cooler higher elevation. There is a large lanai with an outdoor table and gorgeous ocean views. The large master bedroom has a king sized bed. There is an additional separate bedroom with a queen sized bed.
host_about: Aloha! My name is Shawna and I have lived in Hawaii for the last 20 years. I teach at a local elementary school.  My husband is a boat captain. We look forward to sharing our home with you.

description:

Located at the entrance to Pakui Street - a popular area for exclusive vacation rentals, this 3 bedroom, 3.5 bath home is part of the world renown Hualalai Resort that features the Four Seasons Hotel, Sports Club & Spa, championship golf, tennis and a wide range of ocean ...

The space
...sports activities. Guests of this home have the option to purchase passes for daily use of the Resort amenities, located within walking distance. Open-air in design and comfortably decorated, the home has been recently updated and includes king-king-2 queen bedding configuration - ideal for up to 6 guests. A private swimming pool and spa sits just off the spacious lanai and is complete with golf and ocean views yet, private - with jet-black lava and
host_about:
We are a licensed, professional property management company operating vacation rentals on Oahu and the Big Island. Our team will meet guests on arrival, provide an orientation to the property, and be available for assistance throughout the stay, if needed.  

We pride ourselves on providing a consistent, high-quality experience no matter which home you choose.  Homes are incredibly well stocked from kitchen items to bath amenities to beach necessities.  Just bring your luggage!  

Many of our listings are at the Four Seasons Hualalai Resort where I worked for 10 years as VP of Marketing.  The Resort continues to be the #1 rated property in Hawaii and is my family's favorite place to visit.  My business partner now runs our Big Island operation while I have relocated to Kailua, Oahu.... another amazing beach destination!  Fabulous restaurants, great beaches, and charming beach- town shops characterize Kailua and we have a great selection of vacation homes in the area.  
We look forward to having you with us!

description:
Welcome to the Tropical Tree Homestead! Together but separate, we offer two adjacent handcrafted dwellings with an interconnecting yard. The Homestead is one mile to Kehena beach, six miles to the new Po'hoiki black sand beach, the new lava flows, and many tide pools along the red road. Perfect for two groups or large families. Laze about in the hammock. Lot's of love has gone into the custom wood, stone and landscape work. Unique and unconventional in every way. You'll love the Homestead!

The space
The Tropical Tree House, with all it's ornate craftsmanship, brings to the senses the feeling of a wood lodge. Earthy colors set a cool tone of tranquility. It is a nature lover's dream. Tropical flowers permeate the surrounding landscape with their sensuous lure. Color abounds. Vanilla orchids can be seen trellising up the native Kukui tree, once used for its oil to light the way. Giant Ohia trees, sometimes in bloom with the red lehua flower, emerge in the backgroun
neighborhood_overview: Located in Puna the house is nestled into the jungle of east Hawaii and is a ten minute walk to the black sand beach of Kehena, where there may be dolphins to play with, as well as seasonal whale watching. A short drive will land you at Unlce Roberts Kava bar, where you will often find the Uncles playing old Hawaiian country songs on Wednesday night. Also, at Uncle Roberts is the Saturday morning farmers market. Kalani Honua resort is located right next door, where you can find Sunday morning dance, wonderful dining options, workshops of all kinds and a store. Drive down the red road and you will come across tide pools and naturally heated warm ponds, both are great for swimming and healing. And don't forget to check out Poohiki, our local surf spot. Historical Pahoa town is just fifteen minutes away.
host_about:
Aloha, I made a lifestyle decision to move to Hawaii in 2005. I fell in love with the Big Island for the first time in 97. Since then I've explored homesteading and a closer connection to our land. I have been building and creating. Now I am ready to share the house with travelers who visit this magical place. I am into a peaceful sustainable existence, that gives rest to a fast moving civilization. Sometimes it is enough to just look at the stars, and here you can see them well, or just return to the original TV, a nice relaxing fire. And I love to cook on the flames, so simple, so good. Sharing food is my favorite form of communion. I love slow cooking, whether it be smoking or stew making. Slower and longer is just better if you ask me. 

I am a builder, and as a builder the most gratifying thing is to see people enjoying the manifestations that have been created. Sometimes the focus of what it means to construct something for the utilitarian purpose gets lost in the process. But, the magic is always underlying everything, so many times pure serendipity is right there, reminding us. The intention is everything and construed in all the stones carried, wood carved, land sculpted and much, much else. When the energy is pure, then it is easily conveyed or felt. This land is unfolding as the volcano has taught us. All who become part of this history will see how powerful is the asking. My experience here is that there is an instant reflection in the asking. Have fun and come and see...After all this is some of the newest land on this planet.

description:
My fantastic air conditioned ocean view one bedroom condo is located at the Royal Kahana resort on the West side of Maui. The resort is only 15 minutes from Lahaina and less than 10 minutes from Kaanapali. The golf resort at Kapalua is also just a short distance away. Your quoted price includes the Hawaii State and Maui County TAT tax and GED tax totaling 17.25%. Daily resort parking fee is $15.00 payable at front desk during their open hours.

The space
Unit 908 will meet all your expectations.

Direct oceanfront complex
1 Bedroom - Master Suite with King Bed
Full Bath with walk in Shower
Washer / Dryer
Fully stocked kitchen with dishwasher
Free cable TV / wired and wireless internet
65 inch Samsung smart TV with DVD player

Other things to note
Direct beach access from the resort is not accessible during winter and occasionally at high tides periodically at other times. You have beach access just ea
neighborhood_overview: You are about 45 minutes from the airport. Very close to Lahaina town and Kaanapali beach 🏖 great snorkeling at black rock in front of the Sheraton. Wonderful restaurant’s and shopping close by.
host_about: Business owner

description:
The space
The Spinnaker A202

Close to Front Street Lahaina, outlets, restaurants, and the harbor, this lovely two-bedroom condo is going to be the perfect place to enjoy a true island experience! Inside, you'll find a spacious living room dressed in burnished floors, comfortable furniture, a mounted flatscreen TV for streaming your favorite shows, and access to a large furnished patio. The full kitchen is equipped with everything you'll need to prepare a delicious meal, from small and major appliances to ample counter space and cabinet storage. Enjoy your creations at the breakfast bar or al-fresco on the patio. Be sure to take advantage of the shared pool and hot tub during your stay. You can take along the provided beach chairs for an afternoon on the beach then come back to use the outdoor shower to spritz away the sand. The shared gas grill will make for a fun barbecue with friends. Don't forget to use the partial AC and ceiling fans to keep the home nice and
host_about:
Vacasa
Vacation Home Management

Vacasa unlocks the possibilities of how we enjoy vacation homes. We take care of managing our homeowners’ vacation houses so they can have peace of mind (and their home when they want to). And our guests book vacations confidently knowing they’re going to find exactly what they’re looking for without any surprises.

Each vacation home is always cared for by our professional local teams who implement our high cleanliness and maintenance values, while the hands-off tasks of vacation rental management--marketing, filing taxes, and maintaining a website--are handled by a specialized central support team. Our passion and focus remain true: to empower our homeowners, guests, and employees to invest in vacation.

description:
Aloha Welcome to our Backyards Bungalow:) If you are looking for paradise look no more! Our beachfront home is located at Sunset Point on Backyards surf break right beside famous Sunset Beach in the heart of the world famous North Shore on a private sand beach that stretches miles in both directions.

The space
Cozy two bedroom, One full bath & one half bath home with private covered deck/lanai.
Master Bedroom- Queen size bed and smart TV Roku
Second Bedroom- two twin beds and smart TV Roku
Living room- Full sleeper sofa, Large 50" smart TV Roku, Air conditioning
Fully equipped kitchen
Twin floor mattress and baby pack & play crib in upstairs closet if needed.
Outdoor deck has dining table, gas grill, and washer/dryer
We provide beach chairs & towels

Guest access
This property is shared with two other homes The Hula Hut & Sunset Shack on site. Meaning the only thing that is shared is the yard, ocean facing
neighborhood_overview: Home is perfect for those looking for a relaxing, exciting, perfect vacation. Tucked back in a quiet neighborhood with no road noise off the bike path. Whether you are looking to catch a wave, hang in the hammock with a book, snorkel/scuba dive the gorgeous reefs, grill out your fresh catch, bask in the sun, North Shore has whatever a perfect vacation entails to you!
host_about: You're on your way. Going places every day. When it's time to come back home, Just dream of next years spots to roam.

description: Live in Paradise this summer! Panoramic ocean views from your wrap around lanai where you’ll enjoy sunsets every evening where no two are alike from an elevation of 850 ft where a/c isn’t necessary. Less than a mile to the beach to enjoy the reef and snorkeling, fishing, scuba diving and two trails on either side for some of the most spectacular views. Tropical birds chip and the rainforest frogs croque. You truly will forget about life’s worries in this secluded retreat surrounded by nature!
host_about: I travel as much as I can! Love the sun, sand and urban places. I'd like to see as much of the world as possible. I enjoy live chill music, good food, yoga, and hanging out with friends. I'm tidy and respectful of you and your space.

description:
Our three bedroom corner villa has a private first floor master with a California King Bed.
We are located just a short walk to the famous Fairmont Orchid Hotel and its beautiful reef protected beach, restaurants and Spa. A short 10 minute drive away is our simi-private Beach Club with its own restaurant and bar.
Just down the street is a full service grocery.

Please note the state of Hawaii charges a 15.5 % short term rental tax.

This tax is not included in the rate quoted.

The space
Our three bedroom corner villa has a private first floor master furnished with a California King bed and office space. We are located a just a short walk to the famous Fairmont Orchid Hotel. The hotel's restaurants can be used by the public. If you drive down for a meal they offer complimentary valet parking.

The beach at the Hotel is "Kid Safe," ; iis protected by a reef which also provides an excellent place for snorkeling
neighborhood_overview:
We are 1/4 mile to the beach front Fairmont Hotel and 1/2 mile the other way to fun dining at Tommy Bahamas and at the other restaurants. A full service supermarket, used by locals as well as travelers is located in this shopping spot. It is of some comfort that we pay the same for groceries as do the locals, that doesn’t mean you will be buying at bargain prices.

Thankfully there is a Costco on the island near the KOA airport. Costco prices are close to those on the mainland.
host_about:
I am a retired Certified Public Accountant. 

we came to Hawaii the first time in 1982 For a business convention.  It was love at first sight. 

As my children were raised most vacations either started in Hawaii or ended there. Our other love is park city Utah. 

We ended up owning vacation homes in both places. We are originally from the Chicago area and love it there as well. 

In retirement, we split our time between Hawaii, Chicago Illinois and Walnut Creek California. 

So our places, which we rent out when we are not there really are our homes.   

They are furnished with 75 inch OLED TVs, comfortably furniture, that we like. Also artwork and photography that we either created or handpicked. 

Our appliances are new or in new conditions. Last year we replaced the laundry with state of the art equipment. 


We are so pleased that we get to share these unique places with friends and with guest who we treat as friends. 

While we are not here when you are ... we make ourselves available 24-7 For emergencies

Also we have an island repair and maintenance man who can also be called at any time. His contact information is listed on the back of each bedroom door as required by Hawaiian rental laws

Our cleaning service is the best and also available for emergencies.

description:
A Step Back to Authentic Hawaiian Pleasures. When you stay at Wyndham Kona Hawaiian Resort in Kailua-Kona on the Big Island's west coast, you'll feel as if you're stepping back in time to a simpler, unspoiled era. Every detail has been designed to re-create the charming island ambiance found back in the '30s, while still assuring you all the comfortable amenities and activities you expect in a modern-day tropical resort.

The space
2 bedroom 2 bath condo with full kitchen, lanai, washer and dryer. Wyndham assigns the condo at check in. Each bedroom has a King bed and there is a sofa bed in the living room.

- Free parking at the resort
- All reservations are subject to Hawaii's Transient Occupancy Tax upon check-in

Other things to note
Guests will check in at the resort with the front desk with a confirmation provided by me via email. Guest that made the reservation MUST be the person checking in with their id. If the reservation nee
host_about: Worked for the last 16 years matching vacations with those that love to vacation.  I specialize in budget vacations with high quality properties.  I enjoy movies, swimming and dining.  I have 2 grown kids and I love bulldogs.

description:
Aloha and welcome to Tranquil Turtle Retreat at Maui Banyan Resort! Our recently updated owner-managed condo is located right in the heart of South Kihei close to world-class beaches, shopping and amazing restaurants. We have thought through all the details to make your Hawaii vacation careless and comfortable, so bring your family and enjoy Maui at its finest.

The space
The Tranquil Turtle first floor condo has been decorated and furnished in tropical beach style to reflect the unique atmosphere of Hawaii.
This home away from home features 2 island-style furnished bedrooms with California King beds, a cozy living room with a Queen size sofa sleeper, a remodeled and fully stocked modern kitchen, a central eating area with a table for four, a two seat island and two remodeled bathrooms with walk-in showers.

We offer cable TV, upgraded Internet connection and a high end Wi-Fi access point (Work-From-Hawaii ready: the Internet connection is up to
neighborhood_overview: South Kihei is extremely popular because it is convenient to everything. It has Kamaole beaches which are some of the best on the island. It has a variety of restaurants, from fine dining to casual stops. Its center location is considered the best to go on day trips. The Welcome book we send to all our guests contains Day Trip Suggestion, Best Beaches, Best Snorkeling Places,  Best Local Restaurants and other information that makes planning your stay a breeze. We also have Maui Revealed and Maui Day by Day books in our condo that are highly rated by many tourists and will help you to discover the best of Maui.
host_about: Aloha! I’m a mother of two and an Airbnb host. I love to travel and explore new places. When I do, I make it a point to share my experiences with others, whether through online tour guides or travel writing. I always do my best to help my guests make the most of their stay. I’m in love with Maui. I love its stunning beaches and ocean, its many activities and unique landscapes. I hope you’ll enjoy your time here.

description:
Two bedroom villas offer one king bed in the master bedroom, two twin beds or one king bed in the guest bedroom, and a queen sofa bed in the living room, and 2 1/2 bathrooms. Each villa features a fully equipped kitchen, washer and dryer, ceiling fans, air conditioning, complimentary wireless internet, and a furnished lanai.

There is a 14$ a night resort tax paid to resort
Check in person must be 21+

The space
The spacious, air-conditioned villas are cheerfully designed with a tropical Hawaiian flair. Each comfortable villa offers a private lanai or patio with ocean, mountain or golf course view. Our one and two-bedroom villas are fully furnished and offer all the comforts of home.

Mountain or golf course view
Private lanai or patio
Dining room
Fully equipped kitchen
Washer and dryer
Queen sofa bed
Air conditioning and heating
Microwave
