host_about: I often travel for work and pleasure, will be a conscious and respectful tenent.

description:
Waiohuli Beach Hale #D-117 is a ground floor 1 Bd 1 Bath unit with a tropical garden view from the condo and a partial ocean view from the lanai. It has a fully equipped kitchen, TV in the master bedroom and free Wifi.

The space
Waiohuli Beach Hale #D-117 at Waiohuli Beach Hale is a ground floor, 1 bedroom, 1 bath unit with a partial ocean view. This very clean, nicely furnished unit features a walk out lanai to beautiful tropical gardens and the large ocean front, solar heated pool. The air conditioned master bedroom has a flat screen TV and a king bed. There is no a/c in the living room. The comfortable living room has a new 46" HD Smart TV and a deluxe cable package. Tile flooring throughout. Enjoy private, password-protected, high speed internet with free wifi at 100mbps speed. Keep in touch with free, unlimited long distance to the US and Canada. Coin-operated laundry room on-site. Waiohuli Beach Hale #D-117 sleeps up to two guest max.
Same day booking
host_about:
Rentals Maui Inc. is a locally owned & managed Vacation Rental management company located in Kihei, Maui. We've been doing business on Maui for the past 20 years and we are fully licensed by the State of Hawaii, insured, and bonded.

We currently manage over 300 properties in South Maui, which is also where our office is located, making it convenient should guests need assistance day or night.

description:
Rare Find! Beaches, Lagoon, pools, all close at hand. Beautiful Ocean & Lagoon Views from Bedroom, Living Room and Kitchen on the 19th floor of the iconic "Hawaii Five O" Ilikai Towers. Enjoy your Friday night Fireworks at 7:45pm from the comfort of your own Lanai. 5 mins walks to Ala Moana Shopping Mall to bring home native gifts. Pamper yourself in this laid-back tropical oasis with all the amenities the Resort provides: ABC stores, boutiques, restaurants, pools for a perfect vacation!

The space
High floor luxury condo with superior view of the Pacific Ocean. A comfortable 620 sq ft living space including lanai for your vacation, decorated with quality, comfortable, tropical furnishings. A full kitchen with white appliances. You will find a very clean condo fully equipped with everything you need. This 1-bedroom 1-bath resort suite is located on the 19th floor of the Ilikai Towers facing a beautiful Lagoon and the Ocean. Entertainment and many restaurants
neighborhood_overview: The Ilikai is located at the beginning of the Waikiki Beach, next door to the famed Hilton Hawaiian Village and its Laua, steakhouse, and entertainment.  Within just steps of The Ilikai are numerous restaurants ranging from high-end steakhouse to moderately-priced to fast food restaurants.  Walking distance to the world famous Ala Moana Center, which truly has everything for anyone.  From luxury brands to casual surf wear, there are many things you can bring home from this expansive indoor-outdoor mall.  Many visitors practically spend all day and night experiencing the three floors of shopping, dining and entertainment at this popular retail and entertainment destination.   The International Market Place and Fort de Russy Park are only minutes away also.  Kayaking, swimming, paddleboats and stand-up paddle boarding are available in the Duke Kahanamoku Lagoon.  You can surf, stand-up paddle board, snorkel, or ride on outrigger canoes at the ocean beach right next to the Lagoon.  The Il
host_about: A recent retiree, my husband (David) and I love to travel and see the world.  Before signing up as a host, we are Airbnb's biggest fan when we travel to places.  We think Airbnb listings are of high quality and glad that we now have a place that we can share with other vacationers.  David and I are adventurous foodies, and enjoy having great friends!!

description:
Kanaloa at Kona by Outrigger is situated on 16 acres of a secluded oceanfront lava flow overlooking beautiful Keauhou bay. Kona sunsets are enjoyed right from your oceanfront coastline. Tropical gardens and lush flower filled landscape, embraces the serenity of Kanaloa at Kona by Outrigger. These spacious, breeze cooled condos are perfectly suited for the warm, sunny climate of the Kona coast.

The space
• Spacious ocean view condos
• Kitchen features stovetop, oven, refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, coffeemaker, blender, disposal, cookware and tableware
• Private balcony with wet bar
• Master bedroom with 1 king bed or 1 queen bed and private bathroom with shower or tub/shower
• Guest bedroom with 2 twin beds
• Queen sofa bed in living area
• Guest bathroom with shower or shower/tub
• 1639-1769 sqft/152-164 sqm
• Maximum 6 persons including children and infants
• Washer/dryer in unit
• Ceiling fan in bedrooms a
neighborhood_overview:
Deep seafishing is a must in this town, therefore, the catch of the day might be your special in one of the Pacific Rim restaurants nearby.

On-site tennis courts, swimming pools, and table tennis are just some of the ways to relax. For your shopping convenience, Keauhou Shopping Center is located just a few minutes away and a few miles to the historic village of Kailua-Kona with many historic sites from Hulihee Palace to Kealakekua Bay. Make Kanaloa at Kona by Outrigger your next escape for a relaxing and adventure filled vacation.
host_about:
The Outrigger Way

Developed in 1993 with Hawaiian scholar and historian Dr. George Kanahele, the Ke 'Ano Wa'a process was designed to advance the company's corporate culture and fundamental business strategies. The values-based process intricately connected three core elements of the hospitality industry:

HOST + GUEST + PLACE

It also deepened Outrigger's understanding and appreciation of the local host culture, a distinct hospitality style that is recognized across the globe.

description:
Beautiful 1 bedroom unit in the Condominium Hotel Waikiki Banyan, sleeps 4, walking distance to Waikiki Beach, shopping and restaurants. Free parking and Wi-Fi high internet 250/250 MBps. With Ocean and mountain views!

Registration number
Permit : 2212-CCH-0740
neighborhood_overview: The Waikiki Banyan is located in world famous Waikiki, walking distance to the beach, restaurants and shopping centers.
host_about:
Welcome to Midway Realty, we are a licensed full-service real estate management company and Travel Agency specializing in high-quality destination vacation rentals in Waikiki on the beautiful island of Oahu and also in Maui.

Our objective is to help you create a memorable vacation where you and your Ohana (Hawaiian for family) will make new memories… rejuvenate, relax and refresh relationships by providing you with a complete Hawaiian experience and atmosphere full of quality time in Hawaii Nei (beautiful Hawaii).

description:
SOM 109 Beautiful Ocean Views! Pool and Hot Tub! Near Amazing Surf Spots!

The space
Shores of Maui 109 is the perfect location for your next Maui vacation! Located on the south coast of Maui, directly across the street from Cove Park. This convenient central Kihei location is minutes from the sandy beaches, luxury of the Wailea resort area, and walking distance to many more amazing beaches. Spend your day on the beach, or surfing waves at The Cove and return back to the condo to relax on the lanai for sunset with your favorite cocktail and dinner fresh off the poolside grill!

Condo Highlights:
-1 Bedroom,1 bathroom, Sleeps 4 guests
-Window AC in the living room only
-Patio with seating for 4 and ocean views
-King size bed in bedroom
-Sleeper-sofa in living room
-Ceiling fans throughout
-Smart streaming TV’s in living room and bedroom
-Fully equipped kitchen with granite countertops
-Indoor dining table for 4
host_about:
Vacation Rental Management, Property Management, Asset Management, Real Estate Sales and Financial Analysis on  real estate.

We give our pledge to you to make your vacation on Maui as easy and pleasurable as possible. We understand that vacationing with your family and friends is a time for memories, rest, and vital rejuvenation.

We provide the support and peace of mind for your ultimate vacationing experience on Maui.
Link to all our listings:  https://airbnb.com/users/15820446/listings 

We are especially empathetic for our Vacationers.  We are not perfect but we do try hard.  We are all local to Maui and try to represent the Aloha Spirit.

We have discovered for ourselves the pleasure of vacationing in this paradise called: Maui.  All of us came here many years ago, drawn to the mystique and spectacular beauty of the Island. Our satisfaction grows each time we are able to provide that special place our vacationers have worked for and dreamed of for so long. This is truly a marvelous business, and we give thanks each day for this wonderful opportunity.

description:
Welcome to our beach front, ocean view, 2 bedroom, 2 bath,luxury condo. We are situated above Kahalu’u Beach Park which is one of the best snorkel and beginning surfing beaches in the Kona area. Our unit is a first floor unit and is accessible without stairs. We have a lovely view from our lanai of the gardens and the beach. We provide snorkel equipment, beach towels, 4 beach chairs, boogie boards, floaties for children and numerous other water toys.

The space
Our place is perfect for 2 couples or a small family with children. There is a king bed in the master bedroom, a queen size bed in the spare bedroom and we have a portable crib for up to 2 years old and an inflatable bed for a younger child up to 10 years old. Floors are tile and counters are granite, so cool on the feet and easy to keep clean. There is a small shopping center 6 blocks away for all your shopping needs. There is also a Hawaiian Heritage site with fish pond next to Kahalu’u Park.
neighborhood_overview: Kahaluu Beach Park, which is one of the best snorkel beaches on the island is immediately across the street.  The left side is for snorkelers and the right side is for beginning surfers.  There are lifeguards on both beaches.  The Hawaiian Heritage center is also across the street and should be open soon.  Shopping and markets are walking distance to the Keauhou Shopping Center.
host_about:
Aloha,  
My husband Pat and I are retired and spend 4 to 6 months of the year on the Big Island and 6 months in Montana.  We definitely have the best of both worlds.  We remodeled our studio when we first bought it and invested a lot of blood, sweat and even a few tears to get it to what we feel is a homey, luxurious, tropical hideaway.  Because we spent so much effort in remodeling, we have only recently decided to rent it out through Airbnb.   This has become our second home so we loaded it with upper end furniture and amenities.  We love that all our favorite restaurants and happy hours are within walking distance, and the pier and a lovely snorkel beach are close by as well. The Big Island is not for everyone, but if you love raw beauty and are adventurous, then you are coming to the right place.  

Aloha nui loa.

description:
We are located right off the main roadway that circles Oahu. Our neighborhood is peaceful and quiet. You can enjoy ocean views from the master bedroom lanai and there is a secluded beach about a 5 minute walk away; best for taking walks not swimming. Popular attractions such as Waikiki, Hanauma Bay, & Chinatown are within a 15 minute drive away.

Stays less than 180 days are subject to our Hale Wa’a Beach Gear Rental Package. Please read our Terms and Conditions for more details.

The space
Hale Wa'a, the house by the sea, is located just off the main highway heading east from the Daniel K. Inouye airport.

Hale Wa'a is a 2 story guest house that is located on the same property as our main house. The houses are completely separate to provide complete privacy.

The unit's 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms easily accommodate 4 guests, but we do allow groups of up to 6.

**All bedrooms and the downstairs living space/kitchen have AC
neighborhood_overview:
Whether you decide to rent a car or use public transportation, our central location makes it easy to get around to the hottest spots in Honolulu.

The main roadway in Oahu, as well as the bus stop, are a short 2 minute walk from our house as is a beach.

The neighborhood is very secure and safe so you can be at ease walking around at any time of the day.

There is also a children's playground with a huge field that is a couple minutes walk away from the guest house.

The closest mall is Kahala Mall which is minutes from the house and has a Whole Foods, Starbucks, various eateries, and multiple retail outlets. All are not more than a 5-10 minute drive or bus ride.

*Kahala Shopping Center - 5 minute Drive, 7 minute Bus Ride

*Waikiki - 15 minute Drive, 25 minute Bus Ride

*Ala Moana - 15 minute Drive, 35 minute Bus Ride

*Diamond Head Hike - 10 minute Drive, 22 minute Bus Ride

*Hanauma Bay -
host_about:
Hello Everyone!

My name is Quinten and I was born and raised here Oahu. I graduated from Loyola Marymount University in 2015 in LA with a degree in Entrepreneurship and International Business. I worked as an English Language teacher for a bit here in Oahu while helping my mom renovate the guest house we are now offering on Airbnb.

I personally shy away from the beaches here ironically, but I do know the right spots to go; its inevitable to go to the beach growing up and living here. I also have many good recommendations for hikes, places to eat, and other sightseeing spots.

The best part about running a vacation rental thus far has been introducing our guests to our cats, dog, and turtle.

I am also still hoping to challenge a guest in a ping pong match as we have a table in our main house.

I'm also somewhat of a connoisseur of anime so I would love to hear any shows you are a fan of as well :D

The Outrigger Way

Developed in 1993 with Hawaiian scholar and historian Dr. George Kanahele, the Ke 'Ano Wa'a process was designed to advance the company's corporate culture and fundamental business strategies. The values-based process intricately connected three core elements of the hospitality industry:

HOST + GUEST + PLACE

It also deepened Outrigger's understanding and appreciation of the local host culture, a distinct hospitality style that is recognized across the globe.

neighborhood_overview:
Wailuku is a neighborhood located on the island of Maui in Hawaii.

Wailuku is a historic town with many buildings dating back to the 19th century. It has a diverse mix of residential and commercial areas, with a range of housing options from historic homes to newer developments.

The town is home to several parks and recreational areas, including the popular Iao Valley State Park, which features a scenic hike to the Iao Needle, a natural rock formation. The Wailuku River State Park also offers hiking trails and swimming holes.

Wailuku has a vibrant downtown area with shops, restaurants, and art galleries. The Maui Arts and Cultural Center is located nearby, offering a range of cultural events and performances.

Overall, Wailuku is a charming and historic neighborhood with plenty to offer both residents and visitors.

The space

Enjoy snorkeling and swimming with turtles just steps from this premium condo. During the winter months, this condo offers front row seating for whale watching and turtle spotting!

description:

World class dining, golf, tennis, hiking, biking, and the beauty of many other of Kauai’s beaches are just a few minutes away.

host_about:
The complex is located directly across from Kamaole III State Beach Park, which is known as one of the most beautiful and safest beaches in the Islands.  It is perfect for swimming, snorkeling, sunning, jogging, picnicking, kite flying, and especially enjoying amazing sunsets and whale watching.

Each unit has a private lanai that faces the interior of the complex, offering views of the expansive lawns, pools, and lush tropical landscape of palm trees, hibiscus, birds of paradise and plumeria trees.  Most lanais also offer views of the beautiful Pacific Ocean and spectacular sunsets.  

There are two pools, a covered pavilion, and a full size tennis court on the property.  Every evening the outdoor barbecue area is a popular spot to socialize while grilling the perfect dinner and watching as the Hale Kamaole conch shell band performs their nightly sunset ritual.

You will find world class golf courses, fantastic snorkeling and diving, many Maui activities, abundant shopping and delicious fine and family dining all within minutes of Hale Kamaole.

The Wailea hotels are nearby which have walkable restaurants so you many not even need to drive during your stay.
host_about: We have been visiting Maui for some time now and have always called the island "our happy place". Our dream has been to live on Maui some day. We started to really look into what makes us the happiest in life and it is when we are in Maui. We thought that it was only going to remain a dream until this past December when we left the NJ cold and made our dream a reality. We searched for condos on the island that fit our needs. We discussed moving full time and it just does not work out right now for us so we decided on a vacation home. A vacation home allows us to share our happiness with other who visit Maui and may fall in love with the island, its people, culture and beauty just as we have and will (some day) be able to full time! Enjoy our home.

description:
NANAINA COTTAGE. JUNGLE LOVERS DREAM AWAY FROM THE REST OF THE WORLD
This is the ultimate romantic getaway for two with a million-dollar-view of the South Kona coast. It is perched on a rock cropping surrounded by mango trees. A one-minute walk along a jungle path leads you to this secluded setting.

The space
There is a covered lanai (deck), and a few steps down a large open sun deck, with an additional simple bedroom if you prefer not to sleep in the loft (with a view). The cottage comes with a full kitchen (no dishwasher) full access to washer /dryer. Be aware of mangos falling on the roof during season.


Although we are within minutes from shopping, sight seeing & Beaches, getting to our secluded home can be an adventure. We are tucked away in a jungle/rainforest type setting and a 4 wheel drive vehicle is strongly suggested.

Guest access
Lush Gardens & fruit trees

Other things to note
There
neighborhood_overview:
We are literally minutes away from Kealakekua Bay the location that captain James cook first set foot on these beautiful Islands. Once a thriving fishing village Kealakekua bay now boasts snorkeling, kayaking and swimming with Hawaiian spinner dolphins. Other points of interest in the area include Ke'ei beach, and Manini Beach. Not far from Kealakekua bay, you will want visit Pu'uhonua o honaunau or the city of refuge. This ancient place of refuge provided peace and safety during times of battle or unrest, rich in Hawaiian History and culture. located a stones throw away from two step beach.

Although we are located on the same island that madame pele currently resides, we are about 2.5 hours from her wrath and not in any danger. Protected by Mauna Loa and Mauna Kea, Blessed by the Kona trade winds that keeps our air breathable and clean, it’s still the best place on the planet.
host_about:
I am a free spirited workaholic. I love creating tranquil, unique spaces for the “perfect” place to run away to. I love nature and all it’s glory and it still amazes me to see some of the incredibly intricate works of art that Mother Nature presents on the regular. I have successfully raised 2 children of my own but have been adopted by a few other special souls to help guide them through..
I am an entrepreneur of sorts, own a beekeeping business & honey store, love learning about and practicing natural health care and making healing potions and tinctures with a little help from my bees, my  Hawaiian garden & ...a little bit of “magic”. I am lucky, Grateful & happy

description:
This roomy condo is located in the heart of Kailua Kona. Minutes to the Ironman finish line, you can't stay in a more convenient location. Spacious, with open beam ceilings and on the top floor, you have privacy as well as an ocean view from lanai.

Guest access
You will have access to the entire condo. My place is your place. There is a keypad on the door, so you can check in after 2pm up to whatever time works best for you.

Other things to note
The condo is on the third floor, and there is no elevator. If walking up stairs is an issue for you, I would suggest you book elsewhere. However, being on the top floor makes i
neighborhood_overview: Location, location, location.  The ideal spot to stay.  Walking distance to shops, restaurants, the beach, bars, grocery store, etc.  It's a five minute walk to the pier, where all the activities take place for the World Championship Ironman triathlon.
host_about: I moved to the island over 18 years ago seeking surf and the Hawaiian lifestyle. I met my husband here, and we now have two young girls.  Kona is a great place to be, nice people, sun, sand and surf, it can’t be beat!

description:
Discover our spacious and air-conditioned Royal Palm unit, spanning 1550 sq ft and situated amidst half an acre of lush tropical landscaping. Just a quick five-minute walk from the pristine white sands of Poipu Beach. Unwind in the master bath's luxurious jacuzzi, relish the convenience of a full kitchen, and enjoy 50-inch TVs in the living room and both bedrooms. Delight in outdoor dining on your private lanai, complete with a gas barbecue.

The space
Cleaning Policy:
Your health and safety are our top priority. We are now following a thoroughly enhanced cleaning policy. After your accommodation has been thoroughly cleaned using SafeStay Standards, an EPA approved, hospital-grade disinfectant is sprayed that has been found to kill 99.9% of detectable pathogens. Your front door is then sealed and no one is allowed to enter until you do so with your access code. We want you to assure you that cleaning and disinfection is being done to the highest of standards.
neighborhood_overview:
Poipu is a resort area with many restaurants, grocery stores, delis and shops less than 1 mile away.

The local beaches are widely regarding as the best beaches on Kauai where you will enjoy sunbathing, picnicking, swimming, snorkeling, boogie boarding, surfing, and stand up paddle boarding.
host_about:
Hello! My name is Sri and I am the owner of several vacation rentals in both San Francisco and Hawaii. I am incredibly blessed to call these two beautiful places my home and to be able to share my properties with travelers from all over the world. 

I currently reside in San Francisco, but my second home is in Hawaii, where I spend a lot of time with my family. We are thankful to have the opportunity to experience the beauty and culture of both places, and I am excited to share this experience with our guests. 

Our vacation rental properties in San Francisco offer the perfect blend of city living and relaxation, with easy access to all the city has to offer, including popular attractions, restaurants, and shopping. 
Our Hawaii properties are located in some of the most beautiful spots on the island, allowing you to truly relax and enjoy the tropical paradise.

Being able to provide vacation rental properties in both San Francisco and Hawaii is truly a dream come true for me. 
I take great pride in ensuring that our guests have the best possible experience when staying in our properties and I am always available to help with anything they need. 
I believe that everyone should have the opportunity to experience the beauty and wonder of these two amazing places and I am grateful to be able to help make that happen. Thank you for considering our properties and I hope to welcome you soon!

Hello, I am Evan! 
Growing up I always went to amazing timeshare resorts that always made it feel like home. Vacationing has always been apart of who I am and I’d love to send you on your next vacation to somewhere special! During my studies, I decided to make an account, so I could help send you on a memorable getaway. Please let me know how I can make your vacation grand!

description:
One of the best locations on Kauai’s lush North Shore fronting the white sands of Hanalei Bay with amazing views of tropical sunsets, lush green mountains and the sparkling blue waters of the Pacific Ocean.

The space
These Kauai condos are located on over 22 acres of Hawaiian paradise, featuring mature tropical gardens with endless flowers, trees and other flora, cascading pools and lava rock waterfalls, and is steps to one of Hawaii’s most beautiful white sand beaches.

Not only is the Hanalei Bay Resorts’ pool one of the best on Kauai, the views from the one, two and three bedroom condo suites are amazing. Beautiful sunsets, Hanalei Bay, the Na Pali Coast and Bali Hai are just some of the views that the individually owned condos can provide. Our guests enjoy full access to all of the resort amenities, including the two swimming pools, eight tennis courts, bell & shuttle service as needed, resort concierge, front desk and more.

Hanalei B
host_about:
Jonathan Parrish, or "JP" as he is referred to by friends, family, and colleagues, is actively involved with the day to day activities of The Parrish Collection Kauai.  

My personal goal is to ensure that we are exceeding the expectations of all our guests! 

Explore our unique collections of extraordinary Kauai vacation rentals, then match your style with the largest variety of properties available including the Kauai’s most popular resorts and widest selection of oceanfront homes in Poipu Beach.

description:
Spend your vacation at Hale Kalena which means "House of rest" in Hawaiian. Kanaloa 701 by Gather is a 1,700 sq. ft. two-bedroom, two-bathroom vacation rental with garden views and is the ideal place to experience the beauty of Hawaii.

The space
Beautifully furnished in a tropical theme with air conditioning throughout, this two-bedroom, two-bathroom property comfortably accommodates up to four people. Enjoy cooking a meal in the fully equipped kitchen, which features a breakfast bar with seating for three. Accommodate additional guests with the dining table, which has seating for four. The gorgeous primary bedroom is furnished with a king-sized bed and has a private lanai that overlooks the golf course. The spacious primary bathroom features dual sinks and vanities. The guest bedroom has a comfortable queen-sized bed and an additional bathroom. Free Wifi is also included.

You'll love the extensive list of outdoor amenities at Kanaloa. In addition to 1

description:
You've found it! This beautifully renovated 1BR on Maui’s always sunny South Kihei is your home away from home! This ground floor corner unit is in the most perfect location - short walking distance to world famous beaches like Kamaole beach, Cove Park (amazing spot for beginner surfers), and Kamaole I, grocery stores, amazing restaurants, shopping & night life! You'd be hard to find a better value on Maui than this condo! All taxes and fees are included in the booking (no HIDDEN fees!)

description:
Note: there are NO obstructions, NO streets, NO sidewalks between you & the ocean. Just you, the lawn, and the Pacific. This offers a far different experience than busy, touristy areas.

Maalaea (mah-uh-LIE-uh) is a 1-street village, quiet, but central to the island.

Note the Hawaii tax added to the rental. See "Other details to note below."

The space
From the living room, kitchen, and lanai (porch) you can gaze out at the ocean. The evenings are warm enough to sit outside in shorts, and the days are not so hot that you'll usually need the air conditioning but it's there--just in case.

Guest access
The parking is unassigned and free. There's a nice beach at one end of the block (a 4- or 5-minute walk), and there's a deli and convenience store at the other end (a 6- or 8-minute walk). Oops, the convenience store is currently closed for renovation.

Other things to note
Hawaii State requires 3 taxes
neighborhood_overview:
Maalaea is a 1-street village about a 20-minute drive from the airport.

From my unit, there is a small commercial area located about 10 minutes by foot or 2 minutes by car. You'll find several restaurants, a souvenir shop, ice cream shop, and the Maui Ocean Center. (Oh, and a tattoo parlor--just in case!)

Maalaea is centrally located for many of Maui's attractions: Lahaina, Kihei & Wailea, access to upcountry, Maalaea Harbor (for whale watching), and access to the Road to Hana.
host_about: I recently retired; when I leave town, that’s when I post my Phoenix pad for AirBNB guests.

description:
Please note reservations are limited to displaced residents and essential workers through 10/8/23.
1 bed/1 bth renovated end unit condominium on the 2nd floor of 2 story bdg.
Classic sailing vessel inspired decor, clad in custom crafted teak.
This condo sits at Maui Sands is an Ocean Front Property, with a spectacular view of the islands of Molokai and Lanai.

The space
The interior of the unit has been designed with serenity in mind, and was inspired by the architecture of wooden tall ships. There is a large teak island adjacent to the kitchen and creates plenty of space for both the chef and the diner!
The end unit provides an extra window for maximizing the benefits of the cool ocean trade winds.
With extra living space on the large lanai, you can enjoy delicious meals or a superb Maui evening. We have a wonderful garden view, surprisingly private with a peekaboo view of the ocean framed by palms and fragrant plumeria trees.
There
neighborhood_overview:
A low density property, Maui Sands glows with ambiance and charm of Old Hawaii. We have 52 units in six 2-story buildings on three plus park-like acres. We are in the heart of Honokawai, close to delicious take-in and dine-out restaurants, as well as shopping, grocery stores, and the award winning Farmer's Market.
This is a lovely neighborhood with a mix of permanent residents and favorite local business alongside shops that cater to our visitors. It is the kind of neighborhood where strangers say Aloha as they pass on the street.
Honokawai is located on the Northwest shore of Maui, with views of the islands on Molokai and Lanai across the channel. Maui Sands epitomizes old school Hawaii ambience. This is a low density property , with beautiful grounds, including mango and banana trees.
We are a very easy short walk from some lovely beaches, and Honokawai Park. There are many good local restaurants for breakfast lunch and dinner, multi-cultural food trucks, a large Time
host_about:
My husband and I have lived on Maui for 24 years, and we love it here!
I am the Island Agent for the owner of the property, and am so happy to help  put together the perfect accommodation space for you! I've been working to care for my clients homes for 10+ years.

Hawaii is a wonderland from the music to the food and the beaches. There are so many things to discover and we are still having new adventures here!
We moved here from the Olympic Peninsula in Washington State, and I am so happy to be the rental assistant to the owner at Lake Nahwatzel near the southern foothills of the Olympic Mountains. It is a beautiful little spot!

I'm always a text or phone call away if you need me, but I know are here for peace and relaxation, so we like to allow you the space to do that. Our goal is to set you up for satisfaction.

description:
Spacious enchanted cottage on a small 4 acre farm. Lush private yard with clawfoot bathtub and outside shower. Private bathroom with shower and toilet in an additional garden building just outside. Enjoy the magical jungle surroundings with the sounds of the waves and forest at night. The ocean with swimming ponds just 10 minutes walk away.

Our check in hours are 3-8PM, we recommend arriving during daylight hours so we are easy to find and you can orient yourself on the farm.

The space
We are on 4 beautiful lush acres near the ocean, in walking distance to the water and the beautiful "Mermaid" swimming ponds. The property has lots of fruit trees, among them Mango, Soursap, Banana, Avocado, Lychee, Starfruit, Coconut, Lemon, Lime, Breadfruit and much more. Fruits are seasonal so they may not be available during certain times of the year. Kitchen with fridge and propane cook top for your use, and a nice deck to sit on with a view of the green and seclude
neighborhood_overview: The area is several hundred acres of small farms that produce fruit and other things. Puna (the district) offers a unique glimpse at Hawaii away from the high rises and contrived Hula shows of Waikiki and the mega-resorts. Guest come to Puna to relax and get away from it all, and to see lava flows and waterfalls!
host_about: Easygoing, well-travelled European that traded the old world for an island in the Pacific some 20 years ago. Enjoys coffee, conversations, a good book and interesting experiences.

description:
Aloha! You're invited to stay at Casa La Ola, a beautiful 2 BR + den where you can walk to the beach. Enjoy a luxury condo setting with upgraded amenities. Walk to Queen's Bath, gorgeous ocean views, and north shore local attractions.

This is the newest condo development in all of Princeville. Here you’ll find an onsite pool and hot tub steps outside your door. Downstairs there's an open living room that can be used as an office or third bedroom. Relax deeply during your Kauai stay.

The space
Enjoy a fresh, open space that's peaceful. Amenities are upgraded including a fully stocked kitchen, appliances, & beautiful flooring. This is an ideal place for people who want to stay somewhere quiet.

This home is the most private in the entire condo complex, as it does not back up to a road and has its own backyard garden. There are two bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms, each on their own level, so there is plenty of space and privacy.
neighborhood_overview: Princeville is a quiet, developed community. There are many beautiful beaches and natural sites to see. Take a dip at Puu Poa Beach, Hanalei, and Hideaway Beach. Nearby is world-renowned Makai Golf Club with views of Queen Bath’s tide pools (not safe for swimming but lovely to see). You can also visit the Princeville shopping center for restaurants, shops and groceries.
host_about: Enjoy travel, meditation and nature. Islands are some of my favorite places. "Follow your joy" is my personal life motto ;)

description:
Location, Location, Location! Situated in the very central of Kihei, the place is central to everything Maui & a short 20 min drive to the airport. Beaches directly across the street! Completely private unit - no shared spaces besides the pool/bbq area. Abundant amount of amentities; beach supplies (chairs, umbrellas, beach bag/towels/snorkels), kitchenette with dishes, Krueger coffee, large bathroom & closet, WIFI, large Smart TV, A/C & much more. Free & safe private parking. Location & Private

The space
LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION!!!
This is an AMAZING location! You can walk to EVERYTHING!
- Surf, swim, stand up paddle right across the street. Also a roller skating rink, volleyball, basketball, tennis courts, soccer and more across the street!
- Beach is across the street
- Restaurants, bars, shops, rentals (bike, boat, snorkel, dive, surf) all straight downstairs
- Maui Lomi Lomi massage center downstairs and nail salon
- Next
neighborhood_overview: At your doorstep are many many restaurants, shopping, nightlife and snorkeling surfing / SUP beaches. Organic restaurant and juice cafe located downstairs and Kihei's famous Lava Java Coffee shop located a block away.  Scuba and snorkeling shops at your doorstep and surf board and SUP rentals at your doorstep as well. Kihei's famous surfing 'Cove' is right across the street with 'Charlie Young Beach' (long white sand beach) next door. Roosters are everywhere on this side of the island so be prepared for island life living a bit.
host_about:
Aloha I'm Wendy. I love being able to provide a peaceful, and comfortable home away from home for travellers, so they may relax, unwind, take in the ocean views and enjoy the true essence of Maui.  I look forward to meeting other AirBnB members.

If you are wanting to purchase property on Maui, I am a licensed realtor in the State of Hawai'i. RS 85420 and licensed on all Hawaii islands. I would love to speak with you and answer any questions you might have about vacation rentals on Maui.
My motto: "Be the change you wish to see in the world"

description:
Wake up with a cup of coffee on the tranquil lanai and fall asleep listening to the serene sounds of the rainforest.

The Space
This calm and spacious room nestled among the palm and banana trees has everything a guest could need during their stay to on the Big Island. Rest and restore after a long day of exploring everything this wonderful place has to offer.

Shared Space
There is a shared kitchenette with refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker and lanai. Shared bathroom in the main house
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the quiet Hawaiian Beaches area of the Big Island,. 1.5 miles to the ocean where guests can see dolphins and whales during the winter months. 30 minutes from natural hot springs at Issac Hale, 25 minutes from Hilo and 45 minutes from Volcano National Park

Punalu'u Black sand beach is 50 minutes away where you can view turtles and snorkel in the warm water
host_about:
I love to travel! My husband and I enjoy getting out and meeting new people, helping others learn how to adventure while saving money.

We have raised 4 sons and now 1 grandson and just love life!

description:
The entire unit was remodeled in 2020 - over $100,000 remodel! Absolutely everything is new; down to the dishes!

The space
Aloha and welcome to our beachside Condo. The entire unit was remodeled in 2020 - over $100,000 remodel; absolutely everything new down to the dishes!

This little-known Condo complex is a hidden gem with a perfect location in south Kihei. Be sure to book in advance, as our calendar fills quickly with returning guests. Your vacation time is valuable, so choose your accommodations carefully. Why stay in a 'tired' Condo when for the same price you can stay in a beautifully decorated oasis?

Our Condo was remodeled from top to bottom with every single thing brand new in 2020! A spacious floor plan. Air conditioning in the Master bedroom and living room. Simmons Beauty-rest beds with premium linens ensure your comfort, including a California King in the Master bedroom with a Queen and Twin in the 2nd bedroom. Two full bathro
neighborhood_overview: Located directly across from beautiful Kamaole Beach III, you can enjoy a morning swim, excellent snorkeling, or the beautiful Maui sunsets. Within 1 block, you will find the dive boats departing for Molokini, as well as some of Kihei's best restaurants. As an added amenity, the Condo features reserved/covered parking - something lacking at most accommodations in Kihei. After a day at the beach, enjoy the beautiful swimming pool, cook out at the pool-side BBQ area, or try a game of shuffleboard.
host_about:
I am a Realtor with Maui Rental Connections, Inc. on the gorgeous tropical island of Maui.  I have been privileged to live here in paradise since 2004.  I have moved over 55 times in my life; born in Alaska and lived in every single corner of this Country,  and absolutely call Maui MY HOME!  I manage this unit beautiful unit for the owners.
Deb Guimond Heart
Maui Rental Connections, Inc.

You’ll also be just a short drive away from famous Oahu attractions such as Pearl Harbor, Honolulu Zoo, Kualoa Ranch, and more. Whether you are looking for relaxing sandy beaches or exciting adventures, look no further than this Waikiki property.

An outdoor swimming pool, sun terrace, and BBQ facilities are available for guest relaxation. Or, if you are looking for an active vacation, visit the onsite fitness center, or head out to one of the many l

description:
Hula your way to Hawaiian paradise when you book this fully restored 1960's vacation rental house! This 3-bedroom, 2-bath Hilo home features a covered lanai and peek-a-boo ocean views from the yard. The University of Hawaii campus is a mere 1 block away while downtown Hilo is just an 8-minute drive north. Relax at Reeds Bay Beach Park, visit Coconut Island, or get a bird's-eye view of the island from a helicopter. Don't forget about Rainbow Falls home to an ancient Hawaiian goddess!

The space
STVR-19-364095 | NUC-19-1549 | Free WiFi | Laundry Machines | 1,050 Sq Ft | Central Location

Bedroom 1: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed | Bedroom 3: 1 Twin Bed, 1 Tri-Fold Portable Twin Mattress

HOME FEATURES: Covered lanai, landscaped backyard, refinished hardwood floors, original shoji screens, Chinese metal screen door, HDTV w/ streaming capabilities, digital antenna for local Hawaii stations, dining table
KITCHEN: Full-sized fridge, stove/oven
neighborhood_overview:
BEACHES & PARKS: Hilo Bay Beach Parks (3.1 miles), Honoli'i Beach Park (5.3 miles), Onekahakaha Beach Park - sheltered shallow swimming, great for little ones! (5.4 miles), Carlsmith Beach Park - spectacular salt and freshwater lagoons (5.9 miles), Richardson Ocean Park - black sand beach, snorkeling (7.0 miles), Kehena Black Sand Beach (30.1 miles)
OUTDOOR FAVORITES: Hilo Municipal Golf Course (1.4 miles), Liliuokalani Park and Garden and Coconut Island (2.8 miles), Wailuku River State Park (3.3 miles), Rainbow Falls (3.4 miles), Hawaii Tropical Botanical Garden (9.5 miles), Akaka Falls State Park (17.9 miles)
ADVENTURES & ATTRACTIONS: The University of Hawaii at Hilo (1 block), Hilo Daijingu (0.5 miles), Historic Downtown Hilo - restaurants, shopping, theatre, and more (2.8 miles), Kilauea Visitor Center in Hawaii Volcanoes National Park (27.3 miles), Mauna Kea (42.1 miles), Kona (75.9 miles)
DINE & SHOP: Cafe 100 (2.1 miles), Big Island Candies (2.1 miles), Hilo Farme

This beautiful ocean front unit is a hidden gem in Poipu. From the breathtaking lanai enjoy views of whales, spinner dolphins, turtles playing in waves, white water crashing on the cliffs, spectacular sunsets. You will never want to leave!

The space

description:
Support and Rebuild Maui! #MauiStrong

Right on the ocean! Super Clean! Great Location! High-speed WiFi, Free Parking, NO RESORT FEES!

Fortunately, our condo was not affected by the fires in Lahaina. Restaurants, grocery stores, and amenities are within walking distance to our condo.

Our condo gives you incredible views of what you're coming to Maui to experience. Completely renovated, a touch of paradise luxuriously appointed for your stay.

The space
Are you looking for a fun and relaxing vacation spot? Look no further than our recently updated and renovated condo! Located on the top floor with an unbeatable 180-degree oceanfront view, you won't find a better spot to soak up the sun and listen to the waves crashing all night long. Our condo is decorated in a vintage surf motif with a luxurious twist. You'll even catch some of the most amazing sunsets you've ever seen! So why choose our condo over others? Well, it's simple. We tak
neighborhood_overview:
Great restaurants are within walking distance; Maui Brewing Company is "stumbling distance" from our condo. They have great food and beer! Hawaiian Village Coffee Shop is very close. Mi-So-Phat Sushi is about a block away. There is also pizza, fast food and asian food close by too. Make sure to get reservations at Mama’s Fish House in Paia early! This is the toughest place to get into on the entire island!

We have a very descriptive information letter that we send to all of our guests with information on the area; what to do, beaches, out of the way things to do, “secret beaches”, hikes, where to eat, what restaurants need reservations, etc.

Kapalua airport is less than a mile away. Endless activity options are just steps away. This is a perfect location for your Hawaiian getaway.
host_about: After visiting for more than 10 years, we moved to Maui full time in 2018.   While we live here, we have a local management and cleaning company that takes care of our condo.  If you need any advice on where to eat, what to do while you are here or need information, just let us know and we will try and help.   We are both very active and spend a lot of time surfing, foiling, hiking, working in our garden and playing with our dogs Owen and Wilson!

description:
Hawaii Life Rental Presents Lae Nani 434
Modern Ocean view 1 Bedroom Condo, Centrally Located

The space
Conveniently located between the south and north shore is this wonderfully appointed one-bedroom, one and a half bath, ocean-view condo at Lae Nani. Tucked away off a quaint side street in Kapaa, Lae Nani condos are walking distance to Coconut Marketplace, the Tuesday afternoon Farmers Market, Passion Bakery, Imua Coffee, Russel’s Vegan Café, Hukilau Lanai known for their excellent local cuisine, as well as Lava Lava Beach Club famous for their tropical craft cocktails and tables in the sand. This condo has an amazing oversized, covered lanai with two chaise loungers perfect for taking in the big ocean views. It’s a wonderful spot to relax and watch the sunrise while drinking your morning coffee.

Once inside, the owners have thoughtfully designed the space with an elegant mix of unique, retro Hawaiian décor. The kitchen has updated appliances, a
neighborhood_overview: Environmental Disclosure. Guest acknowledges that the State of Hawaii is exposed to environmental hazards including, but not limited to, tidal waves, hurricanes and floods. Please refer to the local phone book for information pertaining to evacuation procedures. In the event of an emergency, the State of Hawaii utilizes a warning alert system (emergency sirens are tested on the first working day of every month at 11:45 a.m.). Guest is responsible for using their best efforts to familiarize themselves with property, its location, and surroundings. Some of the properties are in a remote location. neighborhood_overview: The Royal Coconut Coast is aptly named, not just because of the amazing stands of large coconut trees that cover the landscape, but also because much of the area was originally reserved only for the ali’i or royalty in the Hawaiian kingdom. Today, beautiful white sandy beaches, lush green mountains and valleys, and consistently warm weather all year round attract travelers from all over the world. The Royal Coconut Coast has become a popular tourist destination because of its central location, beauty, rich history and culture, and variety of activities available for the whole family. From Wailua to Kealia, the east side of Kauai offers accommodations for both the budget traveler and those wanting a more full-service resort experience. The whole family can find something to do here, from a leisurely day at the beach or spa, to biking, hiking, kayaking, or golfing, there are many options of how to spend your time on Kauai’s Royal Coconut Coast.

neighborhood_overview:
Wailuku is a neighborhood located on the island of Maui in Hawaii.

Wailuku is a historic town with many buildings dating back to the 19th century. It has a diverse mix of residential and commercial areas, with a range of housing options from historic homes to newer developments.

The town is home to several parks and recreational areas, including the popular Iao Valley State Park, which features a scenic hike to the Iao Needle, a natural rock formation. The Wailuku River State Park also offers hiking trails and swimming holes.

Wailuku has a vibrant downtown area with shops, restaurants, and art galleries. The Maui Arts and Cultural Center is located nearby, offering a range of cultural events and performances.

Overall, Wailuku is a charming and historic neighborhood with plenty to offer both residents and visitors.

It has two bedrooms (queen, two twins) and a sofa bed along with a fully equipt kitchen and two bathrooms!

Born, raised and currently living in Seattle WA.

In terms of hosting and travelling... our motto is treat every guest as though they were a good friend of ours and treat every place we stay as if we were staying with a good friend of ours.

Most of my properties are related to my timeshare. I own several weeks/weekend that I rent out. Occasionally we rent out a room at our home in Seattle and our family home in Palm Desert, CA.

Our goal is to have several vacation properties we can use, share with friends and rent to communities like here on airbnb.

Looking forward to hosting you!

description: On the Big Island’s west coast, you’ll find this delightful retreat built to capture the natural wonder of Kailua-Kona. Husband and wife with two littles under the age of 8.  We love to travel, love the outdoors, and love to share other parts of the world and our country with our children.  

We both believe vacation and traveling is so important, and that carries over into how we take care of the people who book vacations with us!

description:

description:
Princeville is one of the most majestic places in the world and our spacious condo allows you to take in beautiful views of the mountains.
Corner unit, tons of natural light, 2 lanais (off bedroom and living room) offering gorgeous views and cooling ocean breeze. Full kitchen, in unit laundry, and 2 full bathrooms.
We help meet your adventure needs with beach chairs, boogie boards, towels, snorkel gear, etc.

The space
The world renowned "Cliffs" has been awarded the 2018 RCI Green award for it's outstanding sustainable practices. Enjoy the fabulous grounds, amenities, and activities offered here. Swimming, tennis, affordable bike rentals, Yoga on the Cliffs, Botanical walks- just to name a few. Less than a mile to Princeville Center and the gorgeous Hanalei Valley lookout, where you can enjoy waterfall views after the rain. Short drive to downtown Hanalei and the pier and bay (my favorite beach for relaxing).

Registration number
neighborhood_overview: Up on the Cliffs, but close to beaches, golf courses, and town. You will be in awe of this lush wonderland and we will provide you tips on the "best" of the area.
host_about: I am a Psychologist who has found her own self-care in traveling. I love to go to new places and meet new people through Airbnb. The first time I visited Kauai, it was love at first sight and have dreamed of owning a condo there. Making that dream come true, and sharing it with others, is a tremendous joy.

description:

Hale Kamaole is within minutes of Wailea and Makena and all of the most beautiful beaches on Maui. You'll find world class golf courses, fantastic snorkeling and diving, abundant shopping and delicious fine and family dining all within minutes of our condo.

Guest access
The property has two swimming pools, two community charcoal bar-b-q areas each with four large cooking stations. There is also an enclosed full size tennis cour

host_about: I have been in the Maui condo rental business for over forty years and have, over the years sent many happy travelers to our condos. We're located in Burnaby, British Columbia, Canada (just outside Vancouver). I have three adult children with whom I’ve spent many happy holidays on Maui. My hobbies are dancing, cycling (especially around our gorgeous seawall here in Vancouver), walking, yoga, reading and going to the cinema.

description:

Refined details on every surface complemented with unique modern furnishings create a truly one-of-a-kind villa.

host_about:
Hawaii-based and locally operated out of Kapalua Resort, The Parrish Collection Maui is a full-service vacation rental management company proudly overseeing 50 privately owned homes in the Bay Villas, Golf Villas and The Ridge Villas.  

Originally formed in 2007, Aloha Vacation Villas is now part of The Parrish Collection group of companies.  Based on Kauai, The Parrish Collection LLC manages over 350 properties on both Maui and Kauai.

JP Parrish is the Owner and Principal Broker of The Parrish Collection LLC, originally formed in 1984 that is now the largest independently owned vacation rental company on Kauai.  

Headquartered at Poipu Beach, Kauai and operating owner and guest services’ desks at three major Kauai resorts, The Parrish Collection LLC offers easy access to owners and guests. 

Its dedicated team has worked together for many years and offers an unequaled commitment to personal and professional service, attention to detail, and the highest quality standards all balanced with a true sense of Aloha.

description:
​​​​​​​Discover the ultimate Waikiki getaway in this 1-bedroom condo that sleeps 4 at Waikiki Banyan. Just steps from famous Waikiki Beach, shops, and restaurants. Enjoy stunning mountain and city views from both the bedroom and living room. Free WiFi and parking included. Your dream vacation starts here!

This great condo, is just the place you’ve been looking for to kick off your next tropical vacation. The apt on the 23rd floor comes with mountain and city views from your living room, bedroom and balcony -- And have we already mentioned it's within walking distance to the beach? Talk about an embarrassment of riches!

For your convenience and comfort, this air-conditioned unit has an open floor plan and fully-equipped kitchen, along with a countertop with 3 barstools. The bed

host_about:
Aloha from Midway Vacations! We are a licensed, full-service vacation rental management company specializing in high-quality destination vacation rentals in Waikiki and South Maui.

 We love to help our guests create amazing vacations where you and your Ohana (family in Hawaiian) will make lasting memories!

Relax and rejuvenate in our stunning homes with confidence, knowing that the units are expertly maintained, thoroughly cleaned, and well stocked.

No surprises! We provide plenty of photos of each unit on our website, so you accurately know what to expect before you arrive.

All units are fully furnished and stocked with dishware, cookware, bed linens, towels, and initial start-up supplies (toiletries). Enjoy the comforts of home in paradise!

Enjoy the privacy of your vacation rental unit with the peace of mind that our dedicated team is always available to assist you if any problems or concerns arise during your stay.

We take great pride in maintaining our high standards of care and attention to details so you can enjoy superior rental properties.

description:
This large 4 bedroom home has lots of activities for exciting days in Hawaii and relaxing evenings watching a movie, cooking family dinners or playing a board game with the kids.

You will have full access to the home. We use electronic door locks set to make coming and going for family members nice and simple.

We live in the community and have staff always willing to help.

KaMilo is a friendly community near the Auberge & Fairmont Hotels in the Mauna Lani resort. Year round, this area boasts mostly warm and dry weather, plus beaches offering white sands and clear waters, thanks to being shielded by several massive mountains.

A car is ideal for exploring the large island. We do supply bikes for shorter trips.

We love kids ! We have lots of items for families ranging from pack and play, high chair/booster, bed rails, baby monitors, swim vests, even a toddler toilet ring and kids kitchen utensils.

After your booking is
neighborhood_overview: KaMilo is a friendly community near the Auberge & Fairmont Hotels in the Mauna Lani resort. Year round, this area boasts mostly warm and dry weather, plus beaches offering white sands and clear waters, thanks to being shielded by several massive mountains.
host_about: Jeff & Suzanne have been hosting guests in their luxury vacation rentals on the Big Island of Hawaii for the past several years. They love being part of helping families create amazing memories.  Come try the Paradise in Hawaii experience!

This studio in a 4 unit cottage caters to couples in search of some rest and relaxation. Drift to sleep and refresh in a bathroom with indulgent shower for two. Sip coffee as you take in river views from your second-floor windows.

The space
View all our listings here:
Airbnb.com/p/ferngrottoinn

The fully furnished 1Bed/1Bath has beautiful sunset and sunrise views where you and your guests can enjoy playing outdoor games on the 500 sq.ft. Deck. Or sipping coffee on the Mountain facing lanai. If you like shopping, we are conveniently located close to Royal Hawaiian Shopping Center and Ala Moana Shopping Center.  For business travelers, we are located 15minutes to Downtown Honolulu.  This Unit offers a rare chance to enjoy Hawaii’s tropical weather with a large outdoor deck that lets you experience indoor and outdoor living.
host_about: Hawaii is home and I love to travel and surf and all things outdoors....

description:
-Exceptional Kona vacation house with ocean view. 33 miles south of Kailua-Kona on the Big Island of Hawaii. Located near the village of Milolii. From here, travel to Volcano National Park, beaches, ancient ruins, Kona plantations, and Kailua-Kona.

In the evening, watch the sunset from our lanai, as it sinks into the ocean. Take a walk to the ocean everyday, it is 300 yards from our house. Our house is fully Licensed for short term rental, STVR-19-364986, and NUC-19-1720.

The space
The front of the house has a lanai for sitting and watching the sunset or whales during fall and winter months. Large master bedroom looks out toward ocean. Large sitting room and dining/kitchen for preparing food, eating and relaxing. For extra sleeping, use living room sofa, or blow up mattress (located in guest bedroom closet.

Guest access
You have full use of house, except locked storage space next to carport. Weber charcoal grill avail
neighborhood_overview:
We have neighbors on both sides, but houses are generally spread out in the community. The old fishing village of Milolii is down the road next to the ocean. If you like hiking, from the end of the road you can take a 20 minute hike to a beautiful beach.

The great thing about the community is the friendliness of people, the quietness at night, and clear mornings with the million dollar view of the ocean.
host_about: Very active with the gym, cycling, and volunteer work. Retired after working for 40 years at the State of California, Employment Development Department as IT Project Manager.

description:
Oceanfront! Exquisite Luxury VIP Oceanfront Condo in highly desirable "A" Building on Beautiful Kauai offering stunning Direct Oceanfront views from every room with amazing sunrises and a priceless 180 degree view of the Pacific Ocean.

Exquisite Luxury VIP Oceanfront Condo in highly desirable "A" Building at the #1 Ranked Waipouli Beach Resort & Spa on Beautiful Kauai offering stunning Direct Oceanfront views from every room with delightful watercolor sunrises, whale watching (November to April) and romantic dinners on the lanai with a priceless 180 degree view of the Pacific Ocean.

There is Central AC in this condo as well as a full size washer and dryer for laundry!

Waipouli Beach Resort & Spa features breathtaking beach sunrises, a state of the art lazy river saline pool complete with water slides, waterfalls, hot tubs, sandy bottom children's pool, beautiful tropical landscaping lit up at night with tiki torches,
host_about:
I have always known I would have a home on beautiful Kauai and dreamed of hosting guests who come to Kauai to fulfill their own life's dream. My favorite TV show when growing up was 'Fantasy Island' and here I am. Over the past 13 years I have come to realize that all that guests who have stayed at Wailua Riverside Hideaway become ohana the moment they arrive. It is you the guests who are the true stars in this Fantasy Island called Kauai! 

I now run a vacation rental business here on the island: Kauai Calls! managing over 40 properties with co-hosting help from Cathy and Michelle, my ohana! 

I look forward to greeting/meeting you here at the Wailua Riverside Hideaway! We have self-check-in set up for all other properties on the island!  

Mahalo nui loa! 
Candace, 
Owner P RB
Kauai Calls!

description:

Exquisite three-bedroom vacation home is located in the heart of sunny Poipu, swimming pool, lovely barbeque area, outdoor lava rock shower, and a large, fenced yard.

Sixteen-foot glass-panel pocket doors open to an expansive outdoor covered lanai which features a black bottom swimming pool, lovely barbeque area, outdoor lava rock shower, and a large, fenced yard. This is indoor/outdoor living at it’s finest!

Beautiful cathedral ceilings give this home a feeling of grandeur from the moment you step inside. The expansive chef’s kitchen features a breakfast bar and plenty of space to spread out. There is indoor dining for six as well as an outdoor, covered dining table for eight. The
neighborhood_overview: Environmental Disclosure. Guest acknowledges that the State of Hawaii is exposed to environmental hazards including, but not limited to, tidal waves, hurricanes and floods. Please refer to the local phone book for information pertaining to evacuation procedures. In the event of an emergency, the State of Hawaii utilizes a warning alert system (emergency sirens are tested on the first working day of every month at 11:45 a.m.). Guest is responsible for using their best efforts to familiarize themselves with property, its location, and surroundings. Some of the properties are in a remote location. As such, what would be considered normal response time for public services in an urban area may not be available in this location, i.e., police, fire, and emergency services. Also, naturally dwelling animals, reptiles and fauna are different then might be encountered in an urban setting and some might be considered “pests” by some individuals, i.e., centipedes, geckos, roaches, spiders, rodents,
host_about: Hawaii Life Vacations is  a local real estate company offering vacation and long term rentals on all Hawaiian Islands.  We offer island hosts, property managers and offices statewide. Our rentals are professionally managed and each home comes with complimentary concierge services. We look forward to hosting you.

description:
Stylish, romantic two-level villa enjoying spectacular direct views of the Pacific Ocean and the internationally famous Kapalua Bay golf course. Relax on either the master bedroom private lanai or the ground floor patio. Catch the sunrise from the comfort of your luxurious California King bed whilst watching the whales breaching (when in season).

The space
This villa is unique because it is a contemporary, two-floor townhouse. The ground floor living room, kitchen, and shower room have been remodeled to the highest standard. The upstairs, romantic master bedroom and private lanai have breathtaking ocean and coastal views. The decor is beachy and contemporary.

Guest access
Each guest receives a unique key code for entry to the condo which is emailed a week prior to arrival.

Other things to note
Complimentary resort-wide shared shuttle to golf courses, restaurants, and local beaches.
Assigned parking directly by

host_about: This was our home and we loved living here, however we have extended our family and now have a little boy so we decided to move into a slightly bigger house on Maui.

description:
The Ohana at Volcanoes National Park
No cleaning fee!
Free travel advice!
Quiet, private, spacious!
Your own off-street parking space!
The first volcano rental to get 1,000 reviews!
Four minutes from Hawaii Volcanoes National Park!

Ohana: noun. Hawaiian. 1) Family. 2) Guesthouse.
Explore the big island with your ohana at our ohana, a rainforest guesthouse!

All races, religions, colors, nationalities, orientations, & genders welcome!

Aloha!

The space
Detached 600 square-foot guest house (no shared interior spaces, no shared walls) with its own private entry and dedicated off-street parking space: one cozy bedroom with two queen beds that have Casper mattresses, full bathroom, kitchen/living room with sofa-bed. HygroCotton towels. Feather/down pillows, memory foam pillows, and poly-fill pillows. Our guesthouse is part of our home so we're not affecting the local housing market, and all proceeds
neighborhood_overview:
The guest house is tucked away from the road behind the main house giving you serious privacy. It's quiet because there is almost no traffic. The neighborhood is literally a rain-forest, dominated by native ohia trees and giant tree ferns. Our skies are so dark that on clear nights the Milky Way is stunning.

Four minutes from Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park on the Big Island, this is an ideal base for touring the park and is centrally located between Ka'u and Puna.

In the village there are five restaurants, two general stores, and a post office - check out my Guidebook for the island at the bottom of this listing. A farmer's market is held in the village every Sunday where you can get food, local produce, coffee, honey, and crafts.

Local food includes a Thai food truck, the Lava Rock Cafe, Thai Thai Bistro and Bar, Ohelo Cafe, Eagle's Lighthouse Cafe, Ono cafe, Kilauea Lodge and The Rim at Volcano House in the park.

Using us as a base, in d
host_about: I'm an ecologist for the National Park Service. I've studied and visited every national park in the central and west Pacific.

description:
If your idea of a perfect Hawaiian vacation involves the great outdoors, then we’ve got the perfect tropical destination for you and your family. Located on the 9th fairway of Waikoloa golf course, our 1200 sq foot Villa offers a quiet getaway with breathtaking views of the Kohala coast. Whether your looking to unwind or enjoy an endless list of activities, you’ll feel totally recharged after a few peaceful nights at Waikoloa Charm.

The space
Inside the Villa, you’ll find everything you need for your fun filled vacation. Provided for you are a choice of snorkel gear, boogie boards, beach chairs and a umbrella for that sunny day at the beach
Love to golf? We have discounted golf for our guests, as well as golf clubs to use.
Free tennis or pickle ball on the nearby local village courts and we even have rackets for your use.

Guest access
Just steps away in the pool area, you have the chance to relax under the Hawaiian sun or swim lap
neighborhood_overview:
Walking distance to a well stocked grocery, which offers great selection of fresh poke, sushi, crisp salads made with the island’s finest produce. Don’t forget to pickup the freshly baked Malasadas from the bakery or your favorite beer, wine or ingredients for a pitcher of Mai Tai’s!
Not in the mood to cook?
Steps away are a variety of restaurants that are international as well as delicious! The food court has Mexican, Chinese, Thai, and traditional Hawaiian cuisine. Pueo’s Osteria Italian restaurant is the perfect place for a romantic night out. Of course Lava Java is the place for breakfast, serving of course, Kona coffee!
host_about:
Retired form a major airline and wife as an award winning floral  designer have visited many places in the world. Always trying to use Air B & B whenever we can.
Having 7 grandchildren keeps us busy when we’re home. Luckily they all live within 30 minutes of us.
We do enjoy spending 3-4 months every winter at Waikoloa Charm our little piece of paradise on the Big Island of Hawaii.
It’s nice when kids and grandchildren visit us there.
We try to keep fit biking, walking and enjoying many beach activities in Hawaii.
We love to explore and experience different restaurants on the island when we’re there.

description:
Get away from it all in the beautiful Hawaiian Jungle. Glamp at our unique tiny home surrounded by an old Grove of Mango trees! This converted shipping container home brings you all the necessary comforts of home while providing you with a unique but comfortable off grid experience. There is cell service at this location for most carriers, but no Wi-Fi.

The space
Glamping at our Mango Hale you will be surrounded by abundant wildlife and foliage. The Coqui frogs and rain on the tin roof will serenade you at night while you sleep. Enjoy off grid tiny home living at its finest! Close to Hilo, Volcano, and the worlds newest Black sand beach!

Much compared to Glamping, but with 2 beautiful rooms, nice warm beds, flushing toilet, sink, and hot water shower!

Because this is a off grid stay, please be extremely mindful of water and solar power usage. Excessive usage may cause you to run out of these resources during your stay. *THE RESOURCES MAY
neighborhood_overview:
Hawaiian Country living at its best. The neighborhood is diverse in both people and homes! There is abundant native wildlife and plants. We get lots of rain here and also lots of sunny days!

While the neighborhood hosts a ton of wonderful people from all over the world, most people here prefer privacy. Please do not disturb the neighbors. I am happy to help answer any questions and als check out our guide book!
host_about: Single mom of two young kids. I love hosting visitors and love traveling!

description:
Aqua Aloha Surf Waikiki 1008 Deluxe Studio with Lanai and Partial City Views located just 2 Blocks to Waikiki Beach, Sleeps 3. 360 Sq Ft. A surfer’s lifestyle is all about being inspired by the ocean, hitting the beach for sun therapy.

The space
Aqua Aloha Surf Waikiki #1008 Deluxe Studio with Lanai and Partial City Views located just 2 Blocks to Waikiki Beach, (1) King bed + (1) Twin sofa sleeper, Sleeps 3. 360 Sq Ft.

Aqua Aloha Surf Waikiki brimming with island personality offers a range of accommodations that are perfect for couples and solo travelers. On-site amenities include an open-air lobby, pool deck, Wi-Fi, and barbeque grills are included in all stays.

The Aqua Aloha Surf Waikiki is located just a block from the International Marketplace and two blocks to the beachfront of Waikiki. Short driving distance will take you to Downtown Honolulu, the University of Hawaii, and historic experiences like Pearl Harbor and Iolani Palace.
neighborhood_overview:
The Aqua Aloha Surf Waikiki is located just a block from the International Marketplace and two blocks to the beachfront of Waikiki. Short driving distance will take you to Downtown Honolulu, the University of Hawaii, and historic experiences like Pearl Harbor and Iolani Palace.

Enjoy world-class shopping, dining, and nightlife at the International Marketplace, stroll the beachfront of Waikiki for surf lessons and sunset watching, or take in a hike at the nearby Diamond Head for an overview of Honolulu’s magnificent coastline. Whatever adventure abound, the location and the value at Aqua Aloha Surf Waikiki are unmatched.

Points of Interest:
• Waikiki Beach – 2 blocks
• Royal Hawaiian Center – 3 blocks
• International Marketplace – 0.3 mile
• Honolulu Zoo & Kapiolani Park – 6 blocks
• Hawaii Convention Center – 1 mile
• Ala Moana Center – 1.5 miles

Though our business has changed through expansion and growth to include properties beyond Maui -- on the islands of Oahu, Hawaii and Kauai --  our values and sense of Aloha remain. description:
We look forward to welcoming you to our property in the beautiful neighborhood of Kona Palisades. Centrally located in the heart of the Gold Coast of Kona. Less than 8 min away from Kona Airport,15 min away from Kua Bay and Kona Alii Dr.! We are located at 1,150 feet above sea level, this elevation is perfect for escaping the heat of downtown and cooling off after a day at the beach. Awaken to singing birds as the sun slowly rises over the Kona coastline.

The space

The unit is attached to the main house, yet fully private with its own entrance. It consists of one room and one bathroom with a shower. The bedroom and bathroom and kitchenette are on the same level and are kept cool with an air conditioning unit. ENJOY this fully furnished studio. This unit features an AC unit, a cozy queen-sized bed, a queen sofa bed, beautiful artwork and text

Less than 10 min from the airport ( you do not hear the plains due to the directions). 15 min to one of the world's best beaches Kua Bay.  55 min away from the base of Mauna Kea. and 10 min from Costco and Target. We look forward to welcoming you to our property in the beautiful neighborhood of Kona Palisades. Tired after a long flight no worries we are located just a few miles from the airport so no need to travel any further! We are located at 1,150 feet above sea level, this elevation is perfect for escaping the heat of downtown, and cooling off after a day at the beach. Awaken to singing birds as the sun slowly rises over the Kona coastline. We strive to provide a personal level of service to our guests in our quiet residential setting.

We enjoy meeting interesting, creative, and passionate people from near and far and sharing our love for Hawaii Island " Big Island" This island is amazing. Staying with us is like staying with friends and family. We try really hard to make each guest's stay wonderfully memorable.

description:

Hanalei Bay Resort lies perched above scenic Hanalei Bay with a striking view of the Na Pali Cliffs, Bali Hai Mountain, picturesque beaches, cascading waterfalls and swaying palm trees - truly the sights of vacation dreams! description:
E komo mai! Come on in. Papakea J201 offers the best that Papakea has to offer. With windows on two sides of the living room, J201 provides sweeping ocean views from throughout the living, dining and kitchen area. This one bedroom, one bathroom condo accommodates two guests and features newly installed split system air conditioning in the living and bedroom areas. The décor has an understated tropical vibe that is easy on the senses.

The space
Additional Description:

The owners maintain a well-stocked kitchen that makes it easy to prepare your own meals, especially with the ocean view from the kitchen to inspire the cook. The open-ended lanai is a great place to lounge or dine, while watching the boats and canoes glide by; the clouds drift over Molokai and the tiki torches blazing each night as sunset descends. During the Winter season, you’ll see whales breaching and spouting. It’s a true Maui experience.

Inside, there’s a dining tab

description:
Come experience what it’s like to be fully in nature, OFF GRID! This TINY HOUSE has everything u need to relax and enjoy the sounds and peacefulness of nature. We are FULLY OFF GRID, Our toilets are COMPOST… which means a NO FLUSH TOILET, so we can work with nature.. it is done very well, no smell, and it is very clean.. but DON’T WORRY U will have HOT SHOWER, and a heater for those chilly nights.. If u love nature U WILL LOVE THIS OFF GRID COTTAGE!

The space
We have 3 Airbnbs on the property, each one has THEIR OWN PRIVATE bathroom /shower/kitchen… NO SHARING… we also have chickens and cats close to the cottage and walk all around our land

Guest access
U will need a car to get around

Other things to note
We are 100%off grid. We have compost bathroom (which means no flushable toilet) We have solar for ur plugs for phones and what ever u may have to plug in and charge.. we have hot spot Wi-Fi. We also have 3 cats a
neighborhood_overview: We are 3200 above sea level.. it can get chilly at night but we have a heater for u. We’re about 30 minutes to green sand beach and Naalehu

description:
Sea of Glass is a newly remodeled luxury home on the North Shore of Oahu. The house is located on 70 feet of sandy beach with amazing views from every room. This gated property offers privacy and security, and has every amenity you need. Enjoy hiking, biking, swimming, snorkeling, surfing, and kayaking at the property.

The space
30 day rentals available

Kai aniani or Sea of Glass is an architecturally stunning beachfront home on the North Shore of Oahu, completely remodeled in 2018. The A-frame design is accentuated by windows that face Mount Ka’ala, the tallest mountain peak on the island to the south, and wall-to-wall sliding doors along the entire north-facing oceanfront with 70 feet of sandy beach. This gated property on a cul de sac street offers privacy and security with passcode protected locks and a Ring security system.

The main floor of the house is situated on an elevated platform, enhancing infinite ocean views from every win
neighborhood_overview:
We are a short bike ride away from Historic Haleiwa town and all of the North Shore sights. There is a designated bike path directly in front of the house that heads to town.

The beach at this location is sandy, unlike the rocky beaches further east. Due to several reef breaks, the water here is pretty calm and great for kayaking, paddle boarding and snorkeling. Further down the beach are surf spots.
host_about:
My husband and I bought this property to escape the hustle and bustle of city life.  Arriving at Sea of Glass is like a breath of fresh air.

We hope you enjoy this slice of paradise as much as our family does!

description:
Discover the beauty of Maui from this charming one-bedroom home in South Kihei. Located directly across from Kamaole Beach Park II, enjoy easy access to golden sands and the crystal-clear waters and plenty of food options. The comfortable home features a spacious bedroom with a king-size bed, queen-size sofa bed, and two bathrooms, as well as free parking, free WiFi & Cable, and a brand new AC. Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen and other necessary amenities to make your stay comfortable. Experience

The space
This unit is located in the Maui Banyan Condos, featuring 1 master bedroom, a queen sleeper and 2 bathrooms with shower, about 650 sqft. Perfect for couples or small families craving “beach town” charm fringed by lush tropical nature, Maui Banyan is named for the stately “canopy” tree that provides cooling shade from Hawaii’s sunny skies.

Unit highlights:
- Comfy king bed in the spacious bedroom
- Queen sofa sleeper in the living room
-
neighborhood_overview:
Maui Banyan’s convenient location near Wailea Resort and Makena Resort puts couples, families and friends at the springboard to championship golf, world-class spas, trendy shopping and Hawaii’s most popular ocean recreation.

- Explore tide pools and learn to surf at Kamaole Beach Park II
- Snorkel amid the pristine waters of La Perouse Bay
- Tee off for a sunset round at Maui Nui Golf Club
- Sample a Big Swell IPA at Maui Brewing Company
- Catch a whale watching excursion from Maalaea Harbor
- Take a guided kayak tour to Makena Turtle Town
- Hike through Maui’s youngest lava flow along the King’s Highway Trail
- Indulge with fashion and dining at The Shops at Wailea
host_about: We are a group of 4 hosts who have joined forces to create Betterstay. We have a simple mission - to provide a 5-star experience. We look forward to hosting you!

description:

Two of the bedrooms are located within an area separated from our home by a shared laundry room. The third bedroom is located beyond the laundry down a hall separated from our main home by a locked door. we do have a friendly dog who is kept in our yard but often comes to the fence to greet guests. More than 2 guests add $20.00 per person per day.

The space
There are two separate bedrooms. one with queen bed and dresser, the smaller bedroom has a full size bed with dresser in the closet. a third bedroom with queen bed is available for more than 4 guests. If you request the third bedroom for a third or fourth guest there will be a $20.00 per night charge for this bedroom. Please Note: THERE IS AN ADDITIONAL FEE FOR MORE THAN 2 GUESTS. THE FEE IS $20.00 PER PERSON PER DAY. The third bedroom is located down the hallway from t
