host_about: Hi, we are Rhonda and Gordon. We are happy to host our guests in Kailua Kona Hawaii

description:
Waikiki Banyan #3601-T1 – 201 Ohua Ave.

Best views at Waikiki Banyan! You'll savor the views from this 36th floor end-unit! AC, FREE parking and FREE Wi-Fi, communal pool, hot tubs, sauna and BBQ area! Just a city block to world famous Waikiki Beach!

CLICK "Show more" FOR ALL THE DETAILS ON THIS UNIT!

(日本語対応)

The space
It hardly gets better than the vantage point from this 36th floor end unit! Your panoramic view includes the Pacific Ocean views, Waikiki, Diamond Head, and Kahala to Koko Head! This modern air-conditioned contemporary has tasteful Hawaiian touches, 533 sq.ft. plus lanai with table and chairs! All NEW Furniture (2019)!

The Waikiki Banyan is a favorite of repeat visitors with its host of amenities including a pool, hot tubs, BBQ area, and more. All this and just a short 2-block walk to beautiful Waikiki Beach, plus shops, restaurants, the Honolulu Zoo, Waikiki Aquarium, and Kapiolani Park! Public transport
neighborhood_overview: The beaches in Waikiki are just a short walk away (just 3-5 minutes) and shopping, restaurants and entertainment venues in Waikiki are all easily accessible.
host_about:
ALOHA! E komo mai and mahalo for choosing to stay with Captain Cook Resorts!

Captain Cook Resorts proudly manages over 170 privately-owned vacation rentals in Waikiki (a district of Honolulu on the island of Oahu). Everyone on the fun and energetic CCR team works hard to offer great accommodations, great service, and has a passion for sharing all that Oahu has to offer our guests!

We appreciate that you're on vacation, and we ask that you let us know if there's anything we can do to make this visit stand out as one of your best!

ALL CAPTAIN COOK RESORTS RENTALS INCLUDE:
– Bath towels, Beach towels, Bed linens
– Dishes, Silverware, Cookware (including tea kettle & rice cooker)
– Beach chairs, Hair dryer, Iron/Ironing board
– Start-Up Supplies: coffee filters, laundry detergent, dish soap, dishwasher soap, bar soap, paper towels, toilet paper, tissue, basic cleaning supplies, and travel size (2 oz.) shampoo, conditioner, body wash, body lotion
– NOT PROVIDED: beach umbrellas, beach toys, aluminum foil, Ziploc bags, coffee, condiments/seasonings, cooking oil, fabric softener, or bleach. This private vacation rental does NOT include resort services such as daily housekeeping, replenishment of towels or toiletry supplies, or hotel front desk services.

Please let us know if you have any questions!

Mahalo!

description:
Come and enjoy staying in a remodeled camp-style Plantation Home in the quaint town of Papa’aloa. This is a great (basic accommodation) home base and an opportunity for adventurous travelers. This home is off the beaten path, in a local historic camp neighborhood. Situated along the Hamakua Coast, this home is 24 miles north of Hilo and 34 miles south of Waimea. Explore the many natural wonders including waterfalls, lush jungle, botanical gardens and so much more. No A/C.

The space
This house has been refurnished inside and out. This home has three lovely bedrooms, one bathroom and features peek-a-boo ocean views, queen sized beds in every bedroom, TV, wifi, and two available off-street parking spots in front of the house. Enjoy a coffee or tea on the front lanai while watching the ocean. There are many windows that provide great natural light and ceiling fans in every room create air flow year-round.
Ear plugs are provided for your further comfort if th
neighborhood_overview:
This is a lively, vibrant and tight-knit neighborhood. Situated alongside a cliff the houses are close together and surrounded by green luscious jungle. Don’t be surprised if you see neighbors out chatting and the neighborhood kids playing. A short drive or better yet walk down the road is the Papa'aloa County Store and Café. The store has all the various sundries you may need while in town. While not a full grocery there is plenty there to make a meal, enjoy a drink or a dessert. The café and restaurant have a fabulously tasty menu with daily drink and food specials. They are closed on Sunday so make sure you have your supplies on Saturday night!
Please note that there are roosters in the neighborhood. They can get rather loud. Earplugs are provided for your comfort. Also, some of the houses in the neighborhood appear run down. Please don't let this take away from the awesome neighbors. This home offers basic accommodations it is not a luxury rental.
host_about:
Aloha,
I am a cheerful and upbeat person. While I've traveled extensivly and lived in Australia, England and the USA, I'm loving living in Hawaii. The Big Island is an amazing place. I spend most of my time managing our family life. My husband and two children are my priority. I also enjoy gardening, yard work, cooking, and reading. I'm also an avid  sci-fi book fan and you will see plenty of volumes at the property.

description:
This charming, private jungle hideaway was originally a macadamia nut mill, now converted into a quaint living space with a private lanai, entryway, and bathroom. Shaded by a giant monkeypod tree and nestled in gorgeous tropical nature at 1000 feet of altitude and just 2 miles from Kealakekua Bay, where the spinner dolphins live, the Hale Huna “Jungle Surf” suite is your perfect home base for enjoying the Big Island has to offer.

The space
This elegant hideaway sleeps up to four people, with separate nooks for a king-size bed and a pull-out couch. Basic kitchen amenities—mini-fridge, microwave, and hotplate— are provided, with access to a larger shared outdoor jungle kitchen complete with a barbecue just steps away if you prefer to cook and eat in nature. Coffee and tea are available both in the room and in the outdoor kitchen.

Nestled in a gorgeous natural setting, you're enveloped by the lyrical sounds of the jungle, including wild parrots, chicken
neighborhood_overview:
The gorgeous jungle lane leading from the main road to the property makes for a great little walk when you want to stretch your legs. You’re close to hiking trails—including the famous Captain Cook trail which leads to the crystal waters of Kaleakekua Bay just a 10-minute walk from the property.

Supermarkets and cafes are all within a 5-minute drive, and so is the eclectic Aloha Green Farmer's Market which features arts, crafts, jewelry, food, live music, and more! Driving is recommended since the main highways aren’t the most pedestrian friendly, though adventurous travelers have no problem getting around on foot. It’s just not recommended for children.
host_about: Bonnie and Christophe are both psychologists and chose to live in Hawaii to be closer to nature and create a sacred space offering workshops on soul-centered psychology and cutting-edge modalities to experience less stress and more serenity. Christophe is also a neuroscientist, published author, speaker, and researcher in media and mental health. Manta Soul is our life's dream. We invite you to experience the powerful energy of the land and carefully curated spaces at Manta Soul!

description:
Maui Kamaole A207 is an ocean view 2 bedroom 2 bath condo with a fully equipped kitchen, washer and dryer, split system AC in bedrooms and living room. There is free wifi and free parking. There are 2 king beds and sleeps 4.

The space
Maui Kamaole #A207 is a beautifully furnished and decorated ocean view condo that has all the amenities to make your vacation in paradise perfect. The Lanai furniture is comfortable and is the best spot to start your morning and end an evening. Maui Kamaole #A-207 even has a retractable awning for when it rains or when the sun is too much. Please note: This unit is on the second floor with no elevator available.
Same day bookings and those arriving within 48 hours of making the reservation require a phone call to Rentals Maui for confirmation.
Longer stays require additional terms and conditions. Please contact Rentals Maui for inquiries longer than 60 nights.
The Renovation encompassed beautiful new Tile Flooring t

Rentals Maui Inc. is a locally owned & managed Vacation Rental management company located in Kihei, Maui. We've been doing business on Maui for the past 20 years and we are fully licensed by the State of Hawaii, insured, and bonded.

We currently manage over 300 properties in South Maui, which is also where our office is located, making it convenient should guests need assistance day or night.

description:
• Where the eye and mind feel comfortable •
Enter and feel comfortable in the newly renovated lifestyle apartment 'Leeven's Home' with space for your whole crew, as long as it consists of no more than 6 people. Short distances to restaurants and steps from the ocean. Cozy evenings by the pool with BBQ area or rather on the large terrace with lounge corner.

Flooded with light and yet pleasantly cool, stylish, open plan and furnished with attention to detail ...for your feel-good stay.

The space
Why Leeven's Home?

- Sleep well and get your privacy: Entire apartment with 2 separate bedrooms with 2 high quality, king size beds, as well as 1 bunk bed (1 full and 1 double also suitable for 2 adults)

- Your quite spot: The apartment is located on the 2nd floor with balcony/Lanai overlooking the garden and is accessible by lift

- Entertain: Open living/cooking concept as well as sofa/TV area and bar counter, lounge area to
neighborhood_overview: Right in Kona, with plenty of restaurant and bars, a nice “keiki” beach and so much more to do.
host_about:
Vollzeit-Mama die gerne reist, und das am Liebsten mit ihren mittlerweile drei Liebsten ! Unsere Lieblingsdestination ist Hawaii. Mich fasziniert die Vielfalt dieser Inselgruppe ... traumhafte Strände, das Meer und jede Menge zu entdecken. Eine Lebensart im Einklang mit der Natur.
Bei unseren Reisen sind wir immer gerne in stylischen Unterkünften die gut gelegen sind und alles bieten was wir mit unseren Kids benötigen.
Wir freuen uns,  euch das Gleiche bieten zu können !

description:
Aloha Friends! And welcome to KONA LANDING!

Centrally located on the famous Ali'i Drive. Steps to restaurants, bars and most importantly the ocean. Our beachy modern oasis has ocean views from the lanai. Sip Mai Tais as you watch the sunset and feel the ocean breezes run through your hair. Beautiful sparkling clean pool and gas BBQs just downstairs from the condo. We provide a full set up for the beach. We also have family-friendly amenities.

The space
Your perfect vacation starts here because we have everything you will need to relax and unwind. Memory foam mattresses, deluxe pillows, luxury sheets and cool A/C so you are well rested for your day at the beach.

We also want our littlest guests to be happy at Kona Landing. If you have little ones, we have a Pack n' Play, highchair, toys and books.

For indoor relaxing, we have a full kitchen, smart TV and dining area. If adventure is calling we provide snorkels, fins, beach chairs
neighborhood_overview: Centrally located on the famous Ali'i Drive. Steps to restaurants, bars and most importantly the ocean. Many bars and restaurants are downstairs from our condo. As well as a farmers market, and the ABC store. There are many beaches in the area to explore some are within walking distance some you can drive to.

I’ve worked in the tech industry as a Marketing Creative Director until a few years ago when I quit my job to teach people about short term rentals. Follow me @alishaamberarnold

description:
This is a Maui Vacation Rental you will enjoy the location and the ocean view. A king bed in upstairs bedroom, with remodeled kitchen, livingroom and loft. Master bath has walk-in tile shower. Lower bedroom has two twins beds, loft area queen...

The space
At this Maui Vacation Rental you will enjoy the location and the ocean view. The owners just did several upgrades throughout the unit. This unit has a king bed in upstairs bedroom, two twins beds in the lower bedroom and the loft area has a new queen sofa sleeper. The newly remodeled kitchen is well equipped for your stay. New Living room furniture is very comfortable. The upstairs bathroom is newly remodeled master bath has walk in tile shower. The main floor of the unit is a wood floor creating a very warm cozy look. Come relax in this well stocked condo across from Kamaole Beach park 3. Any family will enjoy this comfortable Maui Kihei vacation rental at Hale Kamaole.

GE-050-579-4560-01 TA-05
host_about:
The complex is located directly across from Kamaole III State Beach Park, which is known as one of the most beautiful and safest beaches in the Islands.  It is perfect for swimming, snorkeling, sunning, jogging, picnicking, kite flying, and especially enjoying amazing sunsets and whale watching.

Each unit has a private lanai that faces the interior of the complex, offering views of the expansive lawns, pools, and lush tropical landscape of palm trees, hibiscus, birds of paradise and plumeria trees.  Most lanais also offer views of the beautiful Pacific Ocean and spectacular sunsets.  

There are two pools, a covered pavilion, and a full size tennis court on the property.  Every evening the outdoor barbecue area is a popular spot to socialize while grilling the perfect dinner and watching as the Hale Kamaole conch shell band performs their nightly sunset ritual.

You will find world class golf courses, fantastic snorkeling and diving, many Maui activities, abundant shopping and delicious fine and family dining all within minutes of Hale Kamaole.

description:
Imagine - warm tropical climate, gentle sounds of waves washing ashore, palm trees swaying in the breeze, panoramic views, and the perfect accommodations - is there anyway else to experience Hawaii? This two-bedroom, two-bath condominium gives you all of that and more!
Completely remodeled through-out with many custom touches, it's a lovely condo, with a million-dollar view, which makes this unit the prime destination for an absolutely blissful vacation!

The space
Located on the fourth floor of the four-story oceanfront building, this oceanfront condo has excellent proximity to Kona town and all activities. Easy unassigned parking under building and an elevator as well! We have a newly renovated pool area with Jacuzzi located in the atrium area of oceanfront building. We now have mini-split A/C with single blower in living room area. There is not a separate blower in guest room.

Guest access
The whole condo

Other thin
neighborhood_overview: Condo is located at the Kona Bali Kai Resort south of Kailua-Kona about 2 miles, and is adjacent to the very popular surfing spot called Banyans.  You have excellent snorkeling two miles down the road and a great beach just one mile away called White Sands/Magic Sands.
host_about: Live and work in Kona and have for 16 years.

description:
Holualoa Ekolu makes you feel at home. Close to Holualoa Village, Kailua-Kona town, the ocean and beaches, airport, shopping and restaurants. We love the quaint, cool and country atmosphere here in Holualoa. This is a nice home with comfy queen bed in bedroom, walk-in shower, large covered lanai to enjoy the outdoors (with an ocean view of Kailua Bay), smart TV, Wifi, stacked washer/dryer, full kitchen and amenities. There's a sofa sleeper in the living area and twin bed in the walk-in closet.

The space
Holualoa Ekolu is clean and comfortable. The large lanai/patio welcomes you to enjoy the ocean view and outdoors. Comfortable for couples, solo adventurers, few friends traveling together and small families. The kitchen is well equipped with full size appliances, microwave, refrigerator with ice maker, pots/pans, etc. There is a single serve Kuerig coffee maker and French press for local ground coffee. We provide 4 sets of bath towels, beach towels, some essential
neighborhood_overview: Holualoa Village is within walking distance but driving is more convenient. There are galleries, post office, a cafe in the village. Paul's Place and Doris Store are minutes away if you forgot to pick up something while in town. It's nice and cool at this elevation, open air windows and doors will keep a nice breeze going through the house.
host_about: Aloha! Our family lives a simple life trying to keep that balance of hard work and play. We are a rodeo family and most of our travels seem to center around our kids and rodeo. We grew up here and have raised our family here. Our family is Blessed and we are just thankful to live the life we have.

description:

neighborhood_overview: Papakea Resort is a beautiful, oceanfront, property at the North end of Ka’anapali beach.  The location couldn't be better. While Mother Nature removed Papakea's beach several years ago, you are just a short walk to famous Ka'anapali Beach and the boardwalk which stretches all the way south to Black Rock, and beyond all the way to Whalers Village. That means you have all the access to one of the best beaches in the world without the intrusion of crowds of beachgoers right outside your window. You are just steps from a terrific snorkeling reef, where you can enjoy swimming with the gorgeous Hawaiian fish and sea turtles.
host_about:
Aloha, We are Terry and Jill, we are Realtors and we have been coming to Hawaii since the 1980's. We used to go to Waikiki but we find that West Maui in general and the Honua Kai Resort, in particular, take the Hawaiian experience to a whole new level!  Papakea is more cultural feel to it. Jill has had a love for the culture since she starting Polynesian dancing at 9 years of age and later became a professional dancer here in Canada.  Although she doesn’t dance anymore she still judges the competitions.

We love living in Vancouver B.C. but this place is exactly what we dreamed about in a 'home away from home'.

Vacationing in Maui doesn’t get better than Kamaole Sands, a condo resort built on 15 acres of gardens, waterfalls, and ponds. Live like you’ve always wanted to in an individually furnished condominium suite directly across from Kihei’s popular Kamaole Beach Park III. Defined by its laid-back vibe and tropical beauty, South Maui is a true Hawaiian paradise.

Our dreamy Kihei location near Wailea Resort and Makena Resort puts you in the midst of golf, spas and ocean recreation.

- Learn to surf at Kamaole Beach Park III
- Tee off at Maui Nui or Wailea golf clubs
- Stay on trend at The Shops at Wailea
- Snorkel amid the pristine waters of La Perouse Bay
- Indulge in spa treatments at Wailea Resort
- Sample craft brews at Maui Brewing Company

The best plan for your day is often no plan at all. Maybe you’ll start your morning with a swim in the Pacific or in our pool. You might mingle amid traveling kindred spirits at your resort’s Wednesday Mai Tai Party, and then grill a fresh catch with your new friends at the property’s public barbecue area. Or step out for a sunset dinner at one of Kihei’s fantastic cafes or bistros. Need to stay connected? We offer complimentary WiFi in the lobby, pool area, and all rooms.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

The resort also offers multiple restaurants and bars that highlight the Hawaiian farmer's influence on the culture. neighborhood_overview: Poʻipū Beach Park is located in the community of Poʻipū on the southern coast of Kauaʻi island in Hawaii. The beach is a park has lifeguards provided by the county of Kauaʻi.
host_about:
Suite Paradise – The gateway to island living.

Suite Paradise in sunny Poipu Beach on Kauai is home to hundreds of vacation rental properties, amenable to any sized group and any specifications you could think of. With the highest level of service and a wide range of vacation rental options, Suite Paradise can ensure that your stay is as seamless as Kauai’s lifestyle.

Choose from luxurious beach resorts, each with multiple pools and spas within walking distance and top-of-the-line amenities, including, but not limited to, full membership to Poipu Beach Athletic Club for the duration of your stay. Poipu Kai consists of 70 acres of lush tropical foliage and some of Kauai’s most sought-after vacation rentals. One complex is literally located nestled in a verdant and extinct volcano crater – you can’t get more immersed in the island lifestyle than that! From mauka (mountain) to makai (sea), Suite Paradise has something for you!

Kahala – A popular complex that is home to mostly one- and two-bedroom units. Kahala is only a short walk from the beach, and closest to Poipu Kai’s tennis courts and Kalapaki Joe’s sports bar. With the option of both mountain and ocean views available dependent on the unit, Kahala’s location is perfectly situated with proximity to Poipu Road as well as the Poipu Kai greenbelt.

Makanui – Two- and three-bedroom units perched across from Poipu Crater, with stunning mountain views, distant ocean views, and a short walk to the greenbelt path.

Manualoha –Less than a mile from the beach, although the complex pool is practically attached to the Pacific Ocean! With units sleeping four to six, easy access to the greenbelt pathway, and hues of purple bougainvillea draped throughout the complex.

Poipu Sands – One- and two-bedroom units with incredible ocean views, spacious lanais, and a short walk to Shipwreck’s Beach.

Regency – Larger units, spacious enough to accommodate up to 10 guests. Many of these units are newly remodeled and offer AC. Regency and Kahala sit right next to each other.

Regency Villas – Luxury units with central AC. Regency Villas often feature a loft and sleep up to five guests. Situated near the greenbelt for easy access to many resort amenities, and centrally located for a short walk to Brennecke's Beach, or access to the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort.

Nihi Kai Villas - A comfortable and quiet beach resort with 70 condos to choose from. Located right across from the ocean.

Poipu Crater – Just as the name says, Poipu Crater is nestled in a verdant an extinct volcano crater, which makes the foliage truly breathtaking. With 30 condos to choose from, sleeping four to six guests, the choice is yours! Enjoy the tropical gardens and central location to all that Poipu has to offer.

Lawai Beach Resort - Luxurious oceanfront condos located directly across from arguably the best snorkeling spot on the island. Enjoy a short stroll to five-star dining at The Beach House or enjoy the view from Lawai Beach, as the surfers paddle out for a sunset session. With room to sleep up to six, Lawai Beach Resort has it all!

Poipu Kapili - A beautiful and peaceful resort located on five acres of meticulously landscaped oceanfront property.

Pili Mai - This is Kauai’s newest resort development of luxury condominiums, nestled among a championship golf course.

description:
A cozy single bedroom in Honolulu! Perfect for budget-conscious travelers looking for a laid-back and private stay in the city. Our room offers a twin-sized bed and two window fans to keep you comfortable during your stay. You'll be sharing the apartment with other guests who know that courtesy and respect is expected. Enjoy the use of a shared fully-equipped kitchen and common area. Located in a bustling neighborhood, you'll have easy access to all the attractions and activities close by.

The space
A welcoming hostel spirit animates the property (as some guests have commented), but The Plumeria is a step above a conventional hostel: All bedrooms are private and furnished with the basics and share a common kitchen and bathroom with other guests. The Plumeria hosts a weekly Free-Food-BYOB BBQ (weather permitting) for residents and guests alike.

The Plumeria’s buildings are nestled under a variety of native trees and tucked within a security fence cover
neighborhood_overview:
Makiki is a lively and diverse neighborhood located in the heart of Honolulu.

You'll find a wide variety of restaurants, cafes, and shops in the area, offering everything from local Hawaiian cuisine to international flavors. Search our guidebook to find restaurants with delicious food and good service.

Outdoor enthusiasts will appreciate the nearby hiking trails, including the scenic Makiki Valley Loop trail, and the iconic Diamond Head State Monument. The picturesque Manoa Falls trail is also nearby and takes you through lush tropical rainforest to a stunning waterfall. Plus, just a short walk away is the expansive Ala Moana Beach Park, where you can enjoy a swim, soak up the sun, and relax with a picnic while taking in the expansive ocean views. As with any urban area, traffic can be heavy during peak hours, but Makiki's central location makes it easy to navigate the city and explore all the attractions that Honolulu has to offer.

As with all major
host_about: My name is Richard Stancliff. I have served as host and manager at The Plumeria since April, 2011. I previously vacationed in Hawaii and loved it so much I now spend a good part of the year in Honolulu.  At age 68, I'm semi-retired and find that this lifestyle fits very well.  Some work in the mornings and early afternoons, then the beach and perhaps Waikiki.   Does it get any better than this?

description:
Your own private guest cottage on a 3 acre working avocado farm out of the heat and activity of Kona. We are at around 1,200 elevation but still only 12 minutes from all major grocery stores and restaurants.

The space
The cottage construction was completed in early July 2020 and there are many thoughtful touches and hand built furniture items that give the home a cozy farmhouse feel. Even though we do not have air conditioning in the cottage the higher elevation, shady cloud cover, and powerful fans keep the living spaces cool and comfortable.
The cottage is the second structure built on the 3.3 acre farm and is on a separate section of the land from the our primary residence. You will have your own separate driveway, separate parking, and won't be able to see or hear us from your little slice of paradise.

From your kitchen you can hear and see chickens and will most likely be visited by a couple curious and friendly farm cats. Must love nature
neighborhood_overview: Our farm is located on a historic one lane farm homestead road and is popular for dog walkers and runners. You will hear cars passing by on the road and the occasional conversation from a passersby, otherwise, this is an incredibly tranquil neighborhood and is exceptionally safe.
host_about: My husband and I live in a farmhouse cottage on our very own avocado farm on the Big Island of Hawaii. I am from Alaska and Micah is from a small town in southern Illinois. We met while I was on vacation in Kona and we have been in love with the island and each other ever since! We do our best to enjoy everything the island has to offer but we also truly love to travel abroad and to visit family and friends all over the world.

description:
WELCOME TO HANA, MAUI ~ THE LAST HAWAIIAN PLACE

HANA KAI MAUI welcomes you to our beautiful oceanfront vacation rentals on Hana Bay at Waikaloa Beach.

The space
Unit #4 Nanu'alele, at Hana Kai Maui, is an oceanfront 1 bedroom 1 bath unit. This top floor, corner unit enjoys amazing views of Hana Bay and Waikaloa Beach and is very private. There is a queen size bed in the bedroom and a queen size commercial grade hide-a-bed in the living room, separated by a partition wall at night. There is a bar and 4 barstools for dining within the unit and a dining table and chairs on the spacious covered oceanfront lanai off the kitchen. Tropical decor and tile floors throughout.

As you travel the beautiful Hana Highway through Maui’s untouched rainforest, you will be surrounded by breathtaking views, majestic waterfalls and a lush tropical landscape. Your journey ends as you reach the town of Hana. Here is unspoiled Hawaii, where you can relax and enjoy
neighborhood_overview: Hana is known as the last Hawaiian place. Hana has a rich history and the Hawaiian population in this area once numbered in the hundreds of thousands. Today Hana's population is under 2000, from Keanae to Kaupo, a 40-mile coastal radius. Hana Kai is centrally located and easily accessible. The property is nestled along the North side of Hana Bay at the entrance to Waikaloa Beach. Although we do not recommend swimming, Waikaloa Beach is wonderful to explore and you can actually walk for several miles on the coastal trail to Waianapanapa State park (advance reservations required). Hana Bay is a precious resource to the community and you may see fisherman netting Akule, keiki swimming in the gentle shore break at Hana Bay, dolphins and sometimes whales at the entrance to the Bay, turtles feeding along the rocks, or canoe paddlers practicing for an upcoming regatta.
host_about: I am the General Manager for Hana Kai. I originally came to Hana in 1978 and have made Hana and Hawaii my home ever since. We have a 16 member staff including front desk, housekeeping, grounds and maintenance personnel. We are all Hana residents and the majority of our staff is of Hawaiian ancestry. Our staff is very friendly and always willing to assist our guests as needed with services and information about the Hana area.

neighborhood_overview:
Wailuku is a neighborhood located on the island of Maui in Hawaii.

Wailuku is a historic town with many buildings dating back to the 19th century. It has a diverse mix of residential and commercial areas, with a range of housing options from historic homes to newer developments.

The town is home to several parks and recreational areas, including the popular Iao Valley State Park, which features a scenic hike to the Iao Needle, a natural rock formation. The Wailuku River State Park also offers hiking trails and swimming holes.

Wailuku has a vibrant downtown area with shops, restaurants, and art galleries. The Maui Arts and Cultural Center is located nearby, offering a range of cultural events and performances.

Overall, Wailuku is a charming and historic neighborhood with plenty to offer both residents and visitors.

neighborhood_overview: Nestled between Waikoloa Resort’s Kings’ and Beach Courses on the spectacular Kohala Coast, this Waikoloa resort offers scenic views of Mauna Kea and the impressive lava fields that surround the resort. Where Ancient Hawaii Thrives, located on the South Kohala Coast of the island of Hawaii, the Waikoloa area is rich in ancient Hawaiian history and culture, including petroglyphs and traditional fish ponds that stand side-by-side with modern full-service resorts. The rugged and undeveloped coastline is lined with scenic valleys, lava fields, golf courses, and resorts. Step back in time, by strolling the ancient pathways and petroglyph fields, head to the beach to experience the crystal-clear waters of Hapuna Beach State Park or the jet-black shores of Punaluu Beach, or shop and dine at the numerous shops and restaurants in the area. Popular areas to check out for shopping and dining are the King's Shops, 0.3 miles away or the Queen's Marketplace, only 0.4 miles away.

Captain Cook Resorts proudly manages over 170 privately-owned vacation rentals in Waikiki (a district of Honolulu on the island of Oahu). Everyone on the fun and energetic CCR team works hard to offer great accommodations, great service, and has a passion for sharing all that Oahu has to offer our guests!

We appreciate that you're on vacation, and we ask that you let us know if there's anything we can do to make this visit stand out as one of your best!

Mahalo!

description:
Renovated 2 bedroom + Loft w/2 single beds, 2 bathrooms! New floors, paint, tables and washer & dryer!

Native Hawaiian Owned!

Your perfect vacation begins at this spacious condo on the 3rd floor of Fairway Villas! It sleeps up to 6 people in a master bedroom (king bed), 2nd bedroom (king bed) and loft with 2 single beds; large living room, dining room and beautiful kitchen. Taxes included.

Come stay in Hale Wailana & have a vacation you will never forget!

Keywords: big island, condo, beach

The space
Beautifully and fully furnished in local Big Island décor, this condo has everything you need for your favorite vacation. The Fairway Villas in Waikoloa is a private gated community right across the street from the Queens Marketplace and Kings Shops and is within walking distance to the beach. It also overlooks one of the two championship golf courses in the immediate area.

We are dedicated to ensuring that our g
neighborhood_overview: Vacationers love the Fairway Villas endless pool and hot tub, as well as central BBQ grills and fitness center. Although these are right out your front door, we know visitors come to Hawaii for the beaches :-) Anehoomalu Beach (called “A-Bay” by the locals) is a great beach for everyone, including rental facilities for all kinds of water sports like stand-up paddle boarding, snorkeling, and sunset & whale watching boat rides. See giant sea turtles ("honu") and colorful tropical fish. You can get a meal or snack at the Lava Lava Beach Club or just lie on the beach with a book and catch some rays. In addition to A-Bay, some of the world's most famous beaches are just short drive away.
host_about:
We love the Waikola, HI area. We had the opportunity to live there as a family for 9 weeks in addition to visiting whenever possible. Also, my parents live 20 mins away and my sister (and her family) live 15 mins away ... our ties to Hawai'i island go back for many years :-)

We love outdoor activities, including hiking, swimming, paddleboarding, and (of course) enjoying the incredible beaches and pool. We know you will love it also!

description:
Wake up in the morning, you see the greens & clouds kissing the mountains, hearing the birds chirping. You are a few minutes' drive to the beach. You can easily explore the most indigenous feel of Hawaii nearby. Surfing, swimming, hiking... there are a lot you can do. Snorkeling in the Electric beach is very popular. Sunset hiking in Maili Pink Pill Box is many visitors' favorite. You are about 30 minutes' drive to KoOlina resort & Costco and shopping centers.
A Perfect setting for a big Ohana!

The space
This house has two units: 3/2.5 main house and a studio that has its own entrance, kitchen cooktop, washer/dryer. It is listed separately. The booking for the entire house is based on the availability of both units.

Bed arrangements for the main house (3/2.5):
Master Bedroom: A King size
Guest room 1: A queen size
Guest room 2: 2 twin size
Living room: A full size sofa bed

ADU unit bed arrangement: A queen size.
host_about:
Aloha! Thank you for checking us out. 

We have been honored to be the Super Host since 2015.  We have been doing our best to create a clean, comfortable & hospitable place for our guests.  The culture of Hawaii is "Aloha!" - That means, love, respect & life-giving...  We try to apply all of that into our way of hosting.  

Please reach out to us if you have any questions. Mahalo!

Annie & Joy Ohana

description:
Ultimate luxury interiors, custom designs and Italian marble floors throughout

neighborhood_overview:
Resort Highlights
• The Kapalua® Resort is the only low-density resort on Maui
• Ideal destination to escape the crowds and long lines
• Access to a complimentary door-to-door Kapalua® Resort Shuttle
• The resort is home to four award-winning beaches/bays: Kapalua Bay, Oneloa Bay, D.T. Flemings Beach and Honolua Bay
• Two championship golf courses – the PGA’s Plantation Course and The Bay Course
• Eight tennis courts and ten pickleball courts at the Kapalua Tennis Garden
• Numerous award winning restaurants, from casual to high-end
• Two world-class spas – Spa Montage and The Ritz Spa
• Kapalua® Coastal Trail and other hiking trails

Description:
The Ridge features two beautiful, heated swimming pools. Both pool areas feature gas grills, lounge chairs, a location for eating, with tables and chairs, a shower, a soda machine and restrooms. Pool “One” has an additional full kitchen and large covered gathering area, making this a
host_about:
Ridge Realty/Rentals LLC is the oldest, family owned real estate brokerage which specializes in properties at The Kapalua® Resort. For over thirty years we have maintained a solid track record, generating a customer loyalty that is second to none.  

When planning your next Maui dream vacation, do not make the mistake of staying in a hotel, most of which are small, overcrowded and overpriced. Start your vacation off right, and book your stay in one of our affordable spacious properties. All our properties come fully furnished and offer free high speed wireless internet, fully stocked kitchens, a starter supply of towels, soap/shampoo and laundry detergent, plus linens and all the other comforts of home.

Our clientele enjoy personal, around-the-clock service; staff are on-site, 24 hours a day.  Clients deserve the best and we deliver.  Allow our team to enhance your vacation with special touches; we will stock your pantry, arrange a limo service from the airport, or even create that perfect romantic atmosphere, just for your arrival – no matter the request, it is our pleasure the be there for you. We go the extra mile to ensure that your stay with Ridge Realty/Rentals is nothing short of extraordinary. Our number one priority is to accommodate you in creating a personalized, dream vacation that is as much stress free as it is memorable.

Kapalua® is fortunate to be able to claim three, world-class beaches. Kapalua Bay (rated the “number one beach in the world," by Conde Nast), Oneloa Bay and D.T. Fleming Beach are just a quick walk from all of our properties. Do not worry about parking or long drives; the best beaches in the world are just out your door!
All Kapalua® Resort activities and amenities are conveniently located within walking distance from all of our properties.  You do not feel like walking? No problem! The resort's complimentary shuttle will pick you up at your door, and then transport you to anywhere on the resort grounds.

At Ridge Realty/Rentals we feel fortunate to call Maui our home, and want nothing more than to share this beautiful paradise with you. With the warm sand between your toes, the sun upon your face and the soft trade winds at your back, you will discover an island way of living, offering the peaceful simplicity you have been searching for. We take pride in serving each and every one of our clients with the warmth of the Aloha Spirit.
 
Mahalo for your interest and we look forward to seeing you soon!

description:
Nestled amidst lush greenery, this hidden gem offers a serene ambiance and an idyllic setting that will leave you rejuvenated and refreshed. As you step inside, you're greeted by a tastefully decorated interior that blends modern comfort with Hawaiian charm. The open-concept living area provides a cozy space to unwind, with a plush punee (day bed) and a flat-screen TV. Large windows allow natural light to flood the room and offer breathtaking views of the Waianae mountains.

The space
Front yard - Fully fenced and gated yard with privacy bamboo. Outdoor seating area with rugs and umbrella. Nicely appointed private hot-water outdoor shower. There are two dedicated parking spots directly in front of the house for use by guests. If you prefer, you can park within the gated yard (on the gravel) while still leaving room for the host/owner Phil to come and go.

Open-plan living room and kitchen - Punee (day bed), coffee table and chairs, flat screen TV. Dedic
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to Waialua, a slice of paradise on the island of Oahu, Hawaii! This picturesque coastal town is the perfect destination for your dream vacation. With its breathtaking natural beauty, laid-back atmosphere, and rich cultural heritage, Waialua offers an unforgettable experience for every traveler.


Nestled between the lush Waianae Mountains and the sparkling Pacific Ocean, Waialua boasts stunning landscapes that will leave you in awe. From pristine sandy beaches to towering cliffs, Waialua's coastline is a haven for beach lovers and adventure seekers alike.


Surfers will delight in the world-class waves found at famous surf spots such as Haleiwa, where you can catch a ride on the legendary North Shore swells. For those seeking a more relaxed beach experience, Waialua offers quiet stretches of sand where you can soak up the sun, swim in crystal-clear waters, or simply enjoy a peaceful walk along the shore.


Beyond the beaches, Waialua
host_about: Environmental scientist, musician based on Oahu's North Shore. I love to travel and cook.

description:

The space

Relax on the bed with the sliding glass door open and listen to the wind and the birds. I cannot tell you how quiet this place it!
Enjoy the beach gear we provide as well.

Guest access

Parking is included. Just put the parking pass on the dash and use the assigned spot "204", or the "Permit" spots in adjacent lots.

description:

A fully furnished 1 bedroom, 1 bath, covered lanai, fully stocked kitchen, with washer and dryer for all your relaxation needs.

Pool with hot tub and bbq/ pavilion area and parking onsite.

The space

Walk across the street to the Kalepolepo beach park or enjoy views of the ocean and the West Maui Mountains from the comfort of the living room or lanai. This top floor condo is on the second floor, accessible with stairs, providing an ocean view, with more privacy than a bottom floor unit, and extra natural light other units don't have.

COVERED LANAI: BIG

description:
Mahalo for your concern. Sugar Beach Resort is located in South Maui which is unaffected by the August 2023 wildfires. Maui is open and welcoming visitors (with exception of West Maui/Lahaina side). We look forward to seeing you!

Welcome to beautiful Sugar Beach #104

The space
Please note, the pool area is closed annually each September for one week for maintenance. for 2023 the dates are longer, September 11-24, 2023.

In spring 2021 we completed a kitchen remodel - new cabinets, quartz counters, appliances, ceiling fans, paint and some furniture. See newly updated photos.

This is a ground floor one bedroom one bathroom condo in North Kihei's popular oceanfront Sugar Beach Resort. This recently renovated ground-floor Sugar Beach Resort condo is just 50 steps from the beach—and you never have to hassle with an elevator.

We live locally and check the condo between all bookings to make sure it is clean and take care of an
neighborhood_overview:
Sugar Beach Resort is located in North Kihei along 5 mile Sugar Beach. You are centrally located on Maui, 15 minutes from the airport, 5 minutes to Maalaea Harbor (catch a whale watch!), 10 minutes to South Kihei/Wailea, 30 minutes to Lahaina.

You can walk to an ABC store, Ululani's Shave Ice, the Sugar Beach Bakery and a farmer's market. Additionally there are two canoe clubs a short walk away that allow for guest paddlers.
host_about: We are former West Coast dairy farmers who vacationed annually in sunny Kihei (South Maui) from 2004-2009. In 2010 we sold the farm and immigrated to Hawaii. We invested in four vacation rental condos that first year and have been vacation renting on Maui ever since. ~ Cara grew up in Austria and is passionate about baked goods and coffee. She has a business degree from the University of Calgary, but left her budding big city career in 2001 to join Sig on his dairy farm along the West Coast. She has a passion for customer service and helping you experience your best Maui trip! She is your main point of contact through the booking process, researching your stay (ask about her Maui blog with trip ideas!) and communicating throughout your stay. ~ Sig grew up in BC, Canada with a passion for dairy-farming. To this date he subscribes to dairy publications and enjoys going to trade shows, keeping up with advancements in the dairy industry. For many years our farm had one of the top-producing dairy herds in Western Canada working in close partnership with our animal nutritionist and veterinarian (no rBST). He brings his attention to detail and perfectionism to the condos and handles most of our maintenance needs (and all those remodels we’ve done over the years). He checks our condos prior to every check-in, ensuring they are in top condition from both a cleaning and maintenance standpoint. ~ We hope to welcome you to Maui soon! We know you will enjoy your stay in any of our beautiful, well-appointed condos.

description:

neighborhood_overview:
Location, Location, Location! We are in the middle of it all.

Much to see and do in Waikiki. The World’s most famous beach is just two short blocks away. Watch the sunsets from nearly any vantage point along the beach. The nearby neighborhood includes several major hotels and numerous large and small restaurants and nightclubs that cater to every nationality. The Royal Hawaiian Shopping Center and other “World Class Shopping” may be found on Kalakaua Avenue (the street fronting the beach). A few blocks away you will find famous Kapiolani park and the Waikiki Shell, Honolulu Zoo, Diamond Head, golfing and tennis courts. Plus the brand new Foodland just reopened a few blocks down by the International Market Place. Waikiki has it all!

description:
Surrounded by rainforest, this vintage 1600SF log cabin offers one of the most unique experiences on the Big Island of Hawaii. There is nothing else like it anywhere around, bohemian and chic while also rustic and rugged, you can delight your senses in a luxurious feeling outdoor shower lit by tiki torches under the stars and collect fresh eggs from our flock of backyard chickens the next morning (when available).

Other things to note
This is the rainforest. There will be rain. It will be damp. There will probably be some mud. There will be insects. There will be loud coqui frogs, roosters crowing in the morning and the occasional wild pigs. With the rain comes extraordinary plant life and wildlife and the eccentricities of the area are part of its charm. We provide umbrellas, flashlights, laundry services and mosquito repellent. Beyond that, please accept that these are universal features of the environment and beyond our control. If you are uncomfortable with w
neighborhood_overview:
Leilani Estates is a five minute drive to Pahoa Village for groceries, restaurants, and shopping. In the immediate neighborhood is a playground and sports area. Leilani is also the home of Fissure 8, which is on private property so legitimate tours are only available through land owners. I can recommend a respectful tour guide.
Pahoa Village Road - 5 mins
Uncle Robert’s - 13 mins
Kehena black sand beach - 19 mins Poihoiki hot ponds - 27 mins
Hilo - 30 mins
Volcanoes Natnl Park - 50 mins

description:
Aloha Adventure Retreat Between Volcano & Ocean

Private, gated acreage.

Tropical seclusion 5 minutes from highways 11 & 130 - easy access to all the island has to offer.

Craftsman-built rainforest home in a sunny micro-climate -gently kissed by the trade winds breezing up from the ocean.

Tripadvisor certificate of excellence 4 years running

STVR-19-351121/NUC-19-0576

The space
Set in its own private, gated acreage. The perfect location between volcano and ocean.
This is the Big Island of Hawaii at its traditional, easy-paced best in glorious tropical seclusion, yet only 5 minutes from the highways - giving easy access to all the island has to offer.

Local craftsman built eco-friendly home set in its own sunny micro-climate, gently kissed by the trade winds as they make their way up from the ocean.

The entire home is yours with its own laundry, carport and parking.

Tr
neighborhood_overview: Rural subdivision in tropical rainforest/jungle
host_about:
I am Zoë, a Brit blessed to call the Big Island my home. 

Our family has stayed in many vacation rentals over the years, so we determined to set up our rentals embracing the best of our experiences, adding what we found missing, and sprinkling some original ideas into the mix. 

We always ask guests to suggest what could be improved at our rentals, however small - the properties’ constant improvement is entirely due to the excellent suggestions given.

We care about our guests and delight in tailoring the space to make your visit to the Big Island the best it can possibly be. We have stayed in contact with many previous guests, often hosting them many times over the years. We really do have the very best of guests!

A UK-trained psychotherapist and long-time parenting coach, business coach and wellness coach, I work with clients worldwide to increase presence in our daily lives through intensive, focused work to heal unresolved trauma.

Immersed in traditional healing from an early age, I bring healing into all aspects of my life and my work. If you feel you would benefit from one-to-one sessions during your stay, please let me know with as much notice as possible, as my calendar is usually booked a few months ahead.

description:
Private Ohana in beautiful, peaceful, garden atmosphere. Located 5 min drive to Kahakai Park with Gorgeous Ocean Vista View. Queen Size Bed with 32” TV FREE Netflix, HBOMax and more. Microwave, Hot Plate, Toaster Oven, Mini Fridge, and Coffee Maker, Cookware and utensils. Private lanai sitting area, Gas BBQ, plus side burner, and Outdoor sink. description:
The historic John Walker House is located by the pristine white sand beach of Lanikai on the Island of Oahu. With accommodations for up to 14 guests, this recently renovated property provides the most breathtaking views, relaxed comfort and island charm.

Welcome to Walker's Lanikai Beach House. John Walker, was a Scotsman who made his way to Hawaii as a young man in the 1870's to become a contractor of choice to Queen Liliuokalani, and erect such notable buildings as the Bishop Museum ...

The space
...and Honolulu Hale (City Hall).

Mr. Walker's inviting presence is felt in the structure of this, his favorite hideaway on Lanikai Beach. Built in 1934, this enchanting environment transports you back to an era of graceful living, where the worries of the world are lost in the luxury of sea, sand and restful surroundings. Following recent renovations, the house contains just the right combination of added comforts in its updated kitchen, gues
host_about:
We are a licensed, professional property management company operating vacation rentals on Oahu and the Big Island. Our team will meet guests on arrival, provide an orientation to the property, and be available for assistance throughout the stay, if needed.  

We pride ourselves on providing a consistent, high-quality experience no matter which home you choose.  Homes are incredibly well stocked from kitchen items to bath amenities to beach necessities.  Just bring your luggage!  

Many of our listings are at the Four Seasons Hualalai Resort where I worked for 10 years as VP of Marketing.  The Resort continues to be the #1 rated property in Hawaii and is my family's favorite place to visit.  My business partner now runs our Big Island operation while I have relocated to Kailua, Oahu.... another amazing beach destination!  Fabulous restaurants, great beaches, and charming beach- town shops characterize Kailua and we have a great selection of vacation homes in the area.  
We look forward to having you with us!

neighborhood_overview:
Waikoloa Beach is an area located on the South Kohala coast on the island of Hawaii. Approximately 25 minutes north of the Kona International Airport (KOA). The Waikoloa Beach Resort is very family and pedestrian friendly. Most properties are within a 10-15 minute walk (3-5minute drive with ample parking) to ʻAnaehoʻomalu Bay, also known as A-Bay. A-Bay is a shallow water bay located within the resort. ʻAnaehoʻomalu is best known for its sunsets, snorkeling and historic royal fishponds.
The Queens’ MarketPlace and Kings’ Shops provide convenient dining and shopping options.

neighborhood_overview:
Waikoloa, on West Hawaii’s Kohala Coast, is located at the base of Mauna Kea, about 20 minutes north from Kailua-Kona. A resort town and master-planned community, it is known for grand resorts, golf courses and beaches.

Kailua-Kona, which is known locally as “Kona,” is warm and sunny. Historically, Hawaiian royalty lived here because of the ideal weather. The first missionaries who arrived in Hawaii built homes and churches here. Today Kailua-Kona is a major seaport for the island.

Waikoloa Village offers a restaurant, a full size grocery store and a bank - all within a short 3 minute drive from the home

Following parks are in close by:
Hawaii Volcanoes National Park
Pu’uhonua o Honaunau National Historical Park
Hapuna State Beach Park (BEST ONE! Get a tan, go snorkelling, watch the plentiful honu (sea turtles))

neighborhood_overview: Maui’s unique and varied terrain offers a multitude of activities. From relaxing on some of the world’s most beautiful white sand beaches to the more adventurous undertakings of zip-lining and paragliding. Kihei Bay Vista's location is such that there are many activities and attractions right at your finger tips. Some of Maui’s top attractions are: Maalaea Harbor; many boats leave from Maalaea on snorkeling trips, deep sea fishing, scuba diving, whale watching (in season), sunset cruises, and more. It is much faster to leave from Maalaea Harbor than Lahaina Harbor when taking trips to Molokini Crater and Turtle Town. Other attractions include Maui Ocean Center, Haleakala Volcano, Shops at Wailea, Iao Valley, Wailea Golf Club, King Kamehameha Golf Club, Maui Tropical Plantation, and the Whale Sanctuary. description:
Our place is in the Princeville Resort facing the Golf Course which has wonderful trade winds from the Ocean and is reasonably priced. It is also with in walking distance to the Princeville Shopping Center. Where you will find Groceries, Hardware store, Beauty Shop, Lappets Ice Cream Store and Restaurants.

The space
Our Condo is equipped with a full Kitchen and bath that sleeps two has a King Bed, towels, linens, Beach chairs and Beach towels with a Private entrance and free Parking There is a blue and black bottom Pool for your use also. The unit has a view of the Princeville Golf Course which is rated #1 in Hawaii by Golf Digest Magazine. It does not have air conditioning but has great trade wind breezes.
You will be central to all North Shore Beaches on Kauai. You can take a trail from the Condo and walk to Anni beach. Hanalei Bay is about a seven minute drive to miles of beautiful sandy beaches.
The Condo has only 26 units and is very quiet. The Pri
neighborhood_overview: Come and see why Kauai is called the Garden Island. The scenery is stunning, it's natural beauty is breath taking. Located in the beautiful Princeville Resort. The Condo has only 26 units with free parking and over looks looks the Princeville Golf Course which gives it a feeling of seclusion. It's located on the second floor and furnished for your comfort. There is a King size Bed, full kitchen with laundry, and large screen TV. Hanalei is only a 7 minute drive to some awesome secluded beaches. Or you can walk to Anini beach which has great snorkeling. If you love adventure there is Surfing, Kayaking in the Ocean or navigating the Rivers. It has some of the best hiking trails, you can climb to an upland swamp, descend into a deep valley in the canyon, hike to a hidden waterfall or walk along the steep cliffs of the Na Pali Coast. For active outdoorsy travelers Kauai is heaven on earth.

The space

This 2 story, 2 bedroom plus loft, beautiful beach front condo comes with all the comforts of home including WI-FI, three flat screen TV’s, a closet full of beach accessories, everything you will need in the kitchen to cook delicious meals and more.Newly remodeled with new appliances, granite counter tops and custom bamboo cabinets, new berber carpet upstairs, new tropical themed travertine tile floor, new paint throughout and adorned with local art on every wall. Ideal for families or groups, this condo sleeps 8 with twin beds downstairs, pull out living room couch, pull out love seats in loft and new King pillow top bed upstairs, all with tropical themed soft bedding.With breathtaking ocean views from the living room and both bedrooms, you will easily soak up all the beauty of the island and wake up watching the boats ventur
host_about:
The complex is located directly across from Kamaole III State Beach Park, which is known as one of the most beautiful and safest beaches in the Islands.  It is perfect for swimming, snorkeling, sunning, jogging, picnicking, kite flying, and especially enjoying amazing sunsets and whale watching.

Each unit has a private lanai that faces the interior of the complex, offering views of the expansive lawns, pools, and lush tropical landscape of palm trees, hibiscus, birds of paradise and plumeria trees.  Most lanais also offer views of the beautiful Pacific Ocean and spectacular sunsets.  

There are two pools, a covered pavilion, and a full size tennis court on the property.  Every evening the outdoor barbecue area is a popular spot to socialize while grilling the perfect dinner and watching as the Hale Kamaole conch shell band performs their nightly sunset ritual.

You will find world class golf courses, fantastic snorkeling and diving, many Maui activities, abundant shopping and delicious fine and family dining all within minutes of Hale Kamaole.

Honokowai is a special Maui neighborhood. A place where residents wave and say Aloha passing on the street. There is a Farmers Market (my favorite for fresh organic local produce) with a vegan deli, a large Times grocery, a food truck park and several eateries all in walking distance. There are places
neighborhood_overview:
Honokowai is a special Maui neighborhood. A place where residents wave and say Aloha passing on the street. There is a Farmers Market (my favorite for fresh organic local produce) with a vegan deli, a large Times grocery, a food truck park and several eateries all in walking distance. There are places to rent a bicycle, moped, fishing gear and snorkel gear all within walking distance..
To the south of the property is Honua Kai Beach, one of Maui's prettiest sugar sand beaches and a 5 minute walk away (you can drive if you are packing a bunch of gear, there is ample parking). To the north is Honokowai Beach Park, with a smaller but lovely sandy beach and playground for the keiki (kids). There are several beaches within a 15 minute drive for snorkeling, surfing or picnicking, and historic Lahaina Town is a 10 minute drive south.

description:
Picture yourself in paradise, a spacious top floor 1 bedroom 2 bath condo with expansive living/dining area. Step out onto a double-wide tiled lanai with beautiful ocean & mountain views. We are in the most quiet & private building in the back of the White Sands Village complex, right across from Magic Sands Beach, the only white sand swimming beach in Kona. You are far from traffic noise and next to a natural preserve. Wake to the sounds of parrots and other wild birds.

The space
Please read the whole description, especially the "Other Things To Note" section at the bottom. Ours was originally a thousand square foot two bedroom apartment. It was converted to one bedroom in order to double the living room / dining room space. It will feel large compared to many other units.

You'll have no stairs to negotiate - your covered parking space is right by the elevator which lets you off right near your front door.

At day's end, watch a
neighborhood_overview:
We truly believe this is the best place to be based on the whole island - that's why we bought here. Snorkeling among the hundreds of colorful exotic fish in the calm waters at Kahaluu Beach Park, only a mile south, is grand for both novices and the more experienced alike. Waves break just right at the north end of the park, making it a perfect location to learn how to surf under the guidance of local instructors.

Keauhou Shopping Center which hosts KTA Supermarket, Longs Drug, Regal Movie Theaters and many smaller shops and restaurants is only another mile south.

Kona Country Club's top notch golf courses are open to the public and are also only 2 miles away. Keauhou Bay, also in the same area is the launching point for many water based tours and activities on the Kona Coast. Downtown Kailua-Kona with its many attractions is only a little over three miles north. And you must visit Gypsea Gelato, which we believe has the best gelato outside of Europe, in
host_about: We are Bob (71), Jan (75) and our son and daughter-in law Drew (48)  & Janet(41).   We all love the Big Island. We particularly enjoy swimming and playing in the waves.  We love our condo and are pleased to be able to share it with others.   We are quiet, friendly and always have the best interests of others at heart.   As a host, we want to make sure you have an absolutely delightful visit, since we feel that way every time WE stay there!

description:
Mauna Kea Sunrise Villa at KaMilo provides a perfect setting for your Hawaii getaway and is designed for gatherings of up to 10 people and is provides an upscale, relaxing, luxurious and well-equipped home for your Hawaiian vacation. Fully furnished with beautiful finishes, Mauna Kea Sunrise Villa has sunning views of lush Hawaiian gardens with massive Mauna Kea mountain in the background.  This home is sure to be a delightful spot for your family gathering.

The space
Fast WiFi with great coverage included!

We know our Guests look forward to an exceptional experience from the moment you start planning your Big Island vacation. We’ve incorporated all of our vacationing experiences from Hawaii and around the world, to ensure you have an exceptional stay. Staying in the Mauna Lani Resort also means you get free access to the Mauna Lani Beach Club during your stay!

We love friends & families!

Big Island is such a wonderful place to sp
neighborhood_overview: KaMilo is a high end gated community with lush gardens and an amazing 2 acre  recreation center  with family pool, adult lap pool, spas and fitness center that rival the best of the hotels.
host_about: Jeff & Suzanne have been hosting guests in their luxury vacation rentals on the Big Island of Hawaii for the past several years.   Their company Paradise in Hawaii Luxury Homes consists of a large team of passionate, dedicated individuals focused on helping guests have amazing holidays.    From the initial three homes to now over forty (40) homes all equipped to the same high standards they have never lost their attention to detail.     While they have added team members they remain directly involved with each and every guest.    They treat every guest like their trip to Hawaii is their life long dream fulfilled.   They love being part of helping families create amazing memories.  Come try the Paradise in Hawaii experience!

description:
Located in the heart of Waikiki's resort district, we are surrounded by some of the world's best shopping, dining and entertainment!

Perched above Waikiki, this 1,300 sq. ft. penthouse, budget-friendly unit with incredible views is one of only a few in Hawaii!

Share the spirit of aloha while enjoying the warm breezes, sun sand and surf at famous Waikiki Beach, just one block away!

We welcome you to enjoy all that Hawaii has to offer while taking comfort in all of the conveniences of home!

Registration number
260040120000, TA-126-512-4351-01
neighborhood_overview: Located in the heart of Waikiki's Resort District!
host_about:
Located in the heart of wonderful Waikiki, Royal Hawaiian Hospitality operates dozens of vacation units surrounded by some of the world's best shopping, dining and entertainment!

Just a block from the famous Waikiki Beach, we invite you to enjoy the warm sea breezes, the sun, sand and surf all while relaxing  in our condos that offer the comforts and conveniences of home!

We welcome you to share in the spirit of aloha while creating memories for life!

description:
Spectacular ocean views from every room. Perfect beach or swimming, snorkeling and sunbathing. This deluxe penthouse has 2-bedrooms + 2.5 baths that can accommodate 8 guests. $550 per night for 4 guests. (extra $30 per night per person.)This penthouse features an open-concept kitchen, a large dining/living room, and 2 dedicated work spaces for "remote workers". This spacious 2,000 sf corner unit has something for everyone! Inquire about discounted rates and dates to meet your vacation needs.

The space
This deluxe penthouse is the largest condo in the complex and it has several balconies with ocean views. Luxury furnishings, comfortable beds, and ocean views from every room. Customize your space to meet your needs with 2 different floor-plan choices. The condo can be rented as a 2 bedroom 2.5 bath, or as a 1 bedroom 1.5 bath unit. The condo has 2 large bedrooms upstairs, and a deluxe kitchen, dining, and grand living room downstairs. This condo can accommodate up
neighborhood_overview: The building is located in a  tropical, rural part of the island on a "secret beach". The airport, Waikiki, and Honolulu are 30 miles away going south. World-famous surfing beaches and Oahu's North Shore are 10 miles away, along a scenic shoreline. The Polynesian Cultural Center is about 5 miles north. At this time, the daily rate is discounted 20%  because the building is currently undergoing major renovations, but no construction is going on inside your condo or on the beachside of the building.
host_about: Aloha, I live in Honolulu, about 1 hour away from this pretty, sandy beach, known as Punaluu. Besides my listings in Punaluu, I also have other rentals around the island, so please inquire about my other units too. All of my rental units are either oceanfront or have ocean views and they are priced well to fit any budget from economy studios to luxury penthouses.  I hope you find what you're looking for, and have"Happy Travels", wherever you go!

description:
Konea 734 boasts one of the most sought-after 2 bedroom floor plans at Honua Kai. This corner layout offers a massive 450+ sq. ft. balcony and offers gorgeous Pacific Ocean and West Maui Mountain views.

The space
Maui Resort Rentals is proud to offer another incredible brand new listing now taking reservations for June of 2021 and beyond!

Konea 734 is a luxurious 7th floor two bedroom suite offering a private corner location and boasting gorgeous views of the Pacific Ocean and West Maui Mountains.

The generous 1230 sq. ft. interior offers plenty of space to gather, reconnect, and celebrate. Each bedroom offers a sumptuous king-size bed and a queen sofa-sleeper in the living room brings the total sleeping capacity to 6. In addition, Konea 734 is one of the very few 2 bedroom suites to feature ocean views that extend right into the master bedroom!

You will have plenty of space to stretch out and relax in the refreshing Maui ou
host_about:
The Ohana (Family) at Maui Resort Rentals has been helping vacationers "Make Maui Reality" for over 50 cumulative years on the shores of West Maui.  Inspired by the Maui lifestyle, we aim to provide incredible vacation experiences at a curated collection of premier resort residences.

For your convenience, our warehouse and offices are located in Kaanapali North Beach, just minutes from all of the West Maui resorts.

Our Ritz-Carlton and Marriott trained staff are here to serve. Your guest experience is our highest priority. The privilege to host your precious Maui vacation is ours. 

As an added benefit, our exclusive Maui Resort Rentals courtesy shuttle offers free guest transportation between our West Maui resorts a number of West Maui locations - including Lahaina, Kapalua, and Whaler's Village.

www.airbnb.com/p/mauiresortrentals

description:
This lovely, Hawaiian inspired, 2 bedroom 2 bathroom condo has everything you need to enjoy the beautiful island of Maui! Take a swim across the street at Kamaole Beach park and dry off on your private lanai while you take in the lush gardens that Kamaole Sands provides. This unit provides all the comforts of home: a convenient and well-stocked kitchen, updated furniture and decor, comfortable living area, a large flat screen TV, and complimentary WiFi.

Registration number
390040040275, TA-017-599-8464-01
neighborhood_overview: Kamaole Sands Resort is located across the street from Kamaole III Beach, a perfect beach for swimming, snorkeling, sunbathing, and spotting sea turtles! It is close to many shops, restaurants, and grocery stores. Located in South Kihei, this resort is close to many of Maui's top 10 beaches, such as Wailea Beach and Makena Beach. Kamaole Sands has 15 acres of tropical grounds that features four tennis courts, an expansive pool area with wading pool, two spas, exercise facility, and BBQ/outdoor dining area.
host_about:
We run a professional property management company, Great Rentals On Maui, since 2007.

Kelli is licensed real estate broker for Maui Kama'aina Real Estate and Micheal holds an active Hawaii real estate license. We consider it an honor to be able to help others plan their Hawaiian vacation to this beautiful island and consider ourselves so lucky to call Maui home. We've also assisted many with finding their very own vacation home on Maui!

Some of our favorite things to do on Maui:  Snorkel with the turtles (honu) at Turtle Town, Stand-up paddle  (especially during Whale Season when we get to enjoy the awe-inspiring presence of the Humpback Whales during their migration), Maui sunsets, and hanging out with friends and family at our favorite South Maui beaches.

Don't hesitate to ask us about our favorite dining establishments and activities!

description:
Come see Kilauea put on a show!! Boutique apartment suite in Volcano, Hawaii. New construction. Relax on private lanai, listen to rare birds, and luxuriate in oversized spa shower. Memory foam mattress. 3 minutes to entrance of Volcano National Park. Kitchenette. Private entry.

Parlo Italiano!

The space
Independent apartment suite has own lanai, bedroom, kitchenette, and spa shower room with stone floor and limestone bench.

The House in the Clouds is a serene escape and the antidote to worn out, overstuffed vaction rentals. Relax in a carefully curated space. The suite is a completely reconfigured design in a newly constructed house. Every detail, each fixture and finish has been chosen to harmonize with the design as a whole. Luxurious materials and furnishings include tiled breakfast area and shower, stainless steel appliances, 9 foot ceilings, memory foam mattress with down duvet and leather headboard, and blonde rattan furn
neighborhood_overview:
Quiet neighborhood in the Hawaiian rainforest. The suite is set amongst giant tree ferns (Hapu'u) and red - flowered ohia trees which are filled with native birds. 3 minutes to Hawaii Volcanoes National Park.

The Big Island of Hawaii has something for everyone, from snow skiing to snorkelling. This island has active volcanoes, the world's highest mountain (Mauna Kea, measured from the ocean floor), and 10 of 15 climate zones. Use Volcano as your base and decide each day what climate you want, and then simply drive to that part of the island. Of course, there is lots to do in Volcano, so plan to spend several days. People who spend only one night usually wish they had stayed longer!

Volcano is home to some of the last existing Hawaiian rainforest, and this virgin landscape surrounds The House in the Clouds. Our trees and ferns are filled with endemic Hawaiian birds like elepaio and apapane.
host_about: I have travelled to dozens of countries and lived all over the world but have chosen the special atmosphere of Volcano to make my home.  I love Italian cooking, espresso, and all things Italian ( e parlo Italiano).  My latest passion is outrigger canoe paddling,  the state sport of Hawaii!

description:
TA-038-749-9520-01 Stay at what our neighbors call “The Painted Castle” or "The Manorhouse" at Orchid Isle Manor; former home of local artist Stephanie Bolton, designed by the celebrated architect Skip Goodell.

The space
This is a hosted rental

THE MANORHOUSE
This is an old quirky eclectic three level home with spiral staircase and tall ceilings on a serene 5 acre estate in the Kona Coffee country. It has a big country kitchen fun for cooking meals together, a library/game room, a sunset dining lanai for up to 12 people and living room with wood burning fireplace.

ORCHID ISLE MANOR
The Manorhouse is just one building among others on this property. The homeowners and their children reside here as well, creating artwork and teaching classes. A movement studio is on site where guests may enjoy some of movement classes if they wish (some other classes may be private or open to join at the teacher's fee) or you can rent this spac
neighborhood_overview:
Holualoa Artists’ Village
Kona Coffee Country
Kailua-Kona
West side Hawai’i Island
Kona- Kohala Coast

Don’t let the name “Big Island” fool you- our island is very small, you can drive around the entire island in less than a day. Nothing is very far away & you can save money in cleaning fees by picking a home base & taking day trips to see all the sites!

Nearest airport:
20 minutes to/from KOA airport

Opposite side of island:
1.5 hours to/from Hilo

Furthest away:
2 hours to/from Volcano or Waipio Valley (easy day trip from our house with fun stops along the drive)
host_about: Aloha!  I’m a dancer, writer, artist, and occasional mermaid …as well as the mistress of The Manor.  I have grown up on the Big Island of Hawaii (the Orchid Isle) and studied Fine Art in California & Italy.  I’ve studied dance in Turkey & Egypt and also became certified to teach yoga in Morocco.   I also really enjoy Latin Dance & archery.

description:
The north shore dream! Perfect launch point for Hana, Haleakala or Kite/Wing surfing!

The space
This is a sweet third floor WALK-UP apartment that is my Maui dream manifest into reality. I love being here and sharing it with others. The apartment is a perfect place to chill after a day of enjoying the North Shore winds (kite/wing/surf), Haleakala, or before/after the road to Hana. I have the kitchen stocked with close to everything you may need to cook, but not bake (no oven yet). The stove is convection. There is a milk frothier, pour-over coffee supplies, and blender and various kitchen tools.

Guest access
There is an assigned parking stall associated with the unit. There is NO elevator. You will need to be willing and able to walk up the stairs to the third floor.

Other things to note
The apartment is in Kuau Plaza building on the third floor next to Hana Hwy. Two issues: (1) there is NO elevator - it is a walk-u
neighborhood_overview:
Kuau Store is half a block away and has basic groceries, poke, beer, ice, and take-out breakfast and sandwiches. Mama’s Fish House is directly behind the condo (just cross the lawn and go out the back gate).

The small beach in front of Mama’s has public access from a path described when you check into the unit. The beach is protected by a reef and is practically a natural swimming pool.
host_about: Fun professional person who loves adventures of all sorts.

description:
Next availability Sept 30th - Oct 10th

An upscale villa, in the prime location, with one of the prettiest views at our resort. With its boutique hotel feel, spacious unobstructed ocean views and beachy style, it's the perfect accommodation for a family or two couples. Our beach bar, along with the golf course, marina, shops, restaurants and luau, are all within walking distance of our home.

Resort living at it’s finest. Welcome to our home in the Islands, and your home away from home.

The space
Unique features of this villa include the top floor, front of the building location and the multiple lanais off of the master, guest bedroom and living area.

This villa also has no neighbors on two sides allowing for additional privacy.

We look forward to welcoming you back for a healthy and restorative experience.

BEDDING
Sleeping options include a king master bedroom; two twins or a king bed in the guest bedro
neighborhood_overview: Drive through the gates of our resort and immediately feel the calm come over you as you leave the hustle and bustle of the world behind. Waikiki, the North Shore, Honolulu, the great shopping and restaurants are all here on Oahu, but once you arrive at the resort, it feels like you went to one of the outer islands like Maui or Kauai. The best of both worlds.
host_about:
Homeowner hosts who are here for you when you need us. Not a rental agency.

Alfred grew up on the North Shore of Oahu, (great surfing destination in the Winter) and enjoys sharing tips of things to do and out of the way spots to visit. Our family, Alfred, wife Deanna, and sister Nadia look forward to welcoming your family to our home in the Islands. Nadia lives one exit away and will be greeting you upon your arrival for check-in and will help you to get acquainted with your villa. We are all available to assist answering questions or if you require anything throughout your stay. Alfred & Deanna

Our family looks forward to welcoming your family to our home in the Islands.

Mahalo and Aloha!

description:
Welcome to Hale Kope Kai by Gather! Step into paradise and stay in this luxurious oceanfront residence in Kailua-Kona. This custom-built, two-bedroom, and two-and-a-half-bathroom home boasts stunning views of the Pacific Ocean and can comfortably accommodate five guests.

The space
This exquisite home offers the perfect space for socializing with friends and family, thanks to its high vaulted ceilings and open-concept living room. You can relax on the couch in front of a large flat-screen tv or invite everyone into the kitchen that boasts beautiful granite countertops and an oversized island.

Soak in the stunning Kona sunsets each evening while you step onto the picturesque lanai and drift between indoor and outdoor living. Enjoy cooking dinner on the barbecue grill and taking in the breathtaking view while dining at the oceanfront pool table.

Relax in the main bedroom, featuring a luxurious king-size bed with air conditioning and a flat-scre
host_about: Gather with us! Gather Vacation Rentals is the leading luxury property manager in the US. Gather was founded in 2005 and our properties reflect our high standards of excellence. With over 400 professionally managed luxury homes available for vacation rentals, we are committed to making sure that our vacation clients experience the very best in quality, delivery, and outstanding service Our Vacation Rental Management Team reflects our high standards of excellence.
