description:
Large 3 Bedroom Condo - Kahana Resort 4B2

The space
Take in ocean views on Kahana Beach!

Stay in air-conditioned comfort as all rooms have their own window air conditioning unit. You will enjoy the newly painted condo with updated furnishings, artwork, new plumbing, and light fixtures. Tile and hardwood floors downstairs with carpet upstairs in master/loft bedroom. Each vacationer will enjoy a flat-screen TV in their room.

The condo is located 5 steps up from ground level and one floor up to the entrance of this condo. The condo has no elevators. There is one parking stall assigned to the unit. *10 night minimum stay required Dec 11 thru Jan 10 |

Other things to note
Nearby Beaches to Kahana Outrigger:
1. Kahekili Beach Park (Airport Beach): generally calm conditions, excellent snorkeling and swimming, public restrooms, BBQ grills, and a large grassy area.
2, Honokowai Beach Park: great for snorkeling
host_about:
Chase ‘N Rainbows (CNR) Real Estate, Inc. is a Maui-based company with two divisions: vacation rental management and real estate sales. For the past twenty years, CNR has been offering visitors and Kama’aina alike, affordable and luxury accommodations at a very competitive price. All of its vacation rental units are carefully selected, meticulously inspected, attractively furnished and well maintained to the highest standards. CNR is committed to providing the finest product and unsurpassed personalized service in the industry. These condominiums come highly recommended by leisure, business, and family travelers with distinctive tastes. A significant number of satisfied, return guests speak for the company’s service commitment and quality product. Chase ‘N Rainbows is a proud member of the Hawaii Visitors & Convention Bureau (HVCB), The American Society of Travel Agents (ASTA), Maui Visitors Bureau (MVB), Hawaii Association of Realtors, Maui Chamber of Commerce, and Vacation Rental Managers Association (VRMA).

*Please note we are a licensed and bonded professional management company and we DO NOT advertise on Craigs List 

Follow this link to view all listings we manage on West Maui:
https://www.airbnb.com/users/118578746/listings

description:
Situated in the famed oceanside neighborhood of Portlock on a rare double-sized ocean lot, this Hawaii Kai vacation rental home provides the ultimate in privacy and accommodations for your large group. Multiple estate structures surround a tropical courtyard and 1,000-square-foot swimming pool. From its prime location on Maunalua Bay, the home allows guests to enjoy calm shores and panoramic views of incredible sunsets, Diamond Head, Koko Head, and Waikiki, including dazzling fireworks every

Other things to note
Explore the Most Exclusive Vacation Rentals In Hawaii. Choose From 300+ Properties. Top-Rated, Professionally Cleaned & Managed, and Fully Furnished. Your Vacation Awaits!

description:
Welcome to koolkondo where you will experience luxury vacation rentals at its finest. Our stylish boutique hotel style condos and homes have it all. You will absolutely enjoy your home away from home with VIP concierge style services in modern island luxury!
Koolkondo is proud to present to you The Compound- a unique private estate experience. This stunning property has four separate homes located on a generous lot with a private yard and a shared community pool with all our Koolkondo guests at two other locations! Our prime location is in the heart of sunny Poipu, and is less than 500 yards from Brennecke's Beach! It's the perfect property to book for your small wedding or family reunion.

Our gorgeous estate consists of a large main house called The Ohana - an original plantation home with five bedrooms and four bathrooms and 3 two bedroom, one bath bungalows. The Ohana House is roughly 2,500 sq. feet and the other three bungalows are roughly 1,000 sq. feet each. Th
host_about:
Welcome to koolkondo! We have the most modern Hawaiian luxury homes and condos in Poipu Beach Kauai and perfect Getaways in Malibu Beach, CA. Along with our VIP Customer service and professional management, you will enjoy every second of your stay with us at any one of our luxury properties! 

Every unit is designer furnished and fully stocked with everything you will need to enjoy and relax like being at your own home. Quality vacations and experiences at its finest.

description:
Mapu Place is a bright spacious 3-bedroom with large loft home in Princeville. Its open floor plan and vaulted ceilings gives a large welcoming feeling. There are wood floors throughout the great room and bedrooms. The bathrooms and kitchen have lovely travertine tile. There are ceiling fans throughout the house including in the kitchen and master bathroom. All counter tops are granite. This is truly an executive house. TA-103-933-1328-03

The space
The master suite is on the far side of the house giving it privacy. Through this bedroom you will find the master bathroom with his and her sinks but also his and her shower heads in the large open shower. The two other rooms contain a king size bed and Cal King bed in the third room. A bathroom that has a Jacuzzi tub joins the two rooms.
The kitchen is one of the many highlights of the home. The large island has a double sink, dishwasher and wine refrigerator. There is a gas stove with an electric o
neighborhood_overview: This is a cute family neighborhood in Princeville Kauai.  There is a shopping center 1 miles away with a grocery store, gas station, restaurants and shops.  It is a mile and a half walk to the top of the ocean cliff.  Public stairs take you to a breath taking view and snorkeling beach.
host_about: I am a resident of Kauai.  I purchased two vacation rental 10 minutes away from our house as college investments for our two children.  We love living in Hawaii and are very happy to share that experience with visitors.

description:
South Maui is open! Mana Kai 608 sits oceanfront, on the border of Wailea and South Kihei. Our remodel is designed with a modern surf vibe in mind, we are excited to share it with you!

If you enjoy the amenities of Wailea's 5-star resorts but crave a kitchen, less fees, or don't want to cross the street or drive to get to a beach, come stay with us! We have hired the best Property Manager in Maui, Tracy O'Reilly to take care of our guests.

The space
Hawaii holds a special place in the hearts of everyone. We are deeply saddened by the devastating impacts to Maui, the local residents, and our visitors from the recent wildfires in Lahaina.

Mana Kai 608 is located on the border of Wailea and Kihei in "South Maui". It is not located in an area near Lahaina, it is 45 minutes south of Lahaina. The pool and beaches are open as are the restaurants and grocery stores. Activities are all still operating. Fortunately, this area was unaffected by any w
neighborhood_overview:
You will be mere minutes away from other 5-star resorts and additional great beaches, restaurants, shopping, and ocean activities. Mana Kai Resort is located directly on Keawakapu Beach and is definitely considered one of the best beaches in all of Maui and on the entire Wailea coastline.

The Kihei boat ramp is one block away. There are numerous snorkel and dive excursions that launch from this popular boat ramp every single morning offering options that include exploring the coral reefs at Molokini or swimming with the turtles at Turtle Town.

Nearby beach options are also plentiful. Kamaole Beach Parks I, II, and III are great for families as the waves are usually fairly gentle plus there are lifeguards seven days a week. Ulua Beach in Wailea is just minutes away and is also one of the most popular snorkeling and scuba diving beaches on the south side of the island. If you are looking for big waves, Big Beach (or Makena State Park) is about a 10 minute driv
host_about:
Aloha from Maui!

Congratulations on your decision to book a vacation in sunny Maui, Hawaii; the #1 island in the world for over 25 years.  :)

I would be honored to help you choose accommodations in Maui that fit your needs, desires, and budget. 

As a full-time resident on Maui for over 15 years, I am very familiar with all that this wonderful Island has to offer.  I absolutely love my job as both an owner and property manager of vacation rentals on Maui.  The fact that I get to help others plan their Hawaiian vacation and/or relocation to the magical island of Maui is literally the icing on top of the cupcake!

If you are wanting to purchase property on Maui, I am a licensed realtor in the State of Hawai'i, own a property management company in Maui, and am also a certified Home Staging Expert.  I would love to speak with you and answer any questions you might have about vacation rentals on Maui.

In addition to managing lots of amazing properties directly across the street from the awesome, sun kissed beaches of south Maui, I am also the proud owner of my own vacation rentals.   The condos I own are called Tracy’s Tropical Treasures.  They are listed on Airbnb as Tracy's Tropical Treasure #1 (Ocean View), Tracy's Tropical Treasure #2 (Corner Penthouse), Tracy's Tropical Treasure #3 (Ocean View), and my newest addition, Paradise Awaits You! Tracy's Tropical Treasure #4 (Ocean View, Central A.C., and double pane windows, so no road noise inside the condo).  *Tracy’s Tropical Treasure #3 and Paradise Awaits You! Tracy's Tropical Treasure #4 both house up to 4 guests.  :)

Tracy’s Tropical Treasures were Named the #1 Vacation Rentals in all of Maui in 2016.

In November, 2019, I was RANKED #1 again.  ;)

In July of 2022, I was ranked #1 in Kihei for the fourth time.

I have worked very hard for these achievements and on every single occasion, it was one of the best days of my life when I received confirmation that I had won the award.  

I look forward to speaking with you, helping you with your Maui vacation/relocation, and sharing my ALOHA spirit.  I have been in the hospitality industry for over 25 years, and it's really how I choose to live my life.  Pampering guests is my #1 priority!  

* With well over 1000 bookings on the 4 rentals I personally own, I am extremely proud and take great pride in the fact that I have so many wonderful reviews.  Please feel free to check out all the reviews on Airbnb for the proof.   Customer Service is very important to me!

I am also very proud that I have been with Airbnb since 2009 and have also been a "SUPERHOST” since the program was created.  In July of 2022, I earned Superhost status for the 33rd consecutive time.  

Airbnb is, without a doubt, the BEST vacation rental platform of all!  

When Airbnb was first created, I was one of only eight listings in all of Maui.  My claim to fame is that Brian Chesky, himself, actually called me.  Brian is one of the three Airbnb founders.  Back then, I had also listed my car on Airbnb, and Brian said I was the first person to ever list a car on his platform.  He thought it was interesting, and we had a very nice telephone conversation.

By the end of 2020, Maui had over 18,000 vacation rental listings.  The Airbnb platform has grown exponentially.  I am truly honored to be a part of it all; both as an owner and as a property manager and will continue to tell everyone how wonderful Airbnb is for hosts and travelers alike.

Everybody, no matter where they are, can live ALOHA.  Maui is a great way to unlock the positive spirit within all of us.....

Make it a great day!
Tracy O'Reilly R(S)
~ Owner of Tracy’s Tropical Treasures #1 through #4 (these are my personal vacation rentals which were Named the #1 Vacation Rentals in all of Maui for both 2016 and 2019, and then named #1 in Kihei in July of 2022 for the fourth time)
~ Hawai’i Realtor 
(Licensed on all Islands)
License #73694
~ Property Manager/Island Contact for other vacation rentals in South Maui

description:
Come enjoy yourself at our Kihei Akahi gem! Our gorgeous, completely remodeled 655 sq ft condo is located on the 4th floor and is quiet & tranquil. You will love the fresh, open floor-plan of this unit, tiled throughout and embellished with tasteful Hawaiian décor.

Envision yourself savoring your favorite local fruits on your own private lanai. Kihei Akahi is located in the heart of Kihei, directly across from Kamaole Beach II. The complex offers two swimming pools, a tennis court and BBQ.

The space
***AS OF JULY 2023: BRAND NEW SPLIT AC SYSTEM THROUGHOUT THE PROPERTY IN BOTH THE LIVING ROOM AND BEDROOM. YOU'LL SURELY FEEL ULTRA COOL***

Come let us take your breath away as you soak in the mountain, garden and peek-a-boo ocean views from your own private lanai in this 1 bedroom, 1 bath condo. Have a wonderful night's rest after an eventful or relaxing day in your Cal-King bed!

Relax in harmony as you revel in the Maui breezes
neighborhood_overview: Kihei Akahi is located directly across from one of Maui's best beaches, Kamaole II. It is within walking distance of the Kihei Boat Ramp (a great place to experiences various water activities), restaurants, shops, farmers markets and more. Maui’s unique and varied terrain offers a multitude of activities. From relaxing on some of the world’s most beautiful white sand beaches to the more adventurous undertakings of zip-lining and paragliding. Kihei Akahi's location is such that there are many activities and attractions right at your finger tips. Some of Maui’s top attractions are: Maalaea Harbor; many boats leave from Maalaea on snorkeling trips, deep sea fishing, scuba diving, whale watching (in season), sunset cruises, and more. It is much faster to leave from Maalaea Harbor than Lahaina Harbor when taking trips to Molokini Crater and Turtle Town. Other attractions include Maui Ocean Center, Haleakala Volcano, Shops at Wailea, Iao Valley, Wailea Golf Club, King Kamehameha Golf Club, M

description:
Come enjoy 42 acres of wild, natural beauty, and the state of Hawaii's largest privately accessible waterfall at the Inn at Kulaniapia Falls.

Our Lehua Room has a queen size bed, private bathroom, and you can hear the falls with the window open.

Breakfast and light housekeeping is included with your stay. Experiences like a chefs table dinner, cooking class, and waterfall rappelling are available, for an additional charge.

The space
The Lehua Room is in our Harmony House, which has a total of 6 rooms. You will have access to a refrigerator, microwave and coffee maker, but the shared kitchen may not be used for cooking.

Guest access
Kulaniapia Falls is a 42 acre property just about 15 minutes from downtown Hilo. There are miles of nature trails, and a natural farm on property. When river conditions are safe, you may swim, kayak, and paddleboard under the falls.

description:

Surf, BBQ, or just lounge and enjoy the best that Poipu has to offer - all in your backyard!
Unit 159 at Kiahuna Plantation Resort is a ground floor, ocean view unit located just 100 yards from the beach.
Your backyard is the Great Lawn which leads right to the white sands of Poipu Beach. BBQ grills, beach chairs and the beach rental hut are all at your fingertips.

It doesn't get better than this, book today!

The space
Kiahuna 159 is a renovated, modern luxury 1 BR / 1 BA condo sleeps 4 and offers an ocean view and direct access to the great lawn and Poipu beach.

The sandy beach is only a 30 second walk away. Enjoy unparalleled access to the beach as if it were your own backyard.

host_about:
The Outrigger Way

Developed in 1993 with Hawaiian scholar and historian Dr. George Kanahele, the Ke 'Ano Wa'a process was designed to advance the company's corporate culture and fundamental business strategies. The values-based process intricately connected three core elements of the hospitality industry:

HOST + GUEST + PLACE

It also deepened Outrigger's understanding and appreciation of the local host culture, a distinct hospitality style that is recognized across the globe.

neighborhood_overview: Waialua is on the southern side of Haleiwa, about 5 mins drive or 10-15mins ride on the bike path. Luckily we do not suffer the suffocating traffic that is experienced from Haleiwa north to Waimea/Sunsets most days between 12-5pm.  This side does not see the tourism of the Waimea/Sunsets area, so everything is a lot quieter, with no traffic in the residential suburb with a very quiet beach a few mins walk away.
host_about:
Hi, we are an international couple, we're well traveled with us both living internationally for many years. We now live and enjoy a small corner of heaven know as the North Shore of Oahu, the birth place of surfing, yet still wild and full of beautiful beaches.    We're Honest, clean, tidy out going people and have an active,  fun lifestyle enjoying the amazing water sports here. I am renting out the spare studio attached to my house, to hopefully meet interesting people, share a bit of the "HI" life/aloha spirit and help pay the bills. 

We moved to Hawaii 7 years ago, thinking it would be a nice place to live for a couple of years, make some money and then get back to travelling. I under estimated how nice and how much fun it is to live here, and now I have a house here and no desire to leave. The laid back country atmosphere we have here on the North Shore is alluring- so much nicer than the crazy Waikiki tourist sausage machine.

I'm active and try to complete the whole range of sports possible here on the north shore. In fact my favorite days are when you get a "trifecta" - any three of the surfing, kiting, free diving SUPPing, mountain biking, motocross, beaching, hiking etc actives possible here.

One concept i live by is "Life is for the living"  I enjoy sharing these good times with other adventurous people. 

I work 9-6pm weekdays and other time am out surfing, kiting, adventuring etc. Im very tolerant  and respectful and because the house is still under repair everything is pretty easy going and relaxed.

Not a party house, but small gatherings are welcomed.

neighborhood_overview:
Hawaiian Paradise Park is one of the largest neighborhoods in the country. Also referred to as Paradise Park and known by many as HPP, is a census-designated place in Hawaiʻi County, Hawaiʻi, United States, located in the District of Puna.

It is a very diverse neighborhood. There are areas of tall trees and other areas that are more "open". There are wet areas as well as dry. The closer to the ocean, the drier it is. There are wild orchids growing everywhere. There are wild avocado, mango and guava trees. Some macadamia nut trees and papaya trees have been planted and quite a few nurseries have sprung up, mostly orchid farms as well as nurseries growing other exotic flowers.

HPP is 4 miles long and 3 miles wide, consisting of about 137 miles of roadways and 8850 lots. Most of the residences use the "catchment system" of collecting water run-off from the roof of the house into a large tank somewhere on the lot. It sounds primitive, but most people prefer it since
host_about:
I am a very passionate, artistic and creative free spirit--who loves traveling the world--taking personal time, practicing yoga and spending time with the people I love. My life motto is basically to commit oneself to learning, growing, and studying...practicing the discipline of letting go, accepting what is and then remembering to breathe. Stretch and develop your mental, physical and spiritual levels of awareness and abilities by practicing mindfulness.
Be aware of the wonders and splendors around you. 
Always remember there is the opportunity to learn and grow in every moment--in the good times and particularly the harder moments; keep gratitude present in your constant stream of thoughts; work hard on the tasks at hand; dream big and believe in them with an even greater force; let you inner child come out to play and laugh often; and watch for opportunities to serve those around you... 
When practiced with regularity, these I believe, are the blueprints to living an inspired, fulfilled and peace filled life. One that is filled with freedom, abundance and miracles.

Other things to note

Ke Ala Hele Makalae (The Path that goes by the Coast) or Kauai Kapaa Bike Path is fun to enjoy.
host_about:
I have been in the vacation rental business since 2016 with over 20 years of experience in real estate, insurance, and property management. My family and I run several units on the beautiful island of Kauai. I enjoy scuba diving, kayaking, paddle boarding, and hiking. 

It has been one of my greatest joys to be able to do business in Kauai due to the friendly residents, how easy it is to get around, and the numerous island activities. I love getting to communicate with guests through platforms such as Airbnb. It makes my day to know that you are enjoying a vacation or casual getaway to one of the most beautiful Hawaiian islands at my unit. 

I look forward to connecting with you and always try to do my best to accommodate to your needs. I am always available to you through my contact information and provide very quick responses. Extremely excited to offer you a wonderful, family-friendly, and unforgettable tropical getaway!

description:
Ekahi says it all. Don't come all the way to Maui to stay in a bargain space. Unit 47A is a one bedroom (with sleeper sofa), two-bath renovated on the ground floor. This means a larger lanai than upper units. It also means that when you step off that lanai, you step onto A LOT of grass. Our condo is a 5-minute (barefoot) walk to the most wonderful of all Maui beaches; a ten-minute walk to the shops at Wailea. Restaurants nearby. Convenient yet without the road noise.2067153903 Privacy and peace.

The space
The unit is over 900 sq. feet. (85 sq. metres). That doesn't count the very large grassy area off the lanai that is pretty much yours. (When we are there, our puppy thinks he owns it. About the size of a soccer field.) It gives the place the feel of an even larger space.

For some, there is a big difference between first floor and second. We have no stairs and a bigger lanai (that's a 'deck' on the mainland).

Then there is road noise. All
neighborhood_overview:
We heard recently that West Maui (Kanapali, Lahaina, etc.) was prettier than Wailea. Seriously! This was someone who first said.. "Well, it rains more up there and traffic is a nightmare. And the wind is too much. It would be nice if it was as sunny as Wailea."

: ) There WAS a time when that area had more Gucci type shopping and more 5 star hotels. But that was 20 years ago. Besides, how many hotels do you stay in at any one time. If you do need top-of-the-line accommodations, we are within a five minute drive of the Grand Wailea, Andaz, Fairmont, Four Seasons and Marriott Resort. There are several more really nice four-star places.

But back to West Maui It is indeed very beautiful. All of Maui is. We are at a loss to know what it is the person we heard was looking at that is more beautiful than Wailea. You can always stay in Wailea (with more sunshine, less wind, several road options in case one is closed) and drive over to West Maui to compare the views. If t
host_about: We fell in love with Maui long ago. Every moment here is memorable. We can't spend as much time here now so for the first time in three years, we are renting it to others. Not the whole island, just the condo. But you know what I mean. :  )

The space

A second pool in the complex has a wading area for small children. The fully equipped kitchen is a chef's delight with granite counter tops, high-end appliances, including a refrigerator with 2 ice makers! Everything you need to prepare meals for family and friends. The dining area offers
neighborhood_overview: Waikoloa Beach Resort is known for having some of the best weather and beaches on the Big Island. With over 340 days of sunshine and year-round temperatures between 68-86 degrees, the resort area offers world-class golf, dining, shopping, snorkeling, and diving. For the adventurous types, take a Blue Hawaiian helicopter ride and view the Big Island and its spectacular waterfalls. Swim with the dolphins, star gaze on Mauna Kea, or take a drive to Volcano National Park. Spend the day snorkeling or swimming at the Hilton Waikoloa, or bask in the sunshine at some of the highest rated beaches on the island like Hapuna, Mauna Kea, or our favorite for boogie boarding: Kekaha Kai which is just a short drive away. Less than a two minute drive is Anaehoomalu beach “A Bay”, where you can rent kayaks and paddle boards, snorkel or just relax on the beach. The bar and restaurant, Lava Lava, is there, where you can enjoy live music and a Mai Tai while watching the beautiful Hawaiian sunset. Should yo
host_about: I am a pilot for a Major US airline who loves to experience new places.  My wife and I love to travel and are super hosts with Airbnb having a Villa on the Big Island of Hawaii.

Originally formed in 2007, Aloha Vacation Villas is now part of The Parrish Collection group of companies.  Based on Kauai, The Parrish Collection LLC manages over 350 properties on both Maui and Kauai.

JP Parrish is the Owner and Principal Broker of The Parrish Collection LLC, originally formed in 1984 that is now the largest independently owned vacation rental company on Kauai.  

Headquartered at Poipu Beach, Kauai and operating owner and guest services’ desks at three major Kauai resorts, The Parrish Collection LLC offers easy access to owners and guests. 

Its dedicated team has worked together for many years and offers an unequaled commitment to personal and professional service, attention to detail, and the highest quality standards all balanced with a true sense of Aloha.

neighborhood_overview:
Located in the prestigious Kahala neighborhood, this home immerses you in care-free island living with tons of entertainment for you to access effortlessly.

When you’re not practicing your golf swing at the nearby Waialae Country Club, take a short drive to one of the 3 shopping centers all within 5 minutes from the home: Aina Haina, Koko Marina, or Kahala Mall.

For those happiest in the water, paddle boarding, surfing, snorkeling, and jet skiing are available at Hanauma Bay - only 15 mins away! Treat yourself to a gourmet lunch at Moena Cafe or signature tropical brew at Kona Brewing Co. after a day out in the sun.

Swim with the dolphins at the nearby Dolphin Quest facility, hike to Kahala lookout, or visit the University of Hawaii at Manoa campus - the possibilities are endless!
host_about:
Hi! We’re Evolve, the hospitality team that helps you rest easy when you rent a private, professionally cleaned home from us.

We promise your rental will be clean, safe, and true to what you saw on Airbnb or we'll make it right. Check-ins are always smooth, and we're here 24/7 to answer any questions or help you find the perfect property.

description:
We are 1 of only 12 legal nightly rentals on the north shore of oahu. No 30 days minimum or weird contracts etc. Peace of mind when booking. We can host and handle large groups on our property of 10+ if needed.

The space
This is a 5 Bed & 3 bath unit located in the heart of the north shore in a small neighborhood on waimea bay. This unit features AC in all rooms, fast wifi, comfortable bedding, 85 inch entertainment tv, hot outdoor shower, 180 degree ocean views from top level & off street parking.


Five minute walk to some of the islands most beautiful beaches. Large grocery stores, shopping, and restaurants all within 5-10 drive.

Guest access
All floors of the main house will be yours.
Front yard & private parking, hot out door shower etc.

Other things to note
This property requires the ability to use a ladder to access the top floor & to access the loft bed room.

You are staying in
neighborhood_overview:
Incredible viewing point access directly in front of property that over looks waimea bay on a grassy cliff side. Often no body around and truly beautiful, check photos for this.

*Regarding beach access, We sit next to Waimea Bay. There is a neat trail that goes out from our cul-de-sac and has the option to go up to a fabulous lookout over the bay where you can see turtles, dolphins, occasional whales and wonderful sunsets. It also has an option to go down towards the beach and if the there are no waves and the water is flat (mostly in the summer) then you can jump in the water from the rocks and swim a short distance to the beach, otherwise there is a local trail/pathway behind the house that the locals use to access the beach, we have timed this walk and it takes about 8 minutes.
If you have never been to the North Shore one of the cool features is that there are so many beaches to visit so we encourage you to drive around and visit many of the nearby beaches that are
host_about: Born in Hawaii, Often elsewhere around the world!

description:
Enjoy a spectacular oceanfront view of Hanalei Bay with private lanais and grass lawn looking over the breathtaking views of Hanalei Bay and the pristine Pacific Ocean. Freshly remodeled three bedroom three bath home with full kitchen and living room. Each bedroom comes with it's own private lanai and grass area overlooking the bay. Hanalei Bay Resort has an amazing pool and jacuzzi with cascading waterfalls and lounge chairs to enjoy. The perfect place for an amazing vacation!

The space
Enjoy an amazing sunrise breakfast and cup of coffee as you overlook the bay as the sun wakes up the sparkling Pacific Ocean. The evening Bali Hai sunsets are enjoyed as you gather with friends and family on your own private lanai with a full view of the ocean and amazing fire orange skies.
You have full view of the point at Hanalei as surfers paddle into some of the best waves on the island. The point is a world class wave that can hold the biggest of conditions
neighborhood_overview:
We first became owners in 2016 because of the incredible location and views from the home. It is a full oceanfront view only shared with the Princeville Resort of the pristine Pacific Ocean, majestic mountain range with waterfalls and the Bali Hai sunsets all to enjoy off your private lanai and secluded lawn. Three years later, we were given the opportunity to purchase the place next door and now can provide a place for our growing family for future generations. So, if you’d like to rent both places for a gathering; you now have the ability for two homes - each 3 bedroom, 3 baths with a shared lawn overlooking Hanalei Bay. It is Bamboo 9101,2,3 and Bamboo 9104,5,6.

Oh and if you enjoy tennis like we do, the resort tennis pro Mary is absolutely incredible! Our kids love her and she is an amazing tennis instructor for all ages and levels of play.

So, be our guests, and we hope you and your family have an incredible time enjoying the island of Kauai.
host_about: Farming family from the Central Valley of California.  Enjoy every day God gives you!

description:

This 1 bedroom/bathroom Honokowai condo is fully-furnished with a king bed, in-unit washer/dryer, kitchen essentials, and pool access.

30+ day stays only.

The space
This unit includes a 55” TV, cable, and internet for your use. The kitchen has granite countertops and is fully equipped with stainless-steel appliances, a full-size refrigerator, a Keurig coffee maker for single cups or a whole pot, and everything you need to cook.

Guest access
The front door is equipped with a smart lock - you’ll receive your own unique code, so there is no need to worry about misplacing keys! One designated parking stall is available on site.

host_about: We hope you enjoy staying at our Maui condo as much as we do.  Have a very wonderful stay, aloha!

description:
Private cottage with expansive ocean view within a gated community.
Enjoy the sunrise in the mornings or stargazing at night. Sleep to the sweet sound of chirping coqui frogs and awaken to the chorus of diverse tropical birdsong. Soak in the peace and quiet overlooking a lush landscape of gentle sloping hills, fruit trees, tropical flowers and blue ocean.

The space
Your cottage is fully furnished with a King bed, desk, dresser, hammock, two chairs and a small table. Coffee, tea, sugar, a kettle, a grinder, a french press, a water filter pitcher, microwave and mini fridge. You have a private bathroom and hot shower as well as a spacious covered porch in which to spend your mornings or evening relaxing in peace.

Guest access
Please park straight. The cottages are a one minute walk from the parking area. Follow the signs to your room.
Guests may walk around the expansive lawn surrounding their cottage and enjoy seasonal guavas to t
neighborhood_overview: We are located within a gated community called Onomea Bay Ranch Estates, situated on the sloping hills of Mauna Kea. (We are the VERY FIRST property you come to up Onohi Loop.) If you love walking or running, Onohi Loop is perfect for an early morning or late afternoon stroll or workout. There is little to NO traffic, a gradual incline, and an epic view in both directions.
host_about: Aloha traveler. My name is Suze and I live with my husband on our beautiful property in Onomea, Hawaii. We practice regenerative agriculture (KNF, permaculture), restoring old cane lands back to fertile functioning food forests; raising chickens, pigs, cows, and beneficial microorganisms along the way! We are very passionate about growing our own food and living off-grid. We open our home (our separate ohana units) to you so that you can feel the ocean breeze and see the beauty of Hawaii from our perspective. We hope you have a most fulfilling and inspiring stay with us! ALOHA

description:
Panoramic ocean views with dramatic Haleakala in the distance! This top floor, beautifully remodeled unit is sure to impress. Five miles of perfect sandy beach where turtles love to play awaits below. During the winter months, sit front row on the expansive lanai as many whales breach in view. Walk to shops, restaurants and attractions from this resort. In the evening, enjoy beautiful sunsets and the twinkling lights of Kihei and Wailea in the distance.

The space
Additional Description:

Island Sands 609 is a one-bedroom, one-bathroom 6th floor condo that sleeps 4. Step inside the large slider doors of the lanai right into the tropical and modern living area featuring a large flat screen TV and new furnishings. New laminate wood floors throughout make the space feel bright and open. The fully equipped kitchen is perfect for making mea

My Perfect Stays is here to make your Maui vacation unforgettable! We are committed to delivering our valued guests the very best in quality and service. description:
End a day of adventure with wine at sunset on the private lanai with beautiful ocean view. Homey touches include a full kitchen, ceiling fans, dining table, cable TV, and tropical décor. Life is good!

The space
It’s all about the view in this 570 sq. ft. home edging landscaped lawns and the Pacific. A private lanai offers incredible views for sharing meals prepped in the open-style kitchen. Other comforts include hardwood floors, breakfast bar, cable TV, and ceiling fans. Sleeps 4 in a King and Sofa bed.

On Molokai's beautiful south coast, Molokai Shores welcomes you to 4 oceanfront acres of laid-back bliss with views of ancient fishponds and the island of Lanai. All vacation homes feature a full kitchen, furnished lanai, plus access to a swimming pool and barbecue grills.

Other things to note
Pricing does NOT include the following taxes & fees and will be collected directly upon check-in:

14.42% Hawaii Transient Acco
host_about:
Experience the unspoiled natural beauty of Molokai, the Friendly Isle

The oceanfront Molokai Shores Resort is located on four acres of beautiful tropical landscaping, with an expansive lawn that leads to the beach and dramatic views of the Island of Lanai and the Kaloko'eli fishpond. Unwind in spacious one- or two-bedroom ocean view and oceanfront suites, and leave your worries behind. Take a dip in the ocean or the large oceanfront pool. Spend a lazy afternoon barbecuing and having a picnic in the grassy courtyard. Or, simply sit back and let the day pass by.

Molokai is known for its wide open spaces, unspoiled land, remote beaches, and smaller than "small town" lifestyle. In fact, you won’t even find a stoplight on Molokai. This is just one of many reasons why people are charmed by this tiny island in the sun. You’ll connect with the land and the people of Molokai instantly, as culture and history are carved into every inch of the island’s stunning landscapes.

Whether you seek refuge from modern life or you want an unforgettable adventure, you’ve come to the right place. Molokai Shores urges—no, begs—you to unwind. Our cozy condominiums feature one- and two-bedroom vacation homes that make life easy. Enjoy our oceanfront swimming pool, barbeque areas, Free parking, Free public WiFi, on-site hair salon, shuffleboard, and laundry facilities.

Castle Vacation Rentals Hawaii is a new brand providing management of individual vacation rental properties, backed by the power of Castle’s exclusive technology platform and vast distribution and customer reach.

Being a full service property management company originating and deeply rooted in the Hawaiian Islands, Castle Vacation Rentals knows Hawaii. In the course of our 25+ years in the property and rental management industry, we’ve revolutionized property management with easy to use services and systems that maximize the revenue for our homeowners. To do that, we coupled unmatched technology, marketing and revenue expertise within dedicated Hawaii-based support teams, resulting in our becoming the largest Vacation Rental Management company in the islands.

description:
Our Hanalei Haven has recently been remodeled and is the perfect home base for your North Shore Kauai vacation! Featuring a Fully-Equipped Kitchen, A/C, Private Lanai w/ Jungle & Hanalei Bay ridge views, high-speed Wi-Fi, smartTV, Washer-Dryer and assigned parking. Located across the street from the ocean bluff and within the spectacular Hanalei Bay views - ideal to catch a Bali Hai sunset. Kauai's best snorkeling & surfing beaches - Tunnels and Hanalei Bay are just a short drive away!!

The space
Our condo is has a been fully upgraded with granite counters and cherry cabinets throughout! The kitchen is fully equipped and ready for the preparation of your meals should you decide to eat in. There's plenty of dining options in Hanalei & Princeville in case you want a night out.

The open concept studio layout cools easily with Air Conditioning and feel free to wash any clothes with the full-sized Washer / Dryer. The decor is tropical and compliments th
neighborhood_overview: Across the street from the condo is a small "park" with a walking path and benches. It is one of the best places on Kauai to sit and watch the Humpback Whales as they play (December through March) as well as the dolphins and honu (Hawaiian Sea Turtles) year around. It also features some of the best sunsets on the island. You won't find a better value for a Vacation Rental on the North Shore!!
host_about:
I feel very fortunate to call the the Garden Isle home with my husband + kids + family nearby here on the North Shore.  I love exploring Kauai's many hikes and beaches in my free time and enjoy helping our guests maximize their time while visiting Kauai!!

We are able to offer discounted rates for direct reservations over 4 days - just ask~ Mahalo!!

description:
Endless Ocean Views is a large 3 bedroom home located in Mauna Kea Resort Wai'ula'ula complex. Exquisitely furnished with 3 Master Suites each with their own luxurious bath. The airy open-concept main room includes a well-equipped kitchen, dining area, great room, and large covered lanai with grill. This home has mesmerizing views of the mountains and ocean and is just the place to use as a base whether you’re exploring or simply relaxing and unwinding.

The space
The combination of one of Hawaii's best resorts on what we believe is the best beach in all of Hawaii together with this high-end luxury home makes the perfect setting for your Hawaii getaway.

Fast WiFi with great coverage included!

We know our Guests look forward to an exceptional experience from the moment you start planning your Big Island vacation. We’ve incorporated all our vacationing experiences from Hawaii and around the world, to ensure you have an exceptional stay!
neighborhood_overview: Wai'ula'ula is a gated community at Mauna Kea Resort.   Mauna Kea resort has two glorious beaches (Hapuna and Mauna Kea).   With the optional daily resort fee you can use the chairs and towels at the hotel beaches, pools , tennis courts and golf courses.
host_about: Jeff & Suzanne have been hosting guests in their luxury vacation rentals on the Big Island of Hawaii for the past several years.   Their company Paradise in Hawaii Luxury Homes consists of a large team of passionate, dedicated individuals focused on helping guests have amazing holidays.    From the initial three homes to now over forty (40) homes all equipped to the same high standards they have never lost their attention to detail.     While they have added team members they remain directly involved with each and every guest.    They treat every guest like their trip to Hawaii is their life long dream fulfilled.   They love being part of helping families create amazing memories.  Come try the Paradise in Hawaii experience!

description:
Air conditioned 1650 sq. ft. Seabreeze 2 Bedroom 2 Bath features ocean views from a wrap around balcony and a private hot tub. Set in lush tropical landscaping a short walk to white, sandy Poipu Beach. It occupies our entire top floor, so it is very private and peaceful.

The two bedrooms have a King and queen beds, comes with a full gourmet kitchen with granite counters & stainless steel appliances; HDTVs in every room. Private covered lanai with gas barbecue and outdoor dining.

The space
This is the entire second story of a bungalow-style house. It has a wrap around balcony with dining table for outdoor dining. There is a hot tub facing the ocean from one balcony.

host_about: Born in Tokyo, raised in socal, married in Hawaii and hope to live there some day.  I spent a few months in Kauai during covid and fell in love, would love to share my place in Poipu with you if you have a chance!

description:
Recently renovated condo at entrance of Waikiki consisting of two adjoining rooms, three beds (one queen and two fulls), one full kitchen, two full baths. Each room has it's own private entrance.

The space
Unit Description:

Walk to Waikiki beach, Ala Moana mall, convention center, restaurants, shops and many other Waikiki attractions in this newly renovated unit.

The building offers a pool, jacuzzi, barbecue grills, gym (one time $5 per guest usage fee), coin laundry, common area wifi, a bar and café.

Attached covered parking available for guests at rate of $40.00 per 24 hours for multiple day purchase and $45 per 24 hours for single day purchase. They accept cash only. If you are staying long term (past 7 days), please ask me about other cheaper parking options.

Luggage storage service provided by our security office on the lower lobby level for $5 per bag per 24 hours.

Building has 24 hour security.
host_about: My wife and I love to travel and the best part of traveling is the people we meet. By acquiring rental properties in Waikiki, we are able to meet people with diverse backgrounds from different parts of the world.

description:
Just one of the wonderful experiences you came to Hawaii for.... an outstanding oceanfront condo to make your stay complete.

(Unit D14), From the time you D-14, you will be drawn to the ocean view in front of you. Fully appointed and air-conditioned to ensure your stay is completely comfortable, from the swivel chairs on the lanai for watching the turtles or surfers play, to the extra comfortable pillow top king-size bed.

You have the best view from your own private lanai of the ocean and shoreline, where you are not too high to not enjoy the action of the waves crashing on the rocks, but high enough to have your own privacy. Once you open the sliding glass doors to the ocean, you may never close them again until you leave, as the sound of the

Just within a leisurely walk away from the building is the Waikiki harbor, the Hilton Hawaiian Village, and Fort DeRussy park. As well as an ever-evolving scene of cafes, happy hours, international cuisine, and late-night bars to relax at with an exotic island refreshment.

This 15th floor unit features 1 king-sized bed that can accommodate maximum of 2 people. This comfortable unit has a full kitchen and equipped with basic kitchen supplies you need to cook your meal. Enjoy the great view of marina, Pacific Ocean, and soothing tropical sunshine that will make your time run slower. The unit also has a lanai where you can enjoy seeing the yachts come and go, as well as calming tropical breeze. Don't forget to see the sunset from lanai when you're back from your shopping!

host_about:
The Outrigger Way

Developed in 1993 with Hawaiian scholar and historian Dr. George Kanahele, the Ke 'Ano Wa'a process was designed to advance the company's corporate culture and fundamental business strategies. The values-based process intricately connected three core elements of the hospitality industry:

HOST + GUEST + PLACE

It also deepened Outrigger's understanding and appreciation of the local host culture, a distinct hospitality style that is recognized across the globe.

Location, Location, Location! This spacious 3,000 sq ft home located less than a 5 minute walk to the spectacular Hanalei Bay has 5 bedrooms and 4.5 bathrooms. neighborhood_overview: Environmental Disclosure. Guest acknowledges that the State of Hawaii is exposed to environmental hazards including, but not limited to, tidal waves, hurricanes and floods. Please refer to the local phone book for information pertaining to evacuation procedures. In the event of an emergency, the State of Hawaii utilizes a warning alert system (emergency sirens are tested on the first working day of every month at 11:45 a.m.). Guest is responsible for using their best efforts to familiarize themselves with property, its location, and surroundings. Some of the properties are in a remote location. As such, what would be considered normal response time for public services in an urban area may not be available in this location, i.e., police, fire, and emergency services. Also, naturally dwelling animals, reptiles and fauna are different then might be encountered in an urban setting and some might be considered “pests” by some individuals, i.e., centipedes, geckos, roaches, spiders, rodents,

description:
Nestled into the idyllic north shore of Kauai, this 4,000-square foot custom villa was designed by Hawaii's renowned architect Mark Eyler. The architecture and interior design blend Hawaiian, Balinese, and Asian elements with a contemporary style, offering unparalleled beauty and elegance in a modern tropical setting. The villa boasts an infinity pool, perfect for taking in the breathtaking tropic beauty while relaxing in the warm Hawaiian sun.

The space
Laulea Kailani Villa features an expansive, flowing floor plan in which the upper-level living spaces open to bring the outdoors in, emphasizing the breathtaking mountain and waterfall views. The home also includes an additional living space on the lower level, a fully equipped kitchen with bar seating and a steam room. Lahaina's Edge is "over the top" with decor and furnishings. I know you will love staying in this beautiful home! The owners have done an amazing renovation. 

Aloha Pualani Boutique Resort is located in North Kihei off South Kihei Road. There are 6 units in the complex with a pool, BBQ, courtyard area with table/chair seating and lounge chairs for our guests to use.

I also own and manage two additional short-term rentals, one near Yellowstone National Park and one in Orlando, near the Disney Theme Parks. I've received 5-star reviews with both of these homes as well.

My experience with guests has earned 5-star ratings! I love creating an amazing experience for our guests. Let me know what I can do to help you have a 5-star vacation!

The space

Everywhere is available for access except the storage room in the garage, and the Rubbermaid shed in the back corner of the property.

Other things to note
There’s some chickens that make a little noise during the morning and throughout the day.

neighborhood_overview:
Wailuku is a neighborhood located on the island of Maui in Hawaii.

Wailuku is a historic town with many buildings dating back to the 19th century. It has a diverse mix of residential and commercial areas, with a range of housing options from historic homes to newer developments.

The town is home to several parks and recreational areas, including the popular Iao Valley State Park, which features a scenic hike to the Iao Needle, a natural rock formation. The Wailuku River State Park also offers hiking trails and swimming holes.

Wailuku has a vibrant downtown area with shops, restaurants, and art galleries. The Maui Arts and Cultural Center is located nearby, offering a range of cultural events and performances.

Overall, Wailuku is a charming and historic neighborhood with plenty to offer both residents and visitors.

host_about:
Hawaii. Costa Rica. Jamaica. Bahamas. Yellowstone Park, etc... At the end of one trip, I'm just counting until the next excursion somewhere exciting.  I can't live without traveling. It's in my nomadic nature to roam and never stay in one place.  From food to culture to natural wonders, I love and desire the flavors of the world on my tongue, I love and desire to be immersed in a wholly different culture, and I want to see, hear and feel the natural wonders that surround us. With my loving husband and my two boys we travel at every opportunity and we enjoy snowboarding, surfing, sightseeing. We are fond of Hawaii and have been to three of the islands (Oahu, Maui, Kauai) more times than we can count. 
As a Host on AirBnb, we offer where we go and where we have been so we know what our Guests might experience during their stay. As a result, we have the highest confidence that our Guests' stay will be a truly wonderful experience. 

Aloha and Mahalo,
Abby Heo

Lush, tropically landscaped property. Palm trees, Bougainvillea, citr

This gated  community of more than 3900 acres can be accessed from the coastal Akoni Pule Highway, just above the  Pacific Ocean. About 4 miles from Kawaihae, the location of several great restaurants and a fish market. OceanSports is also in Kawaihae offering whale watch tours and sunset cruises.
host_about:
Aloha Kai Properties is a family business. Deborah D. Sharp, “AlohaDebbie” started her family on the Big Island over 40 years ago. We are a happy, loving family (Ohana) of five children in Love (aloha) with the Ocean (kai). Leilani was born in Kealakekua and her younger brother, Joseph Talman, who goes by “Tally” was born in Hilo. Both have a passion for the water. Leilani is an avid paddler and Tally loves to surf. Mom, “AlohaDebbie” still loves to swim, snorkel and paddle her ocean kayak. Debbie acquired her real estate brokers license in 1985 and found a niche in vacation rental management 10 years later. Taking care of vacation homes and world travelers has been Debbie’s life and love for the past 30 years. Tally and Leilani grew up in the business, always helping with guest requests, whether that was delivering a kayak or a coffee pot.

Together, Leilani and Debbie have managed vacation rentals since 1995.  Tally joined in 2017. Leilani Properties & Aloha Kai Properties have a handful of high quality vacation homes, or as we say in Hawaiian “Na Hale Pono” – just the best! Our goal has always been to carry the spirit of aloha into our beautiful vacation homes and to the people who visit them. Our properties are well maintained and full of charm, beauty and comfort.

We hope you will come back again and again and make us your home away from home.

Please join us for your dream vacation!

A Deeper Meaning of Aloha Kai….

Aloha Kai is abbreviated for “ke aloha ka i ʻoi aʻe” -love is the greatest of all and it comes from a song called ʻEkolu Mea Nuii

ʻO manaʻoʻiʻo, ka manaʻolana
A me ke aloha ke aloha ka i ʻoi aʻe
Pōmaikaʻi nā mea a pau
Pōmaikaʻi nā mea a pau

Faith, hope and love,
love is the best
And everything is blessed
And everything is blessed

host_about:
i love nutella. with a spoon. i love movies. especially the romantic sappy kind. or thrillers. provided there’s a romance in there somewhere. i love to dance. i used to be a professional ballet dancer. but i really love to shake a tail feather too. i love adventure. especially the traveling kind. i love my family. and my wonderful friends. i love to give gifts to people. sometimes i buy christmas presents already in february. i like to cook. but i love watching a real chef in action. top chef rocks. i bake a mean brownie. i am even better at eating them than i am at baking them. i love amusement parks.  the faster the roller coaster the better. pink cotton candy is my favorite. i love the beach. i worship the sun. i love creativity. i love love love photography. i love the smiles a photograph can bring to people’s faces. i love it if i am able to do that for someone.

I am a photographer, a ballerina, a mom, a designer, and recently launched a travel blog. I just follow my passions. I’ve lived in Honolulu for 19 years and know the island well. My homes are always comfortable and warm and inviting,  and I look forward to hosting you!

Some of Maui’s top attractions are: Maalaea Harbor; many boats leave from Maalaea on snorkeling trips, deep sea fishing, scuba diving, whale watching (in season), sunset cruises, and more. It is much faster to leave from Maalaea Harbor than Lahaina Harbor when taking trips to Molokini Crater and Turtle Town. Other attractions include Maui Ocean Center, Haleakala Volcano, Shops at Wailea, Iao Valley, Wailea Golf Club, King Kamehameha Golf Club, Maui Tropical Plantation, and the Whale Sanctuary. neighborhood_overview:
Kauai is so lush and green it’s known as The Garden Island.

And what a garden! Waterfalls plunge into pools lined with exotic flowers, rare birds call out their unique songs, and waves peel off in long sonorous lines that whisper and fade on unspoiled beaches.

It is a garden tailor-made for exploration. Check out the Wailua River where, during certain times of the year and specific tides, you can view ancient stone carvings. Or, hike the Na Pali Coast—a 14-mile stretch of uninhabited shoreline where 2,700-foot cliffs plummet to clear coral waters, and hidden valleys open on empty white-sand beaches.

neighborhood_overview:
Java is the juice that powers Holualoa, the little village and art enclave in the heart of Kona coffee country. This is a great place to taste the rich flavors of 100% pure Kona coffee, a rare commodity exclusively grown in north and south Kona. There are many great restaurants within just a few miles such as Rebel Kitchen, Magics Grill and Kaya's.

The high elevation, constant cloud coverage, and rich volcanic soil in the upland slopes of Kona, Holualoa and Kealakekua create an ideal environment for harvesting the unique Kona coffee bean. There are roughly 600 coffee farms in the Kona area and many offer tours to the public. Visit Holualoa’s thriving coffee orchards and learn about the meticulous harvesting process. Then explore the coffee mill and see how the beans are processed. As you finish your tour, sip a freshly brewed cup for yourself and experience the rich aroma and flavor that makes 100% Kona coffee so highly valued.

Tucked amid the upland farms on

This ground floor unit has a nice grass greenbelt off the lanai. It is steps to the pool, Jacuzzi and new BBQs. A short walk and you are on 2 of the world's most beautiful beaches...Kamaole 1 and Charlie Young.

The unit comes fully equipped. There is absolutely NO smoking allowed in this unit. However the complex itself has a designated smoking areas.

Please note that the hotel to the south of us is expanding and will be working on this between 8:30 and 4:30 Mon-Fri. They have quests a
neighborhood_overview:
Lovely surroundings. Easy walk to good restaurants, grocery and souvenir shopping.
Amazing sunsets from beach across the street. Also snorkeling, sunbathing and beach activities.
host_about: I love providing a warm and comfortable place for people to stay while they enjoy the beautiful island of Maui.  I travel and stay in many AirBnBs and have tried to provide all I look for and enjoy in the homes I have stayed in.

description:
Come enjoy 42 acres of wild, natural beauty, and the state of Hawaii's largest privately accessible waterfall at the Inn at Kulaniapia Falls.

Our Pikake Room has a queen size bed, private bathroom, and balcony with a view of Kulaniapia Falls.

Breakfast and light housekeeping is included with your stay. Experiences like a chefs table dinner, cooking class, and waterfall rappelling are available, for an additional charge.

The space
The Pikake Room is on the second floor of our Harmony House, which has a total of 6 rooms. You will have access to a refrigerator, microwave and coffee maker, but the shared kitchen may not be used for cooking.

Guest access
Kulaniapia Falls is a 42 acre property just about 15 minutes from downtown Hilo. There are miles of nature trails, and a natural farm on property. When river conditions are safe, you may swim, kayak, and paddleboard under the falls.

Other things to note
host_about: Kulaniapia Farms cabins and experiences are hosted by a small team of collaborators who are passionate about sharing our sustainable lifestyle. One of us is always connected to communicate with you before your stay. Your experienced host lives on site and can answer questions about your stay and adventures on the island.

description:
Help revive the island's spirit with your stay! Kihei & Wailea are fully open!

Our 3 Bed/2 Bath Sleep On Maui House
• Fully stocked kitchen + Top-of-the-line amenities.
• In the heart of Kihei. Minutes to Restaurants, Bars, Coffee Shops & Groceries.

Residential Neighborhood - Cul De Sac Street

Please respect the Maui County Quiet hours 9pm-9am.
host_about:
Aloha,

I was born and raised on Maui and the Sleep On Maui House is the home I grew up in. I now live up country with my family. I also host The Aloha Condo with my husband who is from Germany. 

We can be reached via the Airbnb app messaging should you need anything during your stay. You may also text or call should it be urgent. We are happy to help make your stay as enjoyable as possible!

Love Meeting New People
Love To Travel.

description:

This is one of Hawaii's most beautiful locations and near family friendly sandy beaches and North Shore attractions. Enjoy spectacular sunrises over the ocean and large sea turtles that regularly visit the nearby beaches.

The space
This condo has two private bedrooms, one bathroom and is located just a few blocks from the ocean and right around the corner from Kahaha Bay! The condo has a washer/dryer for taking care of your family's needs during your stay plus reserved parking for 1 car. The condo also has air conditioning and has been recently remodeled with an updated kitchen, appliances, and more.

There should be plenty of dish soap, laundry soap, hand soap, shampoo, conditioner, body was
neighborhood_overview:
Near the ocean and also Kahana Bay beach, which is an amazing beach park and safe for kids. The Beach is protected by a reef a ways out so it's perfect for snorkeling without the bigger waves. Shrimp Truck, Thai Food Truck, Burger Food Truck, Vietnamese Pho Food Truck, Hawaiian Ice stand and convenience store with local food counter are nearby!

Near the Polynesian Cultural Center, Hawaii’s #1 paid attraction, draws millions of visitors annually with their world-class entertainment, learning, shows, and luaus. There is a Longs drugstore and two grocery stores in the area. Five minutes away, Laie Beach Park has great year round larger waves for body surfing. Turtle Bay Resort Golf Courses/Restaurants and World Famous North Shore Surfing Beaches a short drive away.

If it's winter, along the North Shore you'll be treated to 30 to 40-foot tall waves and some of the world's best surfers. You'll also find Waimea Bay and the beautiful Waimea Falls Park with its sacred
host_about:
I love Hawaii, attended BYU-Hawaii, work on-island and manage over a dozen premium properties on the North Shore.  We want you to be able to connect with your loved ones and nature by having a wonderful stay while visiting.  

We manage many properties in Hawaii which are available to see at PrimeHawaii dotcom

description:
Situated on one of the largest lots in Princeville, this tropically landscaped & beautifully designed 4BR/3.5BA Princeville corner home can accommodate both large groups and extended families. Features include a centrally located chef's kitchen, hardwood floors throughout, large outdoor lanai to capture the gentle trade winds, downstairs Ohana unit with outdoor shower, huge yard for frisbee, football and fun. Large enclosed courtyard features a BBQ island and large sitting area.

The space
Main House is 3 Bedrooms & 2.5 Baths with a great open floorplan which opens to a sweeping greenbelt. Front bedroom features a bunk bed with double & single mattress. Jack & Jill bathroom connects to the middle bedroom with a queen bed. Large primary bedroom features a sliding glass door which opens to the back lanai overlooking the greenbelt. Large primary bathroom features a dual vanity sink, large tub & separate shower and a spacious walk-in closet.

Downstairs
neighborhood_overview: Located in one of the most coveted neighborhoods in Princeville, just adjacent to The Cliffs & Ali'i Kai complexes, 4892 Pepelani Loop is situated on one of the largest lots in Princeville.  There is a large greenbelt behind the property and the other homes are well spaced for added privacy.  The newly paved Princeville walking path is conveniently located less than a block away.  Walking distance to 'Turtle Cave', Princeville Shopping Center, the Saturday Farmer's Market & Night Market, and the Makai Golf Course.
host_about: Aloha & e komo mai (welcome).  My name is Eric Marovish.  I live here in Princeville with my wife Julie of 19 years and our 2 teenage boys, Nathan & Connor, our golden retriever “Duke” and the world’s laziest cat “Ollie”.  I am originally from Orange County, California, and moved to the Garden Island full-time 5 years ago.  I have been coming to Kauai since I was 4 years old and have always felt a deep connection to the island, the natural beauty, and its culture. Having traveled extensively, I’m 100% convinced that Kauai is the most beautiful spot on earth, and I’m quite certain that God spent ‘extra time’ designing this majestic paradise.  The residents and visitors here are among the friendliest I’ve ever met.  I am a full-time real estate broker and owner of Kauai Property Management, LLC.  I am passionate about selling real estate, sharing our island with visitors, cultivating new relationships, and intentionally living a ‘life by design.’ I begin each morning with a ‘Gratitude Walk’ along Hanalei Bay with Duke.  I enjoy paddling for Hanalei Canoe Club (6-man outrigger canoes), SUP, hiking, traveling, and spending quality time with my family. I look forward to hosting you in one of our gorgeous properties and to helping exceed your expectations.

description:
Optional services offered upon request: Mid-stay housekeeping. Babysitting services provided by a First Aid and CPR certified family member. Please inquire for rates and availability.

The space
Aloha and welcome to our ocean view beach villa! This spacious luxury 3 bedroom villa has been beautifully furnished and offers all the comforts of home along with the luxury of a world-class tropical vacation. The large lanai with comfortable armchairs and a large couch allows you to enjoy the indoor/outdoor lifestyle from sunrise to sunset. You have the choice of keeping your lanai doors open and enjoying the fresh Hawaiian breeze or using the central air-conditioning. The signature state-of-the-art kitchen is designed by renowned Master Chef Roy Yamaguchi with Sub-Zero and Wolf appliances. The granite kitchen island has 4 bar stools for casual dining and socializing. The large dining table comfortably seats 8 people. The living room features a large, modular sofa that c
neighborhood_overview: The Beach Villas at Ko Olina is located on the West side of O'ahu along two miles of Oahu's most pristine beaches in the world-class, private Ko Olina Resort vacation community. This resort community is home to the Aulani Disney Resort, the JW Marriott Ihilani Resort and Spa, the Marriott Beach Club, Ko Olina Golf Course and the Ko Olina Marina. You are located just steps from the beach and within walking distance of all of the numerous amenities offered throughout this vacation community. The Ted Robinson designed Ko Olina Championship Golf Course is home to the LPGA Lotte Championship. There are three full service spas located in Aulani, the Ihilani and the Marriott Beach Club. There are numerous fine dining options located throughout the resort community. The world-class Ko Olina Marina offers a selection of sports fishing, coastline cruises and water activities, from seasonal whale watching and dolphin sails to snorkeling among Hawaiian sea turtles and dramatic sunset cruises. The
host_about: My husband and I have been living in Hawaii for more than 18 years. We invested in KoOlina 12 years ago. The Beach Villas was our home residence for many years before our family started growing and we needed more space.  At that time we decided to share our beautiful beach villa with you.  I am originally from Venezuela, educated in Germany with a degree in Economics. I have been a Realtor in Hawaii for more than eleven years.  I also have extensive expertise in luxury vacation ownership with the two leading companies in the hospitality industry, Marriott and Hilton.  I am very lucky to have joined Island Living Homes to manage our clients' investments properties.   We absolutely love the KoOlina resort community and we can truly say that this resort is a 'place of joy'!

description:

Pahoa eateries 5 minutes away. Volcano Park 35 minutes. Take day-trips anywhere on Big Island, be back by evening. For larger house, see Airbnb listing "Hawaiian Sunrise Vacation House." Your host Eliot has lived in Hawaii for 25 years and can suggest the best ways to enjoy both natural wonders and Hawaiian culture. The restaurants are great too!

host_about: Hawaii is like no other place in the world... I enjoy my guests loving the experience here at my two AirBnb vacation rentals and do my best to create superb comfort and beauty here. As for myself, I am a former Los Angeles bestselling author, psychotherapist and lover of Nature.

Enjoy world-class shopping, dining, and nightlife at the International Marketplace, stroll the beachfront of Waikiki for surf lessons and sunset watching, or take in a hike at the nearby Diamond Head for an overview of Honolulu’s magnificent coastline. Whatever adventure abound, the location and the value at Aqua Aloha Surf Waikiki are unmatched.

Though our business has changed through expansion and growth to include properties beyond Maui -- on the islands of Oahu, Hawaii and Kauai --  our values and sense of Aloha remain. The space

The Palekiko welcomes you to paradise from the moment you walk in the door with all you need to relax and rejuvenate during your stay. This villa is 1,699 square feet and has 3 bedrooms and 3 baths. Custom contemporary decor and upgraded appliances give a 5-star feel. Enjoy the spectacular sunrise and ocean views every day from our penthouse 9th floor lanai.

This luxury condo is ideal for a romantic getaway or a family vacation.

Onsite fitness center

neighborhood_overview:
Spend your days basking in the sun on Ko Olina Beach, just steps from the Palekaiko, or in one of the four lagoons, perfect for swimming and snorkeling. For those with an adventurous side, play a round at the 18-hole championship golf course, embark on a whale-watching tour from the marina or see the many sites the island has to offer. The Palekaiko is located just 45 minutes from Honolulu and Waikiki Beach, and 45 minutes from the North Shore.

The Beach Villas Resort is one of 4 beach front resort properties on Ko Olina. You are within walking distance to the Disney Aulani, Marriott Ko Olina Timeshare, and the soon to be Four Seasons Hotel.
host_about:
Aloha! My husband Duke and I run an online business. We have two beautiful children. We love to travel (whenever we can), eat, and revel in great company.  

We purchased this condo so that our family can enjoy a piece of paradise. Although we'd love to live in Hawaii, we call Huntington Beach, California our home.  We take great pride in creating a memorable experience for our guests.  We hope you will find our condo your home away from home.

description:
It's all about the view for starters. One of the best views of the ocean and Kailua Kona on the entire Big Island. Just a mile up from the beach and town center. I love to jog (downhill) mornings right to the beach and view spinner dolphins right there in the bay. This house is so convenient to shopping, restaurants, and the pier. It is quite charming and comfortable. Only 15 minutes from the airport too.

The space
All the best water sports are on this side of the island. Kayaking, snorkeling, surfing parasailing are just a few minutes away. Book island tours right at the pier or online.

We have air conditioning in each bedroom and ceiling fans through out however there is no central air in the common areas of our home. Most Hawaiians don't have a.c.. preferring to spend their time outdoors rather than in. Open up all the windows and let the cool breezes come through.

Guest access
The entire home is available for your us
neighborhood_overview: This is a family neighborhood that's very quiet and you'll enjoy your privacy.  We have a second story view from a single level home.  No stairs!
host_about: Jan and I love the Big Island and are part time residents. We have 3 grand children in Arizona. Though new to hosting, we have loved sharing our island home and the wonders of Kona with our guests.  Island living is amazing!

neighborhood_overview: Sandpiper Village is centrally located within the Princeville Resort among other condo units and single family homes.  There is on-site parking with a reserved parking space at no additional cost and you're no more than minutes away from dozens of different beaches, hiking trails, and wondrous vistas.  You are less than a mile away from The Princeville Shopping Center anchored by Foodland, a full size super market.  Kauai is an island of unequaled beauty and discovery. No matter how often you return, and you will return, you will continue to uncover her hidden secrets of secluded beaches, multi-level waterfalls, and soul pleasing vistas. Our Puamana town home is located within The Princeville Resort on Kauai's north shore.  It is lush and green and has to be one of the most beautiful place on this planet. If you are a first-time visitor, you will soon discover that you had not chosen Kauai, Kauai had chosen you!
host_about:
My wife, Rachel, and I first visited Kauai in the early eighties and just got hooked. We bought our first vacation rental property in 2001 at Sandpiper Village in Princeville and spent about 5-1/2 months renovating it.  We dreamed that one day we might be able to make Kauai our permanent home, and we were fortunate to actually make this happen in January of 2006.  We bought our second vacation rental property at Puamana in August of last year (2010), as our second vacation rental property. and after a renovation period, placed it on line as a 3 bedroom 2 bath townhouse vacation rental.
My wife still works as a flight attendant and I am retired (for all the guys out there, I'll be writing a book soon about how to make that happen).  However, I keep busy managing both properties, when we're not dancing, playing softball/tennis, or at the beach.  One of the advantages of living here on Kauai and offering vacation properties for rent is that any issues with units that may arise are addressed immediately and decisively through direct communication between the guests and me, the owner. There is no go-between management company in the loop to delay any action that may be required.  It's a win-win for everyone.
Mahalo for visiting AirBNB and if you have any questions, call me at home 808-245-4830 or cell 808-651-0503.
Karl & Rachel Forer

Kona Coast Vacations is fortunate to team up with great property owners which is instrumental in providing exceptional homes for our new and returning guests. With over 240 vacation rentals from oceanfront homes, ocean view condos and private estates, we are here for your every need, open seven days a week to take care of our guests and owners. With two locations in Kailua Kona and Mauna Lani we have dedicated specialists in guest services managing reservations, maintenance, and property checks alongside our accounting, support and marketing specialists. We hope to host you Hawaii and help create a memory to last you a lifetime. We are your “’Ohana” (family) on the Big Island of Hawaii, please do not hesitate to utilize our listed resources and book activities thru Kona Concierge.

description:
Enjoy a spectacular oceanfront view of Hanalei Bay with private lanais and grass lawn looking over the breathtaking views of Hanalei Bay and the pristine Pacific Ocean. Freshly remodeled three bedroom three bath home with full kitchen and living room. Each bedroom comes with it's own private lanai and grass area overlooking the bay. Hanalei Bay Resort has an amazing pool and jacuzzi with cascading waterfalls and lounge chairs to enjoy. The perfect place for an amazing vacation!

The space
Enjoy an amazing sunrise breakfast and cup of coffee as you overlook the bay as the sun wakes up the sparkling Pacific Ocean. The evening Bali Hai sunsets are enjoyed as you gather with friends and family on your own private lanai with a full view of the ocean and amazing fire orange skies.
You have full view of the point at Hanalei as surfers paddle into some of the best waves on the island. The point is a world class wave that can hold the biggest of conditions
neighborhood_overview:
We first became owners in 2016 because of the incredible location and views from the home. It is a full oceanfront view only shared with the Princeville Resort of the pristine Pacific Ocean, majestic mountain range with waterfalls and the Bali Hai sunsets all to enjoy off your private lanai and secluded lawn. Three years later, we were given the opportunity to purchase the place next door and now can provide a place for our growing family for future generations. So, if you’d like to rent both places for a gathering; you now have the ability for two homes - each 3 bedroom, 3 baths with a shared lawn overlooking Hanalei Bay. It is Bamboo 9101,2,3 and Bamboo 9104,5,6.

Oh and if you enjoy tennis like we do, the resort tennis pro Mary is absolutely incredible! Our kids love her and she is an amazing tennis instructor for all ages and levels of play.

So, be our guests, and we hope you and your family have an incredible time enjoying the island of Kauai.
host_about: Farming family from the Central Valley of California.  Enjoy every day God gives you!

C108 is situated between the ABC Store to the North and a host of popular spots to the South such as Koiso Sushi, Beach Street Shave Ice, Pizza Huts, Cafe OLei, Coconuts & Freds Mexican Restaurant, all w/in walking distance.

The space
**State of Hawaii and Maui County require us to collect 17.42% TAX on all vacation rentals. Hawaii tax feature is NOT currently supported on Airbnb billing systems. Airbnb rates DO NOT INCLUDE THESE TAXES, so I will send you a SEPARATE REQUEST for Hawaii Tax Payment.

I will be requesting an ADDITIONAL 17.42% HAWAII VACATION RENTAL TAX through Airbnb Resolution Center within 24 Hours of your booking. It is sent separately so as not to have Airbnb
host_about:
I have had the privilege of traveling all over Europe, Asia, Canada, Mexico, the Caribbean Islands and across the US for both business and personal trips. Of all the places that I have been, Maui is the only place that I feel right at home. Fell in love with Maui since my first visit in the early part of 1990s. Since then, I have returned for a vacation getaway every year and in 2020 moved to Maui permanently! The island is breathtaking, the beaches are spectacular and the people are welcoming.

I came across Kihei Sands Beachfront Condominiums walking along Sugar Beach on one rainy night in December not too long ago. When I stepped onto this property, I instantly felt safe and relaxed. It was serene and calm.  I saw a sky luminous with infinite number of stars, felt the warm rain on my skin, heard the ocean waves crashing against the shore and observed the guests socializing as they were having fun by the BBQs. When some of the guests saw me sitting on the lounge chair, they came over and offered to share their dinner with me. I was taken back by their kindness and the atmosphere of Kihei Sands. I knew right then that I had to be an owner here. 

I finally bought unit A5, a 1 Bedroom/1 Bath Condo in January of 2017. 

A5 has many repeat guests. I love sharing the Spirit of Aloha with others. My goal is to provide you a Great VACATION Experience with MEMORIES that will last a LIFETIME. Kihei Sands is truly a HIDDEN GEM.

A few years later, I found another condo in the center of South Kihei, with a gorgeous ocean view and minutes of walking distance to beaches, restaurants, groceries, activities and shops.  My newest listing, C108 KAMAOLE BEACH CLUB.

Our Maui home rentals are beachfront style, offering activities like snorkeling, surfing, whale watching, hiking, and relaxing by the beach or pool. Not far from many of our Maui home rentals is Haleakalā National Park, an amazing destination for beautiful views, complete with a visitor center for educational information. Also near all of our Maui home rentals are a number of great shops and delicious restaurants for refueling after a long day at the beach. All of our Maui home rentals offer you all the comforts of home with the addition of luxurious amenities. Book one of iTrip Vacations' many beautiful Maui home rentals today for the trip of a lifetime!
