Welcome to RedAwning, a whole new way to travel. We make staying in a unique home or apartment easier than staying at a hotel. By partnering with local homeowners throughout North America, we provide you with the largest collection of vacation homes in the most destinations. Every stay includes our experienced 24/7 customer assistance by text, chat, email and phone, and access to all your travel details via our free mobile app. We offer consistent terms and flexible cancellation policies, and we include accidental damage protection for every stay with no security deposits and a best rate guarantee. Wherever you want to go, RedAwning is here to make your journey easier!

description:
Experience the peace, beauty and serenity of living in your own home, with spectacular views of the Pacific and the tropical landscape of lower Puna: comfortable and easy accommodations and open-space living.

Come experience the raw beauty of a lava eruption. The land has been transformed. Fissure 8 and the hardened lava flow is a 10- minute walk from our home. This is destruction & creation; We and the surrounding community of Puna have been transformed by this experience.

The space
Welcome to paradise!

1700 sq. feet of understated elegance and peace. Here is the perfect place to experience the magic of Lower Puna. Take your family or friends to a place that feels like home (Ohana) and that breathes in the spirit of welcome and love (Aloha).

We have provided a fully-equipped kitchen. There is a Keurig coffee maker, French Press, regular coffee maker, microwave, Magic Bullet for smoothies, and necessary cooking equipment and con
neighborhood_overview: In our opinion, Puna is the most fascinating and lush area of Big Island. From Kalapana to Pohoiki, from the Red Road to Pahoa--you will be experiencing the richness of living in a tropical rainforest. This is the furthest eastern part of the Hawaiian Islands and has a special place in Hawaiian lore. It attracts those who are adventurous, seeking to expand their spirits, and desiring to live in harmony with nature. It is our belief that there are a very high percentage of mindful people who live here.
host_about:
We moved to the Puna District of Big Island in 2013 from our home on Long Island, New York. Here we were so fortunate to buy an incredibly beautiful home overlooking the Pacific Ocean on exquisitely landscaped acres. 


Together we work on gardening and landscaping. 

We seek to create a beautiful, quiet, serene place so our guests feel like they are at home.

The space

WATCH the DOLPHINS and WHALES (typically Dec. - March)

Please refer to the local phone book for information pertaining to evacuation procedures. In the event of an emergency, the State of Hawaii utilizes a warning alert system (emergency sirens are tested on the first working day of every month at 11:45 a.m.). Guest is responsible for using their best efforts to familiarize themselves with property, its location, and surroundings. Some of the properties are in a remote location. As such, what would be considered normal response time for public services in an urban area may not be available in this location, i.e., police, fire, and emergency services. host_about:
Vacationing in Maui doesn’t get better than Kamaole Sands, a condo resort built on 15 acres of gardens, waterfalls, and ponds. Live like you’ve always wanted to in an individually furnished condominium suite directly across from Kihei’s popular Kamaole Beach Park III. Defined by its laid-back vibe and tropical beauty, South Maui is a true Hawaiian paradise.

Our dreamy Kihei location near Wailea Resort and Makena Resort puts you in the midst of golf, spas and ocean recreation.

- Learn to surf at Kamaole Beach Park III
- Tee off at Maui Nui or Wailea golf clubs
- Stay on trend at The Shops at Wailea
- Snorkel amid the pristine waters of La Perouse Bay
- Indulge in spa treatments at Wailea Resort
- Sample craft brews at Maui Brewing Company

The best plan for your day is often no plan at all. Maybe you’ll start your morning with a swim in the Pacific or in our pool. You might mingle amid traveling kindred spirits at your resort’s Wednesday Mai Tai Party, and then grill a fresh catch with your new friends at the property’s public barbecue area. Or step out for a sunset dinner at one of Kihei’s fantastic cafes or bistros. Need to stay connected? We offer complimentary WiFi in the lobby, pool area, and all rooms.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

Beautiful white sand beaches and breathtaking views are just part of the allure of the Kapalua resort. This exclusive gated ocean front community features 2 swimming pools, tennis courts & 2 championship golf courses. Just outside your front door discover snorkeling, cliff jumping & paddle boarding!

The space

On the main level is the kitchen, great room complete with new queen size pull out sofa with a full bathroom and dining room. Off the dining room is a large lanai with beautiful patio furniture to dine Alfresco and a private yard.

host_about:
Aloha, I'm Debbie, a full time Realtor with ALG Luxury on Maui. My passion is helping guests explore the island and discover hidden gems to make their experience exceptional, creating memories with their families that last a life time. I love cliff jumping in Kapalua and can show you a few exceptional spots to jump! When I'm not cliff jumping you can find me snorkeling at Honolua Bay or exploring the wild rugged beauty that is Hana. There are so many wonderful things to discover, and based on your lifestyle and passions, I can help you customize your vacation to make it epic! 
If you fall in love with the island like so many guests do, let's meet over a coffee or Mai Tai to talk about the Maui housing market and how you can own a villa that generates revenue for you or perhaps a second home. I'm always available to offer recommendations, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. I look forward to hearing from you!
Welcome to Maui!
With warmest aloha, 
Debbie

The State of Hawaii requires us to collect taxes on the rent from every reservation. This feature is not currently supported on Airbnb. Upon booking you will be sent a request via the Airbnb resolution center for General Excise Tax (GET) and Transient Accommodation Tax (TAT)

The tax percentages associated with your stay will be:
(GET) 4.7120 % and
(TAT) 13.25 %

Please note, check-in details will not be sent until the mandatory taxes are fully paid.

description:
Classic Hawaii family home. Two bedrooms, full kitchen with stove, microwave, sink, fridge, coffeemaker, etc. Queen-sized bed and two twin beds. Full bathroom. Private entrance and dedicated washer and dryer. Covered parking. Short travel to Kailua town, bus routes and beaches.

Our names are Angie and Al. The cottage is located on our Kailua property. Hale means house in Hawaiian and we are the Chinen's! That is why our place is Hale Chinen.

The space
Due to new rules in Hawaii, effective October 2022, we must impose a 90 day minimum rental. Please contact us for more information.

Hale Chinen | Kailua Cottage is a family-owned rental. It is a private, two bedroom attachment to our home, with your own front and back entrances to come and go as you please. Comfortably sleeps 4 on two twin beds and one queen bed. Carport parking makes for an easy start and end to your adventures around the island.

We are required by Hawaii State Law
neighborhood_overview:
Hale Chinen is located in Kailua, on the windward side of the island of Oahu. Kailua is home two very popular and beaches: Kailua beach and Lanikai Beach.

We are conveniently located but still in a nice and quiet part of the neighborhood. It's a 1 mile, 21 minute walk to Kailua Beach (Kalama Beach Park). If you are the type that enjoys long walks on the beach, Kailua beach is for you. It is a very short drive or bike ride into Kailua Town (1.1 mile, 21 minute walk), with supermarkets, Kalapawai Cafe, Whole Foods, all kinds of restaurants to sample local flavors, smoothies and coffee. There are bicycle, kayak and beach rentals. From Kailua Town you can continue on bicycle, drive or even take theBus on to the world famous Lanikai beach. If you do go to Lanikai we recommend using a bicycle or theBus as parking is difficult near Lanikai.
host_about: Hale Chinen is our family owned vacation rental in the heart of Kailua on the beautiful Island of O'ahu.  Our names are Angie and Al we have two units located on our Kailua property.  We all enjoy food and fun with family, friends and our two dogs and cat. We love living in Hawaii and spreading Aloha. Al and Angie are both retired and will usually be available for any assistance you need.

This tandem package is comprised of two adjacent two bedroom partial ocean view suites that each offers views of the Pacific Ocean and the awe-inspiring West Maui Mountains. You are welcome to relax on the 570 sq ft of combined balcony space and enjoy the abundance of peaceful "Hawaiian air conditioning" that these suites afford, or perhaps you will even want to watch a loved one go down the water slide!

neighborhood_overview: With a prime beachfront location on West Maui's Ka'anapali North Beach, The Honua Kai Resort and Spa was recently recognized as one of the top resorts in Hawaii by Conde Nast Traveler for 2016. description:
Aloha and E Komo Mai - (welcome) to paradise on the Big Island of Hawaii at the Vista Waikoloa Beach Resort. This location is a spacious corner ground floor home with a partial ocean view. The home is located on the sunny and dry side of the Island at the Kohala Coast. Condo faces toward the ocean for amazing sunsets and constant ocean breezes. Vista Waikoloa is a gated community with abundant tropical landscape that surrounds our beautiful 2 bedroom / 2 bath home.

The space
From the moment you arrive you can relax, recharge, and create wonderful memories during your Hawaiian tropical retreat.
Compared to other Big Island vacation rentals, the large wrap around lanai and the floor to ceiling windows facing the ocean, make the home unique.

The soothing earth tones and porcelain tile floors throughout along with high ceilings create a bright, relaxing, and spacious environment. The gardens around the unit are filled with plumeria and hibiscus tre
neighborhood_overview:
King's Shops and Queen's Marketplace shopping areas, offer many upscale retail shops and restaurants and are also only a 12 minute walk from the home. There are several amazing white sand beaches all within a 15-20 minute drive from the home. We also like to walk to the rocky beach to watch the sunsets and watch the sea turtles, which is just a 7 minute walk.

The home is a great base to explore the Big Island by taking days trips. There is incredible diversity on the Big Island from snow on top of Mauna Kea, to the firey volcano at Kilaueua, to the lush rainforests on the Hilo side. There are many off-road places to explore such as remote beaches, mountain roads, and other roads that will need a 4 wheel drive vehicle.

neighborhood_overview:
Wailuku is a neighborhood located on the island of Maui in Hawaii.

Wailuku is a historic town with many buildings dating back to the 19th century. It has a diverse mix of residential and commercial areas, with a range of housing options from historic homes to newer developments.

The town is home to several parks and recreational areas, including the popular Iao Valley State Park, which features a scenic hike to the Iao Needle, a natural rock formation. The Wailuku River State Park also offers hiking trails and swimming holes.

Wailuku has a vibrant downtown area with shops, restaurants, and art galleries. The Maui Arts and Cultural Center is located nearby, offering a range of cultural events and performances.

Overall, Wailuku is a charming and historic neighborhood with plenty to offer both residents and visitors.

Discover the heart of Maui at our authentic kamaaina retreat! While we're not directly on the ocean or in a resort ar

neighborhood_overview:
Kauai is so lush and green it’s known as The Garden Island.

And what a garden! Waterfalls plunge into pools lined with exotic flowers, rare birds call out their unique songs, and waves peel off in long sonorous lines that whisper and fade on unspoiled beaches.

It is a garden tailor-made for exploration. Check out the Wailua River where, during certain times of the year and specific tides, you can view ancient stone carvings. Or, hike the Na Pali Coast—a 14-mile stretch of uninhabited shoreline where 2,700-foot cliffs plummet to clear coral waters, and hidden valleys open on empty white-sand beaches.

host_about:
Like you, I love to travel, including cruising. I love to help people. I love to be hospitable. I love to read, especially about the places I am about to visit in my travels and adventures.  My husband and I have visited most of the European countries, north and south, as well as: Turkey, Israel, Greece. Southeast Asia, and the Western Rockies of the United States and Western Canada. We have also visited the western shores of South America.

"What you know is a function of whom you choose to believe." This is my husband's (Ph.D.) saying. Of course, I believe it.

I just retired after thirty (30) years with one company. Now, I am enjoying sharing our  luxurious vacation resort (which has properties around the world and within the USA). Name any place on this globe, and I will try to help you make your dream vacation or travel experience come true. 

I am looking forward to hearing from you.

Thank you,

Lorie

Located just north of Hilo on the northeastern side of the island of Hawaii, the Hamakua Coast is one of the most beautiful stretches of scenery on the island. With ample rainfall each year, the region boasts lush tropical rainforests, stunning waterfalls and tranquil green valleys.

Awesome ocean views. Papaaloa Country Store, Bar and Restaurant is just down the road . Great pizza and local style fresh food. Live music 3 nights a week.

Please be aware that depending on rain fall the property is at risk of drought. This can sometimes cause the pond levels to drop making it less scenic for some.

host_about:
We've been exceeding our guests' expectations since 1995 with our premium beachfront estates, award-winning resort villas, romantic hideaways and secluded retreats on Maui. Our luxury homes and villas are “Your Own Private Paradise” for your visit to Hawaii. 

Our highly attentive staff includes a personal on-island concierge, property manager and greeter who are at your service, free of charge, from initial planning stages through completion of your stay.

description: Aloha and welcome to Kilohana Hale. This beautiful house is located in an upscale peaceful neighborhood. Kilohana Hale is only minutes away from Magic Sand Beach, Kahaluu Beach Park, and downtown Kailua-Kona. This 5 bedroom, 5 baths, ocean view home can accommodate up to 16.  Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay.
host_about:
Aloha and Welcome to KonaHome Vacation Rentals.   This is Emmy.  I am the owner and manager of these lovely vacation rentals in Kailua-Kona.   I lived in Silicon Valley California for over 25 years and worked as a software engineer and the founder of a few successful start-up companies.  I built several successful start-up companies and pursued our entrepreneur dreams there.   I loved living in the California Bay Area and still consider it our "Home on the Mainland".

Emmy's lifelong dream has always been to live by the ocean in tropical islands. When I first truly memorable experience in Hawaii was the family vacation on the cruise ship that visited each of the Hawaiian islands.  We fall in love with Kona, Big Island the best.  There is so much to do here, with crystal clear water for snorkeling, rainforests, waterfalls, and volcanoes to explore, and mountains that almost reach the stars.

I bought my first dream house in 2013, and 3 years later, just after our daughter graduated from high school in California in 2016. Then we moved to Kona.  Besides high tech, one of Emmy’s lifelong interests has been real estate. Every destination Emmy visited, she loved exploring the properties in the area.   Combining our love for Hawaii and homes, now we own and manage 8 beautiful vacation rental houses.

We have put much effort into every house to make them as comfortable and welcoming as your home.  We use the latest technologies on the rental houses, with smart locks, amazon Alexa, comprehension customized online welcome book for each guest and much more. 

We are responsible and responsive to your inquiries.   We live close to all of our rental houses, we are always available for our guests.   We do our best to provide the best services to our guests.

Mahalo

Emmy 
owner and manager of 
KonaHome Vacation Rentals

host_about:
The complex is located directly across from Kamaole III State Beach Park, which is known as one of the most beautiful and safest beaches in the Islands.  It is perfect for swimming, snorkeling, sunning, jogging, picnicking, kite flying, and especially enjoying amazing sunsets and whale watching.

Each unit has a private lanai that faces the interior of the complex, offering views of the expansive lawns, pools, and lush tropical landscape of palm trees, hibiscus, birds of paradise and plumeria trees.  Most lanais also offer views of the beautiful Pacific Ocean and spectacular sunsets.  

There are two pools, a covered pavilion, and a full size tennis court on the property.  Every evening the outdoor barbecue area is a popular spot to socialize while grilling the perfect dinner and watching as the Hale Kamaole conch shell band performs their nightly sunset ritual.

You will find world class golf courses, fantastic snorkeling and diving, many Maui activities, abundant shopping and delicious fine and family dining all within minutes of Hale Kamaole.

description:
If you are looking for a special place for an unforgettable honeymoon, romantic getaway, or a family vacation where anyone from grandparents, young children, and teenagers can be comfortable, then Lawai Beach 1401 is the place for you!

The space
This unit is one of the few at Lawai Beach that is owned by individual homeowners, as opposed to timeshare ownership, so you will feel and see the owners' personalized treatment of their condo. From your perch at the top floor, you will have an unforgettable, view of the garden and the blue Pacific across the street; where you can watch amazing sunrises and sunsets as you sip your tropical drink or morning coffee. Although snorkeling is a popular activity across the street, that is just a sampling of the myriad of ocean/water activities that you can experience throughout the island. The stretch of road as you turn right from the resort is perfect for morning runs or walks and leads to one of Kauai’s natural wonders - Spou
neighborhood_overview: Poʻipū Beach Park is located in the community of Poʻipū on the southern coast of Kauaʻi island in Hawaii. The beach is a park has lifeguards provided by the county of Kauaʻi.
host_about:
Suite Paradise – The gateway to island living.

Suite Paradise in sunny Poipu Beach on Kauai is home to hundreds of vacation rental properties, amenable to any sized group and any specifications you could think of. With the highest level of service and a wide range of vacation rental options, Suite Paradise can ensure that your stay is as seamless as Kauai’s lifestyle.

Choose from luxurious beach resorts, each with multiple pools and spas within walking distance and top-of-the-line amenities, including, but not limited to, full membership to Poipu Beach Athletic Club for the duration of your stay. Poipu Kai consists of 70 acres of lush tropical foliage and some of Kauai’s most sought-after vacation rentals. One complex is literally located nestled in a verdant and extinct volcano crater – you can’t get more immersed in the island lifestyle than that! From mauka (mountain) to makai (sea), Suite Paradise has something for you!

Kahala – A popular complex that is home to mostly one- and two-bedroom units. Kahala is only a short walk from the beach, and closest to Poipu Kai’s tennis courts and Kalapaki Joe’s sports bar. With the option of both mountain and ocean views available dependent on the unit, Kahala’s location is perfectly situated with proximity to Poipu Road as well as the Poipu Kai greenbelt.

Makanui – Two- and three-bedroom units perched across from Poipu Crater, with stunning mountain views, distant ocean views, and a short walk to the greenbelt path.

Manualoha –Less than a mile from the beach, although the complex pool is practically attached to the Pacific Ocean! With units sleeping four to six, easy access to the greenbelt pathway, and hues of purple bougainvillea draped throughout the complex.

Poipu Sands – One- and two-bedroom units with incredible ocean views, spacious lanais, and a short walk to Shipwreck’s Beach.

Regency – Larger units, spacious enough to accommodate up to 10 guests. Many of these units are newly remodeled and offer AC. Regency and Kahala sit right next to each other.

Regency Villas – Luxury units with central AC. Regency Villas often feature a loft and sleep up to five guests. Situated near the greenbelt for easy access to many resort amenities, and centrally located for a short walk to Brennecke's Beach, or access to the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort.

Nihi Kai Villas - A comfortable and quiet beach resort with 70 condos to choose from. Located right across from the ocean.

Poipu Crater – Just as the name says, Poipu Crater is nestled in a verdant an extinct volcano crater, which makes the foliage truly breathtaking. With 30 condos to choose from, sleeping four to six guests, the choice is yours! Enjoy the tropical gardens and central location to all that Poipu has to offer.

Lawai Beach Resort - Luxurious oceanfront condos located directly across from arguably the best snorkeling spot on the island. Enjoy a short stroll to five-star dining at The Beach House or enjoy the view from Lawai Beach, as the surfers paddle out for a sunset session. With room to sleep up to six, Lawai Beach Resort has it all!

Poipu Kapili - A beautiful and peaceful resort located on five acres of meticulously landscaped oceanfront property.

Pili Mai - This is Kauai’s newest resort development of luxury condominiums, nestled among a championship golf course.

neighborhood_overview:
Waikoloa Beach is an area located on the South Kohala coast on the island of Hawaii. Approximately 25 minutes north of the Kona International Airport (KOA). The Waikoloa Beach Resort is very family and pedestrian friendly. Most properties are within a 10-15 minute walk (3-5minute drive with ample parking) to ʻAnaehoʻomalu Bay, also known as A-Bay. A-Bay is a shallow water bay located within the resort. ʻAnaehoʻomalu is best known for its sunsets, snorkeling and historic royal fishponds.
The Queens’ MarketPlace and Kings’ Shops provide convenient dining and shopping options.

description:

Find relaxation and privacy among the palms at this one-bedroom condo in the Plantation Hale Suites just outside downtown Kapa'a. Enjoy unbeatable access to both North and South Kauai from this lovely spot, with fantastic amenities waiting to welcome you back from your daily excursions.

The Plantation Hale Suites is a lovely, manicured property with three outdoor swimming pools, two hot tubs, grilling and picnic areas, and a path that leads from the front desk to a sandy ocean beach. You'll be mere steps from the Tuesday and Thursday farmers markets at the Coconut Marketplace, close to swimming holes and canoe trips on the Wailua River, and a quick bike ride or drive from the heart of Kapa'a and its cute shops, cafes, and amazing food trucks.

This particular condo sits on the second floor of the resort, with a prime position facing away from the street. The dense palm leaves provide wonderful privacy when yo
host_about: Hi, we’re Vacasa, North America’s largest vacation rental management company. Owners of vacation homes around the world trust us to deliver exceptional service throughout your entire vacation. Professional housekeepers clean and stock each home, and our customer care team is available around the clock—with a local property manager ready to show up and help out. We like to think we offer the best of both worlds: you can enjoy a one-of-a-kind vacation experience in a unique property, without compromising on service and convenience. Check out our listings, and get in touch if you have any questions. Your vacation is our full-time job, and we'd love to help you plan your perfect getaway.

description:
This apartment IS NOT effected by the Honolulu law restricting vacation rentals.

The Birdcage is an apartment perfectly located less than 30 steps from the beach and a short walk from the center of Waikiki. This makes a great home base for exploring Honolulu and the rest of Oahu. The Birdcage is a breezy and bright studio giving you clear views of the Koolau Mountains.

The space
The Bird Cage is a breezy and bright studio giving you clear views of the Koolau Mountains. With historic Waikiki Beach just outside the hotel lobby, the Bird Cage is the perfect home base for you.

The studio underwent a major renovation in November 2018. A brand new kitchen area has been created, and the bathroom has been updated. The original windows were replaced with double paned sliding glass windows that greatly minimize the urban sounds of Waikiki. The kitchen has a two burner cook top, microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker and all the necessary dishes,
neighborhood_overview:
Kapiolani Park is just across the street and offers the Honolulu Zoo, Waikiki Aquarium, the Royal Hawaiian Bandstand, tennis courts, soccer fields, archery ranges, weekend art shows and the city's Sunset on the Beach free concerts and movies - all this in its 500 green acres.

One of the main reasons for coming to Hawaii is of course the sun and sand. Surfing, stand up paddle boardling, outrigger canoeing, swimming and simply lounging on the beach are all just a few steps from the Birdcage.

Hawaii is the crossroads of the Pacific and its culinary offerings reflect that abundantly, so while the Birdcage has a kitchen and microwave, you are a short walk away from countless cafes and restaurants catering to every taste and price range. Similarly, if you can get yourself out of the water and away from the beach there is a lot of shopping to be done in Waikiki, and the many other shopping venues just a short drive away.
host_about: Born and raised in Honolulu, I currently live on the Mainland, but spend a lot of time in Hawaii. I have worked in the travel industry for over 40 years and have explored numerous cities and countries around the world. I can relate to what travelers are looking for in a vacation rental because I'm looking for the same things - clean,  great location and good value.

description:
Our home is located in a very charming neighborhood next to one of the best beaches on the island with world class surfing and swimming at your doorstep. We are located right on the bike path which means you can bike from our home all the way to Sharks Cove marine preserve and Waimea Bay, two of Oahu's most beautiful ocean and beach preserves.

We are interior designers & our home reflects modern pacific style and is both comfortable and beautiful. Once here, you will not want to leave.

The space
Our home is beautiful, comfortable and in the best neighborhood on the island if you are a beach and ocean lover. Our home has high ceilings, two split A/C systems to cool down inside, a wonderful kitchen for cooking along with Indoor and outdoor dining options. We have a sweet backyard and are just steps to amazing beaches in every direction. There is an indoor bath tub for soaking, and an outdoor shower with hot and cold water for post beach showers. The ya
neighborhood_overview: This is a local neighborhood and we ask that all guests respect our neighbors with quiet hours from 9pm to 8am. Everyone in our neighborhood is friendly and respectful - we look out for each other. If you come with Aloha in your heart, you will be met with the same...
host_about:
We are an active couple with two kids and have lived our whole lives in Hawaii. We are both professionals who have started and run several businesses in furniture and design. Aubrey is currently back in school pursuing a PhD in environmental politics. We love to travel to far flung places and now we take our kids with us. In our former lives we were tour guides and can help make your trip to Hawaii extra special, just ask us for advice! 

Aloha, Aubrey

description:
Our condo is 450 ft away from Lipoa beach; perfect for morning walks, and watching famous Maui sunsets. Walking distance to most everything you need.

Enjoy our lovely, quiet community inside Kihei Garden Estates. Recently updated-well maintained two bedroom condo. Fully stocked kitchen, smart TVs, stainless steel appliances, free Wi-Fi 141.7mb dl, free unassigned parking, and air conditioning in each room. LGBTQ+ Welcome!

The space
Two queen beds, one bathroom with shower. Beach chairs, snorkel equipment, beach towels, cooler available for use.

Guest access
The community includes a pavilion with a private pool, whirlpool jacuzzi, full kitchen, coin machine, and BBQs. There is a coin operated laundry room located inside our "E" building for use. We have beach towels, beach chairs and a cooler available for use.

Registration number
390080110045, TA-187-412-1728-01
neighborhood_overview: Our condo is located in central Kihei. Less than a 2 minute walk to enjoy beautiful Maui sunsets or a morning dip in the ocean. Surrounded by everything you would need including; Times supermarket (open until 1am), Longs Pharmacy, several restaurants and bars, gourmet coffee shops, post office, a Minit Medical and Enterprise rent a car. Only a 25 minute drive from the OGG Kahului airport or a ~$30.00 Uber/Lyft.
host_about: Born and raised in Texas, husband from Florida; you can rest assured you'll receive some southern hospitality and great beach recommendations! We both have a passion for the beach and love Hawaii. Let us know how we can help you have a great trip to Maui!

description:

We also have a small shopping area in Orchidland not far from the house. The home is in a quiet tropical jungle neighborhood. Neighbors walk daily and enjoy the peace of the country. These are 3 acre spaghetti lots.
host_about:
Senior gal now-bought and owned real estate through hard work ! Parents amazing holocust survivors. Taught me the meaning of peace and freedom! professional degrees in; . Psychology and legal mediation, Counseling. Dental Hygienist, minister medica/dental intuitive, nutritionist, educator/teacher seminar and class teacher for Healing arts schools , college and retreats.
Many years spent as wholistic, yogi, meditator, educated, personable, sensitive, 
natural health caring.  My parents; being survivors. brought forth a joy of learning and growth blessing me with a choice for education; freedom and love in our home . I have Hosted patients, friends, families ,yoga retreats, healing parties and joyful events as well as silent meditation and hikes or peace in sacred spaces.
Come be yourself and enjoy being near the beach in a world known city of beauty and variety and best weather world wide.  Love opening up opportunities for traveling for others and her self.  I can be quite as a mouse and give you privacy or be there for a need. Come stay in an american beach palace.  Be Happy and if not give yourself the gift of time to take care of you here and now, in a healing home.

Our pickup location is in beautiful Kaneohe, very close to the famous Ku’aloa Ranch, home of the Jurassic Park film site. It’s about a 20 min ride from the airport. Most guests take an Uber or Lyft to the pick up location or take the bus which is a little longer ride but a cheaper option.
host_about:
Hi, Aloha our family was inspired to start this business a year ago. Hotels are so last year! A rental van and a place to sleep all in ONE! Hawaii has become a second home to us. We moved here from Southern California. We love going to the beach with our family, hiking and exploring the beauty of the island. We wanted to give the same amazing beach front stay and rental car experience at an affordable exceptional cost to others traveling to our Beautiful Island of Oahu Hawaii. You get a rental van and a place to stay for less money then it cost to rent a car in the island’s.  
May God Bless You! 
We Hope to see you soon! Aloha enjoy

description:

Newly renovated bathroom with walk-in shower, new appliances new King size bed! A/C, BBQ, Free Wifi, free parking, Oceanfront Hot tub & Salt water Pool! This 1 bedroom has its own washing machine, and dishwasher. We provide coolers, beach chairs, and beach towels! Free parking in our 3 levels just put the parking pass provided in condo on the dash!

The space

Perfect when you have children you can keep an eye on them in the pool while you are in the condo. Sleeps 4 total, free parking and WIFI. New King size bed! Salt water pool and hot tub and BBQ area. This unit has a private lanai to enjoy outdoor dinning. It is also on the ground floor this means it's cooler and you don't need to go up and down stairs to go to the pool area! <

description:
A one bedroom two bathroom condo with full kitchen and nice large private covered patio. Third floor for easy access to grounds with privacy.

Our family company is proud to offer vacation rental condos at the Maui Sunset since the early 1980's.    Specializing in Maui Sunset allows us to provide the best vacations at affordable prices for generations of guests.  

Condo A-205 has so many updates and is extremely comfortable for families or a couples.

The space
Renovated condominium suite features 700+ square feet of living space, plus large private view lanai deck. Maui Sunset is an ocean front resort complex. This condo has TWO bathrooms, rare for a 1 bedroom apartment. Plus it can accommodate a max of 4 people.

neighborhood_overview:
More info on the Maui Sunset and its location
Maui Sunset is conveniently located near central community services with many entertainment and dining facilities. Excellent restaurants featuring continental and native cuisine are nearby. Banks, beauticians, barbers...ice cream and video rentals are located in pleasant shopping malls only two blocks from the Maui Sunset. They also include drug stores and supermarkets where you can buy provisions for evenings "In". Maui Sunset offers two large central barbecue areas for your enjoyment and lawn parties. Relax and watch the sunset from your private covered lanai.
Right at your doorstep is a 34 acre fishpond, built by a Hawaiian king centuries ago. Windsurfing, shoreline casting and spear fishing off the nearby breakwater are a few of the many water sport activities at Maui Sunset. Sailing vessels and deep-sea fishing are available nearby. World famous swimming and snorkeling beaches are minutes away at one of the many sandy safe be

description:
Quiet GARDEN VIEW condo accented with an aloha spirit. Ground Floor, 1 bedroom/1 bath containing 741 SF (69 SM), with hide away sofa sleeper and fully equipped kitchen with range, dish washer, refrigerator, and utensils, outdoor lanai.

The space

This freshly painted and redecorated GROUND FLOOR, one-bedroom, vacation rental condo, containing 741 SF (69 SM), is located within the HEART of the KIHEI RESORT DISTRICT perfectly nestled within the beautiful Kihei Kai Nani village and a mere 200-yard walk from the spectacular Kama'ole II (KAM 2) Beach. It is the perfect place for SUNBATHING, swimming, SNORKELING, and winter WHALE WATCHING. The SUNSETS from this WHITE SAND BEACH are among the most beautiful in the world. The condo is perfectly located within the complex away from the busy street traffic of South Kihei Road and the adjacent restaurants. See
neighborhood_overview: Great central location in Kihei Resort District. Shops and restaurants are within a short walking distance from the condo, making this a great condo to rent without the need of a rental car.
host_about: Aloha and welcome to my "home away from home". I am pleased to invite you to stay at my condo located on the tropical island of Maui. This condo is centrally located within the South Kihei Resort District and within walking distance of some of the best beaches on Maui with several nearby shops and restaurants.  Please consider checking out my condo when making your reservations for a vacation or holiday on the Island of Maui. Mahalo.

host_about: Wailani Kaua'i is a high-end property management and luxury vacation rental company located on the south side of Kaua'i. Our irresistible portfolio of vacation properties features the very best of the best on the South Shore: elegant condos, beguiling bungalows, charming cottages, and idyllic dwellings. description:
Welcome to our beautiful Kaneohe bay front home. We split time between Oahu and Seattle, California and would love to share our beautiful home with you while we are not on the island. The house is right ON the ocean bay where you can see sea turtles and other marine life on a daily basis. We offer a two person kayak so you can paddle to the nearby sand bar! Close by is a 711, Windward mall, Safeway for grocery needs. Nearby attractions are Kualoa ranch and park, and He’eia state park.

The space
You have access to the entire bay front home which is approx 1800 sq ft. The house has 3 bedrooms (1 loft and 2 br) plus a bonus play and relaxation room. We offer two baths. One inside plus a second outdoor shower bath accessible via the end bedroom which is ideal if you spend time at the beach!

description:

With its endless pacific views and the islands of Lanai and Molokai off in the distance, you’ll be in paradise and not want to go home! This stunning, oceanfront unit offers panoramic ocean views, cool tropical interiors and access to fantastic amenities.

The space
Additional Description:

Endless ocean views from the expansive, private lanai will give new meaning to your Maui experience. Sandwiched between a private estate and the finest sandy beach (known as "S" turns) Noelani can be described as a charming, low-key, hidden-treasure, Boutique Resort. Enjoy snorkeling and swimming with turtles just steps from this premium condo. During the winter months, this condo offers front row seating for whale watching and turtle spotting!

Noelani 208 is a spacious and bea
neighborhood_overview: Noelani

description:
Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay. Located between the resort areas of Kaanapali Beach and Kapalua Bay on Maui, the Royal Kahana Maui by Outrigger offers air-conditioned condominium units in an ocean front high rise setting at Kahana.

The space
These spacious Kahana vacation condos are situated in a quiet neighborhood between Ka’anapali and Kapalua Resorts. The majority of units have spectacular ocean views, with the islands of Molokai and Lanai in the distance. Each studio, one- and two-bedroom unit boasts a spacious living area that is comfortably furnished along with full size kitchen facilities, color TV, and a washer/dryer.

• 8th floor condo with patio
• Maximum 4 persons including children and infants
• 1 king bed and 1 queen sofa bed
• Vinyl plank flooring in living room, dining room and bedroom. Tile flooring in bathroom and kitchen
• TV with cable channels and DVD player in living room, TV with cab
neighborhood_overview: These spacious Kahana vacation condos are situated in a quiet neighborhood between Ka'anapali and Kapalua Resorts.
host_about:
The Outrigger Way

Developed in 1993 with Hawaiian scholar and historian Dr. George Kanahele, the Ke 'Ano Wa'a process was designed to advance the company's corporate culture and fundamental business strategies. The values-based process intricately connected three core elements of the hospitality industry:

HOST + GUEST + PLACE

It also deepened Outrigger's understanding and appreciation of the local host culture, a distinct hospitality style that is recognized across the globe.

description:
This ground floor vacation unit is elegantly decorated and features nice views of our resort’s tropical gardens and the Pacific. Conveniences include a full kitchen, dining table, 1 & 1/2 baths, flat screen, DVD, WiFi, and ceiling fans.

The space
This 739 sq. ft. ground floor villa features beautiful views of our gardens and the Pacific. Granite countertops adorn both your fully-equipped kitchen and bathroom. Other touches include ceiling fans, flat screen, WiFi, and DVD. Sleeps 4 in 1 Queen & 1 Sofa bed.

Slip into an easy-going Kauai lifestyle at this east Kauai oceanfront condo fringing snorkeling favorite Lydgate Beach Park. With a full kitchen and private lanai, each Kaha Lani vacation suite features access to the resort’s heated swimming pool, tennis court, and barbecue area.

Other things to note
For a complete list of our available listings, please click on the link below:

host_about:
Kaha Lani Resort vacation rentals in Lihue are one of Kauai’s best-kept secrets!

Our condominiums bring you prime views of Kauai’s oceanfront. Think swaying palm trees, fine white sand, and dreamy ocean blues. Spend your days sun-kissed at our heated swimming pool and sundeck or snorkel at Lydgate Beach Park. At Kaha Lani Resort you can sunbathe at the sandy beach, challenge a friend to a tennis match, and then summon your family for a barbeque as the sun goes down.

With these Lihue condo rentals, you get all the benefits of resort-style Kauai accommodations in a place as comfortable as home. We have laundry facilities, DVD rentals in the lobby, and free parking, making it easy to come and go as you please for as long as you like.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

description:

The space
One bedroom condo with one bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, living room and huge Lanai (Patio) area with a door that opens all the way in the living room. The bedroom has AC. There is Wifi, a huge TV with streaming services and a full kitchen.

Other things to note

Parking can be discussed - I have a car that you can rent for a discounted price with a parking space in the building next door.

There is snorkel gear, boogie boards a beach tent, umbrella and other equipment available for use!

description:
Enjoy our beautifully remodeled one bedroom, one bath condo located along the Ka'anapali shore in West Maui minutes from Napili and Kapalua. The condo comes equipped with refrigerator, stove, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, two televisions, cable tv, Netflix, and high speed internet.

Ground floor unit with a beautiful tropical garden lanai. Sunset views of Molokia and Lanai on the ocean front lawn along with heated pool, jacuzzi and BBQ area while enjoying the beautiful ocean view.

The space
Welcome to our Maui Paradise home. Paki Maui is an ocean front complex where you can swim and snorkel with the turtles and tropical fishes protected by a coral reef. This Garden view condo is located on the ground floor with easy access to the grassy lawn that faces the ocean with views of Molokai and Lanai. You can enjoy your morning coffee or your afternoon cocktail. The whales keep you entertained from mid November through April and the sunsets are alw
neighborhood_overview:
Our condo in West Maui (Honokowai) is located between Ka'anipalli and Kapalua, this is the best area of Maui, boasting cool breezes, calm waters, and beautiful sunsets. A short drive or walking distance to a great variety of shops, restaurants, food trucks and a farmers market. Close to the best beaches and golf courses, this is the ideal place for families and sports lovers.

There is a Times grocery store just a 5 minute walk south, along with a Subway, Java Jazz, and several other stores. Directly across the street is Ohana Tacos, Honokowai Okazuya for the best deli on the West Side, and The Fish Market for the freshest catches around. Just a few steps north is Bad Ass Coffee (Maui's version of Starbucks) and on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday is host to a Farmer's Market in their parking lot, where you can buy fresh produce and other island delicacies.

Next to Paki Maui is the Honokowai Beach Park, with picnic tables, BBQ grills, playground equipment, swings, a
host_about: Aloha,  my family and I live in Southern California and love being by the ocean. We are an active family and love the sun, water and outside activities.  I came to Maui for vacation one spring break and fell in love with the Aloha spirit of the Island and its people. Love love love Maui and owning and share our beautiful condo just made sense. I hope you enjoy Maui as much as we do.

description:

description:

Located Oceanfront, the Aston Ka’anapali Shores offers a two-bedroom, two-bathroom, garden view condo. The condo includes a king or queen bed in the 1st bedroom, t
neighborhood_overview:
Located oceanfront on Maui’s Kaanapali Beach, Aston Kaanapali Shores rests on 10 acres of tropical gardens and merges the comfort of spacious suites with hotel-caliber services.

The Magic of West Maui Known for the dramatic landscapes of deep valleys and native forests, West Maui’s natural beauty is a dream destination for nature lovers and adventure seekers. Aston Kaanapali Shores is just a short drive from the charming town of Lahaina where you can find art galleries, local shops, and popular restaurants. The resort is also conveniently located across from the Honokowai Marketplace which offers a supermarket, shops, and dining.

• Kaanapali Beach - on the beach
• Honokowai Marketplace - directly across
• Kaanapali Golf Courses - 2 miles
• Whalers Village - 2.1 miles
• Lahaina Cannery Mall - 4 miles
• Lahaina Town - 5 miles
host_about:
At Maui Condo and Home, LLC we continue to serve our owners and guests with the same Aloha Spirit that we shared over 20 years ago. Though our business has changed through expansion and growth to include properties beyond Maui -- on the islands of Oahu, Hawaii and Kauai --  our values and sense of Aloha remain. We have implemented new business strategies and have remained at the top of the Property Management industry on Maui. We are excited to continue to serve our current owners and return guests, as well as welcome new owners and guests to Maui Condo and Home.

host_about: My husband Lee and I opened began our Airbnb in February 2022.   After retiring from a thirty year career as a psychologist on Maui,  I now enjoy being a host to our guests and grandma to our two grandchildren.  We purchased our home about nine years ago.  In addition to the main house,  it had two apartment size spaces with their own entrances and what looked like a motel sized swimming pool.   It was the pool that most attracted me as I love to swim. The house was to take work to restore it to its great potential.  We put our heart and soul into this project for three years.  The two independent units which are now our rental  suites were given the same care and attention as our living space.  My passion is to create natural and beautiful interiors that are as much as possible toxin free. We use natural, organic materials and furnishings, and quality art which gives a lovely ambiance.

description:

Touches include an upgraded kitchen & garden view lanai for “at home” dining, washer/dryer, flat screens, WiFi, DVD, ceiling fans & cool tile floors. Sleeps 6 in 1 Queen, 2 Twins & 1 Sofa bed.

host_about:
Vacationing in Maui doesn’t get better than Kamaole Sands, a condo resort built on 15 acres of gardens, waterfalls, and ponds. Live like you’ve always wanted to in an individually furnished condominium suite directly across from Kihei’s popular Kamaole Beach Park III. Defined by its laid-back vibe and tropical beauty, South Maui is a true Hawaiian paradise.

Our dreamy Kihei location near Wailea Resort and Makena Resort puts you in the midst of golf, spas and ocean recreation.

- Learn to surf at Kamaole Beach Park III
- Tee off at Maui Nui or Wailea golf clubs
- Stay on trend at The Shops at Wailea
- Snorkel amid the pristine waters of La Perouse Bay
- Indulge in spa treatments at Wailea Resort
- Sample craft brews at Maui Brewing Company

The best plan for your day is often no plan at all. Maybe you’ll start your morning with a swim in the Pacific or in our pool. You might mingle amid traveling kindred spirits at your resort’s Wednesday Mai Tai Party, and then grill a fresh catch with your new friends at the property’s public barbecue area. Or step out for a sunset dinner at one of Kihei’s fantastic cafes or bistros. Need to stay connected? We offer complimentary WiFi in the lobby, pool area, and all rooms.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

description:

Spacious 2 Bedroom/1.5 Bath conveniently located in the Heart of Waikiki. Just blocks away from the famous Waikiki Beaches and surrounded by endless shopping. Simply Suite, clean and newly renovated with free parking, a pool, jacuzzi and a sauna! Plus the enormous scenic roof top barbeque area that is sure to impress!

Kick off your shoes, put on your "slippah's", sit back-relax and leave your worries to me!
host_about:
Aloha!  My name is Rustin Smith, and hopefully I’ll be your host during your stay in Honolulu!  

I am married to the the love of my life, a beautiful Japanese national and we have three beautiful daughters.  

I am originally from Alaska.  I am the 3rd child of 3. Older brother and older sister!  I grew up as a small town country boy doing the usual hunting and fishing with my father. He was a bush pilot and so I was able to experience most of the Alaskan Wilderness! 

We raised pigs and chickens, turkeys and ducks, also had a horse and a bunch of dogs and cats!  I played Hockey my entire childhood and loved every minute of it!  I’m kinda a golfer now though!!

After high school, I joined the United States Navy and was stationed in Pearl Harbor, Hawaii. After my time in the Navy I stayed in Hawaii and became a self made entrepreneur. I opened my first retail store in Waikiki at the age of 21.  I have opened 2 more locations since then and have been in the customer service industry for 20+years!

I just recently purchased a condo and would like to share my outstanding customer service skills to any and all potential travelers coming to our beautiful state of Hawaii.   

If there is anything that you need, I am at your service and I hope that you chose me as your host. I promise to do my best and to make your stay a memorable one!  

Mahalo!

host_about:
We are a 501c Non-Profit Wellness Center Retreat. 100% of our profits are put back into the wellness center to maintain property and care for the animals in the sanctuary. #1 Priority is the animals, #2 is replacing and repairing as we go. Additional donations are accepted and welcome, and you may even designate to the project or area that you wish to help improve. 
We are a constant work in progress, so please be kind. If you are looking for luxury then you should probably book your reservations with a 5* Hotel. 
Our homes are comfortable, humble yet amazing! We are blessed with both the Sun Rise and Moon Rise in our backyard! It doesn't get more magical than that!
Our properties are Ocean front vs beach front which lends to the privacy our guests enjoy. It also puts wear and tear on our exterior which is tended to on a regular basis, but paint and ocean breezes are not always friends :) 
Focus on the amazing scenery and views and you will be content. Our “shabby chic” houses are blessings and realize that you are only visiting for a few days, not buying the house, so if you see a blemish, RELAX! We are a constant work in progress. Experience waking up to the most beautiful sunrises that Hauula has to offer. 
You may experience raw ocean activity of waves splashing up on the deck and lawn at times during high tides. Tides come in and they go out, so relax, release and enjoy. 
If you enjoy nature and kick back type of folks, we welcome you! If you want pristine, flawless properties, please do not choose to stay with us, we are not your cup of tea and that can only be a bummer for you and us. 
We do our best to offer a comfortable and clean environment for your stay. If something is not to your expectations, we request you to contact us and we will do everything in our power to correct it. We want you to enjoy your time here! PLEASE refrain from leaving mean-spirited reviews after the fact. Give us the opportunity to make things right. 
You may request a scheduled visit to the animal sanctuary and hikes to the top of our mountain with panoramic views of the windward coast, nature excursions, animal therapy, farming experience, and so much more. A donation or tip for the guide is appreciated for their time and expertise. 
You are welcome to partake in any of our various activities just inquire.
We ask that our guests respect the surroundings and leave the premise free of trash, cigarette butts, etc.
People have asked us if they can fish off our backyard............Well, the answer is please NO! There are several beaches along the coastline that are open for fishing and spearing. We prefer the animals in an out of the water feel safe in our private little haven. We are also surrounded by rock reefs and don't want broken fishing lines off our property. It causes harm to turtles, seals, fish. Thank you for respecting that :)
Our units have Pur Water Filters installed in the kitchens for drinking. We ask that you choose to bring a container to refill vs cases of plastic bottles to add to the land fill. Our goals are to be as environmentally friendly as possible. Most of our homes are solar equipped so if you can leave lights and air off during the day when not there it helps us to save resources. 
If you leave things on and are gone for the day, our staff is instructed to turn things off. 

Mahalo for respecting that! 
The Dueño’s 
Hearts For Animals Inc.

JoAnn (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Felix (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
Chelsea (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

Walk to and hike the nearby Pillbox hike for a panoramic view of the east side of Oahu and Ko’olau Mountains! This location is private, yet walking or biking distance to all the best that Kailua has to offer.

Kailua Beach is one of the most beautiful beaches in the world with white powder-like sand and serene, warm water. At Buzz's steak house - a short stroll from the rental unit - experience the local fare while you enjoy a cocktail and watch the kayakers in the canal or the kite surfers! Breakfast, gourmet coffee and lunch are a short walk along the beach path to the Kalapawai Market. Also within walking distance is Bob's Pizzeria, shave ice, kayak rentals, a healthcare office and shops. You can bike or drive less than a
host_about: Loves traveling for surf, ski, food and live music! Loves hosting and getting to know people from around the world!

description:
We are beachfront! Our protected beach is perfect for swimming, relaxing, and snorkeling. During low tide, walk on the exposed coral reef. The reef also has some tide pools you can get a close up look at. Soft sand to lay on or play in. During high tide, the coral reef and sand are covered, making it was perfect time to take the inflatable boat out.

The space
Our beachfront home has a walkable coral reef that is one of our most unique aspects. We've seen people do sunrise yoga on it! It's also perfect for fishing off of. The protected beach creates a beautiful ecosystem in front of our house. You can often find a few Hawaiian monk seals laying out on our beach. These creatures are incredibly beautiful and docile. If you're lucky, breaching whales can be seen off in the distance. During low tide, you can explore the tide pools on the reef.

Our house has an open concept kitchen / living room, perfect for gathering all your friends and family in (althou

description:
Located on the beautiful, lush & highly coveted Hilo-Hamakua Coast of the Big Island (Island of Hawai'i), amidst wide open spaces of farmland, with scarcely a house in sight, we are bringing a small family farm back to life. Experience life off grid in a yurt. Bathe in the rain water. Enjoy the peace & quiet that can be found in the Hawaiian countryside, while also experiencing local agriculture & farmlife/animals firsthand. Our family calls this place home & we would love to be your host!

The space
You will have the entire 700sqft+ yurt to yourselves. We have revamped this 15 year old structure to be simple yet charming, a rustic "Old Hawai'i" ambience with basic modern comforts. Enjoy the privacy of a bedroom, furnished with a memory foam king size bed, closet, dresser & small sitting area. Sleep two on the sofa bed, or better yet, climb the bamboo ladder leading to the bamboo loft* -crafted from our very own bamboo cultivated on site- & stargaze through the s
neighborhood_overview:
15 minutes from Downtown Hilo, but far enough in the country side to enjoy the peace & quiet of nature all around.

For the nature enthusiast you may even catch a glimpse of the two Hawaiian birds of prey - the Pueo (short ear owl) or the Io (Hawaiian Hawk- found only on the Big Island!) while at our space - amongst many other birds!

Driving up or down our road offers spectacular ocean and mountain views, on a clear day.

Close to many tourist attractions and natural attractions including but not limited to beaches, waterfalls, trails.
host_about: We are a multi-cultural husband & wife team, Beto is from Brazil & Maia is Oahu born. We speak English, Brazilian Portuguese & Spanish. We are artsy- you can see some of our work in our rentals. We love animals & own a few dozen pets. We love the ocean water & enjoy surfing, paddling & beach combing. When we travel we always check out the tourist sites, but the locals & their lifestyle is what we really enjoy. Our best traveling memories are probably honeymooning on Rapa Nui (Easter Island) & road tripping on the California coast with our three kids.

description: Spacious, peaceful, central to all activities and amenities.
host_about:
Aloha!
A little about myself; 
I moved to the Big Island in 1993 from Guam after serving a short stint in the USCG during the Golf War,  then worked as an acute care nurse at our local Hilo hospital for the last 22 years.  

Ive remained mesmerized by this island’s amazing natural beauty, diverse ecosystems, terrains, and love the laid back lifestyle it provides which easily translated into me transforming my house to one I can happily and proudly share with those seeking to explore and experience this amazing island in a relaxed home setting.  

I'm originally  from the Micronesian Island of Yap,  known for its pristine water, manta ray dives ( check out the world-famous  Yap Divers ) and  its colorful and spirited bamboo war dance performed by bare chested natives in lion clothes and grass skirts, something I grew up doing.   
I embrace  cultural diversity and truly enjoy meeting people from all walks of life and all regions in the world.  I take pride in my house and the service that I provide my guests. I value my precious 'free' time by sneaking in sporadic reading here and there  and enjoying the outdoors; camping, hiking, swimming, kayaking, paddle board, and gardening, but most of all, I love traveling and looking forward to seeing a lot more of this amazing world we live in and experience different cultures along the way.

I’m always striving for a balanced lifestyle; healthy living through heath conscious cooking utilizing locally grown, ( a lot are my own home grown) produce, keeping physically active, and inner peace and serenity.   

I look forward to meeting you and I'm excited to host another amazing adventurous soul seeking to experience the Big Island of Hawaii!  

Welcome & E Komo Mai!

Diana

host_about:
The complex is located directly across from Kamaole III State Beach Park, which is known as one of the most beautiful and safest beaches in the Islands.  It is perfect for swimming, snorkeling, sunning, jogging, picnicking, kite flying, and especially enjoying amazing sunsets and whale watching.

Each unit has a private lanai that faces the interior of the complex, offering views of the expansive lawns, pools, and lush tropical landscape of palm trees, hibiscus, birds of paradise and plumeria trees.  Most lanais also offer views of the beautiful Pacific Ocean and spectacular sunsets.  

There are two pools, a covered pavilion, and a full size tennis court on the property.  Every evening the outdoor barbecue area is a popular spot to socialize while grilling the perfect dinner and watching as the Hale Kamaole conch shell band performs their nightly sunset ritual.

You will find world class golf courses, fantastic snorkeling and diving, many Maui activities, abundant shopping and delicious fine and family dining all within minutes of Hale Kamaole.

In general it's a quiet neighborhood which may include an occasional barking dog, morning trash pickup, and people leaving to go to work.

description:
Kihei Bay Vista B-102 is located just a 45 second walk to the longest stretch of white sand beach on Maui, this air-conditioned condo is fresh, newly-updated, and completely furnished to host your romantic Maui getaway or family (up to four) adventure.

The space
Spectacular Sugar Beach, named for its fine white sand, just across the street, spans six miles and features great morning snorkeling, and several miles of beach that invite secluded, private exploration. You’re likely to see sea turtles, an array of exotic bird life, an occasional seal, and lots of whales right off the shoreline during the winter season.

This low-density, low-rise resort is nestled in the swaying Palms, floral Plumeria, and a variety of other tropical beauty that sets the tone to create those Maui memories. There are conveniences nearby (a store and a few restaurants), but the property is wonderfully removed from the high-density tourist rush that is a few miles south.

Our office is within a few minutes of all of our properties, and we respond immediately to guest issues. We’re partnered with the largest Real Estate brokerage in the country, Keller Williams; we advise on and sell Maui investment condos, based on the best possible ROI.

description:

This is the perfect place for those looking for an authentic and unique Big Island stay.

The space

The bathroom is outdoors, but secluded from view of any neighboring properties. Fresh towels and linens are provided. The outdoor kitchen is shared and is stocked with dining essentials, a fridge, stove and oven, a blender, and a coffee pot.

description:
Welcome to your bit of paradise in Poipu! The ideal location of the new 2020 remodeled Manualoha 1002 brings you easy and beautiful access to all of Poipu Kai and what it has to offer.

The space
This island condo in Poipu will feel like your home away from home. Set back from the main walking path, it provides privacy, a feature not always found in a condo. Take full advantage of this amazing one-bedroom garden view and enjoy the cooling trade winds that sweep through, bringing in the sweet scent of the surrounding flowers. Attention to detail was given in the beautiful tropical furnishings and artwork that add to the ambiance, making your vacation one you will remember in days to come. A master bedroom with a king bed is equipped with a ceiling fan and ventilating windows to keep the interior cool and comfortable. The large garden lanai provides ample space for lounging around with your favorite book, while a short walk down the greenbelt will take you to some
neighborhood_overview: Poʻipū Beach Park is located in the community of Poʻipū on the southern coast of Kauaʻi island in Hawaii. The beach is a park has lifeguards provided by the county of Kauaʻi.
host_about:
Suite Paradise – The gateway to island living.

Suite Paradise in sunny Poipu Beach on Kauai is home to hundreds of vacation rental properties, amenable to any sized group and any specifications you could think of. With the highest level of service and a wide range of vacation rental options, Suite Paradise can ensure that your stay is as seamless as Kauai’s lifestyle.

Choose from luxurious beach resorts, each with multiple pools and spas within walking distance and top-of-the-line amenities, including, but not limited to, full membership to Poipu Beach Athletic Club for the duration of your stay. Poipu Kai consists of 70 acres of lush tropical foliage and some of Kauai’s most sought-after vacation rentals. One complex is literally located nestled in a verdant and extinct volcano crater – you can’t get more immersed in the island lifestyle than that! From mauka (mountain) to makai (sea), Suite Paradise has something for you!

Kahala – A popular complex that is home to mostly one- and two-bedroom units. Kahala is only a short walk from the beach, and closest to Poipu Kai’s tennis courts and Kalapaki Joe’s sports bar. With the option of both mountain and ocean views available dependent on the unit, Kahala’s location is perfectly situated with proximity to Poipu Road as well as the Poipu Kai greenbelt.

Makanui – Two- and three-bedroom units perched across from Poipu Crater, with stunning mountain views, distant ocean views, and a short walk to the greenbelt path.

Manualoha –Less than a mile from the beach, although the complex pool is practically attached to the Pacific Ocean! With units sleeping four to six, easy access to the greenbelt pathway, and hues of purple bougainvillea draped throughout the complex.

Poipu Sands – One- and two-bedroom units with incredible ocean views, spacious lanais, and a short walk to Shipwreck’s Beach.

Regency – Larger units, spacious enough to accommodate up to 10 guests. Many of these units are newly remodeled and offer AC. Regency and Kahala sit right next to each other.

Regency Villas – Luxury units with central AC. Regency Villas often feature a loft and sleep up to five guests. Situated near the greenbelt for easy access to many resort amenities, and centrally located for a short walk to Brennecke's Beach, or access to the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort.

Nihi Kai Villas - A comfortable and quiet beach resort with 70 condos to choose from. Located right across from the ocean.

Poipu Crater – Just as the name says, Poipu Crater is nestled in a verdant an extinct volcano crater, which makes the foliage truly breathtaking. With 30 condos to choose from, sleeping four to six guests, the choice is yours! Enjoy the tropical gardens and central location to all that Poipu has to offer.

Lawai Beach Resort - Luxurious oceanfront condos located directly across from arguably the best snorkeling spot on the island. Enjoy a short stroll to five-star dining at The Beach House or enjoy the view from Lawai Beach, as the surfers paddle out for a sunset session. With room to sleep up to six, Lawai Beach Resort has it all!

Poipu Kapili - A beautiful and peaceful resort located on five acres of meticulously landscaped oceanfront property.

Pili Mai - This is Kauai’s newest resort development of luxury condominiums, nestled among a championship golf course.

description:
Located on the beautiful East side of the Big Island. This newly built 1880 sq. ft. (Includes open BBQ area, 2nd bathroom, washroom & open space downstairs) home sits on an acre lot surrounded by ohia trees, wild orchids & hapu'u ferns. This property is conveniently located for you to explore the area including several black sand beaches, hikes to tide pools & waterfalls near Hilo & Volcanoes National Park. Birds songs can be heard in the day as well as coqui frog chirps in the night.

The space
The Bird's Nest is located in a neighborhood surrounded by Ohia trees, wild orchids & hapu'u ferns and sits high above the ground which makes it feel as if you are staying in a tree house. There area also seasonal fruit such as guava & avocados on the property that are guests are welcome to. The neighborhood is peaceful with bird songs that can be heard throughout the day & tree frogs at night.

Guest access
We are located 15 minutes from Hilo & airpo
neighborhood_overview: We live in a tropical rain forest. The neighborhood is peaceful and surrounded by lush greenery. From the wrap around deck or from inside the home, bird songs can be heard throughout the day & coqui frog chirps can be heard throughout the night. Geckos can be seen outside as well as other critters. Road in front of home is paved and available for walks or runs. We are located about 4 miles from a couple of beautiful hikes to either a black sandy beach or tide pools.
host_about: I am a fun & loving mother of three boys! Both my husband, Josh, & I love to surf, hike & travel. I make handmade baby blankets & also help people bring healthy eating into their lifestyle.

description:
Completely renovated with high-end RH furniture, quality white cotton sheets, Sonos audio, marble shower, gourmet kitchen, motorized shades, & A/C in every room-- just steps away from 3 miles of undeveloped beach! Bright spacious 2nd floor 2bed/2bath condo with vaulted ceilings, fully stocked kitchen, and views of the bay, Haleakala volcano, and Haycraft Park. Great spot for swimming, paddle boarding, snorkeling, and surfing-- amazing value for families or couples.

The space
Aloha! The Makani A Kai is a beautifully landscaped, intimate resort in Ma'alaea, Maui with only 24 units, and one of only two complexes at the end of Hauoli Street that have full beach-front access to the beautiful Sugar Beach- 3 miles of sandy, secluded beach. The beach is only steps away from this bright spacious 2nd floor, single-story condo, with lovely views of Ma'alaea Bay, Haleakala (dormant 10,000 foot volcano), West Maui mountains, and family-friendly Haycraft Park.

This
neighborhood_overview: Maalaea is perfectly centrally located and a wonderful base for exploring the island. Makani A Kai is directly located on a beautiful, relatively undiscovered 3-mile sandy beach, and feels much less touristy and busy compared to Kihei, Wailea, Kaanapali, or Napili. It is reminiscent of how those beaches were 20-30 years ago. The condo is located at the end of a cul-de-sac adjacent to and overlooking a small state park with partial ocean and mountain views. Occasionally locals camp on the beach as they have for hundreds of years on many of the beautiful beaches around Maui. There are several restaurants, markets, and shops just a short walk (10 minutes) or drive (2 minutes) down the road. Maalaea is also home to the Maui Ocean Center aquarium and the harbor where many snorkeling and sunset boat trips depart.
host_about: Native Californian who loves to travel. Maui has been my family’s favorite vacation destination for many years, and we recently purchased our own slice of beachfront paradise there in Maalaea. We just completed a total renovation (all new double paned windows, solid core doors, high-end appliances, Kohler bathroom fixtures, central air conditioning, washer/dryer in unit, new furniture, etc.) and are enjoying making it into our second home, and sharing it with the AirBnB community.

description:
Right in Downtown Pahoa, The "Aqua" Private Room at "Pahoa Village Hostel" has a max of 4 people, great for Family or Friends ! Features 1 Queen bed, 2 single Bunk Beds, 100% cotton sheets, towels, High Speed Wifi, Work station in room, access to our Shared Bathrooms, Fully Equipped Kitchen with Free Organic Coffee/Tea, Cruelty Free soaps and our lovely Garden Lounge/Lanai. Free Street Parking. Convenient Self Check in after 3pm. Check out 11am.

The space
"Pahoa Village Hostel/Hotel" is a small boutique style hostel right in Downtown Pahoa. The room is private (2nd floor) but the bathrooms and kitchen are shared and on the 1st floor. Must use stairs (no elevator)There's free street parking (no private lot) and convenient Self Check in/Check out with pin pad. Check in 3pm or later. Check out 11am.

Guest access
Private Bedroom, 2 Shared bathrooms, Kitchen, Lounge/Lanai

Other things to note
We host Live Music/DJ's on the
host_about: Aloha, I'm a long time Hawaii resident (17+ years) and I love these magical islands!  I also love Airbnb and the flexibility and unique experiences it helps us provide each other across our beautiful planet. I have stayed in many Airbnb's around the world and also hosted many here in Hawaii. I operate "Pahoa Village Hostel" - a small, boutique style hostel right in Historic Downtown Pahoa on the Big Island. I’m also an experienced and highly rated Realtor with my company "Turquoise Hawaii Real Estate" so I can help you buy or sell property too. I also love volunteering locally, designing, building, renovation, art projects, beaches, waterfalls, vegan food, animals and traveling.  Come visit the Puna District and see all the beautiful sights that goddess "Pele" has created like lava, black sand beaches, hot springs, steam vents, craters, lava tubes, jungles and more !

Close to 'Little Makena Beach. New commercial grill at out building that is throughly cleaned each day. Beach chairs, coolers, beach towels and beach umbrellas in the unit for use.

Abundant activities and white sand beaches are all close by for an action filled vacation or just relaxing on the beach. Perfect sunsets from the lanai welcome guests to a comfortable Maui paradise. Inquiries welcome.

A few minutes drive out or a lovely walk away, you will find cafes, shops, restaurants and beaches. Find our videos on YouTube, search "MaiLan Hale, Kona Hawaii"

The kitchen are equipped for long term stay convenience.
The apartment is located in downtown Kona. You are able to wake to shops, stores and some beaches.

neighborhood_overview:
Punahoa Beach Condominiums in South Kihei is a gem of a condominium complex offering outstanding views of the ocean including world-famous Molokini Crater, the uninhabited island of Kaho’olawe, and the island of Lana’i off in the distance. The grounds of the property feature lush tropical plantings and majestic tall swaying palm trees plus tiki torches surrounding a five-level, 15-unit condominium building. The condominium property is located directly on the ocean fronting Ili’ili Road, which is a calm residential road connecting Charley Young Beach with Cove Park Beach, which is the premier destination in Kihei for both beginner and skilled surfers and paddleboarders alike. Nearby Charley Young Beach, just a block away, is the closest and most scenic section of Kamaole I Beach, part of the strand of the three world-famous Kamaole Beaches.

Located adjacent to Cove Park Beach one block away is Kalama Park, which has jogging trails, barbeque areas, covered pavilions, volleyba
host_about: Thomas is a longtime resident of Maui and enjoys providing guests with comfortable condo rentals in Kihei on the sunny South Shore of Maui. He is an experienced Airbnb Superhost who helps co-host condos and apartments all near the Charley Young Beach area of Kihei, Maui, each of which have earned a lengthy set of positive reviews from pleased guests.

description:

South Maui is open. Kihei, Wailea is open," said Maui County mayor Richard Bissen during a press conference over the weekend. "Maui is not closed."

VISITORS ARE WELCOMED!

Last minute cancellations due to the recent fires means a huge saving for you!

The space

Location! Location! Location!!!

Aloha, if you are looking for the perfect place to call home in Maui, you just found it! Our condo is walking distance to everything in South Kihei! Plus it's central location makes it the perfect place to explore the rest of the island from.

Our family friendly owner managed
neighborhood_overview:
South Kihei is Maui's only true beach town. If you want to have it all - the best beaches, the best restaurants, shopping, snorkeling, surfing etc. all within walking distance then South Kihei is where you want to be.

Unlike other parts of Kihei or even Wailea, you don't have to drive to get everywhere. You can literally walk to have breakfast at the best breakfast spot in Kihei, then go right across the street to take surf or stand up paddle board lessons at the Cove. Then after, head back across the street for some lunch and some shopping at Kalama Village.

Plus South Kihei has the most sunshine of any part of the island. With it's mix of locals, part time residents, and visitors South Kihei definitely has something for everyone.
host_about: Aloha! I'm Tammy. A  wife and mom of two amazing boys who love to have fun and travel. We are so blessed to live in paradise and love sharing the experience of visiting our beautiful island with our guests.

neighborhood_overview:
The terrific location of this Maui paradise places you within steps of Kamaole Beach Park I! With sandy shores, calmer waves, and a garden area, this park is the ideal area to spend the day paddle boarding, surfing, and snorkeling.

There are many more beaches dappled all along the coast, including Kamaole Beach Parks II and III, Keawakapu Beach, and Wailea Beach. For an oceanfront adventure, charter a fishing boat, book a whale watching excursion, or go on a scuba diving tour!

Explore more of the island when you visit the Maui Tropical Plantation, go hiking at Iao Valley State Park, or drive to the Haleakala Crater. A short 15-minute will take you to the renowned Maui Ocean Center with hundreds of oceanic species.

Mike is the cofounder and CEO of KOALA. His mission is to make it secure and easy for travelers like you to access space and resort amenities at affordable prices.

description:

The bedrooms are joined by a main open kitchen and living space. The entire house has amazing tropical and ocean views. Take steps down to your own lush green jungle. You can hear the ocean waves crashing in between the rustling of palm trees and angelic variety of birds. Each day at sunrise and sunset is breathtaking. Trust us you won't want to leave!

The space
The house has been fully renovated with brand new hard wood floors, brand new kitchen cabinets and island and fully renovated bathrooms. Brand new furniture throughout, in classic mid century/ modern style. Fully furnished lanai with additional space to lounge, lay back, and enjoy breakfast, lunch and dinner outside. Don't forget sneakers if you want to use the downstairs laundry.

Guest access
Guests have full access to the property. Main level
