If you want to be far enough away to feel like you're not in the city this place is for you. Blocks down is the neighborhood special "Pebble Beach" which is a divers paradise. During whale season this is the best area for whale watching. There's also an additional secret black sand beach if you can find it on your hike!

description:
Located in the heart of Hawaiian Paradise Park, the second largest sub-division in the United States, this exquisite vacation rental is only 3 minute drive to ocean, conveniently located to many tourist attractions and adventure activities.

The space
This elegant 1,750 sq. ft. home offers 4 bedrooms, each with its own en suite bathroom. This house can accommodate up to 10 guests. Each bedroom has a queen size bed that sleeps two. Two of the larger bedrooms have an extra full-size futon that can easily convert to a bed that sleeps extra guest. There is enough parking on site and is gated for extra security. 3 of the 4 bedrooms have its own separate entrance -- makes for an ideal place for a group vacation.

Your family will have access to the whole house including the main kitchen, great room and covered lanai. There is a laundry facility for your convenience located to the right of the house. There are many fruit trees on the back side of the ho
neighborhood_overview: Our property is located in Hawaiian Paradise Park, the 2nd largest subdivision in the United States. This subdivision consists of about 137 miles of roadways and 8,850 lots. The area is very quiet and peaceful surrounded with trees and foliage.  There is a children playground about a minute drive away.  Most residents enjoy the Swap Meet at the Activity Center on every first Saturday of the month.  Our property is only 3 minute drive to ocean where you can see local residents enjoy the sunrise or sunset, fishing or walking along the beautiful coastal trail.  At your stay, make sure to check out the Maku'u Farmers Market, the largest farmers market on the East side of the island, which is about 10 minutes away.  It opens every Sundays where you can get souvenirs, food, music entertainment or simply hangout and talk story.
host_about: It's a pleasure to allow us to introduce ourselves.  My name is Jim Lee, the owner of this property along with my wife, Amy.  In 2005, we moved to the Big Island from the San Francisco Bay Area and loved living here in this paradise since. We are both college and university graduates. I graduated with an AA degree in Hospitality/Culinary Art and an AS degree in Psychology. My wife, Amy, has a BA degree in Chinese.  Previously we owned a Bed and Breakfast and had served many happy guests from around the world.  With our prior hosting experience, we hope you find confidence in choosing us as your hosts during your next vacation.  Aloha!

description:
Kahala 223 at Poipu Kai Resort - Make this incredible one-bedroom, one-bath condominium, your home away from home for an unforgettable Hawaiian dream vacation!
*Maximum occupancy and sleeping arrangements for 4 guests.

The space
Immediately upon entry, take in the dazzling light brimming from the large dining room picture windows and expansive glass door leading to the balcony lanai. Updated island décor, plush carpet, and a spacious master suite with a California king-sized bed will offer a feeling of comfort and relaxation, while the fully equipped kitchen provides everything needed to cook up a delectable feast. Breathe in the intoxicating scent of the beautiful plumeria blossoms from the private lanai while being mesmerized by the picturesque scenery of towering coconut trees swaying in the breeze and breathtaking views of the magical Pacific Ocean.

Property Amenities
*AC in Master Suite Only; Ceiling and Floor Fans in Living and Dining
neighborhood_overview: Poʻipū Beach Park is located in the community of Poʻipū on the southern coast of Kauaʻi island in Hawaii. The beach is a park has lifeguards provided by the county of Kauaʻi.
host_about:
Suite Paradise – The gateway to island living.

Suite Paradise in sunny Poipu Beach on Kauai is home to hundreds of vacation rental properties, amenable to any sized group and any specifications you could think of. With the highest level of service and a wide range of vacation rental options, Suite Paradise can ensure that your stay is as seamless as Kauai’s lifestyle.

Choose from luxurious beach resorts, each with multiple pools and spas within walking distance and top-of-the-line amenities, including, but not limited to, full membership to Poipu Beach Athletic Club for the duration of your stay. Poipu Kai consists of 70 acres of lush tropical foliage and some of Kauai’s most sought-after vacation rentals. One complex is literally located nestled in a verdant and extinct volcano crater – you can’t get more immersed in the island lifestyle than that! From mauka (mountain) to makai (sea), Suite Paradise has something for you!

Kahala – A popular complex that is home to mostly one- and two-bedroom units. Kahala is only a short walk from the beach, and closest to Poipu Kai’s tennis courts and Kalapaki Joe’s sports bar. With the option of both mountain and ocean views available dependent on the unit, Kahala’s location is perfectly situated with proximity to Poipu Road as well as the Poipu Kai greenbelt.

Makanui – Two- and three-bedroom units perched across from Poipu Crater, with stunning mountain views, distant ocean views, and a short walk to the greenbelt path.

Manualoha –Less than a mile from the beach, although the complex pool is practically attached to the Pacific Ocean! With units sleeping four to six, easy access to the greenbelt pathway, and hues of purple bougainvillea draped throughout the complex.

Poipu Sands – One- and two-bedroom units with incredible ocean views, spacious lanais, and a short walk to Shipwreck’s Beach.

Regency – Larger units, spacious enough to accommodate up to 10 guests. Many of these units are newly remodeled and offer AC. Regency and Kahala sit right next to each other.

Regency Villas – Luxury units with central AC. Regency Villas often feature a loft and sleep up to five guests. Situated near the greenbelt for easy access to many resort amenities, and centrally located for a short walk to Brennecke's Beach, or access to the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort.

Nihi Kai Villas - A comfortable and quiet beach resort with 70 condos to choose from. Located right across from the ocean.

Poipu Crater – Just as the name says, Poipu Crater is nestled in a verdant an extinct volcano crater, which makes the foliage truly breathtaking. With 30 condos to choose from, sleeping four to six guests, the choice is yours! Enjoy the tropical gardens and central location to all that Poipu has to offer.

Lawai Beach Resort - Luxurious oceanfront condos located directly across from arguably the best snorkeling spot on the island. Enjoy a short stroll to five-star dining at The Beach House or enjoy the view from Lawai Beach, as the surfers paddle out for a sunset session. With room to sleep up to six, Lawai Beach Resort has it all!

Poipu Kapili - A beautiful and peaceful resort located on five acres of meticulously landscaped oceanfront property.

Pili Mai - This is Kauai’s newest resort development of luxury condominiums, nestled among a championship golf course.

description:
Beautifully renovated two bedroom condo with loft has Ocean and Garden View. Open feel. Newly remodeled kitchen.

The space
Beautifully renovated two bedroom condo with loft has Ocean and Garden View. Newly remodeled kitchen with stone counter top, and new walk-in showers with etched designer tile. King bed in master bedroom. Queen bed in loft area. Open feel. An additional door from the loft has been installed to the upstairs bath, allowing air to flow through upstairs area. Downstairs bedroom has two twin beds. Comfortable rattan furniture, with queen hide-a-bed in living area. Well stocked unit. Wireless internet installed. Very large, new flat screen TV in living room, and also TV in master bedroom. No smoking in unit, please.

host_about:
The complex is located directly across from Kamaole III State Beach Park, which is known as one of the most beautiful and safest beaches in the Islands.  It is perfect for swimming, snorkeling, sunning, jogging, picnicking, kite flying, and especially enjoying amazing sunsets and whale watching.

Each unit has a private lanai that faces the interior of the complex, offering views of the expansive lawns, pools, and lush tropical landscape of palm trees, hibiscus, birds of paradise and plumeria trees.  Most lanais also offer views of the beautiful Pacific Ocean and spectacular sunsets.  

There are two pools, a covered pavilion, and a full size tennis court on the property.  Every evening the outdoor barbecue area is a popular spot to socialize while grilling the perfect dinner and watching as the Hale Kamaole conch shell band performs their nightly sunset ritual.

You will find world class golf courses, fantastic snorkeling and diving, many Maui activities, abundant shopping and delicious fine and family dining all within minutes of Hale Kamaole.

With its large yard and fire pit, passover kitchen counter, and large patio, this property is perfect for beach lovers with lots of room to roam on the acre property.

The space
Hale Ula Ula can sleep up to 8 guests comfortably with its 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. A Smart TV is available, allowing you to log into streaming services from the living room. This home does not have air conditioning however it does have ceiling fans to keep the Hawai’ian trade winds blowing.

This vintage, open air 1940's home has much of its original antique fixtures still in use. It is located 5 minutes from Kahuku and just 10 minutes from the Polynesian Cultural Center, BYU-Hawaii, and local shopping and restaurants. Take a beach walk along

description:
Our 1550 sq ft, fully Air Conditioned, 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath unit is on the ground floor in lush tropical landscaping, a 5 minute walk to Poipu Beach.

Enjoy a large jacuzzi tub in the master bathroom, full kitchen, 50 inch TV in the living room and large TVs in both bedrooms, plus a BBQ grill and outdoor dining on your private lanai.

The space
Description:
The Aloha unit is located on ground facing the front garden on a quiet street. It was renovated in 2017 and has granite counters in the bathrooms and kitchens, stainless steel appliances, berber carpeting, hardwood floors, solid core interior doors, baseboards and crown molding.

Cleaning Policy:
Your health and safety are our top priority. We are now following a thoroughly enhanced cleaning policy. This home has been thoroughly cleaned using SafeStay standards, an EPA approved, hospital-grade disinfectant that has been found to kill 99.9% of detectable pathogens. The front door is th
neighborhood_overview: We're conveniently located in the heart of Poipu Beach. This is a resort area with many restaurants, grocery stores and shopping located in a one mile radius. Poipu Beach is consistently voted as one of the best beaches in the US and has sections for snorleking, boogie boarding, beginner and intermediate surfing.
host_about:
Hello! My name is Sri and I am the owner of several vacation rentals in both San Francisco and Hawaii. I am incredibly blessed to call these two beautiful places my home and to be able to share my properties with travelers from all over the world. 

I currently reside in San Francisco, but my second home is in Hawaii, where I spend a lot of time with my family. We are thankful to have the opportunity to experience the beauty and culture of both places, and I am excited to share this experience with our guests. 

Our vacation rental properties in San Francisco offer the perfect blend of city living and relaxation, with easy access to all the city has to offer, including popular attractions, restaurants, and shopping. 
Our Hawaii properties are located in some of the most beautiful spots on the island, allowing you to truly relax and enjoy the tropical paradise.

Being able to provide vacation rental properties in both San Francisco and Hawaii is truly a dream come true for me. 
I take great pride in ensuring that our guests have the best possible experience when staying in our properties and I am always available to help with anything they need. 
I believe that everyone should have the opportunity to experience the beauty and wonder of these two amazing places and I am grateful to be able to help make that happen. Thank you for considering our properties and I hope to welcome you soon!

description:
Our peaceful home is a great place for your vacation on Hawaii island. It has a beautiful yard with many mature fruit trees and tropical flowers. It is located in Pahoa, about 15 minutes from the hot ponds, and 30 minutes from Hilo airport.

The space
Aloha,
Luxury at a great price. Come and Stay in our beautiful hale and enjoy Hawaii Island. You can enjoy our entire home to yourself. Our home is very comfortable. It is peaceful and quiet. It's a great home base while you explore Hawaii island.
You can rest assured you will be very comfortable. We have tried to provide everything you need for a comfortable vacation. Please contact me if you have any questions. We are happy to help.
Our home has free local and long distance calling available from our land line, wireless internet, and satellite tv. The garden has fruit trees and beautiful tropical fauna.
The master bedroom has a king size bed with a private bathroom.
The guest bedroom ha
neighborhood_overview:
We love that our neighborhood is quiet and peaceful yet only five minutes from the nearest town. Our home is located near the lava tree state park.

Take note and study the area before booking. We are happy to answer any questions you may have. We are located in a remote area. Very different from waikiki. If you enjoy nature this is the place for you. If you're looking for shopping and hustle and bustle this is not the right area for your vacation.

Our home is located about 30 minutes from Hilo town. It is in a rural area. You will enjoy the peaceful quiet evenings with great stargazing opertunities.
There are lots of interesting sights to see near our home. You can go snorkeling the Wai Opae Marine sanctuary, swim in the natural hot ponds, go surfing at Pohoiki beach, or visit the Blacksand beach at Kalapana. These are just a few things you can enjoy staying in our home.
host_about:
Aloha, 
We love Hawaii. We offer our homes to our guests and want you to enjoy this amazing place as much as we do. Have a great vacation.

description:
Our Luxe Loft is located at Turtle Bay Kuilima Estates East on the North Shore of Oahu. Nestled in between the world famous Palmer Golf course, you will enjoy resort amenities with the comfort of condo living. The North Shore of Oahu is referred to as the 7 mile miracle, for its beautiful white sand beaches, world class waves and crystal blue waters. From Hale'iwa Beach Park to Sunset Beach, you will find the most beautiful shore line found anywhere on earth. It is truly a magical place.

The space
Our Luxe Loft has been newly renovated in January 2023. It's a spacious loft offering you luxury relaxation and catering to your every need. Our condo features a loft bedroom with a California King size bed, Casper 4 layer premium foam mattress with 3 inch mattress topper. Top end luxury sheets and duvet's from Brooklinen. Our condo is ideal for a romantic getaway for 2 or can accommodate up to 4 people with an additional queen pull out sofa bed. We provide all Public
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet and friendly, so please respect this nature of living. There will be no additional guests allowed, no parties or events allowed and you will need to reserve quiet hours between 9:00pm and 8:00am.
host_about: Aloha and welcome to our home! I hope you enjoy it as much as we do :)

description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. Enjoy cool evenings and a little feel of paradise. Take a stroll down to the cliffs, hike to a secluded beach or take a drive to see the volcano. The options are limitless when you’re in paradise, there’s just so much to see.

The space
This property features a loft bed with a pull out sofa. It’s located in the countryside, so it’s peaceful and away from all the traffic noises.
neighborhood_overview: We are just a few streets from the ocean, take a relaxing stroll or bike ride to enjoy the sights, sounds and smell.  Or you can just enjoy the tropical sounds and breeze of the islands while on our property.
host_about:
Talofa,

My name is Lisa, my ancestors are from this beautiful island that we now call home.  I love family and nature and everything that is good and wholesome!  I also enjoy getting to know people and look forward to getting to know you!

description:
Laid back, retro-inspired + uber comfy, this unique space is perfect for those seeking a stylish, authentic Hawaiian experience. Just 20 minutes from Kona, the chill pace of South Kona offers that much needed retreat.

Deliciously warm breezes blow through your screened-in living space, or lanai. Vinyl records, a classic cruiser and that shade of blue which perfectly matches the nearby ocean you'll be enjoying, gives all the beach vibes you've been craving. Long-term discounts offered!

The space
You deserve for your vacation to be blissful. You seek a place of rest, relaxation and something memorable.

With this in mind, we love doing the little extras to make you feel special. Our goal is to exceed your expectations by providing an impeccably clean and comfortable nest at an excellent value that satisfies all your senses.

SEE
All the furnishings, bedding, kitchen appliances and dishes are carefully procured and artfully des
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is where many tour companies bring guests to enjoy Old Hawaii and sample coffee at nearby farms. The area is supremely lush and beautiful. Our nest is located in the stunning South Kona scenic corridor.

This area has been the heart of Kona for generations. It provides ideal growing conditions for coffee and many fruits with its sunny mornings and moderate rainfall. It is the most magical climate where you don't need air conditioning or a heater year round. Even the wild chickens and coqui frogs agree, South Kona is the place to be!

The neighborhood is full of ALOHA found in awesome coffee shops (HiCo + Kaya's are our favs) and great places to eat, like the Coffee Shack, Black Rock Pizza, Shaka Tacos, the Sunday Captain Cook Market, Super J's, Jake's BBQ, Menehunue Cafe, and Junjira's Fresh Thai!

But our favorite thing about this place, besides all the good food, coffee, history, climate, beauty, critters, is the underwater world
host_about:
Aloha!
We are thrilled be your helpful guides to our beautiful Hawaiian island! As you can see from our raving reviews, guests are loving their experiences staying with us just as much as we are enjoying them!  We are a professional team with backgrounds in education, law, and business and we love swapping our street suits for swimsuits to enjoy our favorite feature of Hawaii.  We are ocean fanatics who do our best to get in the water most days for a swim, snorkel, dive or surf. session.  We can't wait to share our ALOHA with you!

description: Our Mstr 1 BDRM 1.5 bath (Large bedroom divided by shoji door, sleeps 6)  tri-level townhouse style condo is few yards away from Kailua village yet it gives you a peaceful, serene private vacation home.  Just across Royal Kona Resort, our condo offers free private covered carport right next to your entrance door. Enjoy your morning coffee with the pool view and peek a boo ocean view from our 2 lanais  on each floor. Our condo offers full amenities that beats any hotel in downtown Big Island!
host_about: We love to travel!!  Our family find traveling to be the best way to experience culture, food and create memories.

description:
Overlooking the beautiful Kona Coast...The Ulu Inn, Kona's first Luxury Geodesic Dome says: "Aloha".

Located in historic Holualoa, home of World Famous Kona Coffee, your stay will awaken your senses. Our 5 acre farm boast amazing panoramic views, is situated with a rural feel, but is less than 10 minutes from all the conveniences of Kailua-Kona stores, restaurants and adventures. Goats, Pigs, Geckos & wild birds roam the property and add to the peace you are sure to find here on the farm.

The space
The Geodesic dome is 23ft (7m) in circmferemce with the ceiling rising almost 20ft High.

Your private bathroom is just steps away outside the geodome and has a sink, toilet and stand up shower with all the bathroom ammenities you may need.

The dome sits on a 42x36’ deck, Equipment with shaded Gazebo, picnic table, BBQ Grill and hanging Egg chairs for relaxing.

Guest access
The whole Geodome and deck area are for
neighborhood_overview: Holualoa is a Historic little town where Kona Coffee was born and still thrives today. If you drive into Holualoa Village, you’ll find ART galleries, boutiques and cafe’s. If you happen to be here on the FIRST FRIDAY of the month, there is a “Holualoa First Friday” Festival that features, music, additional vendors and most all of the regular stores hold night time hours for the event.
host_about:
Hey...We are SHAN & PENA and we’re so excited to Welcome you to The Ulu Inn, our Geodesic Dome! 

We are from Kona, on the west side of Big Island, Hawaii. Pena is originally from Tahiti, French Polynesia. 

We’ve loved using AirBnB’s in many places in the world from Italy, France, Istanbul, New York, Philadelphia, Honolulu and many more. We love the feeling of “home” that most of the AirBnB’s that we’ve stayed in have provided and look forward to experiencing your piece of home on our stay at your place. 

Now that our 4 girls have moved out and we are retired, travel has become more easy and frequent. When we welcome you into our AirBnB, please know that we are tidy and respectful and will care for your home as if it were our own, we just ask that you do the same at ours. 
We look forward to meeting you at some point during your stay. 
Aloha,
SHAN & PENA

neighborhood_overview:
Waikoloa Beach is an area located on the South Kohala coast on the island of Hawaii. Approximately 25 minutes north of the Kona International Airport (KOA). The Waikoloa Beach Resort is very family and pedestrian friendly. Most properties are within a 10-15 minute walk (3-5minute drive with ample parking) to ʻAnaehoʻomalu Bay, also known as A-Bay. A-Bay is a shallow water bay located within the resort. ʻAnaehoʻomalu is best known for its sunsets, snorkeling and historic royal fishponds.
The Queens’ MarketPlace and Kings’ Shops provide convenient dining and shopping options.

We look forward to building our relationship with Air BnB!

This 15th floor condo has amazing city views, overlooks the 6th floor pool deck, and is only a few short blocks from the beach!

Hosted by RedAwning Vacation Rentals

Welcome to RedAwning, a whole new way to travel. We make staying in a unique home or apartment easier than staying at a hotel. By partnering with local homeowners throughout North America, we provide you with the largest collection of vacation homes in the most destinations. Every stay includes our experienced 24/7 customer assistance by text, chat, email and phone, and access to all your travel details via our free mobile app. We offer consistent terms and flexible cancellation policies, and we include accidental damage protection for every stay with no security deposits and a best rate guarantee. description:
Hale Ono Loa, which means "House of good living" in our native Hawaiian language, perfectly captures the essence of this oceanfront paradise. Situated along the beautiful beachfront of West Maui, this cozy and quaint property boasts stunning ocean views that will leave you breathless. Relax on your private ground floor lanai with a cup of Kona coffee in the morning, and immerse yourself in the serene beauty of the glistening ocean just steps away.

The space
Additional Description:

One of the most impressive features of Hale Ono Loa is its jaw-dropping sundecks, which sit practically on top of the ocean. From here, you can descend a set of stairs to the reef below for an unforgettable snorkeling experience. If you're looking for a comfortable and convenient place to stay, look no further than Hale Ono Loa 117.

This 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo comfortably accommodates up to 6 guests, with a master bedroom offering a king-size bed and the
neighborhood_overview: Honokowai

description:
Surrounded by orchids and other tropical flowers, the cottage is located on two lovely landscaped acres - 30 minutes from Hilo or Hawaii Volcanoes National Park.

The property is solar powered, an off-grid sustainable system with 4G phone service and fiber optic wifi.

The last two miles are on unpaved gravel road in variable condition depending upon how much rain we've had lately. Four wheel drive isn't necessary but an SUV or similar vehicle with higher clearance is recommended.

The space
If you want a peaceful and beautiful place to get away, this is for you. Often the only sounds you'll hear are the birds singing and the wind in the ironwood trees. At night, the coqui tree frogs will sing you to sleep or you may hear the patter of rain on the metal roof.

The property is 30 minutes from either Hilo or Hawaii Volcanoes National Park. The last two miles are on unpaved gravel road in variable condition depending upon how much rain
neighborhood_overview: Io Kea Cottage is in the subdivision of Hawaiian Acres, approximately 5 miles off Hwy 11 near the village of Mountain View. It's in a quiet country neighborhood half way between Hilo and Hawaii Volcanoes National Park and about 2 hours from Kona Airport.
host_about:
Aloha! I'm 70ish, grew up on a small farm in Nebraska, and previously lived in Colorado and Texas where I received my MA at the University of Houston. I'm the author of MY VIEW FROM THE HOUSE BY THE SEA: A LIFE TRANSFORMED BY SAMOA AND THE PEACE CORPS, a memoir of one of my many adventures since I retired as Real Estate Asset Manager for the state of Colorado. I stay busy growing orchids, writing, movies, travel, reading, renovating the 40-year old family home on the property, and meeting new friends.

I have experience as a professional tour guide on the Big Island and will be happy to provide information and recommendations.

Nearby Pu‘uhonua o Hōnaunau, an ancient sanctuary whose name means "the place of refuge," could easily describe this resort. Oceanfront, modern, and conveniently tucked outside Kailua-Kona, tranquility reigns. It’s the ideal home-base for all of your island adventures.

host_about: Hello! After many years of vacation club and property ownership, we have had the opportunity to appreciate how extremely convenient and comfortable these style stays can be for all types of travel. As our family has grown, we've found that we have more than we need and are able to utilize every year which lead us to start offering our properties at a great deal to others! With years of experience, our knowledge has allowed us to help others enjoy their vacations and make life long memories. We've been able to grow the services we offer into a business that now also manages multiple different owners with various types of ownerships!  We are happy to be in a place where we can help both owners and vacationers, so don't hesitate to ask for what you need - even if it is not directly listed! We can often book multiple units and/or offer nearby locations. Booking multiple condos at one of our resorts is one of our favorite ways to get family and friends together. Whether you are celebrating or simply spending time together with friends or family, book with us for your next vacation -  Traveling only expands one's horizons!

description:

Step outside through the sliding glass door onto a covered lanai, and be captivated by breathtaking ocean views from both the dining and cozy seating areas. Immerse yourself in the serene surroundings as you savor your morning coffee or unwind with a sunset cocktail. Enjoy your favorite tunes with the Bose 500 smart speaker, creating the perfect soundtrack for your island getaway.

Tax ID W01822068-01

The space
**Spacious Living, Stunning Views:**

This fully furnished studio offers over 600 square feet of living space and a private lanai with ocean views. You'll find a comfortable Queen size Murphy bed, and an additional day bed is available if needed. The kitchenette is equipped with a cooktop, microwave oven, and refrigerator for added convenience. Stay cool and comfortable with ceiling and floor fans on days when the trade winds are light.

**Conveniently Loca
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is set in a quiet hillside neighborhood of Kailua-Kona. Wailua trail is minutes away offering a path for both walking or running. Kaloko-Honokōhau National Historical Park and Kamakahonu National Historic Landmark, for sea turtle viewing and ocean activities, are a short drive away, as are beaches and art galleries in downtown Kailua-Kona.
host_about: We have lived in Kona since 1999 and built our home. We enjoy an active outdoor lifestyle with our two kids and look forward to meeting you.

Legal vacation rental at a fabulous location!
This brand new, 1000 sq ft, 2 bedroom 2 bath with 2 balcony home is across from ‘Alohilani Resort, Steps away from the Waikiki Strip (Kalakaua Ave) and Waikiki beach! There are endless shopping, dinning, and activities within walking distance. This unit comes with a FREE dedicated reserved parking stall onsite. Super convenient and a rare find.

The space
This 2 bedroom 2 bath home is on the 10th floor in a 17 floors building. Fully renovated, amazing design with functional floor plan. The spacious living area has a leather sectional sofa, a large TV, and a window AC. A balcony with a peek a boo ocean view. A gourmet kitchen with dinning table and chairs. Each bedroom has a TV, window AC, and comfortable beds. Both hallway bathroom and En suite bathroom have gorgeous walk in showers. The primary bedroom can be a separate living area, it comes with a kitchenette with a mini fridge and a second balcony with a conve
neighborhood_overview: Welcome to Waikiki, the most lively and busy neighborhood on Oahu, the ultimate tourist destination! We are across from the ‘Alohilani Resort, and located just one block from Kalakaua Avenue and Waikiki Beach! We are also within walking distance to the Honolulu Zoo, Waikiki Aquarium, Royal Hawaiian Shopping Center, International Market Place, and Waikiki Beach Walk! You will find world class shopping and dinning around here, you will also find local favors, food trucks, hole in the wall eateries, mom and pop restaurants, small boutiques, etc. you get the best of both worlds!

Hi there! 

I put a lot of care and efforts to make sure my home is comfy and clean for your stay. I feel happy and accomplished when my guests enjoyed their vacation in Paradise. I’m a chill person, and I always try to be very responsive to my guests. 

Cheers!

description:
Elevate your next trip to the 'Aloha State' when you stay at this 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom vacation rental condo in Kailua-Kona. Tropical decor fills the over 1,800 square feet of living space and the unit comfortably sleeps up to 4 guests. Ideally located in the Kona Coast Resort, you'll enjoy access to 2 pools, hot tubs, a golf course, and much more. When you're done exploring the property, get out and take part in the ample outdoor opportunities that can be found on the island.

The space
Bedroom 1: California King Bed | Bedroom 2: California King Bed

Sunlight cascades into the open living area through the wall of sliding glass doors. Watch a movie in the living room on the flat-screen cable TV while you relax on the plush furnishings including a couch and 2 armchairs.

With excellent cross ventilation through windows on 3 sides and sliding doors in the living room and dining room, the villa is easily cooled by the trade winds and mountain b
neighborhood_overview:
The resort is 15 miles south from Kona International Airport and 5 miles south of Kona town!

Head into town and browse the local shops for a souvenir to take home with you. After a day of shopping, stop by the Kona Brewing Company to experience local cuisine and drinks that will leave you full and happy.

Across the street from the resort is the Keauhou Shopping Center with grocery store, drug store, urgent care medical center, post office, theater, entertainment, restaurants, service station, open-air farmers' market and more.

Dolphin Discoveries offers a variety of water activities including whale watching, snorkeling, and dolphin tours that offer a chance to swim with the animals. Experienced divers will want to check out Big Island Divers for all of their scuba diving needs including a night dive that offers the chance to spot a giant manta ray.

The west coast of Hawai'i is known to be rocky but you can find a soft sand beach 1/4 miles a

description:
o
Our huge 1-bedroom condo is available for the Iron Man World Championship. It is at the Sea Village resort right, on the ocean, so close, that the waves can hit the building. 1 mile from Ironman start line with spectacular ocean & sunset views. Full kitchen, a convenient Washer & Dryer in condo unit Very comfortable for 4 adults. Queen beds in bedroom and wall bed in great room. Sofa that can be slept on too. host_about:
KonaDave is a coffee farmer and world traveler!  His great, great, great uncle brought the first coffee plants to Kona in 1828, the rest is coffee history.  

He was born in Seattle, Washington and when not traveling the world splits his time between homes in Kona, Hawaii, and Edmonds, Washington. He travels over 100 days a year. He grew up (friends say he never grew up) in Seattle and graduated from the University of Washington before a career in the newspaper business and advertising. He worked for a Washington Post company and the San Francisco Chronicle. 

He "retired" from the newspaper business when his daughter was born in 1987. When she was three months old KonaDave started traveling the world.  His daughter left dirty diapers in 24 countries before she was three. KonaDave has explored over 100 nations and states around the world. Italy is his favorite to visit.   He also runs a real estate investment company between travels.  

He loves to show people Hawaii's hidden treasures and his KonaZona Coffee Farm, Art  Gardens and Tiki Village.  Come visit him at the farm and he will let you pick all the coffee, fruit or flowers to take back to the condo.  He will share and cup of Kona Coffee or Mai Tai in his backyard Tiki Bar.  If you are lucky one of his famous parties will happen when you are in town.  They are legendary!!  The KonaZona is only 4 miles and 100 years away in historic Artist filled Holualoa town.  KonaDave  and the famous KonaZona Coffee Farm, Art Garden and Tiki Village  are easy to find on the internet. Check it out on your internet explorations of the Big Island!

We have two old Hawaiian churches and we have a really beautiful guestbook, which shares more about the history of this place and the valley we are located in.

neighborhood_overview: If you want an authentic Hawaiian experience living among the locals in a "real" Hawaiian neighborhood, away from the tourists but close to all the amenities and action, this is the place for you.  You'll be close to both the north and south shores of the island, with easy access to Waimea on the west, while staying in the heart of historic Kapa'a Town and its plentiful shopping, dining and fantastic nearby beaches.  As a dedicated vacation rental, Oceanfront Rhythm and Harmony are professionally cleaned and designed with the traveler in mind, meaning you won't be living in someone else's home.  But, we've put all the care into decorating and designing it as if it was our home, so you get the best of both worlds.   We would be honored to have you as our guest.
host_about: Welcome to Oceanfront Rhythm, Oceanfront Harmony, and Oceanfront Melody, all located on the stunning island of Kauai.  Rhythm and Harmony are short-term rentals, and Melody is available for long-term rent (6 months or more).   Contact us to learn more!

description:
Ours is one of the prime units in Plantation Hale, a quaint, laid-back, two-story condo complex with a superb location right across the street from the beach. Our close neighbors are :
* The Plantation Marketplace, an outdoor complex of shops and restaurants
* The Beachboy Hotel, with it's highly rated Hukilau restaurant and spa
* Lava Lava Restaurant with tables right on the sand

And one of the very best things about our place is that it's right on an eleven mile oceanfront bike path!

The space
Our condo is in a sweet, wonderfully located complex that is more what visitors expect when they come to Hawaii. The buildings are all two-stories tall, with only ten units on each floor. There are multiple swimming pools and hot tubs around the property. We completely gutted our condo about five years ago and made it an inviting, light-filled, Hawaiian space, filled with hard to find vintage rattan furniture and accented by a very contemporar
neighborhood_overview:
We've lived on the East Side of Kauai for 41 years, and still think it's the best side of the island. It has gorgeous beaches and hikes and is within an hour of both ends of the island, making the south, west and north shores easy to visit. I've left a book of suggestions in the condo, but will repeat some here....
1. Walk the glorious beach south of Lydgate State Park. You'll probably walk for at least a mile without seeing anyone else.
2. You have three choices for hiking the Sleeping Giant: walk up the east face, the west face or you can walk along the side of the mountain, through a bamboo forest.
3. Shop the stores in Kapaa Town, especially if you happen to be staying for the first Saturday night of the month, when the stores stay open late. There are food booths, entertainers and a hugely festive atmosphere to it all. I co-own one of the stores, KIKO. It's down a little alley on the main drag and very popular with tourists and locals alike. Not your usual tourist
host_about: I am an artist/designer (and former co-owner of a Sotheby's real estate company on Kauai, Hawaii).  I'm impulsive and a perfectionist -- a Virgo who is obsessed with making things look right (at least to my eye). I've been married to my husband, a retired pediatrician, for 51 years (yikes!). Yoga has been a big part of my life for the past thirty years, and I am certified to teach. We've traveled the world and fallen in love with many places, but  San Miguel  de Allende and Kauai, Hawaii came closest to perfection for me. They are my happy places, fulfilling my need to be around beaches, art, strong cultural traditions, indigenous people and perhaps most importantly, people who are kind to their children.

Halii Kai’s spacious two, and three bedroom vacation villas and town homes are thoughtfully designed so families and friends have the perfect mix of privacy and open living spaces.

 - Privacy for parents and children 
 - Separate rooms create private space to spread out and relax.
 - Fully equipped kitchens 
 - Access to a kitchen reduces stress, saves time and cuts costs.
 - In-room washers and dryers 
 - Save time, pack less, save on baggage fees and stay fresh.
 - All the comforts of home 
 - But with daily housekeeping and amazing views.

Castle Resorts & Hotels was founded in 1993 and is a wholly owned subsidiary of The Castle Group, Inc. Headquartered in Honolulu, Castle manages a broad portfolio of guest accommodations including value/economy hotels, full-service hotels and spacious all-suite condominium resorts and luxury villas in the Hawaiian Islands on Oahu, Maui, Molokai, Kauai and Hawaii, and in New Zealand on the North Shore of Auckland.

neighborhood_overview: One of my very favorite places in the world, a 1-minute walk from quiet Baby Beach, especially in the morning, and a gorgeous place to see Sunset. Almost always warm, calm swimmable, reef-protected water. A Buddhist Temple and landmark located right off the beach. Also, a short walk to the fun and nightlife of downtown Lahaina with its restaurants, galleries ice cream shops (my favorite local Gelato), wharf, and boats to nearby Lanai or a whale watch. A short walk to fantastic raw food restaurant "Choices" for those on a health kick as well. Birds, flowers, quiet cul-de-sac, with nice neighbors. Baby Beach is as kid-friendly as it gets too!

host_about: I love my homes: one HI, one in Glendale, CA, and one in Las Vegas. I spend my Leisure time on the Big Island and I work from Las Vegas.  My family and I love to travel and meet interesting people. I have been living in the US for over 30 years! I speak 4 languages and blessed to work on a daily basis with a lot of interesting talented people from all over the world as an immigration attorney. I've spent many years living in different places all around the United States and Canada, and finally found the best combination of places to call home: the Big Island of HI and Las Vegas (the 9th island of HI as Las Vegas is called for its hospitality culture!) My family and I are ready to host travelers from all over the world at our three beautiful homes which we love to stay in and share with others when we are not there. When you book, the whole house is yours (except CA, where we are allowed by local regs. to share two separate bedrooms). So don't hesitate to book, you will truly feel like home!

Best ocean front condo! Expansive ocean views; see both sunrise and sunset!! Magnificent Princeville condo will steal your heart. Spacious & well equipped. Simply the best! The space

Comfortably furnished & decorated with contemporary beach flair. FULLY equipped kitchen! Newer fridge, stove & dishwasher. Needs no AC as it is perfectly angled to catch the trade winds through the 2 huge lanai doors. Huge master bedroom with California king memory foam mattress. 2 Full bathrooms. Comfortable Queen
neighborhood_overview: The area of Princeville sits up on a cliff at the beginning of "Kauai's North Shore" and the views and topography just get more and more stunning from there. This is a lovely area with walking paths, beautiful beaches and a small town feel. Complete with shopping (grocery, clothing, souvenirs), restaurants, and a variety of activities. The Cliffs resort is unique in that it has a huge green area out front on the cliff with panoramic views of the ocean. It has beautiful grounds and doesn't feel crowded. It is surrounded by residential neighborhoods and some other condominiums and a handful of hotels. about 45 min from the airport and easy to navigate to other parts of the island for sightseeing and various activities. It also has the best array of amenities we have experienced and retains a very Hawaiian and friendly atmosphere from the staff to the guests (many who have been making return visits to the Cliffs for decades!)
host_about: Canadian by birth but There are many places around the world that have captured pieces of my heart. Happily married and proud mom of two fantastic young men, two lovely  daughter-in-laws, a beautiful grand baby  and 3 grandpups. I love to travel and could happily do so for a living.

Laundry hours are from 9:00 am till 4:00 pm daily.
neighborhood_overview:
Please don't tell anyone how lovely our Black Pebble Beach is at the bottom of the street. We don't want all the tourists here! Keep it private.

At our elevation things are a bit more temperate than you'll find it at the ocean level. It's so temperate year round, no one here owns or needs heaters or AC. Our weather is often very predictable as well here in Kona Paradise. You'll tend to find clear skies and sunshine in the morning, a gentle rain in the afternoon, and broken cloud cover through the evening.

At the bottom of a hill you'll find a black pebble beach with excellent snorkeling (we have extra snorkeling gear to share) and pleasant hikes that run north or south along the coast (but bring rugged shoes, as the lava rough is tough!)
host_about: I move between Hawaii & Texas for living and work, so I may - or may not - be here in Hawaii when you arrive.

host_about:
Aloha Kakou, 

Thank you for checking my home; My name is Mike, and I've been living in Hawaii for 28 years. 

A little bit about myself: I have a degree in Architecture, and own a construction company. I love building and seeing the smile on people's faces when they see the home of their dreams, it puts a smile in my heart. 

The same happiness I get from building, I get from hosting; I love to meet people from all walks of life learn about their cultures, and see the smile on their face when they arrive in my home.

In my free time I enjoy spending it with my family and friends, having a nice glass of good wine with my loved ones, and taking my dogs out for a swim at the beach on a beautiful sunny day.

Enjoy life to the max when you can.  
 
--Mike

2000+ Sq Ft Luxury Villa. Brand New Construction! 3 Full Bedrooms + 3 Full Bathrooms. 500+ sq ft Balcony with BBQ Grill and Outdoor Kitchen. Private Entrance. Full Access to Honua Kai Pools and Amenities.

description:
In The famed Na Pili & Kahana area, on the upper west coast of paradise. ENJOY the exclusive, uncrowded vibe,or drive 4 miles south to Kanapalii or 7 miles to Lahaina town. Right here : Ocean, hiking, & world class GOLF at Kapalua! We could place you at Sands of Kahana Or Kahana Falls Resort . Walk to beach, & within 6 miles , there are 6 great beaches & for your delight : surf, boogie board, snorkel, & swim! We use our timeshare weeks, YES , we have TWO bedrooms that sleep 6 .

The space
I would describe these condos as "humble". If you have to have granite counters & really fancy , best to choose the Marriott or Westin ( which is usually double the price ) .The condos are well equipped with all essentials, stackable washer/dryer and it is all about "LOCATION,location, location".We might have a ONE bedroom OR Two bedroom available for your desired week. Simply request & we can inform you . We love hosting & hope to make this your best holiday . Important
host_about:
We love sharing the ALOHA spirit with guests !  We offer great service and quality condos on : big island , Kauai , Maui and Sedona ! Most people that get to visit any more f these , know immediately what a very special place each of these locations are .We are grateful everyday we get to spend here.  Our condos are  in the BEST location  and we truly enjoy sharing ideas to make this vacation your best ever !. We are sharing our timeshare weeks with guests. The great aspect of that is we can sometimes upgrade you to different neighborhood & the condos are in a professional , high quality resort that at a fraction of the price  ...........we love sharing the Aloha spirit & being of service to you with ideas & suggestions to enhance your experience here in paradise. Our motto for hosting & the rest of life is   " Life is easy " . Our style of traveling see to see many different places within a certain area & experience it as locals. 
Thank you , for the opportunity to host, we are honored & feel confident you will be truly glad you chose our listing !

description:
Come enjoy an old growth Mango Grove in 'Sunny Kopoho' with lots of fruit trees and some of the cleanest air on the island!

At our Gecko Hideaway we provide a fruit basket (seasonally) along with 100% Kona coffee, local macadamia nut chocolates and a citronella candle!

It's glamping at its finest! The landscaped surroundings are very peaceful and relaxing! It's truly a beautiful paradise setting, an experience you wont forget!

*Tobacco permitted outside and Medical Cannabis Friendly*

The space
Our Gecko Hideaway tiny home is glamping with lots of charm! We provide a fruit basket (seasonally) along with 100% Kona coffee, local macadamia nut chocolates and a citronella candle!

At the cabin you'll enjoy the distant sounds of the ocean and coqui frogs at night and during the day you can enjoy the geckos, chameleons, the birds and the rare hawaiian hawks!

We do live off grid and are on water catchment so we ask
neighborhood_overview:
The walk or drive on government beach road from our driveway in either direction is beautiful and definitely an experience you won't forget!

If you are taking a left to Pahoa you'll see the newest 2018 lava flow and if your heading right you'll drive through the jungle and pass by the ocean! It is one of the most scenic routes on the whole island! A must to see!

There is more information in our listing on Getting Around for things to do and see!
host_about:
Aloha!!! My husband Andrew and I moved from Northern California to the Big Island of Hawaii in June 2014 to begin our dream on 3 acres in the jungle!!

We married in February on our property and started our Gecko Hideaway Airbnb in October 2015. In 2016 we had our handsome baby boy Kameron and in 2019 we had our beautiful baby girl Leila! We also love our fur babies! Our dogs names are Kaya and Nala, both sweethearts! Kona, Mira, Coco, and Cali are our kitties and don't be surprised if Kona decides to visit! The only thing we kindly ask is please no animals in the cabin in regards to allergies for any upcoming guests.

We love what we do!! Being self-sufficient in this amazing place is the greatest feeling and to share it with others is even better! We love the outdoors, of course our pets and most importantly our friends and family!

description:

Some have said "it feels like being on a ship at sea" as they witness whales breaching in the ocean and waves peeling on the reef from this magical location. A rare penthouse unit with high ceilings, views from every room, even the famous Bali Hai from the deck. Truly a couple's dream!

The space

This oceanfront condo is a third floor penthouse suite with high ceilings and large windows overlooking the ocean, reef and coastline. It has recently been completely renovated so everything in this place is brand NEW! All flooring, fixtures, kitchen appliances and cabinets, furniture, bathroom vanity and tile have been newly repla
neighborhood_overview:
Things to note***
A permit is required for out of state visitors to Ha’ena State park. If you wish to visit Ha'ena State Park which includes Ke'e Beach or hike the Napali Coast trail, you must make a reservation with the Division of State parks well in advance (30 days) because the spots fill up quickly. Hawaii residents are permitted entry. Please check Ha'ena State Park Day-Use www. go haena dot com for more information.
***Our community pool is now open, please use the key found by the door and return to place before check out to avoid charges ****

WELCOME TO PRINCEVILLE!
Named after the Hawaiian crown Prince Albert Kamehameha, Princeville is one of the most beautiful and quaint ocean view resort communities in all of Hawai'i. With dramatic cliffs overlooking the sea and a backdrop of lush, tropical mountains often boasting several waterfalls, Princeville is situated on the bluffs overlooking Hanalei Bay and the distant Makana (Bali Hai) Mountain. Sealodge

description:

Located across the street from the world-famous Waikiki Beach, you have easy walking access to restaurants, shops and entertainment. This picturesque penthouse offers new appliances, comfortable beds, in-house laundry, A/C, a lanai with a spectacular view and more. Your dream vacation awaits!

The space

Next door is a guest bedroom with 2 twin beds, a mountain view, and a full bathroom just across the hallway. Inside the penthouse you will also find a full sized kitchen, living & dining room area, and an outdoor lanai that offers a spectacular ocean view. We also provide sheets for the pull out couch

Perfect for watching dolphins, turtles and the seasonal migration of whales as well as listening to the roar of the ocean below, this spacious and private residence is perfect for those who want to experience all that oceanfront living has to offer.

host_about:
No Ka'Oi or "The Best" - Maui is simply the best. If you traveled the world, you'll be hard pressed to find better than the island of Maui. 

A few things I love about Maui are the health, clean air and aloha spirit. We enjoy slowing down on Maui, eating in season local fruit, attending Farmer's markets, dipping our toes in the ocean and relaxing. I hope you love your stay in Maui and we are grateful to be a part of it.

description:
Maui is open, aloha found here!

Experience the best that Maui has to offer at our updated coastal retreat with dreamy ocean views and a large private lanai. Stroll to the beautiful, world-renowned beaches, dine at delicious local restaurants, and shop at charming boutiques. South Maui's main surf break is just across the street. The space
*South Maui including Kihei is open and welcoming guests. Aloha found here. The west side is still closed for now, and we have been hosting survivors of the wildfires at zero cost to them. Reservations are now being opened up again for visitors. We would love to welcome you to south Maui.*

As hosts, we love the convenience of this central location and all that it has to offer. I make a habit of viewing both the sea and Haleakala volcano from the
neighborhood_overview: Kihei is a relaxed south Maui beach town.  Situated just 25 minutes south of the airport, and just north of the world class Wailea beach.  Many locals call this area home, and for good reason. It is dotted with beautiful beaches hosting calm clear waters.  It is the perfect place to snorkel or learn to surf.   Island surf condos are right in the center of Kihei. There are numerous great dining options within walking distance including restaurants, food trucks, and ice cream.  There are also many local artists and crafts people selling their wares  in open air markets.  Kihei Cafe is a local favorite with their amazing breakfast foods and cinnamon rolls.  Also check out the South Maui Gardens right behind  Island Surf.  There is a giant tortoise, amazing pizza, and other food options nestled in the beautiful tropical gardens.
host_about:
Aloha!  I am an engineer by trade, and split my time between Maui and San Diego. I enjoy surfing, gardening, and spending time with my 2 kids.  

I have lived in both Kihei and Lahaina, and I am excited to share all my local knowledge and favorite spots.  I am always available to help or answer questions during your stay.

neighborhood_overview: Island Surf is located just down the street from Maui’s most pristine beaches. Just steps from the complex you will find restaurants, shopping, health food stores, snorkel rentals and a surf school. Maui’s unique and varied terrain offers a multitude of activities. From relaxing on some of the world’s most beautiful white sand beaches to the more adventurous undertakings of zip-lining and paragliding. Kamaole Beach Royale's location is such that there are many activities and attractions right at your fingertips. Some of Maui’s top attractions are: Maalaea Harbor; many boats leave from Maalaea on snorkeling trips, deep sea fishing, scuba diving, whale watching (in season), sunset cruises, and more. It is much faster to leave from Maalaea Harbor than Lahaina Harbor when taking trips to Molokini Crater and Turtle Town. Other attractions include Maui Ocean Center, Haleakala Volcano, Shops at Wailea, Iao Valley, Wailea Golf Club, King Kamehameha Golf Club, Maui Tropical Plantation, and the
host_about:

neighborhood_overview:
Wailuku is a neighborhood located on the island of Maui in Hawaii.

Wailuku is a historic town with many buildings dating back to the 19th century. It has a diverse mix of residential and commercial areas, with a range of housing options from historic homes to newer developments.

The town is home to several parks and recreational areas, including the popular Iao Valley State Park, which features a scenic hike to the Iao Needle, a natural rock formation. The Wailuku River State Park also offers hiking trails and swimming holes.

Wailuku has a vibrant downtown area with shops, restaurants, and art galleries. The Maui Arts and Cultural Center is located nearby, offering a range of cultural events and performances.

Overall, Wailuku is a charming and historic neighborhood with plenty to offer both residents and visitors.

Across from the ocean we are less than 2 miles from the famous Kehena Black Sand Beach & just 3 miles from the natural Pokoiki hot springs. At night you can hear the coqui frogs & ocean waves. Birds a plenty with all their magic music. Down the road is Uncle Roberts. Weekly live music, smoothie shack and a small bodega. Saturdays is the farmers market. Sundays, half a mile up the road, at Seaview Lawn, is a big drum circle and many food & clothing vendors set up shop.

neighborhood_overview:
You'll love the proximity to Sherwood Beach right in your backyard! Spend your days swimming, sunbathing, surfing and more on the white-sand shores of one of America's favorite beaches!

Just 7 miles away is the charming seaside city of Kailua. Enjoy an array of water sports in the pristine waters of the bay and afterwards, head over to the town center and peruse restaurants and shops.

Visit the Sea Life Park Hawaii for a family-friendly adventure that's just 6 minutes away! The Dolphin Royal Swim, Shark Trek, Sea Lion Encounter, Shark Tank Scuba and the Hawaiian Reef Encounter are crowd favorites of this interactive and exciting park.

Honolulu, the colorful island metropolis of Oahu, is just 20 minutes away! Visit the iconic Iolani Palace, fascinating museums for all ages, the bustling Chinatown Markets, and much more!
host_about:
Hi! We’re Evolve, the hospitality team that helps you rest easy when you rent a private, professionally cleaned home from us.

We promise your rental will be clean, safe, and true to what you saw on Airbnb or we'll make it right. Check-ins are always smooth, and we're here 24/7 to answer any questions or help you find the perfect property.

description:
Regency on Beachwalk #51 – 255 Beach Walk (3-Night Minimum)

Regency on Beachwalk is in a Great Location! Freshly decorated, 2 bedroom, 1 bath (with WASHLET!) end-unit with 2 balconies (lanais) right in the Heart of Waikiki (!) and just steps from the best beaches, fun outdoor activities, top restaurants, and nightlife! Sleeps 6!

INSTANT BOOK! If your dates show as available, you can book instantly!

(日本語対応可能)

The space
Comfort AND Convenience! Newly decorated, fully-furnished end condo (693 sq. ft. plus two lanais with tables and chairs, for a total of 910 sq. ft.) at the Regency on Beachwalk, right in the heart of Waikiki and steps from the best beaches, fun outdoor activities, top restaurants, night life, unparalleled shopping at Waikiki Beach Walk, and just across the street from Trump Tower! 6-person max.

The Regency on Beachwalk is a secure building just a few minutes' walk to great restaurants like Roy's, Ruth's
neighborhood_overview: Centrally located, Regency on Beachwalk is in the heart of Waikiki, surrounded by restaurants, world-class shopping and entertainment venues!  Plus, the beaches in Waikiki are just a short walk away (just 3-5 minutes)!
host_about:
ALOHA! E komo mai and mahalo for choosing to stay with Captain Cook Resorts!

Captain Cook Resorts proudly manages over 170 privately-owned vacation rentals in Waikiki (a district of Honolulu on the island of Oahu). Everyone on the fun and energetic CCR team works hard to offer great accommodations, great service, and has a passion for sharing all that Oahu has to offer our guests!

We appreciate that you're on vacation, and we ask that you let us know if there's anything we can do to make this visit stand out as one of your best!

ALL CAPTAIN COOK RESORTS RENTALS INCLUDE:
– Bath towels, Beach towels, Bed linens
– Dishes, Silverware, Cookware (including tea kettle & rice cooker)
– Beach chairs, Hair dryer, Iron/Ironing board
– Start-Up Supplies: coffee filters, laundry detergent, dish soap, dishwasher soap, bar soap, paper towels, toilet paper, tissue, basic cleaning supplies, and travel size (2 oz.) shampoo, conditioner, body wash, body lotion
– NOT PROVIDED: beach umbrellas, beach toys, aluminum foil, Ziploc bags, coffee, condiments/seasonings, cooking oil, fabric softener, or bleach. This private vacation rental does NOT include resort services such as daily housekeeping, replenishment of towels or toiletry supplies, or hotel front desk services.

Please let us know if you have any questions!

Mahalo!

description:
The space
Kona Pacific C421

Offering a private, covered lanai with treetop views and a warm and colorful interior, this single-level Kona condo will keep you coming back year after year. Drive north on Ali'i Drive to the Pier (the starting point of the Ironman World Championship) as well as beaches, shops, restaurants, and more. For those interested in snorkeling, whale watching, or fishing, charter a boat from Honokohau Small Boat Harbor just four-and-a-half miles away. And don't forget to sample, tour, and taste the wares at Kona Brewing Hawaii, less than two miles from your door.

Open your sliding glass doors and enjoy the visiting trade winds each and every morning while you prepare breakfast in the well-equipped, full island kitchen. Dine side-by-side at the counter, and then relax in the living area or outside on your lanai. Guests will also enjoy access to a shared pool, hot tub, and grilling area.

RESORT AMENITIES
-
host_about:
Vacasa
Vacation Home Management

Vacasa unlocks the possibilities of how we enjoy vacation homes. We take care of managing our homeowners’ vacation houses so they can have peace of mind (and their home when they want to). And our guests book vacations confidently knowing they’re going to find exactly what they’re looking for without any surprises.

Each vacation home is always cared for by our professional local teams who implement our high cleanliness and maintenance values, while the hands-off tasks of vacation rental management--marketing, filing taxes, and maintaining a website--are handled by a specialized central support team. Our passion and focus remain true: to empower our homeowners, guests, and employees to invest in vacation.

description:
The space
Maui Vista 2121

Make your dreams of a truly relaxing beach-cation come true at Maui Vista 2121! This ground-floor condo has everything you could need to experience a wonderful getaway in Kihei with your family, friends, or that special someone. Inside, the open floor plan combines the kitchen, living room, and dining area together. The kitchen is well-equipped with modern appliances and gorgeous granite countertops. Don't hesitate to put the chef's apron on to surprise your guests with delicious meals and snacks. If you'd like to make mealtime even more memorable, take advantage of the shared grills available on-site. The lanai offers a convenient outdoor dining area to enjoy your meals al fresco. After lunch, snuggle up on the couch and watch your favorite movies or TV shows on the flatscreen TV. The complimentary internet access will let you browse your social media, upload selfies, and let everyone know how much of a great time you're having here. An

description:
Welcome to Pauhaho Vacation Retreat, a place to unwind! The name, Pauhaho, comes from Pau Hana Home - "Pau Hana" means to stop work in Hawaiian, so we invite you to stop work and come enjoy a piece of paradise in Maui.

Kihei Garden Estates is a serene property nestled in beautiful tropical gardens. Rest on the lanai, float in the pool, or stroll on the beach.

The space
Our condo and the complex provide a peaceful home base for exploring the island or relaxing on the lanai, at the pool, or at the beach. Kihei Garden Estates is a serene property nestled in a beautiful tropical garden setting. Your home is filled with conveniences, but in addition, the Kihei Garden Estates has a beautiful pool and hot tub where you can cool off and float around to your heart’s content. You’re also near the beach so you can quickly make your way down to stroll on the sand or watch one of the best sunsets on the island. Easily walk to a dozen close-by restaurants and stor
host_about: Raised in Northern California, Scott and his wife, April, lived four years in Seoul, South Korea and three years in Hawaii before returning to Northern California for work and to be near parents.  We have a deep love for travel and for people, and hope our place in Maui blesses our guests who come to visit.

description:
Our ground floor 2 bedroom-2 bath Maui condo is just steps from the ocean & centrally located. It is the perfect place to unwind and relax, or to explore all of the adventure & dining that Maui has to offer. Our home features king beds, walk-in showers, granite kitchen, smart tv's, washer/dryer, & a comfy great room. From our lanai, enjoy the tropical Hawaiian atmosphere as you view breathtaking sunrises over Haleakala, whale-watching (Nov-Mar), and sea turtles that swim year-round.

The space
Our clean and well appointed home is centrally located on the west coast, in the Maalaea bay area. The condo features an Oceanfront bedroom with a king bed where you can drift off to sleep while listening to the sounds of the ocean waves. This bedroom also has tv, bedside lighting with USB charging ports, closet, dresser, and wall safe. A bathroom/shower is right across the hallway. The second, main bedroom boasts NEW A/C, a brand new king bed (2022) & ensuite bathroom, a sm
neighborhood_overview: We are approximately 30 yards from the water and a short walk to Haycroft Park.  Watch sea life, native birds and sail boats!  A great website to learn about the location, shops and restaurants nearby is www.maalaea.com
host_about: Retired and enjoying family, friends and life.

description:
Our newly renovated & beautifully furnished Makaha Valley Towers condo welcomes you! You'll enter the Security Gate to immaculately landscaped, resort like secluded grounds. That's right, round-the-clock security both at the gate & throughout the property. The sweeping, majestic mountain & the bluest Pacific Ocean views are spectacular from sunrise to sunset! There is central a/c, but we'd recommend when the tradewinds are blowing, turn off the a/c, open up all the doors & enjoy!

The space
Legendary Makaha Surfing Beach is less than a mile away. You can actually see the 'line up' from the condo front door! Nearby Makaha Valley Golf Club for you golfers & plenty of hiking trails on the West Side. My favorite hike is Yokohama Bay to Kaena Point State Park. Bring your best walking shoes. Waianae Boating Harbor is close by where ocean adventures like fishing , whale watching, diving, snorkeling & swimming with dolphins tours! Ko Olina is a short 30 minute drive where
neighborhood_overview: Makaha Valley is one of the most spectacular scenics on the whole West Side of Oahu. The Makaha Valley Towers experience is unique in its quietude & panoramic mountain to ocean views...located in a rural area with wild birds & pigs. The roosters & peacocks can be a little loud in the evenings & early mornings...welcome to the West Side country.
host_about: Aloha! My husband & I are longtime residents in Hawaii. We have 2 married children, born & raised here, & 3 granddaughters! Hawaii is our home & we love Makaha. My husband is a surf photographer & has traveled many years to West Oahu shooting. We are blessed to have the condo in Makaha.

description:
An oceanfront Kauai resort in Poipu Beach featuring spacious Kauai condos and spectacular sunset views. With its classic Hawaii plantation style architecture and design, complemented by a wonderful pool and guest amenities, this is a sought after Poipu resort destination on Kauai. Located within walking distance to Kiahuna Beach as well as Koloa Landing, Poipu Kapili is close to the Shops at Kukui`ula for fine dining and shopping.

The space
Our Poipu Kapili resort unit is described, photographed and rated so you can pick the perfect island home for you and your family. Before your Kauai vacation, we invite you to watch our South Shore Kauai video with helpful information and beautiful scenes of our island paradise.

description:
1 Bedroom Deluxe Yacht Harbor View on the 4th Floor!

This amazing and spacious condo is located with a beautiful view of the ocean overlooking the yacht harbor at the Ilikai Hotel. You'll be able to wake up to the beautiful and calming view of the ocean and relax as the sun sets over the yacht harbor. The condo is 500 sq ft with a large lanai of 120 sft feet. The beautiful ocean, yacht harbor and sunset views will make you want to extend your stay forever. The modern and open kitchen is perfect for you to cook your meals for a longer stay. There is a whisper quiet split AC to keep the condo cool on warm summer nights. The condo comes with free WIFI and cable TV! Please note that this 1-bedroom unit does not have a separation wall between the living area and the bed area.

If you're looking for a great view and location for the best price, look no further!

Beach Access? The walkway ramp from the hotel lobby leads directly to the Duke Kahanamoku
neighborhood_overview: Waikiki
host_about: Since 1965, Marina Hawaii Vacations has offered the best places to stay on the island of Oahu. Marina Hawaii Vacations' more than 300 privately-owned condominiums are located in the Ilikai Hotel, the Ilikai Marina and Discovery Bay - within easy walking distance to the heart of Waikiki and Hawaii's popular Ala Moana Shopping Center. Repeat visitors from the U.S. mainland, Canada, Europe and Asia trust Marina Hawaii Vacations for convenience, great quality and prices. Many of our guests are annual visitors who have stayed with us for the past 30 years. Check out the other properties that we manage at www.marinahawaiivacations.com

description:

We are looking forward to welcome you to this fantastic piece of luxury condo, your own Maui tropical paradise. The venue is simply fabulous, as you can spend your time at the property’s beachfront pool, as well as on its private
neighborhood_overview: Maui’s unique and varied terrain offers a multitude of activities. From relaxing on some of the world’s most beautiful white sand beaches to the more adventurous undertakings of zip-lining and paragliding. Maui Sunset's location is such that there are many activities and attractions right at your finger tips. Some of Maui’s top attractions are: Maalaea Harbor; many boats leave from Maalaea on snorkeling trips, deep sea fishing, scuba diving, whale watching (in season), sunset cruises, and more. It is much faster to leave from Maalaea Harbor than Lahaina Harbor when taking trips to Molokini Crater and Turtle Town. Other attractions include Maui Ocean Center, Haleakala Volcano, Shops at Wailea, Iao Valley, Wailea Golf Club, King Kamehameha Golf Club, Maui Tropical Plantation, and the Whale Sanctuary. The town of Kihei is a quant, laid-back beach town boasting some of Maui’s most pristine stretches of white sand and turquoise waters. South Maui is fun for couples and families alike. You c

Aloha! I am a hospitality professional with a passion for customer service. My team consists of talented Guest Experience Specialists who care about your experience, and are available to assist you 24/7.   We offer travel insurance, discounts on rental cars, and professional, resort quality services to all of our guests; it would be our pleasure to host you for your next Maui vacation!

description:
Aloha! We love having family & friends visit. Our clean and cozy condo is a great getaway where everyone feels at home while enjoying the island of Molokai. We'd like you to do the same!
The ocean is footsteps away with a beautiful view of Lanai, Maui, evening sunsets and whale watching from late November to mid April.
NOTE-All Taxes already INCLUDED in Room Price: Hawaii State10.25%Transient Accommodation,Maui County3%Transient Accommodation, Hawaii State 4.167%General Excise Tax.

The space
-Your condominium has natural stone optic tiles throughout the entire condo.
-The Kitchen is fully equipped with standard size Gas Range, Refrigerator/Freezer and Dishwasher with Dish Washer Liquid. There is Dish Washing Liquid, Kitchen Towels, and Hot Pads. Additionally, a Coffee Maker, Toaster, Microwave Oven, Rice Cooker, Set of Pots and Pans, Glass Mixing Bowls, Cooking Utensils, Cutting Boards, Knives, Can Opener, and Corkscrew are available for your use.
neighborhood_overview: You'll be in a tranquil setting on a tropical, beach front property away from it all with beautiful sunsets, views of Maui, Lanai, and whale watching from November to April, and you'll only be 4 miles west of a local eatery and store for all your necessities.
host_about: Aloha! My husband and I love having our family and friends visit. We have a clean and cozy beach front condominium for our visitors and rent it out the rest of the time. As soon as you get your keys out of the lockbox, we'd like you to feel at home and enjoy Molokai!

description:
Maui, the Valley Isle, home to Haleakala Crater, lush tropical forests, sunny beaches, and magnificent sunrises and sunsets. Noelani Resort can be described as a charming, hidden treasure boutique resort. Located at Mahinahina point on Maui's sunny west shore it offers a panoramic ocean, coastline, and island views.

The space
Additional Description:

Snorkel, swim, and surf at the sandy beach located next to Noelani. Whale watch, during winter months, from the lanai as you gaze across the shimmering sea at the islands of Moloka'i and Lana'i.

Noelani 217 is a tastefully decorated studio condo that offers all the luxuries and comforts of home. The studio features a fully equipped kitchen with plenty of counter space, comfortable queen bed and walk in shower. The studio also has A/C.

neighborhood_overview: Noelani

After a 2-year Covid-break from listing properties on AirBnb, Kona Coast Vacations is once again offering professionally managed Vacation Rentals to travelers. KCV is a professional management company established since 2006.

Kona Bliss - Kona Onenalo #6

Kona Bliss is located within an exclusive gated community of 12 freestanding homes at Kona Onenalo next to White Sands beach, about 4 miles south of the village of Kailua-Kona. Very serene setting on a promontory point that offers unobstructed ocean views.

host_about:
Kona Coast Vacations hosts over 5,400 reservations a year with the help of knowledgeable management, proficient team members and trusted home owners. Open 7 days a week, we strive to help with each visitors’ every need. Sharing Aloha from the first contact whether it is phone or email, we are here to assist by making the booking process as seamless as can be. We pride ourselves on providing hands on assistance whenever it is needed, whether it is reservation details, maintenance issues, or even booking activities! 

Kona Coast Vacations is fortunate to team up with great property owners which is instrumental in providing exceptional homes for our new and returning guests. With over 240 vacation rentals from oceanfront homes, ocean view condos and private estates, we are here for your every need, open seven days a week to take care of our guests and owners. With two locations in Kailua Kona and Mauna Lani we have dedicated specialists in guest services managing reservations, maintenance, and property checks alongside our accounting, support and marketing specialists. We are proud to be Airbnb members since 2001 and now are Superhosts with over 1070 reviews.
We hope to host you Hawaii and help create a memory to last you a lifetime. We are your “’Ohana” (family) on the Big Island of Hawaii, please do not hesitate to utilize our listed resources and book activities thru Kona Concierge.

description:
Stay right on the beach in beautiful Punalu'u on Oahu's luscious east side. One bedroom condo apartment has an onsite pool, fitness center, 24 hour security, assigned parking, wifi, and cable. Recently renovated apartment is close to hiking, numerous secluded beaches, the PCC, and Oahu's North Shore.

Please read the entire listing before booking for info on construction.

The space
This cozy apartment has a bedroom and bath separated from the kitchen/living area by a wall. A small deck has obstructed ocean views, but is still a pleasant place to relax in the afternoon.

The apartment is all yours. Step out the back slider and you’re steps from the beach. The kitchen is stocked with everything you need to cook or bake. Linens and beach towels are provided for everyone in your party.

There is construction occurring throughout 2022-2023. There may be loud construction noise between the hours of 8:30-5. Pool, gym, and access to the
host_about: Aloha!  My name's Bekah and I'm lucky enough to call paradise my home.  I love living by family and friends.  I adore being in the ocean.  I live with my husband, two tweenage girls and my mother in law Pammy.  Pammy's Place has always been a gathering spot for old friends and new friends alike.  It seems natural to extend her hospitality to everyone who would like to visit.  We're a busy family, but we always make time for fun.  As our guest, you are always welcome to join us for a bbq at Waimea, kayaking Kahana,  or a Saturday waterfall hike.

Unlike most condo resorts on Maui, Papakea is low rise and low density. The resort offers 13 beautifully landscaped acres with multiple koi ponds and is located right on famous Kaanapali Beach.
