neighborhood_overview: There are plenty of beaches, shops and restaurants in walking distance. You can easily rent water gear and take lessons from local scuba and surf shops just down the block. https://www.mauiaccommodations.com/blog/maui-beach-tips/. Hundreds of visitors get seriously injured at our beaches every year from water sports. Waves that break close to shore are very dangerous and paralyze and seriously injure people regularly. While you may see visitors and locals boogie boarding and body surfing close to the shore break, don’t be fooled it is dangerous. Flash flood warnings are very real. Never ignore them in any area. You can be swept away or trapped at any location in minutes on any road, public area like a park or shopping center. A dry hiking trail can turn into a river in minutes and firefighters can not always rescue you immediately, due to high winds, terrain or visibility issues. You maybe stuck until daybreak. Always swim with a buddy,  not all beaches have lifeguards, lifeguards star
host_about: This unit is privately owned and self check in self service.  I can be reached through Airbnb email. Check-in instructions/codes/passwords are released just prior to your check-in time by Airbnb.  Maintenance issues can be messaged to me through the Airbnb site and I will respond within 24-hours.  All information/rules/amentiites/directions  about the contents of the unit  are provided in the unit and on the Airbnb site.  The cleaner leaves two sets of bath towels two beach towels, 1 toliet paper, 1 soap and extra sheet set. Anything else will need to be purchased on your own.  There is no recycling program for this building, if the trash chute is closed you can walk downstairs to the dumpster located below the chute.

description:
A golfer’s dream, this stylish villa features AC, ceiling fans, washer/dryer, WiFi, DVD, flat screen, work area, and open kitchen for prepping meals to share on the private lanai with wet bar and fairway view.

***Air conditioning is available upon request for an extra fee.***

You’ll enjoy year-round sailing, snorkeling, and fishing, dine among spectacular Kona sunsets, and fall asleep to the sound of crashing waves.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

Our home is an ideal and central base to explore the island of Hawaii.

The space

One of the bathrooms is private to only the master bedroom, and the tub is custom made to be handicapped accessible. Main floor is open and cozy, with all of the amenities that we could think of to make your stay just like at home. host_about:

We LOVE to travel, and we are specifically interested in the sites and history local to where we are visiting. As such, we enjoy finding lodging gems, each with their unique ambiance, and we also thoroughly enjoy hosting. We strive to share the accommodations that we value the most during our own travels, and listen to each of our guests so that we can continually improve each guest's experience.

Experience convenient and comfortable living staying at our Hibiscus Ohana! Our newly built 3 bedroom 2 bath home. Located centrally in Hilo. You will be just 3 miles from Hilo airport, Liliuokalani Park and Garden, Carlsmith Beach Park, and many other popular attractions and restaurants. This spacious house sleeps 6 or up to 12. Enjoy the proximity to Volcanoes National Park, Rainbow Falls, Hawaii Tropical Botanical Garden and much more!

The space

If you are visiting Hilo for business, this space is ideal as well, with plenty of table space for working and high-speed internet through Spectrum (200mbps). Our beautiful floors, modern kitchen, and walk-in shower give the space a luxury feel. In addition to the 3 beds available in 3 bedrooms. there is one futon sofa in bedroom and sectional sofa in the living room to accommodate extra guests; please n
neighborhood_overview:
Endless outdoor adventure awaits when staying at our Ohana. Spend your days swimming, snorkeling, surfing and boating at nearby beaches like Liliuokalani Park and Garden, Carlsmith Beach Park and Richardson Beach Park.

Enjoy a true Hawaiian Experience by visiting Volcano National Park, where you’ll spot live lava flows, lava tubes and glowing creatures. Book a tour with Blue Hawaiian Helicopters to see the action from the sky

An array of additional attractions are just a short drive from your door, including Akaka Falls State Park, Rainbow Falls, Hawaii Tropical Botanical Garden and Stargazing at Mauna Kea Mountain.

For an evening out, grab a lite at local eatery favorites such as Pepe’s Kitchen, pineapples Restaurant or Kuhio Grill- Home of the famous 1lb Laulau.
host_about: Aloha, my name is Maggie. I am a Big Island resident living in Hilo with my family. I love to host members of the airbnb community and those visiting our island home, it's a pleasure! I strive to provide outstanding experiences to my guests with with simple, clean, beautiful accommodations and clear communication. I am always excited to share my knowledge of the East side of the island with visitors. I look forward to meeting you!

neighborhood_overview: River Estate is located between Hanalei, which is 2 miles east of the property and the western end of the road at Ke'e Beach and the Kalalau trailhead are located. The neighborhood is quiet. The surrounding area is lush and rural. The beach is 2 blocks away and you can easily access it by the river. There is no street noise, only relaxing natural sounds. The people are friendly and you're close to all the amenities and activities the North shore of Kauai has to offer.
host_about: Aloha, I have lived on Kauai for 49 years now, owned and managed River Estate for the past 22 of them. I traveled to Kauai from San Francisco on a surf trip with two friends in 1970 and never went back. I have had amazing experiences here over the years and a whole bunch of amazing stories to tell. I have gained a wealth if information here about this area and I love share it with my guests. I worked as a finish carpenter here for 20 years beginning in 1975. Then in 1995, after all the workers who came to Kauai to repair the damage from Hurricane Iniki left the island, myself and a friend put together my first website and began renting one of my long term rental homes that housed workers as a vacation home. That website was the very first vacation rental website on Kauai in 1995. And thus my vocation changed and River Estate was born...

You can hear it, you can feel the breeze and you won't want to look away. Spot whales in whale season.

The space

You are close by to several great beaches within a quick 10-25 minute drive.

neighborhood_overview: Enjoy sparkling blue waters, white sandy beaches, and world-famous Diamond Head views. Sit back on your lanai and enjoy some of the most beautiful sunsets in the world with the sparkling blue Pacific and colorful rainbows that appear daily in the sky. In the evening enjoy the glitter of the city lights or a late night swim under the beautiful half moon overhead.  Every Friday night a fireworks show will appear after sunset over the ocean where you will have front row seats from your lanai.  The beach is right at your doorstep. Fall asleep to the soothing sounds of the gentle waves as they wash upon the sand.
host_about:
Aloha 
My name is Jeff Jarrett
I enjoy all Hawaii has to offer great  beaches,  food and fun.
Being from Pennsylvania and having to deal with cold weather, makes visiting Oahu's warm weather even better.

description:
Escape the hustle and bustle to find relaxation and healing in our ocean therapy studio. Experience the beautiful country town on the windward side of Oahu. From Kualoa Ranch to the infamous North Shore, there are a handful of attractions to experience and foodtrucks. Relax and unwind at one of the best beaches on Oahu a minute’s walk from your front door.

The space
This is a 240 sq.ft cozy studio based on the ground floor of our two story home. You will have your own private entrance so you can come and go as you please. The studio is perfect for 1-2 people and is equipped with a queen-sized bed, bathroom, refrigerator, kitchenette (microwave, hot plate, air fryer), and cooking/eating utensils. Ceiling fan and air conditioning are available to help you cool down and unwind from your day’s activities. Television and internet are also provided to keep you up to date and connected.

A shared washer and dryer are available for you to use upon request.
host_about:
Hello. Living near the ocean is one of my favorite places to be. My family have travelled  and lived throughout the South Pacific and appreciate the diversity of the many cultures of Hawaii. 

Ocean therapy is one way of healing and rejuvenating the mind and body. I hope by sharing my studio with you, it will also be your time of healing and rejuvenation.

Thank you for trusting me as your host and look forward to seeing you  in our community.  Aloha

description:
Deluxe Mountain View Condo, Free parking & WiFi

Upgraded Waikiki Banyan condo at an affordable rate. Enjoy paradise in this Mountain View Waikiki Banyan condo suite with 2 high-end luxury queen sized mattresses! Only one block from world famous Waikiki Beach! Condo suite is located on the 8th floor and has a beautiful view of the mountains, Ala Wai Golf Course, and Canal. 807-2 features cherry cabinets, modern counter tops, and tile flooring throughout!

The space
Enjoy a fully-equipped kitchen which includes a refrigerator, range, microwave, rice maker, coffee maker, and other kitchen wares. There is an island with seating for four people. Tile flooring throughout the condo - clean and hygienic.

Convenient sleeping arrangements include two queen-sized bed in the bedroom, and a sofa sleeper in the living room. The bathroom is sleek and modern with cherry cabinets and a vessel sink. It has two entrances to the bathroom giving greater privacy t
host_about:
Hosted by RedAwning Vacation Rentals

Welcome to RedAwning, a whole new way to travel. We make staying in a unique home or apartment easier than staying at a hotel. By partnering with local homeowners throughout North America, we provide you with the largest collection of vacation homes in the most destinations. Every stay includes our experienced 24/7 customer assistance by text, chat, email and phone, and access to all your travel details via our free mobile app. We offer consistent terms and flexible cancellation policies, and we include accidental damage protection for every stay with no security deposits and a best rate guarantee. Wherever you want to go, RedAwning is here to make your journey easier!

description:
Situated on the western side of the island at a cool 1300ft elevation, this is a small cottage suitable for two people. Privacy is the key word.

This is a quiet, clean, peaceful place with A/C, near the airport, town + beautiful beaches located in a safe, affluent neighborhood.

After the lava eruption on the other side of the island in 2018 subsided, we are now thrilled to have the best air quality and blue skies since 2007!

The space
Suitable for 1 single person or a couple. Lovely room with sliding glass door opening to a private deck to sit and enjoy the birds and all year-round tropical climate. Keep in mind that with any place you stay in Kona, if you are at LESS than 1000 ft, it’s a hot and humid. We are at 1300 ft - just perfect.

Guest access
The cottage is turn key ready and self check-in. As you have seen in the pictures, it is one room with a kitchenette with dishware and utensils, sink, microwave, gas gri
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood is safe and quiet. We have one neighbor across the driveway, but everyone else is with good distance. All properties are 1 acre big, and you can reach our street with two turns from an important connecting road.

It takes 7-10 minutes to/from the airport, 15-20 minutes to "downtown" Kailua-Kona and 15 minutes to a spectacular beach.

There is a convenience store called Matsuyama a few blocks away for you to get comfort food fast. Safeway is 15 minutes away.
host_about:
Aloha! I came to Hawaii in 1998 as a tourist, and never really left. I am originally from Germany, so we are a two language household. My husband James has lived on-island since 1991.

We love to share the beauty of this incredible Big Island, there is so much to explore and see that is spectacular and amazing. A visit to Hawaii Island also tends to have a healing affect on people as they experience the unique, natural beauty all around them.

We are ocean lovers, passionate Manta Ray Advocates*, and are happy to share our knowledge of the island with you as if you were friends or family. We can steer you towards tour operators who know what they are doing and also to those little know activities that are self-guided and free.

Airbnb is venture for us, but we have 12 years of experience of sharing our additional rooms in the main house (the upstairs of our Tropical Treasure). We've created a great space and are confident about our ability to host you. We tend to give our guests lots of space and privacy, but we are readily available if you need us or have questions.


* We would love to show you the mantas rays if you are an adventurous ocean lover. Inquire :)

description:
The beautifully updated two-bedroom and two-bathroom condominium, Manualoha 505 will exceed your expectations for an unforgettable stay in paradise.

The space
With 1700 sq. ft., there is room to gather and entertain or stretch out for peace and tranquility. After a full day of adventure, take in the incredible Kauai sunsets from one of the private lanais, cook up a culinary delight in the fully equipped and updated kitchen, or unwind in the amazing garden tub before slipping into a peaceful slumber.

This townhouse-style home located on the second and third floor is equipped with two-bedroom and two bathrooms. The second floor includes:

*Master suite w/ a Cal king-sized bed, standing A/C, large TV, and ensuite bathroom w/ walk-in shower and oversized bathtub.
*Private lanai with amazing views and comfortable seating.
*Guest bedroom with standing A/C, custom-built storage, and two twin beds that can be combined into one King.
neighborhood_overview: Poʻipū Beach Park is located in the community of Poʻipū on the southern coast of Kauaʻi island in Hawaii. The beach is a park has lifeguards provided by the county of Kauaʻi.
host_about:
Suite Paradise – The gateway to island living.

Suite Paradise in sunny Poipu Beach on Kauai is home to hundreds of vacation rental properties, amenable to any sized group and any specifications you could think of. With the highest level of service and a wide range of vacation rental options, Suite Paradise can ensure that your stay is as seamless as Kauai’s lifestyle.

Choose from luxurious beach resorts, each with multiple pools and spas within walking distance and top-of-the-line amenities, including, but not limited to, full membership to Poipu Beach Athletic Club for the duration of your stay. Poipu Kai consists of 70 acres of lush tropical foliage and some of Kauai’s most sought-after vacation rentals. One complex is literally located nestled in a verdant and extinct volcano crater – you can’t get more immersed in the island lifestyle than that! From mauka (mountain) to makai (sea), Suite Paradise has something for you!

Kahala – A popular complex that is home to mostly one- and two-bedroom units. Kahala is only a short walk from the beach, and closest to Poipu Kai’s tennis courts and Kalapaki Joe’s sports bar. With the option of both mountain and ocean views available dependent on the unit, Kahala’s location is perfectly situated with proximity to Poipu Road as well as the Poipu Kai greenbelt.

Makanui – Two- and three-bedroom units perched across from Poipu Crater, with stunning mountain views, distant ocean views, and a short walk to the greenbelt path.

Manualoha –Less than a mile from the beach, although the complex pool is practically attached to the Pacific Ocean! With units sleeping four to six, easy access to the greenbelt pathway, and hues of purple bougainvillea draped throughout the complex.

Poipu Sands – One- and two-bedroom units with incredible ocean views, spacious lanais, and a short walk to Shipwreck’s Beach.

Regency – Larger units, spacious enough to accommodate up to 10 guests. Many of these units are newly remodeled and offer AC. Regency and Kahala sit right next to each other.

Regency Villas – Luxury units with central AC. Regency Villas often feature a loft and sleep up to five guests. Situated near the greenbelt for easy access to many resort amenities, and centrally located for a short walk to Brennecke's Beach, or access to the Grand Hyatt Kauai Resort.

Nihi Kai Villas - A comfortable and quiet beach resort with 70 condos to choose from. Located right across from the ocean.

Poipu Crater – Just as the name says, Poipu Crater is nestled in a verdant an extinct volcano crater, which makes the foliage truly breathtaking. With 30 condos to choose from, sleeping four to six guests, the choice is yours! Enjoy the tropical gardens and central location to all that Poipu has to offer.

Lawai Beach Resort - Luxurious oceanfront condos located directly across from arguably the best snorkeling spot on the island. Enjoy a short stroll to five-star dining at The Beach House or enjoy the view from Lawai Beach, as the surfers paddle out for a sunset session. With room to sleep up to six, Lawai Beach Resort has it all!

Poipu Kapili - A beautiful and peaceful resort located on five acres of meticulously landscaped oceanfront property.

Pili Mai - This is Kauai’s newest resort development of luxury condominiums, nestled among a championship golf course.

description:
Located on the north shore of Kauai, The Cliffs at Princeville lies within the Princeville Resort on over twenty acres of lush tropical land. This dream of a resort overlooks the Pacific Ocean from atop a high bluff, ensuring dramatic view property-wide. There's certainly no shortage of amenities to be found at The Cliff either; enjoy two tennis courts, a half-court basketball court, two shuffleboard courts, a children's playground, a swimming pool, hot tub spa for adults and putting green.

description:
Aloha! Welcome to my Ocean View Escape! You will have the best view of the Kona sunset every night, and the sunrise over the mountains every morning!

Located in Downtown Kona, you can walk to all of the best restaurants, bars, shopping and entertainment!

Enjoy all amenities you could ask for including a pool with shower, bbq grill, free parking, wifi, full kitchen with all you need, open floor plan, 2 beach chairs and towels, and of course, the best view in all of Kona!

Kona Nate's No Ka Oi!

The space
My condo is a 1 bedroom/1 full bath with a sliding divider that creates an even larger living space! There is plenty of privacy for the 2 beds! 2nd bed is a super comfortable queen sized memory foam pull out couch!

I do my best to experience new places and foods and encourage my guests to do the same. I am always available for questions and suggestions for spots to check out on the island. Mahalo!

• Drums of Polynesia
Enjoy this unique cultural experience, which features a fast-paced, entertaining musical journey through the islands of the South Pacific. With a talented cast of singers, drummers, musicians and dancers performing songs and dances rarely seen in typical luau shows, the dynamic performance culminates with a spell-binding Samoan fireknife dance. An open bar serves guests throughout the evening.

• Marylou's Big Island Guided Tours
Embark on a personalized island-wide tour, where you are able to pick your destinations in a small and friendly group setting. This highly-rated family owned and operated business is proud to show guests around the Big Island and have plenty of tours available to choose from.

description:
**OUR MAUI PROMISE - We will donate $30.00 for every night booked 8/1/2023 - 12/31/2023 to relief fund** Love to be surrounded by nature - just a few miles from Volcano National Park? Chateau Kilauea is a cozy, peaceful, rain forest guest cottage offering privacy, comfort and a one of a kind stay. Lush and relaxing and perfectly located in paradise.

The space
This charming and private bedroom/bathroom studio cottage sits 60 feet from the main house on Lazy Acres in the beautiful Hawaiian rain forest.
The studio cottage includes a very comfortable queen bed, ceiling fan, UV filtered rain water, hot showers, towels, bed linens, extra blanket, drinking water, soap, shampoo, blow dryer, etc. We have an outdoor kitchen available to guests who want to prepare their own meals. Washer, Dryer, and laundry detergent are available for guests who need to do laundry during their stay. Temperatures are cool at night and pleasant during the day. The rain forest inclu
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet and peaceful.  We enjoy the remoteness the Fern Forest offers and the eclectic group of people living here.  We are located on a paved road and that's a bonus out here in the country!  Lazy Acres is 10 miles from the nearest restaurant.   Restaurants close early around here and hours fluctuate.  Be sure to be thinking about getting dinner between 6 and 8pm.
host_about: We enjoy gardening, adventures, and people.  We love our rescue pets, each other and our simplified lifestyle.  The motto for Lily's life is, "love has never failed me".  At lazy acres - we embrace relaxation.  Brian loves home projects,  and sharing his adventurous spirit with others.  Lily loves cooking, writing, reading,and hiking.   We are laid back and easy going.  We look forward to meeting each new guest and hope to make their stay as pleasant as possible.

description: 2BR 2BA at Royal Sea Cliff! These views, the resort, the accommodations! It is all amazing! ** Hawaiian Transient tax paid directly to resort
host_about: Hi, I'm Joy! I'm excited for you to check out my listings and discover all the places you can go! I would love to be a part of your travel journey, as its one of my favorite things in life! My parents had us on adventures starting at a very young age and I thankfully got to see and experience so many wonderful and breathtaking places! I love taking my family on those same adventures now and would be so excited to help you plan out some of yours! Please feel free to reach out with any questions you might have, I am representing owners of the underutilized timeshares that might be just perfect for your next journey! If there is anything you're looking for and don't see in the listings please let me know and a lot of times I can help track down exactly what you are looking for! Can't wait to start planning your next adventure with you! Happy Travels!

description:
Welcome to Pohaku Villa, a beautiful four-bedroom, three-bathroom Princeville vacation rental residence with a private pool, air conditioned bedrooms and lush landscaping. You'll relax into vacation mode the moment you enter this cozy yet elegant island getaway.

The space
Nestled into a picturesque tropical setting where garden and mountain views abound, Pohaku Villa has stylish decor with unique living areas. Earthy flagstone tile, vaulted wood beam ceilings, and warm neutral tones grace the living room. Plentiful windows reveal the beauty of indigenous foliage. Unwind on the living room sectional or stroll outside to the covered wrap-around lanai and take in the splendor of the outdoors.
The gorgeous, well-equipped kitchen at Pohaku Villa makes meal preparation a delight. Whether you're inspired to cook a gourmet feast or bring in takeout, you'll find everything you need. Enjoy your meals in the adjoining dining area or al fresco on the covered lanai.

description:
Welcome to our eminent cottage, Jungle Villa! Jungle Villa has a private swimming pool and very private, tropical half acre yard with a yoga studio and outdoor shower too!

The space
Jungle Villa (formerly Barefoot Villa) exemplifies the romance of a tropical inland getaway. The very private yard is surrounded by areca palm trees. The Royal Poinciana flowering tree in the middle of the yard erupts in lava red blooms parts of the year. Flowering vines, citrus trees, and bird song complete this secret garden location. The large one-bedroom, 1.5 bathroom Villa and its pool are yours entirely during your stay. Enjoy our swimming pool, outdoor shower and cozy yoga studio as well. Our bedroom has a Queen size iron frame bed and ensuite bathroom with walk-in tiled shower, walk-in closet and dual vanity sinks. The living room is large with two leather sofas, a flat screen Smart TV for streaming, free WiFi and lots of windows with garden views. Our galley kitchen has ev
host_about: Jessica owns and operates Salt Water Hawai'i that manages legal vacation rentals on Hawai'i Island with a dedicated staff with over 50 years combined experience.  Let The Salt Water Crew treat you as 'Ohana (family)!  E Komo Mai (Welcome)!

description:

This west-facing Ocean View Suite is a perfect paradise for couples or families looking for a carefree getaway. Features a Kitchenette, Large bathroom & Sleeps up to 4-5 guests. Enjoy the refreshing tropical breeze & sound of the tide lapping the Ka'anapali shore from your full lanai balcony. Sliding doors to lanai. Pool area, Fitness studio, laundry facilities & restaurant on-site.

The space
Enjoy 7 NIGHTS at the beautiful Kaanapali Beach Club Resort in this Partial Ocean View 1-Bedroom Suite. Comfortably Sleeps 4 (or up to 5) adults or children—there is a King bed in the private bedroom and a Sofa bed with Tempur-Pedic mattress in living room. Also, a single roll-away bed *may* be available for a 5th person. Ask when booking and we will add to our reservation. Laundry facilities on site. Normal retail rates on these Deluxe Ocean View suites are between $449-$5

host_about:
We're a happy couple living in an amazing large estate in Seattle. We visit Hawaii a couple times a year, sometimes with our kids and grandkids. Our beautiful timeshares in Kaanapali, Maui (near Lahaina) are The WESTIN KAANAPALI OCEAN RESORT (STUDIO, 1-BRM or 2-BRM)  and The KAANAPALI BEACH CLUB (1-BRM OCEAN VIEW or 1-BRM OCEAN FRONT). 

We have lifetime 5-Star Elite Platinum status with Starwood/WESTIN (the highest possible) as well as similar lifetime Elite Centum Platinum status  with Diamond Resorts/KAANAPALI BEACH CLUB.  As a result, if you book any of our MAUI timeshares, you share in the many special perks we have as owners at both Resorts including (subject to availability) early check-in, late check-out, best possible room locations plus there are no resort fees and parking is always free.

If you do not find the dates you would like on our MAUI listings, please email us and tell us the dates you would prefer (but try to do so at least 8-13 months in advance to be certain of availability (since West Maui is so much in demand now days).

In addition, in Seattle we have two very popular Airbnb units at our large Estate Home both with sunset views:  
#1 SEATTLE LUXURY ESTATE ROMANTIC SEAVIEW 1-BRM GUESTHOUSE
#2 SEATTLE LUXURY ESTATE ROMANTIC SEAVIEW SUITE
 
Contact me ASAP with any questions or to book!

description:
Our home Hale Ho’olana is a cozy Ohana (Family) style home located in historic Kealakekua Bay. The wraparound deck captures cool breezes & stunning oceanfront views offering comfort and serenity to its guests.

Locals and visitors enjoy swimming, snorkeling and kayaking activities in the Bay.

Manini Beach Park is a short stroll away with ocean access, a grassy area to picnic and provides a path to the coastline to view the most beautiful sunsets.

E Komo Mai (Welcome) a nānea mai (relax)

The space
Cozy Ohana (Family) style home beautifully decorated with old Hawaiian charm.

Four bedrooms of equal size, two full bathrooms, with an open living room and kitchen area. The wraparound deck offers ocean and mountain views, sun or shade. Cool ocean breezes flow through the many windows and sliding doors.

The house sits on tall pillars. The bottom level is wide open space, perfect for the kids to play and cool s
neighborhood_overview:
Quaint small old historic fishing village. Many entry spots into the water from the shore line and areas to sit by the ocean. The area in front of the home is rocky so water socks and footwear is a must.

There is a grassy lawn at Manini Beach which is a short stroll from the home that offers easy ocean access via smooth pebbled and sand path.

The oceanfront home sits on a parcel located on a quiet narrow road in the center of a residential village. The neighboring homes in the village consists of both year-round residents and other vacation rentals.

This is open air living where guests can hear the sounds of the ocean, neighbors laughing in the distance and sounds of nature and life happening in the bay.
host_about:
Aloha & Welcome, 

We are Kalani and Regina, along with our family members are Kalama 5, LLC.  We are a multi-generation Hawaiian family ceded from this area.  

Our home Hale Hoʻolana translated as The Home that Floats is located in the historical land division known as Kalama 5 in Kealakekua Bay a beautiful area rich in culture and history.  

With the Love and Support of our family members that reside in the area Hale Ho’olana was built in 2017. 

Our home is our gift to you so that you may experience and cherish the beauty of our island home and it’s location. 

We look forward to welcoming you in the spirit of Aloha.

Mahalo

description:
Beautiful 1 bedroom unit in the Condominium Hotel Waikiki Banyan, sleeps 4, walking distance to Waikiki Beach, shopping and restaurants. Free parking and Wi-Fi high internet 250/250 MBps. With Ocean and mountain views!

The space
This unit has been beautifully remodeled and decorated to reflect an open, inviting space to rest your heads while in paradise. Located in the heart of Waikiki, it offers an expansive view which includes the ocean, city, golf course, and mountains from the 27th floor of Tower 1 at the Waikiki Banyan. It faces the West and its abundance of windows allows for natural air circulation from the Hawaiian trade winds. This end unit also affords quiet from your neighbors but is still accessible to the elevators when you’re ready to explore the town.

At Waikiki Banyan, you’re only 1 block/5 minutes away from the warm sand and blue water of some of the world’s most famous beaches. You’re also within walking distance of international re
neighborhood_overview: The Waikiki Banyan is located in world famous Waikiki, walking distance to the beach, restaurants and shopping centers
host_about:
Aloha from Midway Vacations! We are a licensed, full-service vacation rental management company specializing in high-quality destination vacation rentals in Waikiki and South Maui.

 We love to help our guests create amazing vacations where you and your Ohana (family in Hawaiian) will make lasting memories!

Relax and rejuvenate in our stunning homes with confidence, knowing that the units are expertly maintained, thoroughly cleaned, and well stocked.

No surprises! We provide plenty of photos of each unit on our website, so you accurately know what to expect before you arrive.

All units are fully furnished and stocked with dishware, cookware, bed linens, towels, and initial start-up supplies (toiletries). Enjoy the comforts of home in paradise!

Enjoy the privacy of your vacation rental unit with the peace of mind that our dedicated team is always available to assist you if any problems or concerns arise during your stay.

We take great pride in maintaining our high standards of care and attention to details so you can enjoy superior rental properties.

description:

This is a 2 bedroom unit that has a king in the master and a queen bed in the second bedroom. Kitchen has full size fridge, coffee mkr, microwave, electric griddle, rice cooker, electric fry pan. This unit does not accommodate children under the age of 15. 4 persons max. We also have an affordable 2020Nissan Versa for our guests to rent.

The space
The Garden Ohana 2 bdrm is one of 5 units at the Wailuku Guesthouse LLC, is licensed and founded in 2001. Centrally located in Wailuku, exploring the island is easy from here, and is in walking distance to restaurants, Coffee, and other amenities.

The GARDEN OHANA is our 2 bedroom unit with a living room just off the pool that sleeps 4. This unit does not accommodate children under the age of 15. With air conditioning, a King bed in the master bedr
neighborhood_overview: WE are a walking town, just 2 blocks off old main street.  Eclectic little eateries and shops around the town of Wailuku.  The beaches are just a few miles away in every direction.  Please be careful at Big Beach.  There are many neck and spinal injuries here every year.
host_about: Originally from Chicago, IL.  Lived for about 17 years in Long Beach CA where I attended CSULB and UOP.  Finally settling in Maui in 2000 with my husband that is a partner in a CPA firm here on the island.  I enjoy talking with guests, assisting them in any way I can, bike riding, paddling (when I have time or energy left), going to the beach, baking, traveling and raising our son.

This space includes one bathroom, a living room with a Queen sleeper sofa, full kitchen, patio, and a bedroom with a King bed.

description:

Enjoy warm tropical breezes from not 1 but 3 furnished lanais with the larger one complete with a dining table for six and wet bar. The galley style kitchen offers full-size appliances with a unique island-style tiled backsplash. There is also an eat-in dining table for two and a more formal indoor dining area with a table for six, making this the perfect place to entertain or gather with the family.

host_about:
Kanaloa at Kona by Castle welcomes the hopeless romantics, the thrill-seekers, and those who just want to have fun. Our resort feels secluded, but is close to charming shops, restaurants, and sits upon the dramatic lava rock coast. You’ll enjoy year-round sailing, snorkeling, and fishing, dine among spectacular Kona sunsets, and fall asleep to the sound of crashing waves.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. Accommodations range from full-service hotels to resort condominiums and combines value, convenience, and authentic experiences.

Our comfortable brand new couch is the perfect place to end your day of adventures, watching your favorite shows on NETFLIX, HULU or on your entertainment subscription of choice.

Maui…True Paradise!!! You will enjoy your vacation in our unit and will want to come back again!!!

description:

Enjoy a private lanai with view of tropical grounds, WiFi, air conditioning, ceiling fans, washer/dryer, flat screens, DVD and living room. Sleeps 4 in 1 Queen & 1 Sofa bed.

host_about:
Vacationing in Maui doesn’t get better than Kamaole Sands, a condo resort built on 15 acres of gardens, waterfalls, and ponds. Live like you’ve always wanted to in an individually furnished condominium suite directly across from Kihei’s popular Kamaole Beach Park III. Defined by its laid-back vibe and tropical beauty, South Maui is a true Hawaiian paradise.

Our dreamy Kihei location near Wailea Resort and Makena Resort puts you in the midst of golf, spas and ocean recreation.

- Learn to surf at Kamaole Beach Park III
- Tee off at Maui Nui or Wailea golf clubs
- Stay on trend at The Shops at Wailea
- Snorkel amid the pristine waters of La Perouse Bay
- Indulge in spa treatments at Wailea Resort
- Sample craft brews at Maui Brewing Company

The best plan for your day is often no plan at all. Maybe you’ll start your morning with a swim in the Pacific or in our pool. You might mingle amid traveling kindred spirits at your resort’s Wednesday Mai Tai Party, and then grill a fresh catch with your new friends at the property’s public barbecue area. Or step out for a sunset dinner at one of Kihei’s fantastic cafes or bistros. Need to stay connected? We offer complimentary WiFi in the lobby, pool area, and all rooms.

Since 1993, Castle Resorts & Hotels has specialized in innovative hotel and resort management. We manage properties throughout the Hawaiian Islands, including Kauai, Oahu, Maui, Molokai, and Hawaii Island, as well as Auckland, New Zealand. description:
3 bed/2 bath home with newer beds, mattresses, linens, tv. Fully furnished kitchen. Newer appliances. Ice maker in refrigerator. Quiet area especially at night. We occasionally have coqui frogs and roosters. Minutes from the airport, bay, university, swimming for all ages. 18” dishwasher and Instapot. See instructions. Air conditioner in the front room. Open windows for trade winds, turn on overhead fans, dehumidifier and fans to cool. Mahalo🌸 Ask about discount for 1-2 or 3-4 guests

description:
Escape to an exotic island surrounded by glistening, white sandy shores, flourishing tropical scenery and intriguing wild life. The symphony of gently lapping waves beckons visitors to explore Maui’s many hidden wonders. Dive down to the depths of the ocean and discover indescribable beauty hiding in the sapphire blue waters. Take a boat cruise on a whale-watching excursion, or survey the diverse landscape on a scenic hike.

The space
1 bedroom scenic view- Discover comfort in our beautifully appointed accommodations featuring a king size bed, sofa bed with Tempurpedic mattress, and full bathroom complete with garden bath and walk-in shower. Enjoy the convenience of the partial kitchen equipped with a refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher and coffee maker among many other modern appliances. Additional in-room amenities include internet, cable television, DVD/Blu-ray player, telephone and a balcony/lanai.

There is a General Excise Tax (GET) and state impos
neighborhood_overview: Escape to an exotic island surrounded by glistening, white sandy shores, flourishing tropical scenery and intriguing wild life. Take a boat cruise on a whale-watching excursion, or survey the diverse landscape on a scenic hike. For a little island flavor, dine at any of the fine local restaurants. host_about: I am a certified travel agent for the past 10 years. I am married with 5 kids and a huge dog! I am a family man who loves to spend time with the family. I enjoy traveling and enjoy helping others travel even more!

description:
The space is a private studio connected to the main house with a separate entrance. It is located in Kailua-Konas main residential neighborhood known as “Palisades”. A friendly dog (her name is Kona) lives on the property and enjoys spending time on the deck during the day. Although there is no a/c in the room, temperatures remain cool and comfortable at 1500 ft elevation. An ideal base to explore the Kona coast. When available I have an extra car for rent.

The space
The bedroom windows and deck overlook miles of the kona coast and provide beautiful ocean view sunsets. You will have access to the large deck with BBQ grill and grilling utensils. There is a queen bed and couch that is 6’ long, and can easily be another sleeping area.

Guest access
There is off street parking for one vehicle. A small mini mart is located a mile away, otherwise the major markets and shops are located in town 10 mins away.

Other things to note<
neighborhood_overview: Safe, residential neighborhood.  Above average yard size for the area. There are wild chickens and coqui frogs, as there are in most of the neighborhoods in Kona. Located less than a mile to the closest grocery store and central to several beaches on the west coast.  A short 10 min drive from the airport.
host_about: Hi my name is Brittany. I’ve lived in Kona HI for 6 years. I can recommend activities, beaches, hikes and restaurants during your stay. I spend most of my free time diving or exploring the island with friends. I have one senior pup who is very friendly, and will most likely try to move in with you. Anything  you need or any questions you have I am always available to help where I can!

description:
The space
Kihei Kai Nani 113

This little slice of Hawaiin paradise is ideally located only 200-yeards from the island's famed sandy shores. When you're not grabbing the boogie board and heading to the ocean, you'll love the tranquility of sipping an ice-cold cocktail or lemonade on your private lanai. Located on the ground level, the covered patio opens right up to the gorgeous garden with lush foliage and soaring palm trees.

The home's interior maintains the tropical atmosphere with its decor and beachy, wicker furniture. Sink into the plush sofa after a fun day in the sun and watch the flatscreen cable TV. Or. host a night of family fun with one of the provided board games.

For even more entertainment options, guests will have access to the community's heated outdoor pool and gas grills.

High-speed WiFi
Streaming services available with your accounts
Two beach chairs and a boogie board pro
host_about: Hi, we’re Vacasa, North America’s largest vacation rental management company. Owners of vacation homes around the world trust us to deliver exceptional service throughout your entire vacation. Professional housekeepers clean and stock each home, and our customer care team is available around the clock—with a local property manager ready to show up and help out. We like to think we offer the best of both worlds: you can enjoy a one-of-a-kind vacation experience in a unique property, without compromising on service and convenience. Check out our listings, and get in touch if you have any questions. Your vacation is our full-time job, and we'd love to help you plan your perfect getaway.

description:
The condo is a 2 bedroom, 2 bath condominium with a beautiful ocean view. Maalaea is a central location on Maui convenient to getting to all parts of the island, and this rental has been very popular with visitors over the years.

The space
The condo is a 2 bedroom, 2 bath condominium with a beautiful ocean view. We have furnished our unit so we feel at home during our stays on Maui, and we are sure you will feel comfortable as well. Many of our guests return every year for their vacation. The condo includes linen, bath towels, and beach towels. The fully-equipped kitchen contains a dishwasher, microwave, and washer/dryer. We have cooling ceiling fans throughout, and an air-conditioner in the living area. We never use the AC since the Hawaiian tradewinds that come through Maalaea keep the temperature just right. Cable TV and High-Speed Internet Access is available. The unit is on the ground floor, so entry/exit can be through the front door or the garden
neighborhood_overview: Maalaea is probably no longer considered to be one of Hawaii’s “Best Kept Secrets”.  It’s central location between Lahaina and Wailea allows easy excursions to all parts of the island.  The popular destination spots in Makena, Wailea, Kaanapali and Kapalua are all within a half hour drive of this small ocean front community.  Walk 5 minutes one way from Island Sands to a 4-mile long beach and an extensive natural wetlands; the morning walks on this secluded beach are memorable.  Walk 5 minutes the other way from Island Sands to Maalaea Village and Harbor.  Maalaea Village has the wonderful Maui Ocean Center aquarium, shops, and restaurants.  Maalaea Harbor is the center for boat trips that offer snorkeling, fishing, sunset cruises, dinner cruises, and whale watching.  Or stay ‘home’ and, while having a cocktail on the lanai or barbequing oceanside next to the pool, watch the breaching humpback whales (December-April) or Hawaii’s talented surfers take on the challenging “Freight Train”.
host_about: Randy is retired from the computer field.  He likes to be near the sea and tends to follow the sun.  He enjoys being in the water, golfing, and traveling.  Included in the places he has traveled in the last 15 years are SE Asia (Thailand, Vietnam, Myanmer, Malaysia, and Indonesia), extensively around South America (Machu Picchu, Argentina, but mostly Chile), Europe (most recently Italy, Greece, Spain, England, Croatia, Prague), New Zealand, and across the US (45 states including Alaska).  When not traveling, Randy splits his time between Maui and Sebastopol CA.

description:

host_about: Hi, I'm Joy! I'm excited for you to check out my listings and discover all the places you can go! I would love to be a part of your travel journey, as its one of my favorite things in life! My parents had us on adventures starting at a very young age and I thankfully got to see and experience so many wonderful and breathtaking places! I love taking my family on those same adventures now and would be so excited to help you plan out some of yours! Please feel free to reach out with any questions you might have, I am representing owners of the underutilized timeshares that might be just perfect for your next journey! If there is anything you're looking for and don't see in the listings please let me know and a lot of times I can help track down exactly what you are looking for! Can't wait to start planning your next adventure with you! Happy Travels!

Our condo is located on the 13th floor of the iconic Ilikai Building in Waikiki Beach. Made famous in the opening credits of Hawaii Five-O. Ilikai Hotel just steps away from white sand beaches, water sports, high-end shopping, dining, and your own version of paradise. Everything you need is within walking distance. Breathtaking views and balmy breezes from our condo's balcony (Lanai) capture the beauty of the Pacific Ocean, lagoon, and pools. Friday Night Fireworks and the Hilton luau nearby.

The space

Guest access
PARKING - Valet parking in Ilikai is $35 per day / 24hrs with in and out privileges. Self-park in th
neighborhood_overview:
High-rise hotels line the shore in Waikiki, a vibrant neighborhood known for its popular surf beach. Designer fashion stores line Kalakaua Avenue and nearby streets, and the area buzzes after dark with waterside cocktail bars, fine dining and Kuhio Beach hula shows. Honolulu Zoo is home to Komodo dragons and wandering peacocks, while parrotfish and urchins inhabit Waikiki Aquarium’s reef exhibit.

Ilikai is a 100% Legal Vacation Rental Resort
Many foreign forums have been discussing the new Hawaii law that has banned an estimated 10,000 illegal vacation rentals across Oahu that are outside of tourist resort areas like Waikiki. If you are thinking of renting a home or condo outside Waikiki you are recommended to contact Hawaii officials to make sure it is legal as it's a $1,000 fine for the first offense and up to a $10,000 fine for repeated offenses. That being said, that law has nothing to do with legal vacation rentals in Waikiki and other "Resort Areas" where tourists

host_about:
Chase ‘N Rainbows (CNR) Real Estate, Inc. is a Maui-based company with two divisions: vacation rental management and real estate sales. For the past twenty years, CNR has been offering visitors and Kama’aina alike, affordable and luxury accommodations at a very competitive price. All of its vacation rental units are carefully selected, meticulously inspected, attractively furnished and well maintained to the highest standards. Two bedrooms. One queen size mattress, and a firm memory foam sofa bed in the second bedroom.

We can't wait for you to feel the energy of this land!

description:

The space
READ BEFORE BOOKING:

The State of Hawaii requires us to collect taxes on the rent from every reservation. This feature is not currently supported on Airbnb. Upon booking you will be sent a request via the Airbnb resolution center for General Excise Tax (GET) and Transient Accommodation Tax (TAT)

The tax percentages associated with your stay will be:
(GET) 4.7120 % and
(TAT) 13.25 %

Please note, check-in details will not be sent until the mandatory taxes are fully paid.

description:
Beautiful, cozy, clean, private, spacious and simple studio in an open country hillside location. This studio has lots of natural lighting and high ceilings. Private bathroom with a shower. Studio has a part ocean view with a private patio with a full ocean view. Stay in the peacefulness of nature yet only drive 10 minutes to Hilo; 15 minutes to Hilo Airport; +40 minutes to Hawaii Volcano Nat'l Park.

The space
Studio is cozy, tall ceiling, big windows, and in nature surrounded by 7 acres.
Studio includes comfortable queen size bed, couch(king fold out bed), dining table, hot plate,microwave, small refridgerator, and coffee maker.
*Please note- the studio does not have a full kitchen.
* The studio is mostly stand alone- does share the front porch to other home.
There is a private porch in the back of studio with a table+chairs and an ocean view.
There are 3 resident spaces in the main building; the property is 7 acres of grassla
neighborhood_overview:
This studio is 20 feet away from the 2 bedroom vacation rental and has 7 acres of grassland surrounding the unit. Peaceful landscape with horses and cows along the drive up, part of the rural beauty of Hamakua coast but close to Hilo.

The stand alone studio has a private patio overlooking the ocean. This is a quiet and peaceful location with a perfect temperature and breeze.

We are located 10 minutes to Hilo, 10 minutes to the nearest beach (Honolii Beach Park), and 50 minutes to the Volcanoes National Park((Re-opened 9/22)
Also Hawaii Botanical gardens and Akaka Falls are nearby. If you have any questions feel free to ask!
host_about:
Sharon and I built this beautiful, spacious home on 7 acres in 2003 to fulfill a dream of living in Hawaii. Our home takes advantage of an incredible view 5 miles north of Hilo on the Hamakua coast, up slope from the scenic drive and Hawaii Tropical Botanical Garden.  (vacation rentals currently on hold though due to Covid restrictions)..
Come share our neighborhood with the farms, local horses, space and quiet while you appreciate what we feel is the best of Hawaii.  You are close to many of Hilo’s local activities, and within easy traveling distance to the Volcano sights, waterfalls and lush vegetation and attractions of our coast.
We offer an extremely spacious main living house area that mirrors the space of our outside view, and an ohana next door for a smaller living option.  We love the sunrises over the water, the constantly changing weather, and the sunsets over the mountain.  We hope you enjoy this place as much as we do.
Mark

description:
There’s no better way to experience Oahu’s south shore than from this charming Honolulu vacation rental home. Ideal for a romantic retreat, this 1-bedroom, 1-bath home for 2 is a short stroll from the scenic Koko Crater trail system, 1 mile from the beach and within 5 miles of the Koko Marina Center and the Hawaii Kai Golf Course. Lounge poolside in your backyard or discover the nature reserve right next door!

The space
Bedroom: King Bed

Boasting all new upgrades, this Honolulu house has everything you and your loved one need to feel at home on the island. Beach-inspired furnishings coupled with coastal accents add a tropical touch to the open living area, housing a comfortable sofa, flat-screen Smart TV and large sliders overlooking the tiled swimming pool.

Experience south shore living at its finest as you claim a lounge chair by the shared backyard pool. Dive into the water to escape the heat or cool off with a mai tai on the shaded pati
neighborhood_overview:
Take no more than a few steps from the property to discover nature-lined walking trails guiding you toward Koko Crater. Hike the Makapu‘u Point Lighthouse Trail for epic ocean views and explore the Botanical Garden!

Soak up some sun on the stunning south shore beaches only 1 mile from your vacation rental or drive 4 miles down to Hanauma Bay to try snorkeling.

If golf is your game, the Hawaii Kai Golf Course is only 2 miles away offering breathtaking island views. Hit the links or head down to the Koko Marina Center for a little retail therapy! Also nearby is the Hawaii Kai Shopping Center, boasting one of the best shopping experiences on the island.
host_about:
Hi! We’re Evolve, the hospitality team that helps you rest easy when you rent a private, professionally cleaned home from us.

We promise your rental will be clean, safe, and true to what you saw on Airbnb or we'll make it right. Check-ins are always smooth, and we're here 24/7 to answer any questions or help you find the perfect property.

Our units are only dog friendly, but there is an extra $200.00 fee if you decide to bring your dog. it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place.

The space

Luxury condos are great, but we recommend living in Hawaii from the same perspective as the locals.
Mele Naia Homes recommends living in Hawaii from the same perspective as the locals.

It is located right behind the famous "Rainbow Drive-In" for plate lunches,

neighborhood_overview: Ko Olina Marina; 18-Hole Ted Robinson Championship Ko Olina Golf Course; Award-Winning Four Seasons full service Spa, the Disney Au’lani , paddle boarding, the Paradise Cove Luau, shopping, snorkeling, SCUBA diving, boating, fishing, sailing, surfing, windsurfing, walking and hiking paths; guided activities, including whale watching and dolphin swims as well as scenic island tours. neighborhood_overview: This end of Waikiki is composed of residents and is a favorite area for surfing, walking, jogging and bicycling.  Music events are close by at the Waikiki Shell and Kapiolani Park bandstand.  There are often events nearby such as art fairs, movies on the beach, sand volleyball tournaments, surf contests, and parades.  The finish  line of the Honolulu Marathon is steps away..  There are several tennis courts nearby and tennis racquets are provided by the hosts.  A quiet sandy beach for those with small children and for swimmers and stand up paddlers (Stand Up Paddleboard is provided in unit)  is steps away.  Kahala Mall is a mile away and has movie theaters, Whole Foods, and upscale shops. Up Monsarrat are shops and restaurants. Michel's Restaurant offers fine oceanfront dining four buildings down.

neighborhood_overview: Kihei

description:
Nestled in the cozy and quiet Hale Moi complex in Princeville, our spacious Studio suite condo is perfect to serve as your home base as you explore the awe-inspiring beauty of the North Shore (and beyond) of Kauai. The condo is less than a 5 minute walk to multiple beaches and the newly opened restaurants and spa at the 1Hotel Hanalei.

The space
Our Studio suite is a second-floor unit (up only 6 steps) with vaulted ceilings, a private 75-square foot lanai with breathtaking views, a great kitchenette, beach gear, and everything to make your stay cozy and comfortable. One of the best things about our complex, Hale Moi, is it is small and low-key - our building has just four condos. The condo has a king bed with Serta plush top mattress, a super comfy living area with love sofa and chair, dining table, a 37" flat panel TV, and two ceiling fans. The kitchenette is well-stocked with a mini-fridge/microwave/toaster oven/coffee maker/hot plate/dishes/etc. (and you can o
neighborhood_overview: Our condo is special for many reasons and a major one is location. Hale Moi is in one of the only areas in Princeville where you have beach access within walking distance. Two beaches are within a ten minute walk, with the closest being Pu'u Po'a beach in front of the newly renovated 1 Hotel. Right outside the front door is the scenic jog/walk/bike path that runs through Princeville, and across the street is a famous sunset viewing spot (Voted one of the 10 ten sunset viewing locations by Traveler Magazine), which is also great for whale watching if you’re with us during the season (Nov-April). Gorgeous Hanalei Bay is a 10 minute drive and for hikers, several trails are within reach, including the Okolehao trail in Hanalei and the infamous Kalalau Trail. If golf is your thing, the Makai golf course (recently renovated) is a half-mile away. For an easy dinner out, Hideaways Pizza Pub is a 5 minute walk. Princeville Center is a 5 minute drive and has a grocery store, coffee shop, yoga st
host_about: We live on Kauai and are committed to making your stay a relaxing and memorable one. If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to get in touch. Mahalo and Aloha!

I live in Colorado and am lucky to have an island getaway in Kailua-Kona Hawaii. I love the relaxed vibe of Kona and go there every chance I get.  

I am an open, happy, creative and fun-loving person; very focused at times, but not so serious. I love to decorate and spend time with my family including our 4 rescue dogs. I like to dance, bike, walk, stand-up paddle board and practice pilates for fun/exercise. I want to learn to paint, knit, and install tile : >

The ocean waves create a symphony of sounds. This is one of those units you will want to visit over and over again. Book now and for the future. The resort is one of the finest on Maui. neighborhood_overview: North Kihei

description:
Hale Mala means "House in the Garden" in Hawaiian. It is a peaceful spot in a beautiful tropical location.
Hale Mala is the downstairs portion of our home. Walk through the lanai to your private entry & begin feeling right at home. There are 3 spacious bedrooms & a massive lanai with outdoor lights that connect the living room area to the outside. With a large table & bench seating, plus a breakfast bar, there's space for everyone to be together. Perfect for couples or families.

The space
Transient Accommodation Tax is INCLUDED in this price. No extra to pay!!!

The Hale Mala rental includes:

- On-site parking
- Private keyless entry
- Wireless Internet
- Ultra High Definition TV with Apple TV, Netflix, Amazon Prime and Disney+
- Kitchen includes: fridge, microwave, toaster, oven, stove, coffee maker, coffee grinder, kettle, dishes and silverware
- High quality towels and linens are provided for all guests
neighborhood_overview: Hale Mala located in a quiet residential neighborhood. This is the place to book if you want to experience genuine Hawaiian culture and really live like a local. Because our place is actually where the locals live, we ask our guests to show the aloha spirit to those around them by keeping noise levels to a minimum after 10pm and by respecting Hawaiian culture.
host_about: Aloha! G'Day! We are a family of five who spend our time between two of the most amazing places on the planet, Hawaii and Australia. Travel, adventure and community are what we love most. We think life is best lived through new and exciting experiences, meeting new friends and making new memories along the way. We have been hosting guests at our two locations for over 3 years now and we love it. We try to create the perfect atmosphere for our guests to relax, have fun and discover all the best our cities have to offer.

WIFI available for a nominal fee paid to the resort.

My Timeshare Rentals,

description:
Aloha! My husband and I love having our family and friends visit. Our clean and cozy condominium is a great Molokai getaway where everyone feels at home while enjoying Molokai and we'd like you to do the same! We are setup for two adults or families.
The ocean is footsteps away with a beautiful view of Lanai, Maui, evening sunsets, and whale watching from late November to mid April.

The space
-First floor, one flight of stairs up!
-The kitchen is fully equipped with standard size refrigerator/freezer, gas stove, electric oven, microwave oven, coffee maker, toaster, blender, rice cooker, pots and pans for cooking and baking, cooking and baking utensils, cutting board, knives, can opener, corkscrew, wine glasses, kitchen towels, dish washing liquid, paper towels, and plates, bowls, flatware for four.
-Complimentary wifi exclusively for your use.
-LAN line for local calls. Nice to have because cell reception on Molokai is not that great.
-Be
neighborhood_overview:
You will be centrally located to all the sites and activities on the east and west sides of the island, and one mile east of Kaunakakai town where you can enjoy local eateries and get souvenirs:
-Saturday morning is open market for fresh fruits and vegetables, local delicacies, and souvenirs.
-At Fish & Dive you can refuel, arrange ocean gear and boating or fishing tours and get delicious seafood plate lunches from their lunch wagon.
-Eateries: Sundown cafe, Store House, Paddlers Inn, Fish & Dive's lunch wagon, Hula Bean cafe, Kamoi's, Cory's Lunch Wagon, Pizza Cafe, Molokai Burger, Home Town, Kanemitsu Bakery.
-Paddlers Inn has great nighttime music with local bands.
-Two miles east of Molokai Shores is Hiro's Family Grill at Hotel Molokai.
host_about: Aloha! My husband and I love having our family and friends visit. We have a clean and cozy beach front condominium for our visitors and rent it out the rest of the time. As soon as you get your keys out of the lockbox, we'd like you to feel at home and enjoy Molokai!

description:
enjoy a beautiful & restful glamping experience here on the homestead…

stay in our very comfy glamping tent in our tropical fruit, flower & herb gardens with privacy & an outdoor eco on-demand hot water shower, sink & antique cast iron tub…a private yard, a hammock & only ambient solar lighting at night perfect for stargazing.

wake to views of our beautiful sacred mauna & sun rising over the ocean…fresh air, fresh coffee/tea.

we are chefs…ask us about breakfast, dinner or cooking classes!

The space
this is our homestead and we are always working on projects, gardening & planting trees. you are welcome to join us!

where you will stay is private & tucked away down in to our organic gardens... very beautiful, comfy & clean.

with a private outdoor eco on demand hot water shower, sink & cast iron tub. a private yard w hammock and no electricity, only ambient solar powered lighting.

there’s a fire pit
neighborhood_overview: we are a homestead in the Hawaiian homestead farm lots. our neighbors are family & friends…this is a local community, in the countryside. we love visitors though cannot speak for our neighbors. it’s mellow, sacred & sweet here & we want to keep it that way…so please be respectful of everyone & everything while visiting.
host_about: Aloha we’re Kalen + Sorrel & we welcome you to our homestead here in Anahola, Kaua’i… Kalen is Hawaiian, born and raised in Kaua’i & living on this land since the 80’s. Sorrel had been visiting her family’s farm that is just down the road since she was a little girl before the two met & started homesteading together 5 years ago… We’re a mellow, earth loving, fun loving couple. And we love to share local stories, Hawaiian culture & tips.

Its great location offers convenience being close to everything – the beach, shops, restaurants, and attractions.

The space
We take cleanliness seriously and sanitation is our number one priority. Our professional cleaner ensures that your safety comes first.

description:
Beautiful condo located in gated community at Turtle Bay Resort and walking distance to fantastic beaches, golf and restaurants.

The space
The spacious floor plan makes Hale Nani one of the best family vacation spots on the North Shore. Sitting on the grounds of Turtle Bay Resort, you are in the prime location to experience the best of North Shore without the long drives from Waikiki.

When you get home from exploring the surf or beaches, relax and rest in the king bed on the main floor with en suite bathroom with a stand-up shower. New pillows and bedding will give you a good night’s rest in the bedroom in the king bed with flat screen TV. There is a window AC in the bedroom to keep you cool at night.

The rest of the bunch will have plenty of room to get away in the spacious upstairs loft. There are two queen beds, dressers to unpack and floor space for the kids to play. We have a few toys to get the party started!

The living room
neighborhood_overview:
Just a short distance, about ¼ mile from the condo complex you will find the beautiful beaches of the North Shore of Oahu, the Fazio Golf Course at Turtle Bay Resort and all the fantastic restaurants they have to offer. You can book surf lessons, horseback riding or helicopter tours all at Turtle Bay Resort.

10-minute drive to Sunset Beach, Pipeline, Waimea Bay and Valley and Shark’s Cove.

20-minute drive to the town of Hale’iwa where you can find great restaurants, shopping and adventure tours like Shark Tours, jet-ski rentals, and scuba diving.

10-minute drive to Brigham Young University and Polynesian Cultural Center.
host_about: Hosting wonderful vacations on the North Shore of Oahu

description:
Just minutes away from the glistening white sand beaches of Hapuna State Park and the Kohala Coast.

• Guest checking in must be 21+ with valid ID & card for $250 refundable security deposit (credit/debit card only)
• Resort tax $9/night payable at check in
• A/C optional $8.36/night
• Name on reservation must match photo ID at check-in

The space
Paniolo Greens is surrounded by the greatest sights and attractions the Big Island has to offer. Ten of the most picturesque golf courses in the world are nearby, along with tropical restaurants, extraordinary shopping, dining, luxurious spas and beachfront bars for unwinding after a long day of sightseeing. Nearby are the stunning white sands of Hapuna Beach, the famed Kona coffee fields and the resort's central location is also great for day trips to the Waipio Valley, Volcano National Park, and the magnificently majestic wonders of Akaka Falls. The comfortable two-bedroom vacation villas, posi
neighborhood_overview:
Area Activities:

• Beach
• Fishing
• Golf Courses
• Helicopter Rides
• Horseback Riding
• Kayaking
• Scuba Diving
• Shopping
• Snorkeling
• Popular Attractions

• Aloha Ocean Excursions
Get up close and personal with the Hawaiian coastline and marine life on exciting boat tours and snorkeling adventures! Offering state of the art and environmentally friendly excursions, Aloha Ocean Excursions allows you to snorkel to secluded beaches, encounter dolphins and whales, explore waterfalls and see the cave and lava tubes.

• Mauna Kea Summit Adventures
Come visit the original sunset and stargazing adventures! For many years, this experienced tour company has been offering guests an educational and memorable sightseeing adventure to one of Hawaii's most popular destination. Tours last 7-8 hours and include arctic style hooded parkas, a hearty meal and hot drinks.

• Yoga Hale
Visit Yoga Hale

description:
When you think of Maui, what comes to mind? Is it the sandy beaches? Or maybe the perfect climate? What about that amazing blue ocean? At Kihei Ali’i Kai C104 you’ll experience it all! This beautifully remodeled one bedroom, one bathroom ground floor condo is the perfect place to get away from it all. You’ll feel at home the moment you step inside; a color scheme of cool blue colors with tasteful Hawaiian inspired furniture and decor await you.

The space
Additional Description:

This unit features an open concept, easy living feel. Kick back and relax on your private and spacious lanai with quiet garden views.

Inside, there is plenty of seating to relax, dine and just hang out. The kitchen has everything you could ever need to prepare all your meals; fully equipped with high end stainless steel appliances and beautiful quartz countertops. You’ll stay cool with the Maui breezes by opening up the lanai doors but you can also enjoy the extr
neighborhood_overview: Kihei

description:
This fully remodeled, elegant one-bedroom, two-bathroom offers modern comfort for island living at its finest. Boasting ocean and West Maui Mountain views from the lanai, a modern chef’s kitchen, resort-style en-suite bathroom with a Calcutta Laza Quartz double vanity and a King size bed featuring a Sealy Tempurpedic cooling memory foam mattress, this is the luxury rental you’ve been dreaming of.

The space
The calming and beautifully lit King bedroom offers an attached private lanai, flat-screen smart TV and an exquisitely designed en-suite bathroom. The open-air kitchen features stainless-steel appliances and is stocked with everything you need to prepare beautiful meals, including but not limited to a blender, toaster and tea kettle. Enjoy dining on either the private lanai or at the indoor table with seating for 4.

The island themed living area includes a comfortable pull-out sofa and an over-sized armchair with ottoman facing a new LG smart TV o
host_about: I live on the island of Maui with my family. Originally from Las Vegas, NV, I moved here 11 years ago and love sharing my passion for the island lifestyle. I am a licensed Real Estate Broker with Hawaii Life Real Estate Brokers and am the full time property manager for this wonderful condo. I work with my wife and assistant Kristin to ensure our guests have a truly unforgettable Maui experience.

description:
Welcome to Luana Garden Villa 14D, located on the upper floor of Enclave Three at the prestigious Honua Kai Resort in Kaanapali, Maui. This luxurious 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom villa offers 2,047 sq ft of living space and high-end amenities that provide both comfort and style. Relax and entertain on the oversized 521 sq ft lanai, complete with a private outdoor kitchen and stunning views overlooking the pool area. Designed to comfortably accommodate up to 8 guests.

The space
Luana 14D features two primary bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms that include glass-walled walk-in showers, and a third bathroom with a bathtub and shower. Each bedroom has a King size bed, and the third bedroom has the option to be split into 2 twin beds prior to arrival.

As a guest of Luana Garden Villas, you'll enjoy full access to the resort's seven pools, waterslide and spas, fire pit area, and all the amenities of the 4-diamond rated Honua Kai Resort. At the end of the day, retreat
neighborhood_overview: The Honua Kai resort is located on the magnificent North Kaanapali Beach on the west side of Maui near Lahaina town. This resort has seven pools & numerous hot tubs you can enjoy during your stay, including a water slide! In each tower lobby there is a shop you can get snacks, drinks, amenities & more from. There is valet parking & bellhops to assist you as well as self parking available. Duke’s restaurant is onsite & offers breakfast, lunch and dinner along with pool service at the 3 main pools. There are BBQs throughout the resort for your use & easy access to the beach. The A'ina gourmet market in the Hokulani lobby & the Whalers General store in the Konea lobby provide everything from a bottle of milk to a bottle of fine wine. Take a stroll down the beach path & enjoy snorkeling at airport beach or soak in a sunset over the water.
host_about: Live 'The Good Life' on Maui with Maui Westside! Our family-owned business is dedicated to making your island getaway unforgettable. With local expertise, friendly staff, & free concierge services, we're here to ensure you have a great stay. We are a fully licensed & legal property management & real estate brokerage firm - license #RB-21121. Please feel free to contact us via email, text, or call during your stay.

description:
This premier 7th floor one bedroom suite offers partial ocean views as well as enchanting views of the West Maui Mountains. Ocean views even extend right into the master bedroom.

The space
Hokulani 738 is a luxurious 7th floor one bedroom suite that offers views of the tranquil blue Pacific Ocean as well as views of the lush West Maui Mountains. You will have plenty of space to relax in the 700 sq. ft. interior. To fully enjoy the warm Hawaiian breeze, fold away the glass doors to allow the relaxing interior to blend seamlessly with the outdoors.

The unit has been recently updated with new flooring, a new bed in the master bedroom, a new sofa in the living room, a 65” Smart TV in the living area, a washer & dryer, kitchen appliances, and decor.

When it’s time to rest, the gentle Maui breeze will lull you into deep slumber in the master bedroom’s king-sized bed. Enjoy the views because this is one of the few one-bedroom suites at Honua Ka
neighborhood_overview: Honua Kai sits beachfront in North Kaanapali so you’ll literally be just steps away from the tranquility of Maui’s shoreline. An “Ohana Play Package” including Tommy Bahama beach chairs, an umbrella, BBQ equipment, and a portable cooler is provided complimentary.
host_about:
The Ohana (Family) at Maui Resort Rentals has been helping vacationers "Make Maui Reality" for over 50 cumulative years on the shores of West Maui.  Inspired by the Maui lifestyle, we aim to provide incredible vacation experiences at a curated collection of premier resort residences.

For your convenience, our warehouse and offices are located in Kaanapali North Beach, just minutes from all of the West Maui resorts.

Our Ritz-Carlton and Marriott trained staff are here to serve. Your guest experience is our highest priority. The privilege to host your precious Maui vacation is ours. 

As an added benefit, our exclusive Maui Resort Rentals courtesy shuttle offers free guest transportation between our West Maui resorts a number of West Maui locations - including Lahaina, Kapalua, and Whaler's Village.

www.airbnb.com/p/mauiresortrentals

description:
This newly updated 2bdr/2bth deluxe condo in Country Club Villas has amazing Ocean views and a spacious floor plan. The home boasts 2 master bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms. Condo amenities include a fully appointed kitchen, in-unit washer/dryer, beach gear and designated parking. The complex has 3 pools, tennis and pickle ball courts and is very well located in Kailua. Walk to the grocery store, pharmacy and multiple restaurants. E Como Mai (Welcome).

The space
Whale watch from the lanai in the winter. Gorgeous sunsets are year round. Bring the office or stay in touch with upgraded WiFi and basic cable. the television in the 2nd Bedroom is not connected to cable but is Firestick/Roku compatible. The kitchen is well appointed with a variety of appliances and some basic non-perishable items such as sugar, creamers, and various spices. E como mai i kā mākou hale. (Welcome to our home!)

Other things to note

host_about:
My husband, Paul, and I are world travelers and like to think of ourselves as retired  but can't help but keep busy.  We are now renting/managing properties, camper vans and vehicles.  

I am also a Travel Agent and enjoy helping people get the most out of their vacation.  Just call!

Paul is a amazing source of island history and culture and is always available to "talk story".  He's got the inside scoop for food and coffee too!

description:

Located on the beautiful coastal town of Kapa'a, Kaua'i, the Kapaa Shore Resort enjoys views of the resort's sun drenched gardens, heated pool, and shallow tide pool beach while being just steps to shops, restaurants, and more!

description:
Maui's best kept secret is Kihei Garden Estates. Located on the southwest side of Maui. Watch spectacular ocean sunsets, dine in or out with the convenience of grocery store and restaurants steps from your condo. On-site amenities include a barbecue grill, swimming pool, whirlpool spa. Golf courses close by, wifi. 20 min from the Airport, Makena, Lahaina. Free Parking. A luxury rental with all the necessities of home. Stay in and cook or walk steps to the restaurants.

Registration number
390080110074, TA-170-417-5616-01

host_about: Aloha, I'm Christine Tyler.  I travel extensively with my husband for his job.   I call Home Texas and Maui my home.  I raised my family on Maui, but their all grown and live in Oregon, Missouri and Maryland.  I hope you will love staying in my home as much as I do!  I'm constantly remodeling and painting to keep it updated.

description:
Spectacular Views! beautiful sunsets, and tropical breezes, watch the whales, and just relax

The space
Corner third floor condo with ocean front views on Kahana Bay. Enjoy ocean front views from the lanai off of the living room and master bedroom. A 30" flat screen TV coupled with the DVD player keeps you entertained in the evenings. Bring your CD's from home and listen on the player provided. Roll down the shades in the living room to provide afternoon shade on the corner ocean front lanai. The Valley Isle Resort is an ocean front unit within walking distance to Maui Brewing Co., China Boat and Dollie's Café and Pub.

Nearby Beaches to Valley Isle: Kahekili Beach Park (Airport Beach): generally calm conditions, excellent snorkeling and swimming, public restrooms, BBQ grills and large grassy area , Honokowai Beach Park: great for snorkeling due to shallow, reef protected beach, Children’s playground area, plenty of shade, tables and BBQ grills, Pohaku
host_about:
