description:
We are located in the heart of Wailea at the Grand Champions Villas, close to Maui's best beaches and within walking distance to great restaurants, the Shops of Wailea and surrounded by Championship Golf Courses. Grand Champions is a serene 12-acre park-like resort next to the Wailea Tennis Club and Wailea Blue Golf Course. Have fun with the whole family at this stylish place.

The space
You are invited to stay in our beautifully one bedroom two bath unit nestled in the popular Grand Champions at Wailea.

This unit is on the 1st floor and has AC in the bedroom and living room, a fully equipped kitchen, TV's, King size bed, sofa sleeper in the living room, vaulted ceilings and lots of natural light providing a spacious, relaxed feel. The unit is surrounded by lush greenery and dining on the lanai allows for the Hawaiian outdoor living experience.

The Grand Champions onsite amenities include two heated pools and spas, BBQ's, and 12 acres of be
host_about:
Aloha, I'm Anke, property manager surfer, runner and kiteboarder living on Maui. Managing vacation rentals in Maui and I love what I do! 

Love, Live Aloha!

description:
STPH2013/0010
A charming vacation rental cottage in Paia / Kuau on Maui’s well-loved North Shore. 15 minutes from Kahului airport and centrally located to many Maui attractions, such as the sunrise from Haleakala or driving the beautiful winding road to Hana. We are very close to the trendy, historic town of Paia, with restaurants, galleries, boutiques and more. The cottage is a stroll away from the Kuau Store deli and the #1 rated beachfront restaurant on Maui, Mama’s Fish House.

The space
Menehune Cottage has a patio area with outdoor table/chairs and gas bbq to fully enjoy easy outdoor living in the balmy evenings. The interior of the cottage is fun, friendly and colorful, an inviting “home away from home”, full of the spirit of Aloha.

There are two bedrooms:
#1 - spacious room with queen bed. This room has "room style" A/C. With the windows and door closed it will cool the room to 72F.
#2 - queen bed with a large sliding door
neighborhood_overview: Experience a delightful part of “old Hawaii” with all modern conveniences by staying at the Menehune Cottage in Kuau, one of the coolest little neighborhoods on the island and only steps away from the endless fun activities that Maui’s North Shore has to offer; windsurfing, kiting, surfing, dining at Mama’s Fish House, playing in the tide pools on Mama’s beach, swimming, cycling, shopping in Paia, walking/running on beautiful Baldwin beach and much more!!!!
host_about: We're a small property management company in Haiku Maui.  We have a lovely collection of homes in Haiku, Kula, Paia and Spreckelsville.  We enjoy providing unique lodging to each and every guest.  Our local staff can quickly assist when you have questions or need local information.  Stop by our office in "downtown" Haiku to visit.  We'd love to meet you.

description:
Captivating unobstructed Ocean and Molokai views, from this stunning oceanfront Condo

The space
This condo is one of the closest to the beach and ocean! From the moment you step in the door you will be greeted by a breathtaking view of the ocean. Royal Kahana #109 is an updated, Oceanfront condo with amazing sunset views! From our private lanai (balcony) you can:
View the Island of Molokai, watch the whales as they jump and play in the water (during whale season),Take in one of Maui's many rainbows or stunning sunsets. Relax and enjoy your morning coffee, cocktails or meals, Watch wind surfers as they do their flips and tricks, Spot turtles in the water, Snuggle up together on the sofa. Enjoy the starlit skies

This recently refreshed one bedroom condo is perfect for your Maui getaway. Features 777 square feet of living space and has 150 square feet lanai. The living area provides ample seating as well as additional sleep space via the comfy pull-

description:
Located in the heart of Waikiki, this Hawaiian-themed suite is the ideal home away from home! With a full kitchen, this unit is steps away from some of the world's best shopping, dining, entertainment and of course famous Waikiki Beach!

With one-bedroom, one-bath, a king bed and a modern kitchen, we are certain that you will love your stay.

host_about:
Located in the heart of wonderful Waikiki, Royal Hawaiian Hospitality operates dozens of vacation units surrounded by some of the world's best shopping, dining and entertainment!

Just a block from the famous Waikiki Beach, we invite you to enjoy the warm sea breezes, the sun, sand and surf all while relaxing  in our condos that offer the comforts and conveniences of home!

description:
Located steps away from the uncrowded white sand beaches on Molokai island (*not Maui or Oahu islands*). West Molokai has white sand beaches and blue snorkeling waters. Stunning two bedroom/bath is perfect for long stay or quick get-away retreat. No need to pack the car to go to a secluded beach - simply walk out front to relax on beautiful beaches and watch a spectacular sunset! Enjoy peaceful resort pool and bbqs. Many amenities!

The space
This chic two story 2bdrm/2bth home is located on the west side of Molokai in a quiet residential complex, located right on the beach! Your Molokai island getaway starts here! Offering one of the best locations on Molokai since it's located along one of Molokai's westend white sand beautiful snorkeling beaches and located in a quiet residential complex where you hear the sounds of nature.

This 1,400 sq ft home offers the perfect home-away-from-home for groups or couples. Please note: Accommodation is not suitable f
neighborhood_overview:
Lounge and enjoy the complex's pool and bbqs located all around the complex. Lush beautiful jungle greenery surrounds you wherever you go in this quiet complex, which is split between permanent homeowners and visitors.

This is a quiet complex - a place where people come to relax. So much so that 'marco-polo' is not allowed in the complex's pool. This place is not ideal for small children or group's wishing to party late at night - - instead it is ideal for people seeking a retreat in this stunning environment. Quiet hours are respected within this complex and all must respect their neighbors. All visitors are expected to help us sustain this peaceful environment and all visitors seeking peace and serenity are GREATLY welcomed! Aloha <}
host_about:
Aloha I'm Wendy. I love being able to provide a peaceful, and comfortable home away from home for travellers, so they may relax, unwind, take in the ocean views and enjoy the true essence of Maui.  I look forward to meeting other AirBnB members.

If you are wanting to purchase property on Maui, I am a licensed realtor in the State of Hawai'i. RS 85420 and licensed on all Hawaii islands. I would love to speak with you and answer any questions you might have about vacation rentals on Maui.
My motto: "Be the change you wish to see in the world"

description:
Be our guest and experience the sights, sounds, smells and tastes of "authentic Hawaii." Be lulled to sleep by the sounds of lush rainforest.
Wake up to swaying palm trees, tropical fruits trees and the smell of tropical flowers.

Our private guest cottage (ohana) is located adjacent to the main house, just behind the carport making parking convenient for our guests.

The ohana features a very comfy king size bed, kitchenette, TV, Wifi and private bathroom with outdoor shower. Paradise awaits!

The space
The ohana has a private enterence which is located at the rear of the carport, where guests can park their vehicle. The hosts live in the main home on the property and are available, should you have any questions or concerns during your stay.

The ohana is set up much like a studio with open concept living, but features authentic Hawaiian ammenities, such as the relaxing outdoor shower and charming old Hawaii tropical decor.

host_about:
Aloha,

My wife, Mandy and I were married on Kauai Island in the mid 80's.
We always dreamed of living in the islands, so after raising our two sons in the beautiful Sierra Nevada Foothills in Northern California, we decided to make our dream a reality.

We love our Big Island home and we love sharing this magical place with friends & family.

We look forward to welcoming you to paradise!

description:
Welcome to Ohia Hideaway! Wake up to a room service style breakfast of local fruit and homemade baked goods surrounded by thousands of acres of beautiful native Hawaiian rainforest. Its the perfect place to stargaze and relax in the private hot tub after a day of adventures. Stay put or explore what the quaint Volcano area has to offer. You can spend your days hiking in Volcanoes National Park, exploring lava tubes, golfing, visiting the winery and of course viewing the world famous lava lake.

The space
This space is located in it’s own, separate building, surrounded by thousands of acres of pristine rainforest.  You can hang out on your private lanai which has an outdoor shower, hot tub, fire table and bbq.  New building  offers an indoor shower, and a separate heating and A/C system in the suite, which is vital if you are sensitive to mold or other allergens found in the rainforest.  Enjoy high speed internet so you can be productive while you stay in absolute
host_about: I love being part of our small, tight knit Volcano community.  I am pursuing my dream of becoming a writer, and find inspiration and energy from the rainforest, the volcano and our wonderful community members.  My whole family lives here in Volcano, and I was lucky enough to be able to recently join them as part of my journey. I love meeting new people and sharing stories.  I have found that living here has allowed me to heal and grow.  I am sure you will find as I have that you will feel the energy of this place and come away renewed and refreshed.

Just put on your flip flops, spf, grab a hat and chair, breathe in the ocean air, listen to the waves, and the songs of tropical birds, and enjoy breathtaking sunsets every night. Location is everything and you can have a great stroll all over this walking town to great food,bars,shopping and surf lessons.

Na Pua Lani, "The Heavenly Flowers" Estate is centrally located on the island of Oahu, near a beautiful beach, endless shopping & practically every type of cuisine eatery. The space

The Pikake is the smallest of the three separate houses, but is a comfortable two-bedroom home with a full bathroom - just as elegant and well-appointed as the others, but sitting above the garage with views to Diamond Head. The delightful island-style décor creates a relaxed and charming atmosphere for
neighborhood_overview: Located just a hop, skip, and jump away from Waikiki, yet a world apart in terms of character and charm, Kaimuki is an eclectic neighborhood. The thriving community of Kaimuki is located just mauka (on the mountain side) of Diamond Head. It is one of Honolulu's oldest neighborhoods, providing an eclectic mixture of established businesses and new trendy shops and restaurants. The area has managed to retain its historical charm while making room for new exciting business growth. The casual walking district of Kaimuki is filled with niche shops, specialty boutiques and unique eateries dotted along its main thoroughfare of Waialae Avenue. Its unique character and prime location make Kaimuki a wonderful place to live, work, play and visit. Kaimuki (pronounced ky-moo-kee) is a historic town, remaining one of the oldest communities on Oahu, Hawaii. King Kalakaua's ostrich farm was once roaming all over the mountainside of Kaimuki. Then it became the State's carnation farm for funeral flowers.
host_about: When Greg Siok was at his 10th year into his 25 year career in the construction industry, he started in property management in 1996 with the rental of his own home and has been renting out his own properties ever since. In 2010, Greg and his real estate broker wife, Cindy, started their own real estate company, At Home Hawaii Real Estate Sales & Property Management, and Greg took charge of the property management side of the business. Greg now manages properties for owners throughout Oahu, with about half of the rentals being on the Windward side of the island in Kailua or Kaneohe. Greg is a long-time resident of Kailua, where he grew up and where he raised two boys of his own. Now an empty-nester, Greg continues to enjoy meeting people through the property management business and enjoys working with contractors and other professionals who improve and maintain homes.

description:
Magical tropical escape and working coffee farm. Our farm produces delicious Kona coffee while also being a bio-plantation (botanical garden) that grows rare tropical plants and provides a home for local birds and wildlife.

The space
Property:
Magical tropical escape and working coffee farm. Our farm produces delicious Kona coffee while also being a bio-plantation (botanical garden) that grows rare tropical plants and provides a home for local birds and wildlife.

Three acres are devoted to the coffee trees, while the remaining acreage is landscaped primarily in rare and endangered tropical plants with the hope of encouraging their use in landscaping and thus saving the species. There are even a new species of avocado that was discovered on the property. These avocados are named Sallee avocados after Derek's mother.

Two acres of the property is landscaped in a wild tropical feel. Meander around the property (careful, this is not an
neighborhood_overview: We are settled near the small artist village of Holualoa.  The town offers art galleries, a spa (massage and yoga), and restaurants.  There are wonderful art stores and quaint shops (less touristy than downtown Kona). There is even a shop that sells Ukeleles!  If you feel like some more shopping and action, downtown Kona is also a short drive away (about a 15-minute drive). Our property is off the Mamalahoa hwy.
host_about:
We are an easy-going, health conscience, friendly couple who feel fortunate to enjoy and be able to share the beauty of Hawaii.  

In our free time, we enjoy skiing, yoga, hiking, dancing, and general exploring (so much to discover). Derek is currently learning to play the bass, while I (Alissa) am working on my healthy cooking skills.

host_about:
I have lived in the Islands since 1960. My husband and I met on Oahu.  We moved to Maui in 1973 where he began his art career. In 1984 we opened The Curtis Wilson Cost Gallery. It is now the longest running one-man gallery in the State of Hawaii. 
We love to travel and stay at Airbnb's. These experiences have laid the foundation for our Kula Jasmine Studio and Kula Jacaranda Studio. We wished to offer an authentic Upcountry Maui alternative to the hotel option. There are so many wonderful things to do on the slopes of Haleakala and we enjoy sharing Maui with our guests.

description:
Spacious and elegant. Completely remodeled in July of 2021, no expense was spared to create our gorgeous oceanfront oasis. This two-bedroom, two-bathroom condo features luxurious touches paired with oceanfront serenity. Located in sunny Kihei, all of Maui is within reach. Beach chairs, umbrellas, plush towels and a cooler are all provided. Whether you dine out at a delicious local restaurant or play chef in our fully stocked kitchen, you will love your new home away from home.

The space

Our condo is located at Kauhale Makai “Village by the Sea”, a community nestled up against a charming beach; perfect to catch the most amazing sunsets. The property amenities include two pools, a hot tub, volleyball court, shuffleboard decks, putting green, several BBQ grills with picnic tables an
neighborhood_overview: Kihei is located at the base of Haleakala, a sprawling and majestic 10,000 foot high volcano. Stunning views of the mountain are everywhere. Lined with miles of beaches, local food & shopping, and close proximity to many activities. Fun fact about Hawaii- all beaches are public! There is no such thing as a private beach anywhere in the state. Together with neighboring Wailea, the area enjoys numerous shops, restaurants and “happy hour” opportunities. Kauhale Makai is a short distance from many grocery stores, including a Safeway, Times and Foodland. If you prefer Costco or Target swing by on your way from the airport!
host_about: Traveling on company business trips five days a week for eighteen years has taught us what is important to guests. This inspired us to create the ideal environment and provide the right amenities for the perfect stay.  Happiness can be about the journey that produces it and we found it on Maui, the “ valley island”.  After visiting Maui for many years on vacation for a break from business travel, we moved here permanently a few years ago. We chose Kihei, a relaxed ocean front surfing community that thrives with the aloha spirit! We welcome you into our Ohana.

The space

The first thing you will notice are the breathtaking ocean views, picturesque palms, and refreshing sea breeze - Hawaii’s natural air conditioner! A covered lanai offers the ideal location to experience the quintessential sights, sounds, and smells of the island. Enjoy an oceanfront morning coffee or afternoon cocktail at the comfortable outdoor table and chairs. A BBQ is also available for an afternoon of grilling and dining outside!

An inviting living area greets you upon arrival with cozy furnishings. Snuggle up on the comfy sofa and enjoy a movie night at home on the large, flatscreen TV with cable and high-speed internet. Spectacular ceilings tower high overhead featuring an open design to promote airflow and circulation.
neighborhood_overview: Environmental Disclosure. Guest acknowledges that the State of Hawaii is exposed to environmental hazards including, but not limited to, tidal waves, hurricanes and floods. Please refer to the local phone book for information pertaining to evacuation procedures. In the event of an emergency, the State of Hawaii utilizes a warning alert system (emergency sirens are tested on the first working day of every month at 11:45 a.m.). Guest is responsible for using their best efforts to familiarize themselves with property, its location, and surroundings. Some of the properties are in a remote location. As such, what would be considered normal response time for public services in an urban area may not be available in this location, i.e., police, fire, and emergency services. Also, naturally dwelling animals, reptiles and fauna are different then might be encountered in an urban setting and some might be considered “pests” by some individuals, i.e., centipedes, geckos, roaches, spiders, rodents,

host_about:
Kona Coast Vacations hosts over 5,400 reservations a year with the help of knowledgeable management, proficient team members and trusted home owners. Open 7 days a week, we strive to help with each visitors’ every need. Sharing Aloha from the first contact whether it is phone or email, we are here to assist by making the booking process as seamless as can be. We pride ourselves on providing hands on assistance whenever it is needed, whether it is reservation details, maintenance issues, or even booking activities! 

Kona Coast Vacations is fortunate to team up with great property owners which is instrumental in providing exceptional homes for our new and returning guests. With over 240 vacation rentals from oceanfront homes, ocean view condos and private estates, we are here for your every need, open seven days a week to take care of our guests and owners. With two locations in Kailua Kona and Mauna Lani we have dedicated specialists in guest services managing reservations, maintenance, and property checks alongside our accounting, support and marketing specialists. We are proud to be Airbnb members since 2001 and now are Superhosts with over 1070 reviews.
We hope to host you Hawaii and help create a memory to last you a lifetime. We are your “’Ohana” (family) on the Big Island of Hawaii, please do not hesitate to utilize our listed resources and book activities thru Kona Concierge.

description:
On the lava fields surrounded by Ohia trees you will find our cozy Lotus Dome. Embracing atmosphere with covered lanai, ocean view, a million stars at night, comfy Queen size bed and kitchen. At 50 feet outdoor bathhouse with shower, sink and toilet. Furnished Japanese style, a room with a view! Close to South point, Green & black Sand beach & snorkelfun bays. Kahuku volcano park is close, at 10 min, great hiking! Anyone is welcome, we are happy to receive you with a warm Aloha.

The space
The Lotus accomodates a maximum of 2 people. It is located on 3 acres of lava land, far enough from our house to have your own privacy and also close enough to walk over if you need something or have some questions. It is basic, a little bit like glamping, but very cozy. A real outdoor feeling in a protected area. And with the luxury of a fully equipped kitchen, with a ice cooler and with an outlet for evening lights and charging your devices. The outdoor shower is cool, mainly
neighborhood_overview: Ka'u country is unique for the lava, million starry nights, the blooming ali'i, ohia trees, nice local ka'u market on saturdays, with lots of fruit, vegetables and nice treasures to find out there and lots of hidden corners waiting to be found out there. Also there is a supermarket and gas station nearby, a coffee shop and some small restaurants. And beautiful Kahuku Volcano park is close, 10 minutes drive, great for hiking, open Thursday till Sunday. Manuka park is also 10 minutes drive, open every day.
host_about: Living here together with my Dutch wife Genevieve, on the Big Island of Hawaii, in the beautiful district of Ka'u. I love music, playing Ukelele, dancing Hula and snorkelling in the deep blue Pacific Ocean. I share all of this with Genevieve, together we dance lots of Hula, enjoy our land, enjoy receiving guests here, we host a couple of rentals, and we love sharing the aloha of the beautiful Hawaiian culture and stories. We also love to travel now and then but most of all we enjoy the Hawaiian islands.

host_about: Aloha! I was born and raised in Montana but spent my entire life visiting the Hawaiian island each year. This lead me to be an outdoor enthusiast and adventure seeker. I love traveling to new places to be exposed to different cultures and foods but I always find myself back in Montana or the Hawaiian islands. My travels have taught me to appreciate the small things regarding accommodations and my homes provide those same pleasures for guests. Maintaining a low impact on my environment is a priority  and I have carried that best practice into the care of my  accommodations and ask that my guests to the same.  We have one world and one life lets all do our part to take care of each other.

host_about:
The complex is located directly across from Kamaole III State Beach Park, which is known as one of the most beautiful and safest beaches in the Islands.  It is perfect for swimming, snorkeling, sunning, jogging, picnicking, kite flying, and especially enjoying amazing sunsets and whale watching.

Each unit has a private lanai that faces the interior of the complex, offering views of the expansive lawns, pools, and lush tropical landscape of palm trees, hibiscus, birds of paradise and plumeria trees.  Most lanais also offer views of the beautiful Pacific Ocean and spectacular sunsets.  

There are two pools, a covered pavilion, and a full size tennis court on the property.  Every evening the outdoor barbecue area is a popular spot to socialize while grilling the perfect dinner and watching as the Hale Kamaole conch shell band performs their nightly sunset ritual.

You will find world class golf courses, fantastic snorkeling and diving, many Maui activities, abundant shopping and delicious fine and family dining all within minutes of Hale Kamaole.

host_about:
From Silicon Valley to big islands 

Had been a software engineer in Silicon Valley for many years and kindly tired of the city has nothing but technology, hawaii was always my dream: beautiful beaches , nice weather ……

Big island is one of my favorite among all the 4 hawaii islands. It has all different climates, volcanoes, rain forest which is specific from other islands, also green sand beach , white sand beach and black sand beach, lots of fruits everywhere.

host_about: Hi, we’re Vacasa, North America’s largest vacation rental management company. Owners of vacation homes around the world trust us to deliver exceptional service throughout your entire vacation. Professional housekeepers clean and stock each home, and our customer care team is available around the clock—with a local property manager ready to show up and help out. We like to think we offer the best of both worlds: you can enjoy a one-of-a-kind vacation experience in a unique property, without compromising on service and convenience. Check out our listings, and get in touch if you have any questions. Your vacation is our full-time job, and we'd love to help you plan your perfect getaway.

description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place, newly renovated studio with fully equipped kitchen, private bathroom and designed parking space.

This is a single house, your unit is on the first floor with private entry, totally safe and private.

I also accept short term rental, welcome to inquire about it.

Other things to note
Tax information:

Regardless if you rent your property short term or long term, we need to talk about tax obligations that come along with collecting rental income in Hawaii.

1.) On all gross rents received you have to pay 4.5% General Excise Tax (GET).

2.) If you rent 180 days or less per tenant, then you’re obligated to pay an additional 10.25% Transient Accommodation Tax (TAT)

3) UPDATE effective 12.14.2021: OTAT – Oahu Transient Accommodation Tax (Oahu). All rental revenue from rental terms shorter than 180 days (plus cleaning fees collected) is subject to an
host_about: Grace House LLC is the professional short term rental management company in Hawaii. We manage over 20 properties.

description:
Hale Kai Kalani (“House of the Heavenly Sea”) is a perfect Kauai cottage situated on one and a half acres of land just up from the picturesque Rock Quarry Beach (also known as Kahili Beach). Conveniently located near Kilauea Town, home of the Kilauea Lighthouse and the Crater Hill National Wildlife Refuge along with many beautiful Kauai beaches. Rock Quarry Beach is just a ten minute walk or two minute drive from your comfortably furnished island vacation home.

The space
The large spacious lanai overlooks the Pacific Ocean, the Kilauea River valley, the lush Crater Hill National Wildlife Preserve and a fresh tropical jungle waterfall. The property’s lushly landscaped grounds include seasonal tropical fruits including bananas, limes, figs, starfruit, and coconuts…all available to you during your stay.

The Parrish Collection is a locally owned and based real estate management company that specializes in vacation rentals on Kauai and Maui. Our collection
host_about:
Jonathan Parrish, or "JP" as he is referred to by friends, family, and colleagues, is actively involved with the day to day activities of The Parrish Collection Kauai.  

My personal goal is to ensure that we are exceeding the expectations of all our guests! 

Explore our unique collections of extraordinary Kauai vacation rentals, then match your style with the largest variety of properties available including the Kauai’s most popular resorts and widest selection of oceanfront homes in Poipu Beach.

host_about:
Hosted by RedAwning Vacation Rentals

Welcome to RedAwning, a whole new way to travel. We make staying in a unique home or apartment easier than staying at a hotel. By partnering with local homeowners throughout North America, we provide you with the largest collection of vacation homes in the most destinations. Every stay includes our experienced 24/7 customer assistance by text, chat, email and phone, and access to all your travel details via our free mobile app. We offer consistent terms and flexible cancellation policies, and we include accidental damage protection for every stay with no security deposits and a best rate guarantee. Wherever you want to go, RedAwning is here to make your journey easier!

description:
Escape to Maui's paradise and experience luxury living in Luana Garden Villa 8B. This stunning 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom villa is located on the ground floor of building 8 in Enclave Two at the Honua Kai Resort with over 2,047 sq ft of living space, this villa boasts a spacious lanai of 521 sq ft. Enjoy a tranquil and private oasis on the grounds of the magnificent Honua Kai Resort, where you can enjoy all the amenities of the resort & be able to retreat to your own private villa anytime you like.

The space
Relax and unwind on your oversized lanai while you cook a delicious meal on your personal gas BBQ or gather around the poolside fire pit with friends after a luxuriating dip. Luana Garden Villas provides a tranquil and private oasis on the grounds of the magnificent Honua Kai Resort & Spa, where you can enjoy all the amenities of the resort and be able to retreat to your own private villa anytime you like.

Villa 8B comes complete with high-end amenities
neighborhood_overview: The Honua Kai resort is located on the magnificent North Kaanapali Beach on the west side of Maui near Lahaina town. This resort has seven pools & numerous hot tubs you can enjoy during your stay, including a water slide! In each tower lobby there is a shop you can get snacks, drinks, amenities & more from. There is valet parking & bellhops to assist you as well as self parking available. Duke’s restaurant is onsite & offers breakfast, lunch and dinner along with pool service at the 3 main pools. There are BBQs throughout the resort for your use & easy access to the beach. The A'ina gourmet market in the Hokulani lobby & the Whalers General store in the Konea lobby provide everything from a bottle of milk to a bottle of fine wine. Take a stroll down the beach path & enjoy snorkeling at airport beach or soak in a sunset over the water.
host_about: Live 'The Good Life' on Maui with Maui Westside! Our family-owned business is dedicated to making your island getaway unforgettable. With local expertise, friendly staff, & free concierge services, we're here to ensure you have a great stay. We are a fully licensed & legal property management & real estate brokerage firm - license #RB-21121. Please feel free to contact us via email, text, or call during your stay.

description:

description:

Within this tranquil setting on Kauai's spectacular north shore, guests will find a freshly remodeled kitchen, updated bathrooms, new furniture, a new television, new paint, new ceiling fans, new carpet in the bedrooms, and even new bedding, pillows, and lamps.

The space
The primary bedroom at Hallor Hale boasts its own television, direct lanai access, and en suite bath with tub and shower, while the second bedroom has its own lanai access and full bath. The home also features a loft, furnished with two twin beds and already fully functional as a third bedroom, which will be completely enclosed by early 2020. description:
Come stay in our brand new luxurious condo with ocean view located in Kihei!!! We call this style "tropical glam" which is very upscale yet relaxing and beachy! Featuring white planked flooring, farmhouse sink with gorgeous gold faucet, custom art, marble shower all with an ocean view!!! Sip a mai tai on the lanai at sunset or gaze up at Mt. Haleakala Volcano!!! This charming complex has a pool & spa and is ocean front in Kihei!!

The space
Beach chairs, towels, boogie boards and umbrella are provided!

host_about:
We have lived in La Jolla for 27 years and have raised our 3 children here. We love to travel and have been all over the world but can honestly say that La Jolla remains one of the most beautiful and interesting places we have been to. Great weather, beautiful beaches and a vibrant downtown.
I (Christy) am fanatical about my two Siberian Huskies and enjoy walking with them all over La Jolla. I love yoga, working out and running. I also love ecommerce and am an avid wreath maker and sign painter.
David (husband) loves to kite sail, surf, work out and travel down to Las Ventana in Baja plus our family favorite, Maui.
We both love to read and cook! Mexican food, fresh fish from El Pescador Fish Market on Pearl, breakfast at Coffee Cup Cafe and dining at George's at the Cove are among our favorite things here in La Jolla!
We are new to hosting vacation rentals but have stayed in quite a few. Our first homestay was in Paris and it was so nice to be in an neighborhood and not a generic hotel we really felt a little Parisan!
The cottage in Birdrock was the home of a friend which we purchased and lovingly updated. I, Christy put my wood working skills to the test and actually made most of the items in the hous (dining room table, master bedroom furniture, signs, shelves etc). Always up for a new adventure!
We hope you love staying at our cottage "Casa Blanca" as much as we do. We are here to help answer questions, guide you or be of service.

description:

This Beautiful Condo features the highest quality elegant decor.

host_about:
I have always known I would have a home on beautiful Kauai and dreamed of hosting guests who come to Kauai to fulfill their own life's dream. My favorite TV show when growing up was 'Fantasy Island' and here I am. Over the past 13 years I have come to realize that all that guests who have stayed at Wailua Riverside Hideaway become ohana the moment they arrive. It is you the guests who are the true stars in this Fantasy Island called Kauai! 

I now run a vacation rental business here on the island: Kauai Calls! managing over 40 properties with co-hosting help from Cathy and Michelle, my ohana! 

I look forward to greeting/meeting you here at the Wailua Riverside Hideaway! We have self-check-in set up for all other properties on the island!  

Mahalo nui loa! 
Candace, 
Owner P RB
Kauai Calls!

description:
A204 is a prime Royal Oceanfront unit with gorgeous ocean views from every window. Sleep to the sounds of the waves right outside your bedroom window. Prepare meals in the state of the art kitchen and relax in the comfortable living room while watching a magnificent Kauai sunrise every morning. You can dine inside or outside on your lanai and whale watch (in season). You will sleep on luxurious new beds and we provide 100% cotton linens, as well as 100% cotton towels and bathmats.

The space
Guests have access to the Waipouli Resort pool and gym. The pool has a lazy river and a slide -- super fun for kids, adults, and families!

The Waipouli Beach Resort is centrally located and within walking distance from Safeway, one of the best farmers market on the island, our quaint Kapaa town with stores for local products and clothing, restaurants, food trucks and more. You have easy access equally between the north shore and south shore, are very near the mai
